name: Franke Basis BFG 651 1.5 Bowl Inset Kitchen Sink
description:
This ultra modern and hard-wearing sink features one and a half bowls with a grooved draining board, offering both form and function. Its reversible design means you can easily fit it around your kitchen needs. Choose from Coffee, Onyx and Polar White colourways.

Composite granite is a material that's made to simulate granite and stone, but enables the sink shape to be moulded. Granite particles are bonded together with synthetic materials to create a smoother, flatter surface. It is also far more difficult for residue, food particles and bacteria to accumulate in between the granules, which greatly improves hygiene, and reduces lime scale build-up. This material is highly resistant to heat, impact and staining making it the perfect choice for your kitchen sink.

Key features:

  • Cabinet Size: 600mm
  • Bowl Size: 340mm x 420mm x 200mm
  • Small Bowl Size: 150mm x 290mm x 100mm
  • Cut-Out Size: 950mm x 480mm

Please note: This sink does not come with the tap pictured.

Worth knowing: Waste and overflow kit is included. Plumbing kit sold separately.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Choose the perfect sink for your kitchen

Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect kitchen sink, from material to sink configuration.

Stainless Steel Stainless steel is the most popular material, made from premium 18/10 nickel steel. It looks beautiful, is resistant to staining, chipping, rust and corrosion, is heat proof and non-fading, hygienic and suitable for food preparation.
Ceramic Kiln-fired porcelain for a tough, smooth gloss finish which is able to stand up to even the harshest treatment. Very hard-wearing, mostly used in classic, country style kitchens. Can be inset, undermounted or the classic Belfast style.
Composite Granite Contains 80% tough granite particles with an acrylic of synthetic material which gives great strength. They are resistant to burns, dents, chips scratches and stains - 100% food safe, 100% acid resistant, 100% non-fading. They can resist up to 280 degrees of heat.
Undermounted vs Inset Sinks Traditional inset sinks are extremely practical. They can be cheaper than undermounts, and simpler to install. Undermounts give a seamless appearance to worktops which can have drainer grooves cut into them. Both styles can be found in Stainless Steel, Ceramic or Composite Granite.
1 bowls vs 1.5 bowls The 1.5 bowl is the most popular configuration, if space permits. The smaller bowl can be used for washing cutlery or glassware to save water and time. Can also be use with a drainer basket to drain vegetables, rinse salads etc.

name: John Lewis Trim Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Dark Leg, Winchester Anthracite
description:
Ready for your sofa sanctuary? We love the cocooning shape of our Trim sofa, somewhere to switch off and escape to at the end of a busy day.

This welcoming retreat is designed for long-lasting comfort. Made in the UK and MADE TO LAST, the sofa frame has a 15-year guarantee, as solid as the wood it's built from. The wood has been selected for its low-moisture content, for strength and durability.

We've got to thank the designers for their thoughtful touches here. They've added foam in the side cushions to create a comfortable structure that's easy to maintain and doesn't need constant plumping. That foam has been treated with new plant-based chemicals rather than traditional petroleum-based chemicals.

Plus, the plush sofa cushions have overlocked seams, so when you unzip them there are none of those annoying loose threads you sometimes find.

Resilient eight-gauge springs across the length of the sofa ensure maximum comfort and support with a robust wire threaded throughout the seat, so there's no chance you'll sink into a corner or disappear down the sides like a phone or set of keys on an old settee. Always embarrassing when that happens.

The bouclé fabric on this sofa is ideal for upholstery with its tightly twisted fibres that are ultimately hardwearing. This creates a softly textured finish with a tactile feel that really complements the wrap-around cosy design. So, go ahead and put your feet up.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Gucci Stylo À Sourcils Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil, 01 Miel
description:
A light, modern and luxurious pencil, Stylo À Sourcils Waterproof Brow Pencil is a dynamic tool for drawing and filling in the brows.

Designed with an exceptionally fine and triangular lead, the pencil’s pointed nib shape delivers an ultra-precise yet fast and natural brow look. Dual-sided with a fine spoolie at the opposite end, colour can be effortlessly combed through the brows to style hair-by-hair and blend the product to your specifications.

With Stylo À Sourcils Waterproof Brow Pencil, brows appear naturally defined with a finish that emulates real-life brow hair. Apply to bare brows, outlining or filling the gaps to create a flawless look with staying power.

  • Delivering a non-dry, weightless texture, Stylo À Sourcils Waterproof Brow Pencil offers a natural finish
  • Easy-to-blend and comfortable to wear, the waterproof formula is smudge-proof and migrate-proof once applied
  • Housed within a sleek pale pink casing with gold trim, the dual-ended pencil is finished with gold Gucci lettering

Stylo À Sourcils Waterproof Brow Pencil is available in six shades, which suit all complexions and brow colours: from Miel, a light blond for those looking for very fair shades, to Noir, a deep black for a strong dark brow finish. In between shades include Blond, which is a medium blonde, and Châtain, a light brown, while Brun is a strong medium brown and Gris is a delicate grey.

name: bareMinerals Original Mineral Liquid Concealer, Fair 1N
description:
A clean, vegan buildable coverage concealer with a natural finish that smooths and brightens to reveal healthier-looking skin instantly and over time.

  • 100% agreed it instantly concealed the appearance of skin imperfections*
  • 100% agreed it felt lightweight on the skin*
  • 90% agreed it instantly brightens the under eye area*
  • 83% agreed it left the under eye area looking smoother over time**

*Based on a 1-week independent U.S. consumer study of 31 people.
**Based on a 1-week independent Canadian consumer study of 30 people.

Less ingredients, more results
Our skin-smoothing liquid concealer does it all — with less. This next-generation clean formula is made with less ingredients than other concealers, and without silicone, parabens, talc or oil. It’s shown to refine skin's texture, smooth the look of lines and brighten dark circles.

Skin-improving coverage
This ultra-light creamy formula with medium buildable coverage blurs imperfections, and makes an ideal under eye concealer. The skin-loving formula nourishes and hydrates skin while providing crease-resistant, all-day wear that doesn't settle into lines.

name: Garmin vivoactive 4S Smartwatch 40mm with Silicone Band
description:
The Garmin vivoactive 4S provides a host of features to help you get the most of out your training and leisure time, thanks to music options (when paired with compatible headphones), on-board GPS, heart rate monitoring and easy-to-follow, animated workouts – right on the watch screen.

Garmin Coach
Hit your next target with help direct from your wrist thanks to Garmin Coach. Garmin Coach can help you train for your next 5K, 10K or even half-marathon.

Animated workouts
Thanks to preloaded animated workouts, you can watch animated cardio, strength, yoga and Pilates workouts directly on the watch screen, so there’s no more hunting for demonstrations.

Stay connected
Receive smart notifications for your emails, texts and alerts when your pair up your compatible smartphone.

Track it all
vivoactive 4S lets you track and measure your body, ranging from body battery energy monitoring, hydration tracking, menstrual cycle tracking, advanced sleep monitoring, heart rate and stress tracking to name a few.

Music on the go
Connect a compatible pair of headphones and get ready to listen to your favourite tunes.

Garmin Pay
Leave your cards at home, thanks to Garmin Pay – just tap and pay as you would with your card or phone at participating providers.

Connect IQ
Make the watch your own by downloading custom watch faces, or add data fields, apps and widgets, all from the Connect IQ Store.

name: Milton & Humble Jewellery Second Hand 18ct Yellow & White Gold Sapphire & Diamond Branch Ring, Dated London 1964-65
description:
This ornate ring has an abstract branch-like design set with 3 round sapphires and 2 round brilliant cut diamonds. The diamonds have been graded as colourless to near colourless with minimal inclusions ensuring a wonderful sparkle. Made from 18ct yellow gold, the style combines a bark texture and polished finishes that help create a complex but appealing overall look. Uniquely, the style features individual white gold claw settings that add quirky detail to the look. This item is hallmarked 18ct in London in 1964/1965.

Match with other pieces from the set for the complete look.

This ring is currently finger size M but can be altered to fit your finger. See below for how to have this ring re-sized.

Estimated diamond weight 0.17ct. The diamond is considered F-G in colour and VS2-SI2 in clarity.

Colour F-G falls into the following groups:
Colourless D-F Diamonds in this colour grading are the rarest and as a result, the most expensive ones. Given their absence of colour, D-F diamonds tend to be set in white gold or platinum, since these metals don't reflect colour and make the best choice for showcasing the stones.

Near Colourless G-J. More common than D-F colour diamonds, the G-J diamonds provide a great value. Similar to D-F diamonds, these diamonds are best highlighted in white gold or platinum as the white colour of the metal enhances the colourlessness of the stone.

Diamonds clarity graded VS2-SI2 - Very Slightly Included (VS1 and VS2). Inclusions are observed with effort under 10x magnification and are defined as minor. The inclusions are not visible to the naked eye.

Slightly Included (SI1 and SI2). Inclusions are visible under 10x magnification only but not to the naked eye.

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

How to have your ring resized

1.Once you've placed your order, please email your ring size directly to miltonandhumble@gmail.com including your name and order number
2.If this is not received within three days, we will dispatch the ring with the size quoted on the website. Please note that the ring cannot be resized once it's dispatched. Once the ring is resized it cannot be returned.



c

If you want to return this product, you'll need to take it back to a John Lewis & Partners shop for verification, and not return it by post or courier. We'll process your refund once the item has been returned to and checked by our specialist, so please allow us time to action your full refund.

name: TOM FORD Research Crème Concentrate, 50ml
description:
Energise. Hydrate. Soothe.

A hydrating, ultra-rich cream that feels feather-light on skin. It cocoons dehydrated skin with an immediate sense of comfort. The cream melts into skin, infusing it with luminosity and radiance for an energized appearance. Skin is recharged and visibly renewed, while the appearance of lines and wrinkles is diminished.

White porcelain cacao, caffeine and Gyokuro help promote energized, healthy-looking skin. Algae Extract helps to soothe stressed looking skin. Hyaluronic Acid and an array of humectants deeply hydrate and moisturise, helping the skin to maintain a moisture reservoir for 24 hours. Peptides help skin look smoother, with reduced lines and wrinkles.

"I never believed in the power of cremes and serums. Until now. I created Tom Ford Research to merge high performance, scientific skincare with a truly luxurious delivery system. Working closely with a team of scientists, I have developed high potency formulations that work. This is advanced skin science for the 21st century that helps you put your best face forward. This is skincare that works." TOM FORD.

Clinical Study Results:

  • Radiant, energised-looking skin
  • 24 hour hydration
  • Brighter, more luminous skin the morning after the first application
  • Visibly diminished pores
  • Visibly diminished lines and wrinkles
  • Helps visibly decrease redness after a glycolic acid peel

Dermatologist and Ophthalmologist tested. Non-acnegenic, appropriate for all skin types. Tested on men and women.

Consumer Study Results:

Immediately:

  • 98% said their skin felt hydrated
  • 89% said their skin felt energised

After just 1 week:

  • 97% said their skin felt softer and smoother
  • 99% said their stressed/irritated skin felt soothed
  • 94% said their skin looked vibrant
  • 91% said their skin texture looked revitalised
  • 95% said their skin looked healthy
  • 92% said their skin looked youthful
  • 94% said their skin looked smoother

After 4 weeks:

  • 82% said appearance of their pores was minimised
  • 83% said appearance of their lines and wrinkles was diminished

(Consumer perception study on a total of 104 men and women)

name: John Lewis Grace Upholstered Bed Frame, Small Double, Brushed Tweed Grey
description:
Our Grace bed frame is a classic shape, but the gently curved and well-padded headboard gives it a modern edge. It's accented with button detailing and sprung slats in the base provide a supportive and responsive foundation for your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Seija has been inspired to create artwork to brighten up walls and spaces for those special moments or people in our lives.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

name: LSA International Pearl Champagne Saucer Glass, 300ml, Set of 2, Clear/Multi
description:
This pair of elegantly stemmed Pearl sweet champagne or cocktail saucers are made of mouthblown glass. Each glass is hand-painted with a striking, iridescent lustre, inspired by the shimmer of a pearl. They complement other Pearl drinkware and decorative accessories, mouthblown by LSA International artisans.

Choose the perfect glassware

Glass comes in a range of weights, cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from, designed to suit every budget and occasion.

Soda LimeVersatile and available in many colours and styles, soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand, soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items.
Crystal GlassFiner in quality with greater clarity than soda glass, crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges.
Lead CrystalWith a beautiful clarity, weight and resonance, lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead', the glass has at least 24% lead oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed, only.
Sparkx®Neither Soda Lime Glass nor Crystal Glass, this ultra-clear glass is pure, transparent and free of heavy metals. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers.
SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass with all the same ingredients as Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that make it even stronger, with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even Sparkx.
LUXION®100% lead-free crystal glass which replaces its former 24% lead crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency and exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable.
RecycledGlassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass.
Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime Glass.
HandmadeThis type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above, depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are usually suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion.
DecorativeThere are many ways to decorate glass including cutting, spraying, diamond etching, pantograph etching, silk screen printing, sand blasting, hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material.

name: Original Penguin Daddy Organic Cotton Polo Shirt, Dark Sapphire
description:

Formed in a regular fit for a classic profile, Original Penguin's unmistakable Pete penguin sits proudly upon the chest.

Whilst you won't find many penguins native to Minneapolis or NYC for that matter, it didn't exactly stop fashion salesman Abbot Pederson from acquiring one on passing a taxidermist's shop during a trip to The Big Apple. Having spent the flight home to Minneapolis arm in arm with his new drinking buddy (after all it was the 50s) Abbot convinced his employers to immortalise his companion - For over 60 years 'Pete' has featured proudly upon Original Penguin's signature clothing.

name: Le Creuset Cast Iron Signature Frying Pan with Wood Handle, Meringue, 28cm
description:
A cast iron skillet or frying pan is a cook's secret weapon for quick, easy and tantalising dishes. A skillet, an American term for a frying pan, has long been a treasured kitchen staple for stovetop frying, with a versatile shape that can be used for everything from searing steaks, vegetables or fish.

Add Le Creuset's superior cast iron that retains and evenly distributes heat and you’ll find that everything from frittatas to pancakes to veggies really does taste better when cooked in this cast iron skillet. This version has a stay-cool wooden handle and a large helper handle to make the pan easy to grip and move.

Key features:

  • Cast iron for superior heat retention and distribution
  • Hygienic, durable and easy to clean enamel interior
  • Easy-grip, stay-cool wooden handle and cast iron helper handle
  • Suitable for use on all heat sources, including induction
  • Available in a choice of colours
  • Lifetime guarantee

Enamel interior
Like the inside of Le Creuset grills, the skillet is coated with a satin black enamel finish that protects it for high surface heat use and will not wear off. Very durable, hygienic and easy to clean, this cooking surface also helps to achieve the correct sealing and searing of foods, as well as the caramelisation of the juices. The surface is chipping and stain-resistant and over time, a natural patina will develop that is ideal for frying.

Cast iron benefits
The skillet is made of cast iron, a very efficient material thanks to its superior heat retention and even heat distribution, which saves energy and prevents hot spots. Your food will seal very quickly with a delicious caramelized effect while locking in moisture, nutrients and flavours for succulent results. A quick test to check if the temperature is ready for cooking: throw a little water on the surface; if it stays in the pan without evaporating, it’s not yet hot enough. Be careful of the cast iron handles heating up.

Ergonomic stay-cool handle
The ergonomic main handle is made of wood and stays cool. The easy-grip helper handle provides extra stability when lifting a full pan between hob and table.

Induction compatible and lifetime guarantee
Suitable for use on all heat sources, including induction, in the oven and under the grill, the skillet is available in a wide choice of colours to perfectly complement every kitchen and style. It comes with a lifetime guarantee for complete peace of mind.

Le Creuset Cast Iron Care

  • Remove all packaging and labels. Wash the pan in hot, soapy water, then rinse and dry thoroughly
  • Medium or low heat will provide the best results for cooking, including frying and searing
  • The enamel surface is not ideal for dry cooking
  • Always cool a hot pan for a few minutes before washing. Thermal shock may occur, resulting in cracking or loss of enamel
  • When grilling, take a few drops of water on your fingers and scatter over the hot surface. If they sizzle and evaporate almost immediately it is hot and ready for use
  • Handwash recommended

name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation, 10NN
description:
Find your naked truth with Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation, our vegan formula, buildable medium coverage liquid foundation with a real-skin matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours.

We designed this lineup of 50 shades with 9 shade intensities, 3 mastertones, and 7 undertones to dial in your precise colour match. Our waterproof, long-wear foundation feels like wearing nothing, thanks to a breathable, flexible vegan formula* that moves with you - all day and all night, up to 24 hours!

It not only feels better, it even looks better with its stay-true colour, which minimises the appearance of pores - so you always look like you.

*Vegan formula: does not contain animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

name: adidas Kids' Gaming Logo Print T-Shirt
description: Advance to the next level. This gaming-inspired tee elevates a casual look. Made from soft cotton jersey, this adidas t-shirt keeps you comfortable whether you're heading out or exploring virtual worlds.

name: Celtic & Co. Men's Sheepskin Bootee Slippers, Khaki
description:
Refined comfort for the man in your life, these bootee slippers from Celtic & Co. are the last word in downtime luxury. Crafted in British sheepskin, these slippers feature a flexible cuff that can be worn up for extra coverage or turned down to reveal the tonal fur inside. The lightweight nature of the sole belies its durability, so you can happily move from inside to out without kicking them off.

Celtic and Co. are proud supporters of British farming and source only the finest sheepskin that is a by-product of the UK farming industry that would otherwise be incinerated or sent to landfill.

Worth knowing: these slippers are machine washable on a 30 degree cycle when used with a Celtic wool wash detergent, simply put the slippers in a pillowcase to avoid drum marks from the washing machine. Made in the UK.

name: John Lewis Kids' Tie Dye Shark Rash Vest, Blue

It is finished with short raglan sleeves.

Super cosy and a bit of an all-rounder when it comes to activewear, they're ready to take on another set or another season of your favourite show. Whatever the day dictates.

name: EAST END PRINTS Ana Jaks 'Tropical Huns' Framed Print, Black Frame, 28.4 x 33.4cm
description:
Pride 2022 artworks
In celebration of Pride 2022, alongside EAST END PRINTS, John Lewis & Partners have curated a selection of works by LGBTQAI+ artists. Spanning a variety of genres and styles these works express the diversity of the LGBTQAI+ community. This collection is a vibrant, colourful and summery burst of optimism and sunshine. From bold geometric prints to cheeky photography and graphic illustrations, this collection highlights the wealth of creative contributions of LGBTQAI+ artists that we proudly work with.

A tropical scene in vibrant colours, 'Tropical Huns' is by artist Ana Jaks. Ana Jaks is a freelance illustrator currently honing her craft out of a studio in Bristol, a space she shares with many other illustrators and designers. Ana's work is predominantly female-led, although her love for inclusivity means he/she/they often feature throughout. Ana's work heavily leans into all things bright, colourful and fun.
Ana's queerness wasn't realised until midway through her twenties, and so Pride for her equates to self-love, self-acceptance and self-expression. Being an illustrator can often feel like an ongoing research project to grow stylistically and professionally, and with that growth came a fondness to work on LGBTQIA+ projects. This fondness eventually became a personal realisation. The colourful, celebratory aspect of Ana's portfolio has seen her work with clients such as Nike, Bombay Sapphire, LUSH, Stylist Magazine, The Washington Post and many more.

The giclée art printing process and 210gsm acid-free archival paper create an exhibition-quality art print with long-lasting colours that more closely resemble the artist's materials and tones. A digital form of the original work is stored and then printed using a commercial printer and pigment-based inks. The print is presented with an acrylic glaze that's optically the same as glass yet lighter in weight making it easier and safer to hang. Ready to hang on your wall, it's framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

    • The wide frame measures 3.5cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 36 x 31cm
  • 46 x 36cm
  • 56 x 46cm
  • 86 x 66cm

name: Passenger Cabin Colour Block Scarf, Multi
description: Looking for the perfect colourpop winter wear? You found it. Passenger's Cabin scarf is made in a multi colour, knitted jacquard pattern and features end tassels for that winter boho look. Stay cosy, look good.

This contemporary shimmer structure design is vinyl on non-woven backing wallpaper, which means you paste the wall, making it easy to hang. The average piece length is 10.02 metres.

The name says it all, texture, texture and more texture. Keeping it on-trend and simply stylish.

The Textures Book collection provides the perfect backdrop to any home looking to add interest to tired walls. Whether you want a bright and bold finish or a soft and subtle look there is something for everyone; whatever the style.

The Textures Book is designed to complement any home or interior's existing furnishings and theme.

name: AllSaints Rina Cropped Tank Top, Black

A wardrobe essential, this tank top from AllSaints allows for endless styling opportunities.

description:
Stylish and functional, the Draper range is thoughtfully designed with tailored arms and slender legs. The modern proportions of the button detail seat and back cushions offer a deep and supportive sit.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

name: Hobbs Lucie Cotton Jumper
description: Simple yet sleek with a crew neckline, this jumper by Hobbs is stitched from pure cotton for comfort that lasts wash after wash.

description:
Carving a clean line with its pencil shape, this midi skirt by Whistles is made from a soft blended fabric for comfortable wear.

name: Sweaty Betty Multi Use Biker Shorts
description:
Sweaty Betty's multi-use biker shorts with a super-soft feel. The stretch fabric is supportive, breathable and sweat-wicking. The extra-flattering seamlines sculpt your bum and elongate your legs. This high-waisted design has an internal adjustable drawcord and a side slip pocket for your phone.

Inseam length: 9" / 23cm.

name: Little Green Radicals Baby Cotton Sunshine Print T-Shirt & Joggers Set, Natural
description: Designed for active little ones, this set is made for everyday play indoors or out; at nursery, at home, at the park or even worn as PJs! It comes with a pair of organic striped joggers plus a comfy top, so you'll have a ready made outfit to make getting them dressed in the morning that little bit easier.

name: TOM FORD Shade & Illuminate Soft Radiance Foundation SPF50, 0.0 Pearl
description:
Radiant. Nourishing. Medium-Full Coverage.

Shade and Illuminate Soft Radiance Foundation SPF 50/PA++++ merges three-dimensional radiance with three-dimensional skincare.

The medium to full coverage foundation features a blend of advanced elastomers and light-diffusing powders to create the perfect radiant surface to reflect soft light. Designed to create the appearance of flawless skin it also nourishes the skin with breathable protection.

Infused with Hyaluronic Acid that helps to moisturize the skin for a plump, dewy look, a trio of natural oils including Balsam Copaiba, Andiroba, Acai and anti-inflammatory Noni fruit extract nourish and calm the skin, while SPF 50/PA++++ helps to protect from the harmful effects of the sun.

Packaged in a luxe glass bottle with a pump, the complexion-perfecting formula softly highlights to enhance natural features and brighten skin for a natural, soft-focus look.

name: Cotswold Abbeydale Low Top Walking Shoes, Navy
description: Made for the great outdoors, these Cotswold Abbeydale walking shoes will provide you with the comfort you need. The pair has low-top styling with a waterproof inner membrane to keep you feet dry. A specially-designed and removable memory foam foot bed moulds and cushions the feet for excellent comfort at every step. The shoes are complete with soft lining, a padded tongue with alignment loop, a deep cushioned collar and a rear pull loop for easier on and off.

name: Mango Mogambo Linen Blend Shorts, Orange
description:
An effortless choice for when the temperature rises, these mid-rise shorts from Mango are made from an airy viscose blend.

Whether you're preparing yourself for holidays abroad or the rest of summer spent in your local park, this pair is ready for the day ahead.

name: Barbour Essential Lambswool Half Zip Jumper, Burgundy
description:
Crafted from super soft lambswool, Barbour's Essential jumper is a cold weather staple.

In a mid weight, 7 gauge knit with a ribbed zip neck, the jumper has a smart appearance that's ideal for creating a refined weekend look.

name: KETTLER Mali Garden Rectangular Side Table, Natural
description: The luxurious Mali range from KETTLER has a modern look, made from high-quality and robust aluminium frames edged with innovative Sumparwood which looks just like real wood. An environmentally friendly material made from recycled components, Sumparwood includes recycled polystyrene mixed with wood waste to produce a really strong and weather-resistant material, requiring virtually no maintenance. The Mali tabletop surface is made from premium ceramic to complete this attractive design.

name: Dinny Hall Edith Sunbeam Pendant Necklace
description: Sunbeam 'Edith' mini pendant is part of the Sunbeam collection, one of two special ranges designed to celebrate the 'Pre-Raphaelite Sisters' exhibition at The National Portrait Gallery, London. Sunbeams are inspired by 'the ethereal' in Pre-Raphaelite paintings, rays of painterly golden light. This particular pendant is named after Edith Hipkins - artist & true Pre-Raphaelite Sister.

name: White Stuff Urban Stripe Print Jumper, Navy/Pink Multi
description: Simple and sweet with its round neckline, this lightweight jumper by White Stuff is striped for an eye-catching finish and has cosy appeal with its soft wool blend.

name: Bulova 98A213 Men's Wilton Heartbeat Automatic Bracelet Strap Watch, Silver/Rose Gold
description: This Bulova Wilton Automatic watch has 60 Hour power reserve for precision timekeeping that won't miss a second. Made from two-toned stainless steel, it features a textured three-hand dial with Roman numeral hour markers and round dial aperture offering a glimpse of the self-winding 21-jewel heartbeat movement with 60 hours of reserve power. The domed sapphire crystal with blue anti-reflective coating protects the face so it keeps on looking stunning for years to come. A stainless steel bracelet strap with a push-button deployment clasp completes the look.

name: Slip® Pure Silk Zippered Pillowcase, Petal
description:
Why switch to a slip pure silk pillowcase? Real results, real benefits in just 4 nights! Over 95% of cotton and synthetic (non-silk) satin pillowcase users who made the switch to slip agreed that their:

  • Sleep creases, sleep lines, sleep wrinkles were fewer and less noticeable.**

    Slip® is the #1 preferred brand of silk pillowcases by dermatologists for their patients, themselves and their families.†

    The Slipsilk® difference: Slip® pure silk products are made using slipsilk®, developed and refined for over ten years to provide the ultimate combination of shine, thickness, softness and durability.

    Anti-ageing: We spend a third of our lives in bed. In laboratory testing, Slip® pure silk pillowcases were shown to absorb significantly less face cream than cotton pillowcases††, so they can help keep your skin’s moisture and valuable face and hair products where they belong, on your face and hair. Slipsilk® was also shown to create 43% less friction on average††, which can reduce stretching and tugging on delicate facial skin.

    Anti-sleep crease: Slipsilk® has been shown to reduce friction by 43% on average††, allowing skin to glide along the pillow, which can reduce pressure on creased skin.

    Anri-bed head: Ordinary cotton pillowcases can cause hair tangling during the night. In laboratory testing, Slipsilk® has been shown to reduce friction by 43% on average††.

    **Based on a clinical consumer perception study of over 100 women, aged 35-65, who were regular users of cotton or synthetic (non-silk) satin pillowcases and tried a slip pure silk pillowcase for 4 nights. †In a survey of dermatologists in the United States conducted between 1-12 November 2021. ††Compared to widely available cotton pillowcases with a 220-360 thread count.

    Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fiber mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme.

    Contains pure silk queen pillowcase. Size: 76 x 51cm

name: Lola + Blake Cotton Pyjama Bottoms, Floral Disco
description: Featuring a winter wonderland print, these hand-illustrated pyjama bottoms are classic cut, luxury, pure cotton, with beautiful detailed piping, deep pockets and both an elasticated and drawstring tie.

description:

FSC-Certified

name: Yves Saint Laurent Rouge Volupté Shine Lipstick, 131
description:
Hydrating oil-infused lipstick. Luminous shine. Medium coverage.

A medium-coverage oil-in-stick lipstick that provides luscious colour and luminous shine while conditioning lips.

YSL Rouge Volupté Shine Lipstick is a long-wear, hydrating 'Oil-In-Stick' shiny lipstick that combines voluptuous glide-and-go colour and intense shine with comfort and care. This lipstick-meets-balm is enriched with six sensorial oils that keep your lips feeling kissed with moisture. With the irresistible signature YSL mango scent, these lipsticks are good enough to eat. Colourful yet under-stated, dial it up or dial it down according to your mood. YSL Rouge Volupté Shine delivers the promise of flirtatious style and ultimate pleasure. Live to shine.

  • High shine finish lipstick

name: Duke + Dexter Scott Suede Loafers
description:
The Duke + Dexter Scott Loafer is a shoe that has been designed to be the go-to choice for all-day wear.

It features an everyday style that is ultra-lightweight and incredibly versatile. With a premium Italian suede upper and leather lining, these loafers are crafted to provide both comfort and functionality.

They are also designed with a jagged sole that offers additional support and durability. In addition, the hand-stitched upper detailing adds a touch of elegance to the overall design of the shoe.

Handmade in England.

name: Jellycat Huge Bashful Dragon Soft Toy
description: A face as soft as its fur and capable of huge cuddles, this friendly Jellycat dragon will add some magic to your child's game time.

name: Orla Kiely Flower Tile Cushion, Medium
description:
A reversible, retro design for two contrasting looks. Perfect for creating mid-century style in your home.

Designed exclusively for John Lewis & Partners.

Hailed by many as the 'Queen of Prints', Orla Kiely is a prolific textiles designer that has won global acclaim for her kitsch and colourful designs. Drawing inspiration from nature, her Irish heritage and her grandmother, she has encapsulated these elements in her prints, giving the fresh, retro-inspired twist for which she is famous.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Cushions & Bean Bags | Cushions

name: John Lewis Helmsley Blackout/Thermal Roller Blind, Dark Blue, W122 x Drop 160cm
description:
This blackout blind eliminates light and gives 100% privacy, allowing you to get a sound night’s sleep.

Key features:

  • Can be installed either inside or outside the window recess, to the wall or ceiling
  • Can be standard or reverse rolled. Standard gives a close fit to the window, helping eliminate light. Reverse brings the material forward over the roll which conceals it and creates space between the blind and window
  • Chain mechanism can be attached on the left or right-hand side, without affecting the way the blind is rolled
  • Width can be cut to size
  • Supplied with easy fit universal brackets
  • Includes safety devices to keep children safe

    • Warm in winter, cool in summer
    As the blackout lining on this blind blocks out sunlight it helps keep your room cool as well as dark. This 3 layer blackout coating also adds an extra layer of insulation, giving the blind thermal properties which aren’t found on non-blackout blinds. It protects against both heat loss and heat gain, regulating the temperature of your room so you’re kept warm in winter and cool in summer.

    Worth knowing...
    The width stated in our product specifications is the total width of the blind including mechanisms and brackets. The width of the fabric alone will be a few centimetres less than this.

    Safety warning
    Young children can be strangled by loops in pull cords, chains, tapes and inner cords that operate the product.

  • To avoid strangulation and entanglement, keep cords out of the reach of young children - cords may become wrapped around a child's neck
  • Move beds, cots and furniture away from window covering cords
  • Do not tie cords together. Make sure cords do not twist and create a loop

    • More information on child safety can be found on our Child Safety Hub
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Curtains & Blinds | Ready Made Blinds

name: Whistles High Waist Barrel Leg Jeans, Black
description:
Choose a flattering, laid back shape with these High Waist Barrel jeans from Whistles.

Crafted from a rich cotton with a touch of stretch for comfort, this pair feature a fastening at the front with classic, five pocket styling and a straight, barrel shape through the leg. Finishing at a cropped length, the hems are frayed for a casual aesthetic.

Tuck in a jersey top and team with sandals for an on trend weekend look.

name: Nkuku Kunvar Square Cushion Cover, Natural/Black
description:
The Nkuku Kunvar cushion cover is made from recycled cotton, creating a beautifully soft and quality cushion cover that will make the perfect addition to your home interior.

With its broken diamond pattern and subtle tones, it will make a great stand-alone piece, or would look equally as good alongside other scatter cushions. Handwoven by skilled artisans in India using age-old methods and traditional handlooms.

Please note that cushion pads are sold separately.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Cushions & Bean Bags | Cushions

name: Skechers Uno Stand On Air Sports Trainers, Black/Multi
description: Classic air cushioned style meets updated comfort in the SKECHER Street Uno - Stand on Air shoe. Smooth leather-textured synthetic upper in a lace up classic fashion trainer with stitching and perforation accents. Air Cooled Memory Foam insole, visible air cushioned midsole.

name: John Lewis Charlotte Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa, Dark Leg, Piccadilly Black
description:
The traditional Charlotte range combines gently flared scrolled arms and tapered legs for an elegant look with fibre-filled cushions you can really sink into.

Environmentally friendly fillings
We use Quallofil® Blue fibres in our Charlotte range as a more sustainable choice than chemical-based foam fillings. Quallofil® Blue fibres are made using 50% recycled plastic from Plastic Bank; a globally recognised and award-winning solution to stop ocean plastic whilst improving the lives of people living in poverty, who collect the plastic. These fibres give firm, controlled support and are long-lasting so they'll retain the cushion's original appearance instead of becoming squashed and flat over time.

Sustainably sourced timber
We make sure Charlotte's timber frames are sourced from carefully managed, sustainable forests.

Sustainable manufacturing
We’re proud to work with Westbridge, our manufacturing partner based in North Wales who make our Charlotte range of sofas for us. Westbridge have been making more environmentally friendly choices for over a decade and haven’t sent anything to landfill since 2007. They also continue to work hard to offset their carbon footprint by introducing energy-saving procedures and equipment throughout their factory.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: 2022 Apple iPad Air, 10.9", M1 Processor, iPadOS, Wi-Fi & Cellular, 64GB, Space Grey
description:
The 2022 iPad Air is driven by the brand's super-powerful M1 chip for super-fluid response, features elegant all-screen design, a 12MP Ultra Wide front camera with Centre Stage, and is compatible with the 2nd generation Apple Pencil (sold separately). It only weighs around 460g so is ideal to take the power of iPad with you. And everything you watch, read, or play looks fantastic on its Liquid Retina display.

The power of M1
Now in iPad Air, Apple's M1 processor delivers up to 60% faster performance than the previous model, arming you with the potential of a creative and gaming powerhouse. You'll be able to move swiftly between multiple apps, and enjoy the immersion of high-intensity gaming. And the 16-core Neural Engine accelerates machine learning for higher creativity.

Liquid Retina display
With narrow borders and elegant rounded corners, the Liquid Retina display features True Tone, P3 wide colour and anti-reflective coating, consistently making text sharp and colours vivid.

Ultra Wide camera with Centre Stage
The iPad Air's 12MP ultra wide front camera features Centre Stage. It automatically pans to keep you in frame as you move around, and when others join or leave the call, the view expands or zooms in automatically. Meanwhile, the rear Wide camera is 12MP too, and the M1 chip supports Smart HDR 3 for higher quality images.

Secure Touch ID
Touch ID is integrated into the top button for fast, easy and secure authentication. So you can use your fingerprint to unlock your iPad or quickly and securely make a payment. Your fingerprint information stays on your iPad - it's not shared with anyone, even Apple, helping to ensure that your personal information remains private.

Supports Apple pencil
iPad Air is compatible with the second-generation Apple Pencil (sold separately). It attaches magnetically and charges wirelessly, so it's always with you when you need it.

5G enabled
Get ready for the next generation of mobile internet and experience incredible download speeds, or play games without the fear of lag. Please contact your mobile service provider regarding the 5G options currently available to you.

All day battery life
The iPad Air will keep you going for up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi-Fi or watching video off a single charge.

Wireless communication
Built-in Wi-Fi makes it easy to connect this tablet to the internet, whether that's through your own home network, Wi-Fi at work or a public connection. Bluetooth will let you send files and folders wirelessly between Bluetooth devices, and stream music to compatible speakers or headphones.


Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.

We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.
breadcrumbs: Electricals | iPad & Tablets | View All Tablets

name: Enye Studio - 'Boa Viagem' Framed Print & Mount, 73.5 x 53.5cm, Multi
description:
An abstract print, 'Boa Viagem' by Enye Studio. This colourful print is made in the UK and presented in a simple black frame, glazed with a window mount, ready to hang on your wall.

Enye Studio is a small studio based in London, ready to challenge the status quo of mass production that is currently happening in the art world. They do not believe in trends and understand that ART is subjective, ART can bring and conjure so much joy and happiness. This is what Enye Studio are here for — Art with Intention, aiming to create unique and beautiful pieces for your home.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

name: Hobbs Dakota Leather Biker Jacket, Tan
description:
Featuring all the classic characteristics associated with the perennial piece, this biker jacket from Hobbs sits at the hip for versatile coverage.

Featuring a neat collared neckline, it is made from pure leather for a premium feel.

name: Blanco Axia 6S Inset 1.5 Right-Hand Bowls Composite Granite Kitchen Sink
description:
A modern concept for the kitchen, the Axia range from BLANCO makes food preparation at the sink even easier thanks to clever accessories. The ergonomic sink enables a smooth workflow along both axes of the bowls. You can either move the included chopping board along the longitudinal axis, or position it partially or entirely over the bowl area. Work effortlessly into pots or bowls, without anything falling in between.

The practical and multi-functional colander also allows you to use the bowl’s transverse axis. Position the included colander freely alongside the bowl or clip it onto the smaller secondary bowl. This makes it easy to separate cooking ingredients from trimmed waste.

This inset sink is installed on top of the worktop and features a large bowl to the right-hand side of the draining board as well as a handy smaller bowl.

Made from Silgranit, this material comes in beautiful colours and shades with a natural stone-like look. It’s 80% granite to suit kitchen use and is easy to care for, durable, non-fading, naturally scratch resistant, heat resistant to 280°C and food-safe.

Worth knowing: Waste and overflow kit is included. Plumbing kit sold separately.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the product in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in all our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Choose the perfect sink for your kitchen

Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect kitchen sink, from material to sink configuration.

Stainless Steel Stainless steel is the most popular material, made from premium 18/10 nickel steel. It looks beautiful, is resistant to staining, chipping, rust and corrosion, is heat proof and non-fading, hygienic and suitable for food preparation.
Ceramic Kiln-fired porcelain for a tough, smooth gloss finish which is able to stand up to even the harshest treatment. Very hard-wearing, mostly used in classic, country style kitchens. Can be inset, undermounted or the classic Belfast style.
Composite Granite Contains 80% tough granite particles with an acrylic of synthetic material which gives great strength. They are resistant to burns, dents, chips, scratches and stains - 100% food safe, 100% acid resistant, 100% non-fading. They can resist up to 280 degrees of heat.
Undermounted vs Inset Sinks Traditional inset sinks are extremely practical. They can be cheaper than undermounts, and simpler to install. Undermounts give a seamless appearance to worktops which can have drainer grooves cut into them. Both styles can be found in Stainless Steel, Ceramic or Composite Granite.
1 bowls vs 1.5 bowls The 1.5 bowl is the most popular configuration, if space permits. The smaller bowl can be used for washing cutlery or glassware to save water and time. Can also be use with a drainer basket to drain vegetables, rinse salads etc.

name: Celtic & Co. Merino Wool Ribbed Fisherman's Jumper, Olive
description:
A style any gent's wardrobe could benefit from, this men's fisherman's jumper from Celtic & Co. slips easily into modern collections.

This piece is knitted in pure Merino wool to offer a sturdy ribbed structure with reliable warmth. Celtic & Co. flags add a hint of understated DNA to this design, while a slightly extended crew neckline provides a touch of extra coverage on cooler days.

Just add trusty denim and your go-to boots for a look that works from off-duty weekdays to beach adventures at the weekend.

Made with 100% Merino Wool: Unbelievably soft with its super-fine silkiness, merino wool is a hero yarn for so many reasons. This natural fibre is able to breathe equally effectively in both warm and cold conditions, creating an efficient microclimate around your body for ultimate comfort, whatever the weather. Fully traceable guaranteed non-mulesed Merino wool.

name: LG 86QNED866QA (2022) QNED MiniLED HDR 4K Ultra HD Smart TV, 86 inch with Freeview HD/Freesat HD & Dolby Atmos, Dark Meteor Titan
description:
LG's innovative QNED MiniLED screen blends Quantum Dot Nanocell colour with MiniLED technology for brilliant colour, and exceptional brightness and contrast. The QNED866 delivers an immersive 4K picture, enhanced by depth-boosting HDR including Dolby Vision, plus three-dimensional Dolby Atmos sound. Use LG's award-winning webOS smart platform to stream shows from such apps as Netflix and Prime Video*, and you can interact by voice with both the Google Assistant and Alexa built in.

4K UHD resolution with Dolby Vision HDR
This screen has four times the number of pixels than Full HD TVs, delivering stunning realism, natural motion and incredible detail. High Dynamic Range expands light, dark, and every colour in between for a picture that's closer to real life. This set supports multiple HDR formats including Dolby Vision.

QNED MiniLED technology
Quantum Dot Nanocell tech delivers richer and more accurate colour, for more delicate differences in tone. And with MiniLED, thousands of tiny LED lights lead to exceptionally-balanced contrast of deeper blacks and stunning brightness.

Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos sound
Together, Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos audio ensure even more immersive entertainment, providing awe-inspiring drama to every genre.

Great gaming
Get the most out of next-gen consoles, and give yourself the competitive edge, with HDMI 2.1, Variable Refresh Rate (VRR), High Frame Rate (HFR), and picture optimisation to suit the type of game.

120Hz Motion Pro
With a 120Hz refresh rate plus Motion Pro tech, every detail is kept in focus, even when the action is super-fast, for realistic and thrilling live sports.

webOS smart platform
LG's award-winning webOS platform revolutionises how you experience your entertainment. With quick and easy content discovery and switching, there's more entertainment available than ever before. You can stream from all the most popular services like Netflix, NOW TV, Prime Video, Disney+, Twitch, and more.*

Voice control & smart compatibility
This TV has the Google Assistant and Alexa built in, so you can get answers to questions while you're watching TV, and control compatible smart home devices.

Perfect partners
With TVs getting slimmer and built-in speakers getting smaller, choosing the right sound system is more important than ever. Soundbars enhance your TV's sound quality and add that extra audio punch to all your movies, games and TV programmes. More affordable and easier to set up than a full size speaker system, they don't compromise on quality either.
Take a look at our full range of soundbars.

Don't forget...
If you want to connect your TV to a blu-ray player, games console, soundbar or soundbase then you'll need a HDMI cable.
View our collection of cables & connections

And if you're looking to elevate your viewing experience with cable management, then why not take a look at our wall mounts and TV stands.

*Some services may require subscription (sold separately)

A Smart TV is a platform that can run 3rd party Apps. 3rd party content providers may remove Apps from the Smart TV platform or stop supporting them at any time, and we cannot guarantee an App's availability. When new Smart TV products are launched, there may also be a delay before certain Apps become available. Availability of Apps is not included within the terms of the manufacturer's warranty, or the John Lewis 2-year Guarantee for audio visual products, or the 5-year Guarantee for TVs.

Delivery information: If you buy a soundbar or DVD/Blu-ray player along with this TV, please note that they'll be delivered separately.

name: Chelsea Peers Organic Cotton Logo Boxy Cropped Knot Lounge T-Shirt, Lilac
description: There's nothing comfier than throwing on a boxy T-shirt when you get home from a long day. description:

You deserve to be comfortable when staying active, and Superdry know that. That's why they've fitted this bra with supportive padding and elastic hemming. Maximising breathability and helping you stay comfy from start to finish, it's great for spin classes or elliptical workouts.

name: Sisley Phyto-Khol Star Waterproof Eyeliner, 4 Sparkling Bronze
description:
Phyto-Khol Star is an automatically retractable pencil with integrated pencil sharpener.

The creamy and firm tip offers aunique glide and ensures perfect definition with extreme precision. 8 shades with multiple effects that give intensity to the look:

  • Sparkling: luminous shades infused with delicate glitter
  • - Mystic: almost black shimmery shades with subtle reflections

Its formula with exceptional comfort and softness enriched with Rosehip oil, Bisabolol of natural origin and Vitamin E acetate, takes care of the eyelids’ delicate skin.

Stands up to all tests: rain, humidity, heat, tears, exertion, sweat, sebum. Very long-lasting.

name: Coach Soft Tabby Leather Shoulder Bag
description:
Refined for all occasions, bring versatility to your ensemble with this shoulder bag by Coach.

Sculpted from premium leather that's sure to stand the test of time and with a detachable strap for flexibility of wear and features interior and exterior zip pockets for easy organisation.

name: NARS Soft Matte Complete Foundation, Stromboli
description:
All-day satisfaction is here. Discover NARS Soft Matte Complete Foundation. Full, natural-looking coverage. Comfortable, 16-hour wear. True colour that doesn’t oxidise.

With Hydramatte Balancing Complex, Soft Matte balances excess sebum while keeping skin perfectly hydrated. No settling. No drying. Just a silky smooth complexion that lasts. Plus, the Anti-Oxidation Complex protects against colour shifting. The shade you apply is the shade you wear, AM to PM.

Create a velvety, second-skin look with Soft Matte’s veil of superior oil-absorbing powders. Satisfying. Matiffying. This is the new take on matte – available in 34 shades.

Top tip: To find your perfect shade match, blend along the jawline and allow foundation to dry down on the skin. Shades may vary slightly across formulas depending on coverage and finish.

How to use:

  • 1. Create the smoothest canvas for makeup that glides on with NARS Radiance Primer SPF 35
  • 2. Dispense a small amount of Soft Matte Complete Foundation onto the back of your hand. One drop delivers full coverage with fingertip application
  • 3. Pat product with fingertips. Start at the centre of your face and gently press foundation into skin
  • 4. Use a stippling motion to blend outward. Work in small sections, focusing on one area at a time
  • 5. Finish with the Soft Matte Complete Concealer, dabbed onto areas where you want extra coverage

name: Ro&Zo Ribbed High Neck Top
description:
An all-year essential, this ribbed jersey top by Ro&Zo will give your wardrobe the refresh it needs.

Cut with a conservative high neck and long sleeves, it is made from a light yet durable fabric and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

name: Hype Kids' Abstract Paint Splats Script T-Shirt, Black/Multi
description: Make a statement in this Hype t-shirt. Designed in a standard shape and made from a soft touch fabric for the ultimate amount of comfort, this features an all-over abstract splat sublimated print.

description:
Freshening up your wardrobe, this pair of chunky-soled trainers by Ted Baker is made from leather for comfort and quality that you can rely on.

name: Mango Kids' Cotton Jogger Style Trousers, Medium Grey

description:
Every casual collection needs a pair of versatile joggers and Amie from HUSH are perfect for lazy days at home, or for dressing-up and embracing the athleisure trend.

Crafted from a soft cotton blend with a drawstring waistband, gently tapered leg and two neat slanted side pockets to flatter the shape. Two faux pockets to the back and side zip detail on the legs complete this relaxed style.

Add high ankle boots and an oversized tee for a chic evening ensemble. For a more laid-back style, go for flatform plimsolls and a striped jersey top.

Inside leg 69cm (size S)

name: Susanne Kaufmann Rejuvenating Day Fluid, 50ml
description:
A lightweight, velvety moisturising fluid created to protect skin against the first signs of ageing for a visibly rejuvenated complexion.

Featuring silk protein, ectoin and moth bean extract to moisturise and improve skin elasticity. In addition, schisandra fruit extract, known for its antioxidant properties, along with balloon vine extract and echium seed oil protects skin from environmental aggressors that cause dryness, while shea butter, jojoba oil, argan oil, magnolia extract and broccoli seed oil help to reduce moisture loss.

Antioxidant tomato fruit extract and barley wax protect the skin, while vitamin E and allantoin boost cell renewal. Meadowfoam seed oil contains precious fatty acids to lightly moisturise and nourish the skin, leaving it feeling silky smooth.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: MAC Blot Powder/Pressed, Light
description:
A unique pressed powder designed primarily to provide shine control without adding any noticeable colour or texture. Sets foundation, finishes faces. For use in professional situations and for frequent touch-ups.

Blot Powder contains Mica and Silica to adsorb excess oils and reduce shine on the skin's surface.

name: Hobbs Flo Suede Ballerina Pumps
description:

Set on a flat heel, they are designed with a closed toe that has smart-casual covered.

name: Phase Eight Irena Denim Pinafore Dress, Blue
description:
In an utterly fresh and modern pinafore shape, this midi dress by Phase Eight is free from any fussy details.

Framing your profile with its squared neckline and a sleeveless design, this dress offers breathable all-day comfort with its pure cotton fabric and is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: MissPrint Leaves Wallpaper, Absinthe, MISP1031

These little leaves will bring an elegant and subtle touch to any room.

Have you thought about wallpaper accessories? Shop here.

All-day satisfaction is here. Discover NARS Soft Matte Complete Foundation. Full, natural-looking coverage. Comfortable, 16-hour wear. True colour that doesn’t oxidise.

With Hydramatte Balancing Complex, Soft Matte balances excess sebum while keeping skin perfectly hydrated. No settling. No drying. Just a silky smooth complexion that lasts. Plus, the Anti-Oxidation Complex protects against colour shifting. The shade you apply is the shade you wear, AM to PM.

Create a velvety, second-skin look with Soft Matte’s veil of superior oil-absorbing powders. Satisfying. Matiffying. This is the new take on matte – available in 34 shades.

name: MAC Lip Pencil - Strip Down, Soar
description:
With the largest-ever range of neutral Lipsticks, Lip Pencils and Lipglasses, reveal every shade of you with nudes for every mood.

Since MAC stands for All Ages, All Races, All Genders, we made it our mission to create an inclusive and diverse collection of lip shades for people of any and all colours.

Embrace all your shades and explore by your skin tone to find the nude (or two) for you.

Create different lip looks – from barely there to bold – by choosing a lip wardrobe to reflect what makes you uniquely you.

name: Guerlain Parure Gold Skin Matte Foundation, 1.5N Neutral
description:
The Parure Gold complexion has embodied the ideal alliance of makeup and skincare for an unmatched youthful glow. Boasting an ultra-sensory texture, Parure Gold Skin Matte’s formula is 85% rejuvenating skincare-based¹, for beautified skin, application after application.

No-transfer technology lies at the heart of this new formula offering 24 hours² infallible hold, a luminous matte effect with a velvety feel. A hint of pure 24-karat gold is associated with a duo of white peony extracts in a formula which instantly offers an exceptional complexion, and a more beautiful and luminous skin day after day.

Meticulously designed to adapt to all skins, 18 shades from the fairest to the darkest are available for Parure Gold Skin Matte.

¹Percentage of base without pigments and mother-of-pearl. ²Instrumental test on 25 Caucasian women.

name: MAC Powder Kiss Lipstick, Marrakesh-mere
description:
Matte, totally reinvented.

Delivering a romantic blur of soft focus colour, this weightless moisture matte lipstick was developed to replicate a backstage technique: blending out edges of matte lipstick for a hazy effect.

Its groundbreaking formula contains moisture coated powder pigments that condition and hydrate lips. The result is the zero shine look of a matte lipstick with the cushiony, lightweight feel of a balm.

Fall for this all new soft touch, misty matte kiss of colour.

name: Wrought Iron And Brass Bed Co. Lily Iron Sprung Bed Frame, Super King Size, Black
brand: Wrought Iron And Brass Bed Co.
description:
A timeless classic, the Lily bed frame from Wrought Iron And Brass Bed Co. balances the clean-lines of its slatted head and tailboard with downward, sweeping curve detailing. Made in the UK from solid wrought iron, its elegant frame references traditional Victorian design thanks to added cast iron fittings and colour-coordinating finials. This frame has a sprung base, providing a cushioned and responsive foundation for your mattress.

name: MICHAEL Michael Kors Jet Set Travel Leather Large Purse, Admiral
description:

Crafted from grained leather, the zip-around fastening opens to reveal three open compartments, a zipped and two slip pockets and various card slots. Additionally there is a card slot to back for access to your most used card and easy contactless payments.

It is completed with gold hardware and the Michael Kors logo to the front.

name: Daisy London Malachite Palm Pendant Necklace, Gold/Green
description:
Conjuring up images of distant lands, this pendant necklace has a great geometric design with a central palm on top of a malachite stone in the centre for a pop of colour. The pendant hangs from a fine chain that's adjustable in length for the perfect fit.

Each Daisy London item comes beautiful present with a pouch, box and gift bag.

name: Mango Niki Split Hem Tailored Trousers, Black
description:
Tailored to a slim silhouette, these mid rise tailored trousers by Mango are made from a blend of easy-care fabrics for long-lasting wear.

A versatile choice thanks to its plain design, let your hair down and mix with bold patterns.

name: Brora Mohair Cardigan
description: Buttoning right up to the neckline, this cardigan from Brora is spun from a wool-blend for a warming feel.

name: Lixirskin Night Switch PHA/AHA 10% Serum, 15ml
description:
Al acids exfoliate the skin to dislodge dead and strongly pigmented cells, they also encourage cell turn around to renew the skin. Each acid offers a special benefit, Lactic Acid improves hydration, Lactobionic Acid reduces oxidative stress and Phytic Acid eliminates heavy metals to detoxify the skin.

Your skin is quickly even-toned, radiant, plumper, softer and smoother. Gradually, fine lines, pore size and imperfections such as age spots are reduced.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: Calvin Klein Seductive Comfort Underwired T-Shirt Bra
description: Calvin Klein's Seductive Comfort range brings you everyday lingerie in super smooth fabrics. This t-shirt bra is made from a microfibre jersey fabric and provides an underwired lifted fit with adjustable shoulder straps. A Calvin Klein metal tag sits on the wing and scallop lace trim adds a finishing touch to the cups and underband.

name: Under Armour Charged Vantage 2 Women's Running Shoes
description:
• Neutral profile for runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
  • Charged Cushioning® midsole uses compression molded foam for ultimate responsiveness & durability
  • Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight
  • Anatomically placed, deep flex grooves offer extra flexibility in key areas

Achieve better cushioning, better comfort, and even a better stride with the support and guidance of a locked-in heel in these Charged Vantage running shoes from Under Armour.

This is a running shoe that's so light and flexible, once you put them on you won't want to stop. Feel the secure hug of a breathable mesh upper, the plush ride of Charged Cushioning®, and the impulse to just go. They're built with extra durability in high-impact zones so there's no stopping you.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Kids' Star Trunks, Pack of 3, Multi
description:
A trio of comfy, colourful trunks with a soft elastic waistband.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.
This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton.
bettercotton.org/massbalance

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.
