name: Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew by Spear & Jackson Dutch Hoe, FSC-Certified (Ash Wood)
description:
Part of the Kew Gardens collection

This rake has a mirror-polished stainless steel head that slips easily through the soil, is resistant to rust and easy to clean. Two chamfered edges let you hoe with both the forward and backward stroke. The handle is made from weatherproofed FSC-certified ash wood, sourced from sustainably managed forests.

Developed by Spear & Jackson in conjunction with Kew Gardens's horticultural team, used and recommended by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Garden | Gardening Hand Tools

name: Gucci GG0529S Men's Square Sunglasses, Gold/Grey
description:
This pair of square-shaped sunglasses from Gucci is made to suit a round-shaped face.

The polycarbonate lenses are impact-resistant and lightweight for comfortable wear, repelling water and dust for higher clarity.

name: Soaked In Luxury Shirley 3/4 Sleeve Blazer, Tea Leaf Green
description:
A smart outerwear piece that will pull any look together, this blazer from Soaked In Luxury features ruffled three-quarter length sleeves for a no-nonsense look.

Featuring a neat collared neckline, it is made from blended fabric that can be easily thrown on over a smart-casual outfit when the weather's being unpredictable.

name: Whistles Chunky Marl Socks, Multi
description: These chunky marl ankle socks from Whistles are made from a soft cotton-blend for ultimate comfort.

name: Sweaty Betty Sophia Short Sleeve Jumper, Black
description: A loose-fit, throw on jumper top ideal for layering. In a soft and stretchy fabric with a warm feel, it's cut to a subtly cropped fit that falls to the mid-waist. With batwing-style sleeves that end just above the elbow, it's finished with a comfy elasticated waist, cuffs and neckline.

name: Eclectica Vintage Attwood & Sawyer Swarovski Crystal Flowing Ribbon Clip On Earrings, Dated Circa 1980s, Gold
description:
In a flowing ribbon design, these earrings are decorated with sparkling Swarovski crystals for a touch of dazzle. Signed Attwood on the clip, it is thought to be made circa the 1980s. The earrings are secured with clip-on fittings that can be worn by anyone.

The Attwood and Sawyer company was founded in 1956 in Porthcawl, Wales by Mr Horace Attwood and Mr Sawyer. Many of the designs now treasured by collectors of vintage jewellery were inspired by historical references, including their most recognisable collection inspired by the jewellery collection of the Duchess of Windsor. Their high-quality approach to bold costume jewellery is now very sought after.

The brand had a very strong presence across the UK and Europe, and went on to produce the jewellery for the television series "Dallas." The brand was acquired by Buckley Jewellery Ltd. in 2001.

Please note, this is a limited production piece of vintage jewellery.

Please note, this is a limited production piece of vintage jewellery. Avoid contact with liquids and other beauty products.

Please note that vintage jewellery was produced prior to the introduction of the 2002 law prohibiting the use of nickel or nickel compounds. Customers allergic to these metals may experience skin rashes or irritation where the metal is in contact with the skin.

name: White Stuff Devin Shirt Dress, Ivory
description:
The feminine answer to dapper style, this midi dress by White Stuff adds charm to your collection with its classic gingham check pattern.

Framed with a flattering v-neckline and short sleeves, it is cut from pure cotton fabric and is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: Radley Trinity Way Leather Slip On Mules, Soft Gold
description: Upgrade your flats. The Trinity Way mules are where expert leather craftsmanship meets smart, shiny hardware. With details like a layered leather band across the foot, a comfortable padded insole and low, stacked heel, this slip-on style is made for poise and sophisticated (even when you re wearing them with your off-duty denim).

name: Monsoon Sienna Embellished Maxi Dress, Dark Blue
description:
Designed in a flattering A-line shape, this maxi dress by Monsoon boasts embellished detailing.

Framed with a round neckline and short sleeves, it pairs up with heels for your evening out.

name: Radley RYS05-2042 Women's Series 5 Printed Silicone Strap Smartwatch, Multi/Black
description:
Introducing the Radley London Series 5 smartwatch with colour screen and up to 7 day battery life. This great smartwatch combines functional tech features with a fashionable design you'd be proud to wear.

Compatible with iOS and Android, this smartwatch offers a range of fitness features including a heart rate monitor, distance/steps/calorie tracking, sleep tracking and activity tracking (running/walking/cycling/climbing) in real time. Plus you'll also have loads of handy other features like live weather updates, receiving calls, message notifications, selfie camera control, find your phone function as well as alarms and reminders. The watch is completed with a silicone strap for a comfortable finish.

Each watch is packed in a Radley London presentation gift box complete with an instruction manual, USB charger (sealed rechargeable battery) and 1 year manufacturer guarantee.

Download the free Radley London Active App now to explore in more detail. Splashproof only.

Please note: Radley have recently introduced new packaging across their jewellery and watches which is being gradually introduced into the John Lewis collection, so packaging received may vary from the image shown.

name: John Lewis Wooden Pull Along Dog
description:
• Improves gross motor skills like balance and coordination
  • Inspires imaginative play and allows storytelling skills to flourish
  • Supports the development of their communication and social skills

No need to spend weeks teaching them how to sit or how to play fetch, this one's already house trained! This classic wooden pull along toy we've made has a spring-loaded head and tail so it waggles with happiness whenever the kids take him for a walk.

Don't worry about walking him in the rain or make a mess of your sofa either, it's totally up to you when he goes out!

name: Raging Bull Flock Word Graphic Crew Neck T-Shirt, Forest
description:
Make down-time dressing effortless with this crew neck t-shirt by Raging Bull.

Imbued with a brushed flock word graphic to the chest and iconic bull logo to the right arm, reach for off-duty denim to complete the look.

name: John Lewis Two Step Indoor/Outdoor Rug, L180 x W120 cm, Orange
description:
This rug takes the classic stripe and gives it a modern twist. With a two-step style that offers a contemporary interpretation that draws the eye, this durable rug is made using a jute-style material and finished with whipped edges for a sharp border that complements the pattern.

With a flat finish making this rug ideal for busy, high-traffic rooms, the materials in this rug have been woven together by hand to create a strong construction. It's also suitable for use outdoors as well making it a great option for decking or conservatories.

About your new rug

  • We recommend John Lewis & Partners Rug Hold Underlay. It prevents your rug from moving underfoot and protects against colour transfer to the floor
  • Vacuum occasionally. When vacuuming your rug, use suction only. Rotating brushes may damage your rug
  • Blot any spills with a clean, dry cloth. Do not rub. Spot clean using a mild soap solution
  • Textile backed
  • Specialist cleaning recommended

name: Nerf DinoSquad Armorstrike Blaster
description:
Charge into action with the Nerf DinoSquad Armorstrike blaster! It features an awesome dinosaur design, capturing the look of an Anklyosaurus dinosaur. Launch 8 darts in a row from the blaster's 8-dart rotating drum to show your targets that you have plenty of dino-power!

The blaster includes 16 Official Nerf Elite foam darts -- 8 darts to load the drum and 8 darts for reloads. And you can keep those 8 backup darts nearby because the blaster has onboard dart storage.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Outdoor Toys & Games | View All Outdoor Toys & Games

name: Moda in Pelle Filicia Leather Zip Up Trainers, Dark Orange
description:
Filicia from Moda in Pelle is the ideal everyday leather trainer.

Featuring a stripe slab sole and side zip which means you can set the laces for that perfect fit, the leather sock and lining will keep you comfortable all day long.

Style with your casual collection.

Good to know: If you wear a half size Moda in Pelle recommend sizing down.

name: John Lewis Luxury Natural Collection British Wool 8750, King Size, Firm Tension Pocket Spring Mattress
description:
Our Luxury Natural Collection is handmade by experts in Yorkshire, with natural fillings chosen for their wonderful comfort, temperature-regulating and moisture-wicking properties. The innovative, high-density pocket springs reduce pressure points and give excellent targeted support. Plus, the combination of eco-friendly and natural fillings, alongside a completely glue-free design means these mattresses are fully recyclable at end of life for a much more sustainable sleep space. Handcrafted by Harrison Spinks.

Reassuringly dense with an extra level of support, our Firmer tension models are perfect for those who prefer a firm feel.

Natural fillings
Manufactured in Yorkshire, this mattress is upholstered with layers of locally-sourced natural fillings. British wool is used for its durability, comfort and natural springiness while hemp wicks away moisture, keeping the bed fresh and hygienic. The cover is also made with insulating, luxury wool which is fully traceable to British farms. It’s naturally fire retardant and free from chemical treatment for a healthier sleep.

Cortec™ Quad pocket spring system
This glue-free support system is made up of hundreds of pocket springs that move independently from each other to contour your body with accuracy. Designed, developed and manufactured in-house with a design that unites comfort and sustainability, they ensure precise pressure relief and help to keep your body weight evenly distributed during the night. Plus, as the springs work individually, air can flow better through the mattress and keep the temperature controlled.

Eco-friendly design
Marking a huge and sustainable step forward in mattress manufacturing, the patented Cortec™ Quad springs are sealed with heat rather than glue. Not only does this mean the springs can work individually for maximum efficiency, it also means each spring can be disassembled and reinvented in the future. So this mattress is 100% recyclable at the end of its life, rather than ending up in landfill sites across the country. We guarantee to recycle your mattress responsibly when you’re ready to buy your next one, after seven years. Visit one of our shops or call 03456 049 049 and we’ll help you to choose a new mattress and recycle this one.

Make the most of your mattress
After unwrapping your new mattress, leave it in a well-ventilated room for a few hours. Any natural scent from the fillings will dissipate after a few days. We recommend using a cotton mattress protector and airing your mattress regularly. If you’re placing this mattress on a slatted base, ensure the gaps are no more than 7.5cm apart.

Try before you buy
This is an important purchase and it’s worthwhile to try your choice of mattress in store to make sure it's right for you. Our store Partners will be able to tell you more about its benefits, and recommend options based on your needs. For more information, call 03452 661 805 and we can tell you where the range you’d like to view is on display.

name: Rachel Jackson London Medium Punk Hoop Earrings
description:
Opt for distinctive jewellery with these Rachel Jackson London medium punk hoop earrings.

In a choice of finishes, the earrings come with secure post fittings and a ball bead texture that adds texture, character and uniqueness in equal measures. Please note that these earrings are for pierced ears only.

Pair with the coordinating pendant necklace for a complete look.

name: Superdry Rookie Down Parka, Rifle Green
description:
Easy to pack for those will-it-won't-it days, this parka by Superdry comes in a flattering longer length.

With a faux fur trim hood for when the heavens open and with an responsible duck down filling, it is fashioned from longlasting fabric that will see away the cold.

name: John Lewis Brooks Gas Lift Adjustable Bar Chairs, Set of 2
description:
Upholstered in supple faux leather, our Brooks bar chairs provide a functional seating option for informal dining at your kitchen island or bar. Easy to assemble and supplied as a pair, the height-adjustable seat is easy to wipe clean and well-padded for comfort and its shapely design incorporates low armrests to support your frame.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Kitchen | Bar Chairs & Stools

name: YKK Open End Medium Weight Coil Zip, Black, 36cm
description: This YKK open end, medium weight, coil zip is ideal for your knitwear, outerwear and sportswear dressmaking projects.

name: Urban Decay Vice Lipstick, Elote
description:
With a new look and 100% vegan formulas*, new Vice Lipstick gives you high-impact, long-lasting colour. Los Angeles-inspired shades in three moisturising finishes: cream, matte, and shine. Find your favourite Vice colour, from sheer pink and everyday nude lipstick and to bright orange and red lipstick. We’re all about the comfy, hydrating feel and even coverage. Vice’s creamy formula gets a boost from Aloe Vera and Avocado Oil, ingredients known to be rich in antioxidants.

These lipstick shades are our love letter to L.A.

*Vegan formulas: contain no animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

name: InWear Jumo Long Sleeve Polo Jumper
description: Featuring a collared v-neckline, this lightweight jumper by InWear is made of pure cotton for breathable all-day comfort.

name: John Lewis Natural Cotton Quilted Kingsize Pillow Protector
description:
Naturally breathable with a pure cotton filling and quilted outer layer for comfort and softness.

Life Natural
The cover of this pillow protector has a Life Natural finish. This is an innovative natural peppermint treatment that contains antimicrobial protection to keep it fresher and cleaner for longer. The peppermint treatment is completely odour-free.

More Sustainably Sourced
We always strive to obtain raw materials from more sustainable sources. This product supports cotton farmers who use water efficiently, care for the environment and promote fair and decent work.

name: Caudalie Vinofresh Natural Stick Deodorant, 50g
description:
Meet Vinofresh, the naturally effective deodorant we were all expecting!

This 98% natural-origin ingredients deodorant is formulated with grape water whose prebiotic power supports a healthy underarm flora and soothes the skin, vegetal glycol to eliminate bad bacterias and the delicate scent of the invigorating aromatic notes of Eucalyptus to stay fresh all day long.

Thanks to its sensory and humectant base, Vinofresh Natural Deodorant Stick does not clog pores and leaves skin soft and hydrated. Suitable for sensitive skin, pregnant and breastfeeding women.

name: Harlequin Transverse Furnishing Fabric, Ink
description:
Inky brush mark detail casts subtle shapes and shadows across the ground of this show stopping fabric that's inspired by the angularity of architecture.

Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
If you'd like to purchase this fabric and are ready to place your order, or need a little styling advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: John Lewis Show-Wood Upholstered Bed Frame, King Size, Brushed Tweed Grey
description:
A modern design that incorporates sleek lines and smooth curves, our Show-Wood bed frame will bring a softer style to your bedroom. It's supported by tapered legs and we've added sprung slats to the base for extra support. Available to order in a choice of fabrics.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a subtle texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Lyle & Scott V-Neck Merino Blend Jumper, X65 Cactus Green
description: When it comes to knitwear, why mess with a classic? Defined by a conventional v-neckline, this jumper from Lyle & Scott is rendered from a lightweight merino wool blend for year-round appeal.

name: E.W Adams 9ct Gold Cushion Cocktail Ring, N, Amethyst
description:
Get ready for going out with this fine cocktail ring from EWA.

In solid gold, the ring showcases a timeless cushion-cut semi-precious stone that will shine for years to come.

Wear with the matching pendant necklace for a complete look.

Ring size: size N

To order a ring in a different size than that listed, please visit your nearest John Lewis branch to place a special order.

Resizing your ring:
If you have received a ring which doesn’t fit, you can take it to your nearest John Lewis store where your finger will be measured. The store will arrange the alteration of the ring free of charge for up to 3 sizes larger or smaller. Once the resizing is done, you can collect your ring from the same branch.

Please note that resized rings are not eligible for return.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY bluebellgray Floral Unframed Print, Set of 3, 30 x 40cm, Multi
description:
Create a gallery wall of floral prints with this colourful trio from bluebellgray. The three prints are unframed and require poster frames for wall-mounting.

Scottish home interiors company bluebellgray was established in 2009 by Glasgow School of Art graduate Fi Douglas. Inspired by a love of colour and all things floral, her hand-painted designs are fresh and modern.

Fi paints from the heart. Her designs continue to evolve while always having florals and colour at their core. Her beautiful oversized watercolour blooms and abstract pieces born from her natural painting processes have become synonymous with the bluebellgray name. These bright and fresh pieces offer a modern take on timeless florals and bring a colour statement into the home.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: HUGO BOSS Hooded Lounge Jacket, Black
description: This versatile loungewear jacket has a contrast-lined hood, and is crafted in stretch-cotton jersey for everyday comfort. Having a regular fit, it's detailed with piping and a coordinating BOSS logo at the left chest.

name: Stoneglow Luna Ylang Ylang & Amber Reed Diffuser, 120ml
description:
Ylang Ylang & Amber- A deep and mysterious fragrance, oriental floral accords of ylang ylang, jasmine and iris mingle with dark amber spiced with ginger, black pepper and cinnamon.

Stoneglow is a family run business that was established in 1991 specialising in the design, manufacture and packaging of creative handmade candles. Made in the UK, all candles and diffusers from Stoneglow are made to the highest standards by skilled artisans.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Candles & Home Fragrance | Diffusers

name: Yumi Floral Midi Shirt Dress, Green/Multi
description:
The feminine answer to dapper style, this midi dress by Yumi is doused in pretty florals.

With a cold shoulder design for a standout look and short sleeves, it is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: Georg Jensen Organic Links Chain Bracelet, Silver
description: The traditional chain bracelet is given a fresh new twist in this sculptural design by Jacqueline Rabun. Presenting a series of interlocked sterling silver links defined by an organic form, the piece combines a bold look with Georg Jensen's organic forms. The bracelet is fastened by an integrated clasp.

Our Mid-Century Sweep bed frame has a sleek, retro-inspired shape. Its streamlined profile marries soft curves and sharp lines, resting on tapered wooden legs. Sprung slats in the base provide additional support for you and your mattress.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Carhartt WIP Swamp Tours Organic Cotton T-Shirt, Dark Navy
description:
Make down-time dressing effortless with this organic cotton round neck t-shirt by Carhartt WIP.

Lay a solid foundation for your casual looks by slipping this go-with-anything piece on with joggers or jeans.

name: Gentlemen's Hardware BBQ Apron & Bottle Opener Gift Set
description: The Gentlemen's Hardware BBQ Utility Apron keeps your threads dapper and safe when you're cooking up a storm on the BBQ. Cotton canvas BBQ Apron. Includes bottle opener and pockets.

name: The Little Greene Paint Company Marlborough Wallpaper, Crystal
description: A large-scale pattern, reminiscent of an early 20th-century interpretation of one of Scottish designer Robert Adam's creations. This paper was discovered just after the death of Queen Mary, who lived in Marlborough House in London until 1953, after which the house became the headquarters of the Commonwealth Secretariat.

name: Lyle & Scott Contrast Block Short Sleeve Polo Shirt, Z271 Dark Navy
description: A wardrobe staple from one of Scotland's most iconic heritage brands, this regular fit polo shirt from Lyle & Scott is ideal for elevated casual days. Framed by a classic collar in a short sleeve cut, this one's made designed in a charming contrast block construction.
breadcrumbs: Men | Men's Polo Shirts & Rugby Shirts

name: Kersaint Cobb Fine Seagrass Carpet
description:
The pale hues of seagrass are a natural reflection of the landscape where its life begins. It is spun and woven with care into the most natural flooring we offer. With a thin latex backing seagrass will live and breathe in your home and you can admire the colour tone change throughout its life as it ages gracefully.

In a flatweave construction which adds texture, this carpet is a good choice for rooms that see less traffic or where people are less likely to wear shoes, such as bedrooms.

name: Saint Tropez Mila Rollneck Jumper Dress, Major Brown Melange
description:
In a comfortable jumper design, this mini dress by Saint Tropez is a muted, yet chic addition to your repertoire.

With a cosy rolled neckline and long sleeves, this piece will keep out the chill so you can enjoy the day ahead.

name: Jon Richard Crystal Pave Triple Glass Pearl Butterfly Brooch, Silver
description:
Elegnatly designed in the shape of three butterflies with crystal and pearl accents, this brooch from Jon Richard is an eye-catching piece to enlive simpler outfits. It is secured with a pin and catch fastening that ensures it stays in place.

Presented in a beautiful Jon Richard gift box, this brooch is the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one.

name: AllSaints Zoya Leather Gloves, Charcoal Grey
description: Practical and fuss-free for wintry days, these gloves from AllSaints are crafted from pure leather for smooth sophistication.

name: Phase Eight Siera Ditsy Print Blouse, White/Multi
description:
A versatile piece, this blouse from Phase Eight will instantly lift your mood with its bloom-filled floral print.

Framed with a v-neckline and three-quarter length sleeves, it is made with durable fabric for longevity of wear and is sure to act as the cornerstone of your everyday looks.

name: Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew by Spear & Jackson Secateur and Leather Holster Set
description:
Part of the Kew Gardens collection

Keep your essential gardening tool close to hand with this secateur and leather holster set. The holster features a belt clip for easy attachment, while the secateur has strong carbon steel blades, along with a metal anvil for improved durability. The adjustable cutting width makes for versatile use, with ergonomic soft-grip handles ensuring you can prune in comfort.

Suitable for branches up to 20mm / 3/4-inch in diameter.

Developed by Spear & Jackson in conjunction with Kew Gardens's horticultural team, used and recommended by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Garden | Gardening Hand Tools

name: Fisher & Paykel CG604DNGX1 Gas Hob, Stainless Steel
description:
The Fisher & Paykel CG604DNGX1 60cm gas hob features a stylish and minimal design on sleek stainless steel. Simple and precise, the hob has a neat look which is finished with a polished metal trim. Precision of latest burner technology with elegant stainless steel controls and a desirable design aesthetic inspired by European styling.

The hob features 4 burners, from a powerful wok burner to an extremely low simmer burner, this hob lets you create mouth watering dishes with ease. Cast iron trivets and polished silver controls perfectly complement the design and make operation of the hob straightforward. The cooktop has an easy-clean design so you'll have less clean-up hassle to deal with after cooking.

Please note: there should be a minimum height clearance of 75cm between a gas hob and the cooker hood above it.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new hob, along with removing and reycling the old one. Simply add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

name: Cotswold Rissington Commando Goodyear Welt Chelsea Boots, Brown
description: The Rissington Commando comes crafted with a leather upper styled with a classic full wing-tip toe. The Classic Goodyear Welt Construction and Heavy Duty Commando Sole promise total comfort and durability across any terrain.

name: French Connection Lilly Mozart Crew Neck Jumper, Utility Blue
description:
Keep warm and look good in the Lilly Mozart Jumper from French Connection.

Featuring a round neckline, relaxed fit, long sleeves and chunky Mozart knit, this essential layer has a luxurious feel and will also stave off the cold.

Layer yours over classic denim for an effortless weekend outfit, or pair with a sleek midi skirt to nail that smart-casual dress code.

name: Superdry Luxe Embroidered Logo Joggers
description:
Cut to a slim shape to flatter your profile, these mid rise joggers by Superdry are crafted from a durable, breathable cotton blend and fall to a regular length.

Stamped with the brand's logo, let them know who you are sporting.

name: Bosch Series 6 SMS6ZDW48G Freestanding Dishwasher, White
description:
Bosch has packed some serious cleaning power into this dishwasher - all whilst ensuring it keeps your energy bills low. The IntensiveZone option keeps your pots and pans looking at their best, with glass protection ensuring your more delicate crockery doesn't lose its shine. Fitted with sensors that detect how much water is needed, signature features like EcoSilence Drive™ and ActiveWater keeps noise and water usage to a minimum.

Access and control your dishwasher, no matter where you are
With the Home Connect app (available on Android and iOS), you can control your dishwasher remotely. Select programs, adjust timers, check how long the cycle has left, start the wash when you want; all from the comfort of your Smartphone.

LoadSensor automatically adjusts water useage
Not all washing loads are the same, so why should each cycle automatically use the same amount of water? The LoadSensor feature detects the load weight and water level so that only the required amount of water is used, saving you energy and money off your bills.

Clean heavily-soiled pots and pans at the press of a button
The IntensiveZone option, which can be added to most programmes, increases temperature and spraying pressure in the lower basket. Don't worry about any delicate dishes or fine china either: place them in the gently-cleaning upper basket to keep them looking at their finest.

EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum
Sleep soundly even with the dishwasher running as EcoSilence Drive™ keeps noise to a minimum. The brushless, energy-saving motor not only ensures you won't be disturbed at the night but also helps give the machine a longer working life; all without sacrificing cleaning power.

Perfect drying results with less energy usage
Bosch's PerfectDry uses humidity from the cleaning phase and transforms it into warm air to help dry your plates. Reducing energy usage by up to 20%, there'll be no more streaky glasses or drippy leftover boxes, and you can throw that ragged tea towel away and all.

Efficient water useage
Bosch's ActiveWater technology keeps your water usage low and your monthly bills even lower. By combining targeted water circulation with faster heat-up times and improved pressure in the spray arms, your dishwasher gets the maximum use out of each and every drop.

DosageAssist provides optimum results
From greasy baking trays to heavily soiled pans, DosageAssist ensures all your kitchen crockery comes out crystal clean. Catching the tablet in a special tray on the top basket, it gets completely dissolved, giving you great results every time.

Glass protection
Because soft water causes glass corrosion, Bosch fitted this dishwasher with glass protection that constantly regulates the degree of hardness to ensure valuable glasses and delicate china is always washed with special care.

So quiet it's worth shouting about
Quiet Mark approval means sounds are kept to a minimum and you're not disturbed by excess noise. Handy if you want to make the most of off-peak energy prices too.

name: La Rochère Abeille Bee Stemmed Wine Glass, Set of 6, 240ml, Blue
description:
A set of six tactile La Rochère wine glasses with a three-dimensional bee design raised from the glass surface. Each colourful glass has a weighty base and an attractive tapered shape for enjoying soft drinks or wine. The glass is dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning.

The original bee motif is a signature design of La Rochère glassware and was inspired by a famous pattern that belonged to Napoleon. The l'abeille or bee is also a symbol of the South of France and its rural landscape.

name: Clarke & Clarke Frontier Linen Blend Furnishing Fabric, Gold
description:
Enter Emma J Shipley’s uncharted land of curious creatures inspired by myths, legends and the unique beauty of the natural world. Shipley is a British artist and designer who studied at the Royal College of Art, and has always had a love of nature, and a fascination with mixing imagination and reality. She creates hand-drawn designs for nature lovers, dreamers, and maximalists.

This fabric, Frontier, is part of the designer’s second collection for Clarke & Clarke which is a fantastical, nature-inspired series that travels from Africa to America via British fairy tales, always with a touch of surreal fantasy. This version is printed on a cotton/linen blend fabric, but it's also available as a velvet.

Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
If you'd like to purchase this fabric and are ready to place your order, or need a little styling advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: A B Davis 9ct Gold Pear Semi Precious Stone and Diamond Teardrop Pendant Necklace, Amethyst
description:
Give your ensembles a classic and minimalist touch with a pendant necklace by A B Davis.

Expertly crafted from noble materials, the necklace comes in solid gold and features a small pendant. Th pendant combines a pear-cut semi-precious stone and three glistening diamonds. The necklace is finished with a lobster clasp.

Semi-precious stone 0.64ct, diamonds: 0.01ct

name: John Lewis Oliver Large 3 Seater Sofa, Light Leg, Aquaclean Matilda Steel
description:
The Oliver range comes in a wide choice of modular pieces and complete sofa options so you can choose the perfect sofa for your space.

Treated to prevent stains
An Aquaclean treatment has been applied to the fabric on this sofa which means you can banish the majority of household stains just with water. The treatment covers every fibre with an invisible coating that doesn't need to be re-treated or re-coated, making this sofa a good choice for busy households where you might be worried about potential stains.
It also has additional Safe Front® protection which is an extra shield that eliminates mites, fungi and bacteria.

Please note: The armless pieces within this modular range should not be bought separately as these units feature pre-fitted clips that are designed to be attached to another modular piece.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Aab Mico Plaid Houndstooth Check Maxi Dress, Multi
description:
This Micro Plaid Maxi is a classic style that you will wear for years to come. Houndstooth is a timeless pattern and this maxi has autumnal hues of deep red with navy & beige. With perfectly pointed collars, cuffed sleeves & a detachable belt, pair yours with a blazer for smart casual or trainers for a laid-back look.

This Maxi has a modest silhouette and fits true to size. The belt is detachable so you can wear without for a modest style or cinch in at the waist for a more defined look.

name: Freya Fatale Underwired Plunge Bra
description:
Freya Fatale is arguably Freya's sexiest collection to date and this plunge bra features a semi-sheer geo-stripe design.

Features include:

  • Low centre front for a plunging neckline without push up
  • Lace trim neck edge with sheer top cups and lace bottom cups
  • Gold ring detail at the centre front and apex

    • Wear with the matching Brazilian knickers to complete the look.

name: HotSquash Lace Sleeved Crepe Top, Navy
description:
Add a splash of colour to your wardrobe with HotSquash's Crepe Top.

In a range of beautiful colours with coordinated lace sleeves, it's perfect for both office wear and casual wear. Made in London from crease-resistant technology fabric. If between sizes we recommend you size up.

name: KAFFE Jillian Capri Chinos
description:
Designed in a fit that is slim but not skinny, these mid rise smart trousers from KAFFE feature a durable yet lightweight blended fabric.

A versatile addition to your wardrobe, this pair will go well with more or less anything.

name: Superdry Logo Velour Shorts, Everglow Pink
description:
A staple to slip on as the sun comes out, these mid-rise shorts from Superdry are made from a lightweight, breathable cotton blend.

Making the most of your downtime, complete your casual look with an oversized tee and a pair of sandals.

name: John Lewis Grace Child Compliant Upholstered Bed Frame, Cotton Effect Pink
description:
Our Grace bed frame is designed with button detailing on its curved headboard, which gives it a smart, yet understated look. It's supported by sturdy wooden legs and there are supportive, sprung slats in the base. We've upholstered it in our Cotton Effect fabric which has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Worth Knowing: Child Compliant bed frames
This bed conforms to BS 8509:2008+A1:2011 (Childrens beds for domestic use. Safety requirements and test methods). We recommend it is used with a standard single mattress, L190 x W90cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 4 years.

Result: The four eyeshadows blend endlessly to define natural, intense, sophisticated or smoky eyes.

Composition: A formula that enhances colour and makeup effects.

An exceptional concentration of pure pigments for a wider range of effects and intensities.

A jellifying system and a blend of polymers and spherical powders for:

  • A soft, creamy, glide-on texture
  • Shades that blend together perfectly

Easy application and immediate intense coverage.

Ophthalmologist tested and suitable for contact lens wearers.

name: Buyagift Two Night Memorable Break Gift Experience
description:
Sometimes you just need to escape from the stresses of everyday life and find some tranquillity. A weekend escape can be the perfect way to recharge your batteries and have you feeling rested and rejuvenated; fortunately, we've got just the thing to help you find that perfect break.

We've hand-picked the finest selection of over 440 wonderful two-night getaways to give you the best possible range of weekend breaks at venues across the UK! Whether you feel like staying in a hobbit hut or a Victorian mansion, a charming bed and breakfast or a luxury hotel, we've compiled a list so diverse that there's something to suit everyone, so no matter what kind of weekend escape you're looking for, we've got you covered! Whether you fancy a rural retreat or a glorious luxury getaway, you'll find yourself spoilt for choice so you are sure to enjoy a perfect break for two at a fantastic location.

Worth knowing: This voucher is valid for 2 years from date of purchase.

Worth knowing: If you need to request a refund of your Gift Experience, please get in touch with our Customer Contact Centre by clicking here or call on 03456 049 049 quoting both barcodes on the back of the box. Please note Gift Experiences purchased online cannot be refunded in-store. name: The Little Botanical New Home Plant Bundle
description:
Succulents require watering every 3-4 weeks and ideally they like to be placed somewhere light in your home. The Calathea and Chamaedorea need watering once a week.

This bestselling bundle of houseplants will instantly add contemporary style to your living space. Whether you buy this indoor plant gang as a gift or for yourself, these green delights won’t just look great, they’ll improve your wellbeing and get to work removing toxins from the air around you.

Included in this bundle are:

  • Calathea (Prayer plant)
  • Chamaedorea (Parlour Palm)
  • Medium Haworthia (Zebra cactus)
  • Medium Crassula (Jade plant)
  • Echeveria Miranda (Molded Wax Agave)

All the succulents are low maintenance and only need watering once every 3-4 weeks and prefer to be placed somewhere light in your home. The Calathea and Chamaedorea need watering once a week.

All plants are planted in Little Botanical signature ceramics, so they’ll arrive ready to go. All you need to do is unpack them, decide where they will go and then sit back and relax.

H50 x W18 x D17 cm

Please note that this is a living product and the variety of Calathea and Haworthia may vary from the photo.

Caring for your plant

Always follow the attached care instructions. Whilst this will give your plants the best chance of thriving, environmental factors will also play a big impact on your plant's life span such as exposure to sun and humidity.

Please note:

As plants are a live product, the dimensions and images provided are estimates only as each plant is unique.

Refund policy
We can't offer refunds or exchanges on perishable goods such as flowers and food, unless faulty or not as described. Find out more. This does not affect your statutory rights.

description: Slimline and lightweight, the 6 Card Single Billfold Wallet from Aspinal of London will discreetly slip into your trousers or coat pocket. name: John Lewis Java II Motion Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa with Footrest Mechanism, Metal Leg
description:
Redesigned to more modern proportions, Java II features slender legs, generous bolster style arms and innovative Cortec™ pocket spring technology for a supportive sit. This is our Motion version which also features a footrest, so you can properly kick back and relax.

Comfort and sustainability
We use innovative Cortec™ pocket springs to give excellent support in the Java II. These springs help retain the cushion shapes so they stay firmer for longer compared to foam seats. The air in the pockets also allows for natural ventilation, keeping upholstery clean and fresh, and with no glue used the springs are 100% recyclable.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Basic Blackout Roller Blind, White
description:
This blind is made from moisture resistant fabric, so it’s suitable for use in kitchens and bathrooms

Key features:

  • Can be installed either inside or outside the window recess, to the wall or ceiling
  • Can be standard or reverse rolled. Standard gives a close fit to the window, helping eliminate light. Reverse brings the material forward over the roll which conceals it and creates space between the blind and window
  • Chain mechanism can be attached on the left or right-hand side, without affecting the way the blind is rolled
  • Width can be cut to size
  • Supplied with easy fit universal brackets
  • Includes safety devices to keep children safe

    • Warm in winter, cool in summer
    As the blackout lining on this blind blocks out sunlight it helps keep your room cool as well as dark. This 3 layer blackout coating also adds an extra layer of insulation, giving the blind thermal properties which aren’t found on non-blackout blinds. It protects against both heat loss and heat gain, regulating the temperature of your room so you’re kept warm in winter and cool in summer.

    Worth knowing...
    The width stated in our product specifications is the total width of the blind including mechanisms and brackets. The width of the fabric alone will be a few centimetres less than this.

    Safety warning
    Young children can be strangled by loops in pull cords, chains, tapes and inner cords that operate the product.

  • To avoid strangulation and entanglement, keep cords out of the reach of young children - cords may become wrapped around a child's neck
  • Move beds, cots and furniture away from window covering cords
  • Do not tie cords together. Make sure cords do not twist and create a loop

    • More information on child safety can be found on our Child Safety Hub

    With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there’s joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: BLANCO Envoy Single Lever Monobloc Mixer Kitchen Tap
description:
A sweeping swan neck and single lever design make this tap an attractive and practical addition to your kitchen. This monobloc mixer tap is available in a range of colours.

One of Blanco's Eco 6 litre water-saving taps, it comes with a fitted restrictor or flow limiter within the spout, limiting the water flow to six litres per minute. It does not require any extra work from the installer and it saves a considerable amount of water yet still provides a very good visual flow from the tap.

For use with high-pressure supply systems only with a recommended 0.5 minimum and 5.0 maximum bar pressure.

Key Features:

  • Single-lever monobloc mixer tap
  • Solid geometric form
  • WRAS compliant approved fitting
  • Ceramic disc cartridge
  • Eco 6 litre/minimum flow regulated tap

Please note: not all our ranges are on display in all of our shops. For more information, please speak to a furniture Partner in store, or call 03452 661805 and we can tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Choose the perfect tap for your kitchen

Below are a few options and features to consider when choosing your perfect kitchen tap. Taps are largely about style and preference although they can have several useful features:

Aerators (also called flow constrictors) These are anti-splash, but also mix air with your water, creating a good pressure, at the same time as saving water. If you are simply rinsing plates or cutlery these can give a great saving.
Filter taps These work in the same way as a water filter jug, except they filter as you draw water from the mains, therefore giving you limitless filtered water. They remove bacteria, chlorine and lead from the water supply. They also remove any pesticides and insecticides which may have got into the water system. Filtered water also helps reduce the build up of limescale in appliances. The filter cartridges for these taps need replacing every 6 months or so to retain effectiveness.
Hot taps Use a mini-boiler under the sink to provide you with instant boiling (or hot) water. You no longer need to rely on kettles or saucepans to heat water before you make a cup of tea, or boil your veg - it comes instantly from the tap. Some taps can also provide you with chilled water for cold drinks, and even sparkling water. These are great if you like fizzy drinks, but prefer to avoid additional sugar - simply mix with your favourite cordial!

name: Giorgio Armani Crema Nera Acqua Pantelleria Lotion, 150ml
description:
Inspired by the mythical waters of Pantelleria Island, Acqua Pantelleria is a lotion made from the fusion of four vital minerals and Reviscentalis™, an extract from a powerful resurrection plant.

Enriched with grapefruit extract from Italy for its sophisticated freshness and with Vitamin E, Acqua Pantelleria delivers instant hydration and comfort to revitalise the skin, for a more luminous, younger-looking complexion.

The gel-like formula imparts a sensation that is at once as fresh as water, as nurturing as a serum, and as light as a veil, leaving skin silky-smooth and prepared for the next stages of the skincare ritual. The silky texture breaks into water, blending with skin to provide comfort and suppleness. Skin feels revitalised.

  • Instantly, skin feels gorged with water, nourished with moisture, it feels more comfortable and supple
  • Skin reveals a healthy glow with more radiant and fresher complexion. Hydrated all day long, skin is plumper and its texture refined
  • Skin appears younger and firmer, fine lines appear reduced

Active ingredients:

  • 1. Reviscentalis™: extract from a powerful resurrection plant able to revive with just a few drops of water after years of desiccation
  • 2. Vitamin E
  • 3. Four vital minerals: magnesium, sodium, potassium, and silicium inspired by the composition of the waters that surround the volcanic island of Pantelleria
  • 4. Grapefruit extract from Italy: provides an overall sense of freshness

description:

Refraining from any fussy details, this refined choice will effortlessly slip into your everyday rotation.

name: John Lewis Select Gliding Curtain Pole with Barrel Finial, Wall Fix, Dia.30mm, Satin Gold, L100cm
description:
Returns
As our usual exchange and refund policy doesn’t apply to products that are made to order or made to measure, our Select Curtain Poles cannot be cancelled, returned or exchanged. This doesn't affect your statutory rights if goods are faulty, or not as described. To see the colour finishes of the poles, a selling partner or home designer, in store, will have a sample ring available with all finishes.

Behind every great pair of curtains is an even better curtain pole. It’s important not to neglect this part of your window dressing as, without even realising it, the pole provides support both in the obvious structural sense, but also in terms of complementing your decor. Designed and made here in the UK our premium Select Curtain Poles are a fantastic option. Here’s why:

  • They’re made from high-quality steel and/or aluminium that will support all curtain weights, from breezy voile panels to heavy, opulent velvets
  • Depending on the type of pole you choose there are up to four finials and five powder-coated finishes available so you can create your perfect configuration according to whether you’re going for a modern or more classic look
  • Sizes range from 1m to 4m, going up in 10cm increments, so there’s a size to fit every window without having to get the hacksaw out. If the size of the curtain pole selected is 210cm and above, the pole will be delivered in 2 parts. All Select pole sizing excludes finials
  • Even the ‘little bits’ are as robust as possible - the brackets (which project 10cm from the wall) have a vertical back plate that gives maximum support and grub screws secure the pole and finials in place
  • Magnetic cover plates are included to hide the fixings so there are no unsightly screws left on show
  • They can be mounted on wood, metal, masonry and plasterboard so you can match the poles throughout your home even if the wall types differ. Just be aware that you may need to purchase specialist fixings

    • This particular version is our 30mm, wall-fix gliding curtain pole with a barrel finial. It's suitable for hanging curtains with any pleated heading style. The gliders are designed to run smoothly in the pole channel, minimising noise as you open and close your curtains.

    Includes:

    Curtain pole 1
    Brackets 2x side brackets on all sizes

    1x mid bracket if over 2m

    3x mid brackets if over 3.5m Finials 2 Gliders 1 per 10cm of pole Other

    Fitting instructions

    Fixings (suitable for some wall types)

    Fixing guide for advice on specialist fixings required depending on your wall type

    Curtain holdbacks are also available as part of our Select range. They come in the same 5 finishes as the pole so you can make sure they match.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Curtains & Blinds | Curtain Poles

name: John Lewis Metal Shelf Set, Pack of 2, Blue
description: In a handy pack of 2, these shelves are a colourful way to accessorise their space. The handmade shelves are made from heavy gauge iron sheets and have a matt-painted finish. The stylish shelves look great and make a great place for storing little keepsakes.

description:
An all-year essential, this jersey top by Live Unlimited will give your wardrobe the refresh it needs.

With a flattering v-neckline and long sleeves, it is made from a soft viscose blend and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

name: Benefit Hoola Matte Bronzer, Original
description:
Matte bronzer.

  • Award-winning, iconic bronzer
  • Silky-soft powder bronzer with a matte finish
  • Available in 4 shades: Hoola, Hoola Lite, Hoola Toasted & Hoola Caramel

The bronzer that started it all...

Benefit’s bestselling powder bronzer instantly warms up your complexion and gives a classic matte finish. All 4 shades feature the same soft, blendable formula that made the original Hoola a cult-fave. Hoola-la!

  • Hoola matte bronzer
  • Hoola Lite light matte bronzer
  • Hoola Caramel medium-deep matte bronzer
  • Hoola Toasted deep matte bronzer

name: CHANEL Coco Mademoiselle Eau De Parfum Spray, 50ml
description:
The essence of a bold, free woman. An Amber fragrance with a strong personality, yet surprisingly fresh.

Sparks of fresh and vibrant orange immediately awaken the senses. A clear and sensual heart reveals the transparent accords of Jasmine and Rose. The trail unfurls the pure accents of Patchouli and Vetiver that emphasise the slender structure of the composition.

The eau de parfum comes in a spray format for an effortless application on skin or clothing.

A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also available to enhance the fragrance trail.

name: Osborne & Little Bamboo Wallpaper, W7025-02
description:
Stylised bamboo, rendered in a painterly fashion.

Have you thought about wallpaper accessories? Shop here.

name: John Lewis Chester Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Dark Leg
description:
A modern twist on a classic shape, Chester features deep, feather-wrapped seat cushions and buttoned back detailing for an inviting sit, finished with brass-capped tapered legs.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Sofas & Armchairs | Sofas & Sofa Beds

name: Fresh Seaberry Revitalising Conditioner, 240ml
description:
Seaberry Revitalising Conditioner with nourishing omegas 3, 6, 7 & 9 is a daily rinse for all hair types that softens, smooths, and revitalises the hair from root to tip while improving manageability and adding amazing body. The gentle formula further works to protect the hair from environmental stressors, promoting frizz-free strands. Seaberry has been revered since antiquity for its ability to promote shiny, healthy-looking hair.

  • 94% found it nourishing
  • -94% said it coated and softened their hair and made it easy to comb after rinsing
  • -90% felt it improved dryness and damage from root to tip and maintained healthy-looking hair

*In vivo.

Key ingredients:

  • Seaberry oil, also known as seabuckthorn oil, is a powerful antioxidant rich in nourishing omegas 3, 6, 7 & 9 that promote lustrous locks.
  • Cranberry seed oil, packed with vitamin E and additional omegas, helps smooth and protect.
  • Moringa seed extract is known to protect the hair from environmental stressors.
  • Beet root extract is known to protect the hair from heat-induced stressors.
  • Sal seed butter helps to soften and moisturise.
  • Vitamin B5 helps smooth strands and enhance shine.

240ml

name: New Balance Fresh Foam X Hierro v7 Women's Trail Running Shoes
description:
• Megagrip outsole to create a protective shell of durability and traction
  • Breathable, lightweight upper
  • Fresh Foam midsole cushioning is precision-engineered to deliver an ultra-cushioned, lightweight ride

People love the idea of adventure in the great outdoors, but there's more to the natural landscape than fresh air and scenic views. Uneven terrain, debris, and moisture are unique challenges to footwear that require specialized construction. For those who take going off the beaten path literally, there's the Fresh Foam X Hierro, a dedicated, off-road application of our best running technology. The Fresh Foam X Hierro v7 employs a Vibram® Megagrip outsole to create a protective shell of durability and traction around the signature Fresh Foam X cushioning and a breathable, lightweight upper.

name: Tommy Hilfiger Logo T-Shirt
description: Made from pure cotton jersey and finished with Tommy Hilfiger's flag and logo embroidery, this tee is a sleepwear staple. Relaxed fitting giving you room to move, mix and match it with favourite lounge or nightwear bottoms.

name: Designers Guild Brera Lino Furnishing Fabric, Cornflower
description:
Beautiful plain soft washed linen, heavyweight with outstanding texture and drape. Heavy and durable, with all of the natural charm and character of linen for a textural and sensual experience.

description:
A sleek and modern choice, this mini dress by Superdry boasts a floral flourish for added appeal.

Framed with a smart collar and short sleeves, this piece is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: Gina Bacconi Spencer Knot Mini Dress, Teal
description:
An ideal option for evening cocktails, this dress from Gina Bacconi exudes luxe style.

Made from soft velvet for a premium sheen, this dress is cut to a mini for ease of movement and long lasting comfort. It features a knot detail which pulls in the waist to create a stunning slinky silhouette.

Wear with heels and a sparkling clutch.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Short Sleeve Custom Slim Polo Shirt, Deckwash White/C8645
description:
An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original.

This trim version is made from a highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a super-soft handle.

Made in Ralph’s Custom Slim Fit, this polo has a trim silhouette in between their Classic and Slim Fit. Tailored through the waist with bicep hugging sleeves, a ribbed collar and embroidered pony at the chest complete the iconic design.

Ideal for smart-casual styling throughout the seasons, this polo looks just as at home with denim as it does with slim chinos and leather boat shoes.
breadcrumbs: Men | Men's Polo Shirts & Rugby Shirts

name: DIOR Addict Shine Lipstick Refill, 527 Atelier
description:
The DIOR Addict lipstick refill is part of the House of DIOR's eco-design initiative. Once your lipstick is finished, swap out the stick with the shade of your choice.

The DIOR Addict lipstick is formulated with 90%* natural-origin ingredients and keeps your lips hydrated for 24h.** Its ultra-creamy texture glides on the lips to provide comfort and shine.

Good to know: The DIOR Addict lipstick refill cannot be used alone.

*Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. **Instrumental test on 10 subjects.

description: Framed by a graceful high neckline, this jumper by Great Plains is precisely patterned to a geometric brief and is made from a soft and longlasting cotton-polyester blend.

name: Chelsea Peers Ornamental Fan Print Swim Shorts, Blue
description: These swim shorts are ideal for your poolside debut. In a board shorts style, they come with multiple pockets and Chelsea Peers' signature drawcord waistband. Finished with an ornamental fan print, they boast plenty of retro attitude.

name: Simply Silver Chunky Polished Sterling Silver Ring, Silver
description: With a wide graduating design and gorgeous polished finish, this ring from Simply Silver manages to achieve both simple and statement at the same time. Made from sterling silver, it makes a great addition to any collection.

name: French Connection Tam Ribbed Jersey Top
description:
Not your average staple, this jersey top from French Connection makes for the perfect companion to patterned accessories.

Keeping things cosy with its roll neck and long sleeves, it is made from a light yet durable blended fabric and is ideal for relaxed daytime wear.

name: HUSH Adeline Twisted Necklace
description:
HUSH has given a classic style a contemporary twist – literally – with its pretty Adeline necklace.

Featuring a fine chain and a twisted hoop pendant, it will look great on its own or layered with others.

Please note this product does not come in a gift box or with gift packaging.

name: Swyft Model 01 Storage Ottoman
description:
Say goodbye to less-than-beautiful storage solutions with Swyft's Storage 01.

Designed in a round shape it has a comfortable foam top for solo sitting, or for those well-deserved feet-up moments. Inside, you’ll find a sturdy hardwood and solid beech frame that’s made to last, with a soft fabric lining.

About Swyft's fabric options

All inherently durable and resilient to everyday life, the boucles, wools, chenilles, and soft linens offer a softer, more textured option. The velvets, linens, suedes, and cottons are all made with stain-resistant threads so you don't need to worry about your clumsy friend, over-excited child or boisterous pet making a mess.

About Swyft's Eco-Velvets
These fabrics are woven from 100% recycled polyester and are GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certified. The yarns are extruded from post-consumer PET bottles, repurposing thousands of plastic bottles that would otherwise end up in the ocean or landfill. These fabrics are also OEKO-TEX 100 certified, meaning they've been thoroughly tested beyond national and international requirements to ensure all components are fully free from any substances which may be harmful to human health. Those are some pretty impressive conditions, but they still perform as you would expect from velvets as they're durable yet have that soft matt touch with a plush dense pile.

Delivered in a box
No matter how tight your entry space, or how many flights of stairs you need to contend with, Swyft sofas are easily delivered as they will come in a box that can be lifted by one person, or a series of boxes depending on the size. It'll take some assembly when it gets to you, but it does mean you don't need to worry about the logistics of actually getting your new sofa into your home. And you won't need any tools as every Swyft product uses the innovative Swyft-lok mechanism which makes assembly quick and easy.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

description: Enjoy the ultimate in laid-back luxury, indoors or outdoors. Designed to snugly surround you in super-soft faux fur. The elasticated slingback adds extra support and textural difference..

description: A classic pair of wing-tip brogues, the Dustin style is crafted with leather and has a comfortable cushioned memory foam leather footbed. The hardwearing flexible sole unit makes this the perfect smart all day footwear.

name: Sisley Instant Correct Primer, 1 Just Rosy

  • Just Rosy: Illuminates fair skin and subtly corrects dull complexions with greyish undertones
  • Just Lavender: neutralizes and gives a porcelain finish to very fair skin with yellow undertones

description:
• Slim fit sits close to your body
  • Elasticated design promises total freedom of movement

Get a sweat on in style with Superdry's Base Layer leggings. If you couldn't tell already, they're super stretchy and come fitted with a large elasticated waistband for extra support and comfort. Signing off the only way they know how, spot the brand’s signature stamp at the leg.

name: Crew Clothing William Check Shirt, Bright Red
description: Shirts aren't just for the nine-to-five. Reworked for a more casual settings, this cotton design by Crew Clothing unashamedly borrows from the past with its classic check pattern and comes in a classic silhouette that's light enough for layering.

name: Lollys Laundry Tanya Spot Print Midi Skirt, White/Multi
description:
Cut to drop into a tiered silhouette, this midi skirt by Lollys Laundry is aptly scattered with spots across its canvas.

Crafted from soft and durable cotton and sitting at the waist, it's a breath of fresh air in casual combinations.

name: ASICS NOVABLAST™ 3 Women's Running Shoes
description:
• Mesh upper increases breathability and allows the foot the flex naturally
  • Trampoline inspired outsole design provides a more responsive bounce back
  • A heel stabiliser helps support the foot and create a more balanced stride
  • FF BLAST™ technology provides lightweight cushioning and a responsive rebound

Running made easy. For the second iteration of the NOVABLAST™, ASICS has created a smoother and more responsive trainer.

Ideal for neutral runners, the trampoline-inspire outsole puts a spring in every step, with FF BLAST™ technology providing a softer landing and a more energetic rebound. The outsole's wider base creates a more balanced landing, meaning you'll benefit from improved comfort over long distances.

The shoe's soft and lightweight mesh upper delivers excellent airflow, keeping your feet cooler and fresher throughout your run.

Complete with a gusseted tongue that improves the midfoot fit and reduces tongue sliding, you'll no longer see a finish line when you reach home. Just a put stop until you're ready for round two.

name: Aspinal of London Men's Milano D-Frame Sunglasses, Tortoiseshell
description: A timeless tribute to retro sun-wear, the Milano Sunglasses are a refined accessory choice for the discerning gent. Hand-crafted from highly polished Italian acetate, the D-shaped frame is complemented by solid lenses which provide 100% UVA and UVB protection for ultimate wearability. Designed with meticulous attention to detail, Aspinal's iconic shield can be found on the eye front, the interior bridge and the hinge. A bespoke laser-etched metallic plate in the shape of the Aspinal shield adorns the inside of the temple, while the exterior is accented with the Aspinal of London logo.

name: Claudia Bradby The World is Your Oyster Freshwater Pearl Pendant Necklace, Silver
description: Claudia's signature, and iconic design, The World is Your Oyster, has become a bestseller for its easy-to-wear design and touching sentiment. The disc is cast from an oyster shell found on a beach near Claudia's birthplace in Australia. Much loved by Claudia Bradby collectors, this special necklace can be worn on its own or layered. The adjustable length allows this necklace to be worn as a choker as well as at a more regular length.

name: Bisley MultiDesk Ply Wood Home Office Desk with 6 Drawers, 140cm, Pink/White
description:
Perfect for smaller spaces, the MultiDesk brings you all the benefits of the iconic Bisley MultiDrawer storage cabinet, transformed into a multi-functional desk. Stay organised while working comfortably and maximising space within the home or office.

Made in the UK, your MultiDesk can be assembled with your MultiDrawer at the right or left side, whatever is handier for you. The contemporary design features six drawers, sturdy steel hairpin legs and a painted ply wood top.

description:
Can Thomas and his adventure-loving friends uncover the secret hiding in the mines? Kids can relive all the exciting action of the 'Mystery of Lookout Mountain' episode of 'Thomas & Friends: All Engines Go' with this set of diecast metal vehicles and accessories.

Includes Thomas, Percy, Diesel, Kana, Nia, Sandy the Rail Speeder, Darcy the Driller, and Carly the Crane. Just push to send these railway pals racing along to the next Sodor adventure!

Egyptian cotton is celebrated for its superior strength, durability and exquisite comfort, and we’ve worked hard to source the very best for this range.
