name: Totter + Tumble Captain and Trailblazer Compact Reversible Playmat, Multi
description:
Created to meet the needs of the whole family, the robust yet squishy playmat from Totter + Tumble keeps little ones cushioned on the floor, with a modern, double-sided design, to complement your interior. On one side, the Captain's diamond patterns on a warm terracotta clay background has a rustic appeal, while on the reverse, the playful leopard print of The Trailblazer has a contemporary look, on a timeless storm grey background.

Made from sealed, waterproof memory foam, it's a practical foundation for busy family activities, from their tummy time workouts and train track building to your home workout sessions. When required, simply wipe clean with a gentle cleaning solution and it's ready to see more action.

    Totter + Tumble Playmats are all:

  • Simple, easy care. Just roll out and wipe down with a gentle cleaning solution and cloth.
  • Stylish and reversible to suit your home interior.
  • Supportive with 1.3cm thick memory foam, which cushions and molds, designed so you won't feel the floor underneath, and nor will your little ones.
  • Safe and certified for newborns, made of high quality, phthalate, and lead-free PVC.
  • Strong, tough and durable, standing up to endless use every day.
  • Sized so the whole family can play together on both the standard and compact styles.

This version is a compact model that's designed for smaller spaces.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Shop Toys | View all Baby Toys

name: Big Green Egg MiniMax BBQ with ConvEGGtor
description:
So much more than just a charcoal barbecue, Big Green Eggs will transform the way you cook at home by bringing the flavour of fire cooking out of the restaurant and into your back garden.

The barbecue reaches cooking temperature within minutes. Its patented airflow control allows you to achieve the right temperature to within a few degrees and maintain it with accuracy. This makes it ideal for a host of cooking tasks, from grilling burgers to slow cooking ribs, smoking fish, roasting chicken or even baking bread.

The MiniMax is the smallest of the range but don't let its size fool you – it still packs in all the same features of its larger siblings plus has the benefit of being transportable thanks to a purpose-built carrier that makes it easy to stow in a car boot. Perfect for impromptu trips.

The ConvEGGtor, included as standard, opens up a world of culinary possibilities by allowing you to cook indirectly. The clever ceramic insert essentially turns the EGG into a convection oven, circulating heat around the dome and protecting food from the direct heat of the fire below. This means that as well as grilling, you can roast, slow-cook, smoke, bake and more.

The patented ceramics, covered in a British Racing Green coloured glaze, are the same as those used for NASA space shuttles, so this is a barbecue that not only looks attractive but is built to last.

Key benefits:

  • MiniMax kamado barbecue with ceramic ConvEGGtor for grilling, baking, smoking and slow cooking
  • Ideal for barbecues for 2-4 people
  • Sturdy, easy to grip carrier
  • Perfect for adventures, camping trips or taking to the beach
  • Stainless Steel Cooking Grid
  • Fire box, fire ring and fire grate
  • Stainless steel cooking grid
  • rEGGulator snuffer cap
  • Tel-Tru thermometer dome gauge
  • What can it fit?: 4 burgers, 1 whole chicken, 2 steaks or 1 rack or ribs or a 12-inch pizza
  • Weatherproof
  • Lifetime guarantee is for the ceramic base, dome, fire box and fire ring

The outside of this exceptionally well-insulated ceramic EGG doesn't get as hot as traditional metal barbecues, meaning it's safer to use, especially if you have children around. The exterior wipes clean with ease while inside, residual heat burns away any leftover grease, just like a self-cleaning oven.

name: Simply Silver Ball Bead Bracelet, Silver
description: A simple but elegant style, this beautifully designed large polished ball bracelet is the perfect way to finish any outfit, whatever the occasion. The style is part of the brand's iconic Simply Silver collection that boasts fine, contemporary and meaningful 925 Sterling Silver jewellery.

name: Estée Lauder Pure Colour Creme Lipstick, Unleashed
description:
Make the moment with a match for every power move.

This long-lasting lipstick saturates lips with statement-making, wearable colour designed to flatter all skin tones. High-performance lipstick stays colour true and wears for 10 impactful hours while resisting bleeding, feathering and creasing.

Creme Finish: Dimensional colour glides on effortlessly to a smooth, satin finish. Full coverage lipstick with plumping, nourishing and conditioning benefits.

Naturally derived Moisture Lock Complex* provides extra lip-adoring care while you wear. Lips look immediately plump and smooth, with a more defined and sculpted appearance over time—even after the lipstick is removed.

Expertly designed lipstick bullet is perfectly shaped to help sculpt the curves of your lips with effortless precision. The golden case is a delight to have and to hold. Thoughtfully designed to be refilled in a curated selection of Estée Lauder's most coveted lipstick shades.

#LeaveYourMark: this long-lasting lipstick is for everyone, for any occasion. Explore all the must-have shades in 3 on-trend finishes.

Featured ingredients:

  • Moisture Lock Complex: Estée Lauder's rich, naturally derived* Moisture Lock Complex features a blend of potent oils plus a powerful plant extract to instantly condition and plump while maintaining moisture on lips over time
  • Potent Oil Blend: Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Meadowfoam Seed Oil and Apricot Seed Oil nourish and condition lips
  • Salicornea Herbacea Extract: Powerful plant extract maintains lips’ moisture and comfort over time

*Per ISO Standard 16128. From plant sources, non-petroleum mineral sources, and/or water.

Coverage: Medium to full coverage.

Finish: Long-lasting lipstick in Creme finish.

name: Gina Bacconi Doreen Chiffon One Shoulder Dress, Pink
description:
Flaring out at the hem for added movement, this maxi dress by Gina Bacconi is in need of no fussy details or prints to catch the eye.

Adding modern definition with an asymmetric neckline and shaped with one sleeve, this piece makes nailing occasionwear effortless, whether your toasting the bride or hitting the dancefloor.

name: Frederique Constant FC-200MPW2V2B Women's Classics Art Deco Bracelet Strap Watch, Rose Gold/Silver
description:
Channel elegant and timeless Swiss horology with this Frederique Constant watch.

The minimalist piece presents an easy-to-read dial set in a flattering oval dial. The mechanism is protected by a sapphire crystal glass.

The final touch is the fine bracelet strap that secures with a deployment clasp.

If you would like to return this product, you will need to take it back to the Jewellery & Watch department in one of our John Lewis Branches. Only once the product has been verified and authenticated will a return be authorised.

name: Whistles Phoebe Leather Shirt Midi Dress, Black
description:
In an A-line shirt style that you will wear again and again, this midi dress by Whistles is in need of no fussy details or prints to catch the eye.

Smartening your look with its collared neckline and puff sleeves, it is cut from pure leather for a premium feel and is a care-free option for daytime dressing.

name: Estée Lauder Double Wear Stay-In-Place Flawless Wear Concealer SPF10, 03W Medium Warm
description:
Looks flawless. Lasts 15-hours. Feels comfortable, never dry. Stays seamless, without creasing.

The lightweight creme formula creates the perfected look of flawless skin and lasts all day. Transfer-resistant, colour-true, with medium buildable coverage that won't slip, slide or melt away. Luminous finish.

Infused with minerals and emollients to condition skin and make blending easy. Oil-free. Water, perspiration and humidity-resistant.

name: Simon Carter Plain Leather Belt
description: Of considerable robustness and durability in the finest Simon Carter tradition, this leather belt is well stitched, with a sturdy buckle in brass. Branded with the Simon Carter logo on the reverse, this must-have accessory is built last.

name: John Lewis Cashmere Crew Neck Cardigan
description:
Designed to last in look as well as quality, our luxury Cashmere cardigan is softer and smoother thanks to its high quality long fibres.

Because 100% cashmere means just that, this foundation piece is knitted using a yarn spun uniquely for us, and we've used cashmere knitted tape to support the beautiful mother of pearl button placket. Longer in length, it combines simple modernity with a relaxed fit that works well dressed up or down.

At John Lewis, we're committed to having the most sustainable and traceable cashmere on the market.

We work closely with our suppliers in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where the extremely cold climate means the goats produce some of the best cashmere in the world. Using only the longest, finest fibres, our specialist cashmere spinners use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed.

Read our full traceable cashmere story

John Lewis introduces a new style philosophy focused on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe.

Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch.

Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. It's how you wear it.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Jaipur Rug, L300 x W200 cm, Dusty Green
description:
Made from a strong cotton-blend and a pattern inspired by traditional rug design, this floor covering adds a splash of colour and sophistication to living rooms and bedrooms. Why not accessorise with cushions and throws in the similar shades to create an effortless, co-ordinated look?

About your new rug

  • We recommend John Lewis & Partners Rug Hold Underlay. It prevents your rug from moving underfoot and protects against colour transfer to the floor
  • Natural fibres may shed. This will reduce over time, and shouldnt affect your rugs lifespan or performance
  • When vacuuming your rug, use suction only. Rotating brushes may damage the fibres
  • Blot any spills with a clean, dry cloth. Do not rub or use harsh detergents.
  • Latex backed therefore not suitable for underfloor heating. Specialist cleaning recommended.

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, theres joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: Wolf & Whistle Embroidered Triangle Bikini Top, Black/Red
description: Bloom beachside in Wolf & Whistle's Embroidered triangle bikini top, with its delicate red embroidery over black.

name: VF Jewellery 9ct Yellow Gold Garnet Second Hand Floral Brooch
description:
Dated London 1963, this VF Jewellery brooch offers a richly detailed floral shape punctuated by faceted round-cut semi-precious stones. Complete with a safety roller catch.

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

name: Ted Baker Seyie Crocodile Effect Double Monk Formal Shoes, Chocolate
description:
Channelling heritage charm, these double-strap monk shoes from Ted Baker are made from supple leather for comfortable wear.

Detailed with a buckle fastener and a crocodile effect, this pair may be the last thing you put on, but they're far from least when it comes to sophistication.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Fiona Howard Flower Vases Unframed Print, Set of 3, 40 x 30cm, Multi
description:
Create a gallery wall of floral prints with this colourful trio from Fiona Howard. The three prints of flowers in vases are unframed and require poster frames for wall-mounting.

British designer Fiona Howard trained at Middlesex University and now works from her beautiful Regency studio overlooking the sea in Brighton and from her Los Angeles studio in Venice Beach. Over the last 25 years, she has built an international reputation in home furnishing textile design and prints, working closely with clients, travelling between London, Paris, New York, Chicago, San Francisco and Los Angeles.

Fiona is inspired by an eclectic mix of influences, such as Japanese art, 50s textiles, Indian woodblock prints, the designers Lucienne Day and William Morris, illustrators Edward Bawden and Robert Tavener, exciting finds at antique fairs, travels to India and Marrakech. Artisanship and skills sit at the heart of Fiona's work. She meticulously colours handmade Japanese papers to create her distinctive colour palette. Filling numerous sketchbooks with preparatory drawings, she then translates these into repeating patterns. Employing lino print, monoprint, painterly and cut paper techniques, everything is created by hand, nothing is computer-generated giving each design the quality of fine art.

Fiona has regularly exhibited her work at Made, Brighton's Design and Craft fair, The Brighton Artists Open studios and has also exhibited her prints at The Brighton Art Fair.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.

A smart, shirting stripe.

description:
Made from 23 recycled water bottles, these skorts come with a high-rise waist which doesn't roll down and are made from a soft touch, opaque fabric (don't worry, you cannot see through it though). In a compressive material that's breathable and stretchy with built in shorts and mesh pockets, they're finished with side slits.

Made using recycled materials, helping us to reduce our impact on the planet.

name: Simplicity Misses' Pullover Dress Sewing Pattern, 9011, R5
description:
Create a pullover dress with this Simplicity Misses' paper pattern.

Follow detailed instructions and illustrations to create pull-on, slim dresses in two lengths with grown-on sleeves. Choose between a straight, gathered or cuffed sleeve. Designed and sized for stretch-knit fabrics and easy to sew, this pattern can be constructed using an overlocker/serger. Please note, this pattern is suitable for US sizes 14-22.

name: Whistles Easy Jersey Joggers, Dark Grey
description:
Make these Whistles jersey joggers part of what you wear on a day off.

With a classic tapered fit and elasticated cuffs, the design is produced from a super-soft cotton-mixed fabric. Its drawstring keeps it comfortable around the waist and the side pockets give it the perfect utilitarian finish.

Add your favourite sweatshirt.

name: Smeg KLF03 Kettle, Red
description:
Combining a beautiful design inspired by the retro-chic of the 1950s with a range of practical features, the KLF03 kettle from Smeg is sure to make a statement in any kitchen.

The KLF03 boasts a sleek stainless steel body and soft-opening lid for safe and simple refilling. The 360° swivel base makes it suitable for both left and right-handed users, while the stainless steel limescale filter is easy to remove and wash. Other handy features include an automatic shut-off at 100°C, water level indicator and anti-slip feet.

name: Hourglass Equilibrium Resurfacing Retinoid Treatment, 30ml
description:
A lightweight resurfacing treatment that boosts clarity, helps even skin texture and tone, and provides a healthy, balanced glow.

This fast-absorbing treatment is formulated with our clinically proven blend of retinoid, hexylresorcinol, and niacinamide to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles and diminish the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation, while improving skin radiance over time. The formula is effective yet gentle enough for both morning and evening use.

Features & Benefits:

  • Provides a more even skin texture and tone
  • Visibly improves skin radiance over time
  • Minimises the look of fine lines, wrinkles
  • Reduces the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation
  • Helps balance skin and provides a healthy glow
  • Gentle enough for both morning and evening use
  • Effective yet gentle to skin, minimising potential irritation
  • Non-drying feeling
  • Vegan and cruelty-free

This fast-absorbing treatment is formulated with a clinically proven blend of a retinoid, hexylresorcinol, and niacinamide to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles and diminish the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation to boost skin radiance. The formula is effective yet gentle enough for both morning and evening use.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: Chelsea Peers Maternity Zebra Regular Button Up Shirt and Shorts Pyjama Set
description: These zebra print pyjamas combine style and comfort for the perfect lounging experience. The long-sleeved shirt boasts a flattering V-neck and collar, while the shorts come with a wide stretch drawcord waistband for all-night comfort. The recycled fabric is super-soft and breathable with contrast piping for a pretty finishing touch.

name: Aveda Shampowder Dry Shampoo, 56g
description:
99% naturally derived,* non-aerosol powder mist that refreshes hair between washes. Absorbs excess oils. Adds matte texture and volume while infusing calming Shampure aroma.

*From plants, non-petroleum minerals or water.

name: Gucci Éternité De Beauté Foundation SPF 15, 110C
description:
Gucci Éternité De Beauté foundation stays on the whole day, no matter how you play. This 24H, long-lasting Gucci foundation delivers a luminous-matte finish and full coverage in one drop, while feeling breathable, weightless, and comfortable. Available in 40 shades.

The Formula: A combination of high-skin affinity powders and coated pigments with an ultra-performant polymer technology allows 24-hour wear with zero transfer, while letting the skin breathe. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Black Rose Oil, the formula helps to boost and maintain skin hydration. Its very thin, flexible texture feels comfortable, and breathable, like a second skin. Bamboo Powder helps control shine all day. Blending the best of natural luminosity with a perfecting mattifying effect, Gucci foundation instantly blurs pores, evens the complexion, and blends away imperfections. The matte effect is never dull and stays fresh all day long without looking cakey. Formulated with SPF filters for skin protection.

The Range: A full range of 40 foundation shades matched to all skin tones–from deepest to lightest on every skin type. Calibrated across five shade families and harmonised to four undertones: cold, neutral, warm, and olive.

How to use:

Take one pump on the back of your hand, then, with your favourite tool (clean fingers or a foundation brush), pick up 1/3 of it. Starting at the nose area, stretch it from the centre of the face outwards, and blend with circular motions Pick up more product if needed and continue to apply to the forehead, chin and jawline.

How to find my perfect shade.

Each shade is identified by two parts:

  • Numbers refer to the depth of your skin tone, from Fair (1XX) to Deep (5XX)
  • Letters correspond to your skin undertone. C for Cool - skin rarely tans, with pink hue; N for Neutral - skin tans sometimes, with both pink and golden hues; W for Warm - skin tans easily, with yellow or golden hue; O for Olive- skin tans easily, with both yellow and greenish hues

name: Mango New Mom Cropped Jeans, Black
description:
Slim through the leg, these mid rise jeans from Mango are made with comfort in mind thanks to their soft cotton blend composition.

A versatile addition to your edit, this pair will go well with more or less anything.

Less Laundering
It’s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible.

name: ELLE Lace Trim Bikini

A matching bralette is also available.

Carved with a crew neck and long sleeves, it's made from organic cotton making it naturally soft and breathable and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

description: Elevate your everyday look with these Denton Chinos from Tommy Hilfiger. Made from a stretch cotton corduroy with side-angled and back button pockets, and finished with Tommy flag embroidery on the back pocket for a subtle branded finish.

name: Cricut Foil Transfer Insert Cards, Pack of 35, Royal Flush (S40), L12.1 x W12.1cm
description:

This ingenious glue-free design allows for two-tone, depth-filled cards without the hassle or mess of glue. Each cut will reveal the hue of the insert inside. Set includes: Set of three Leitz Cosy Letter Trays that provide the optimum storage space for your documents, magazines and folders. Helping you to stay organised in the office and at home. Leitz Cosy Pen Pot that has a wide open top to fit all of your desktop accessories, whilst its matte colour and minimalistic design make it the perfect accessory for any workspace. Leitz Cosy 2 ring binder that ensures organised filing of up to 190 sheets of A4 paper (80 gsm). The lightweight, wipe clean plastic allows you to stay relaxed and productive all day. Set of two Leitz Cosy Display books that allows you to be organised, no matter where you are working. name: John Lewis Pocket Sprung 4 Drawer Divan Base, Small Double, Soft Touch Chenille Duck Egg
description:
Great if you're short on storage space. This divan base features four drawers, two on either side of the frame, so there's plenty of extra room for your clothes or spare bed linens. A sturdy and supportive divan base, made from high-quality pine wood and designed with layers of posturfil pocket springs that provide a responsive and cushioned base for your mattress. Team it with a pocket spring mattress for enhanced support as the springs pivot in response to your movements for a deeper level of comfort while you sleep.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Want to see it first?

Made from robust fabric that's sure to stand the test of time, it is waterproof, regular in length and has a zip-up closure that's perfect to grab-and-go.

name: Radley Window Shopping Ceramic Mug, Dark Rose

The Window Shopping scene is taken from this season's picture bag and features Radley dog. Presented in a giftable box, it makes the perfect present – if you can bear parting with it, that is.

description: Offered in an intricate, geometric design, our Otto Door Mat is made using 100% coir for a durable finish.

description:
An easy choice for off-duty days, this pair of trainers by Moda in Pelle is made with leather uppers for long-lasting quality.

Sitting on a flat heel, they are shaped with a round toe for everyday appeal.

Heel height: 3cm

name: Estella Bartlett Cubic Zirconia North Star Drop Earrings, Gold
description: Make a wish on the North Star with this celestial-inspired style. The drop style has a star charm with a single cubic zirconia stone in the centre shining bright. The charm hangs from a classic demi-hoop and is secured with post fittings that are for pierced ears only.

name: Bric's Life Large Faux Suede Holdall, Neutral
description: Covered in a soft suede-effect finish, Bric's Life holdall has 'weekend escape' written all over it (not literally, mind). Featuring multiple zipped pockets, smooth leather trim and an optional strap for easy carrying, the clever slide panel at the back lets you slip it onto suitcase handles to go hands-free. And yes, before you wonder, it'll happily travel on the plane with you as a cabin bag.

name: EAST END PRINTS Jane McDevitt 'Cat' Matchbox Label Framed Print
description:
A vibrant vintage-style framed cat print inspired by matchbox labels, by Jane McDevitt.

This fine art-quality print on 210gsm acid-free archival paper is framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes. The acrylic glaze is light in weight and optically the same as glass. Made in the UK, it's ready to hang on your wall.

Designer Jane McDevitt's interest in matchbox labels lies primarily in the design but also the concept that these small images can communicate to a large number of people. 1950s and '60s Eastern European labels captivate her the most as she finds the subject matter particularly fascinating.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

    • The wide frame measures 3.5cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 36 x 31cm
  • 46 x 36cm
  • 56 x 46cm
  • 86 x 66cm

name: Phase Eight Brielle Wrap Bodice Maxi Dress, Black/Pink
description:
Wrapping over at the front for a shapely silhouette, this maxi dress by Phase Eight creates a little sparkle with its metallic print.

Framed with a flattering v-neckline and long sleeves, this piece pairs up with heels for your evening out.

name: Stoves Richmond 600G Gas Range Cooker, Red
description:
Beneath its compact exterior, the Richmond 600G Gas Range Cooker from Stoves offers professional gas cooking for effortless yet delicious meals, no matter what's on the menu.

Using Bluetooth technology, you can connect the oven to your smart device and remotely set the clock and timer, as well as register your appliance.

Perfect for mastering the art of cooking, this luxury range cooker boasts 4 gas burners including a 4kW wok burner that delivers fast, intensive heat. It also comes with hard-wearing cast iron pan supports for maximum stability and durability.

Other impressive design features include an easy-clean enamel lining, telescopic shelves that can be pulled out smoothly for added ease and safety, and a soft-close cast aluminium lid which reduces noise and completes the premium feel.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new cooker, along with removing and recycling the old one too. Simply add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

name: Bosch Series 6 WGG24409GB Freestanding Washing Machine, 9kg Load, 1400rpm Spin, White
description:
Stain-busting, wool washing and A-rated energy performance. Bosch has ensured this washing machine can care for all your laundry whilst not being a burden on your bills. The hygiene setting is great for any allergy suffers, and the reload function is a lifesaver when you find an odd sock that didn't quite make its way into the laundry basket.

Freestanding Design
This freestanding washing machine sits on its own, stacked or under the counter. You can place it anywhere where there’s a connection, which means if you move house you can just disconnect and go.

1400rpm spin speed
Spin speed refers to how quickly the drum can rotate in order to remove excess water out of clothes. The 1400rpm on this machine makes it ideal for doing everyday laundry, drying clothes just enough so that tees and shirts don't come out dripping wet whilst still ensuring not to damage the fabric.

The right wash for the right stain
No two stains are the same. But selecting the right washing programme for each can result in less than perfect cleaning results. Bosch washing machines with the AntiStain option help you to reliably remove any stain, every time. The option easily removes the most stubborn stains (red wine, chocolate, and grass included), adjusting temperature, drum movement and soaking time for perfect results.

AntiVibration reduces noise levels
Cleverly shaped to keep noise to a minimum, the AntiVibration design of the side walls provides more stability and reduces vibration during the spin cycle. You'll benefit from a machine that works quietly and doesn't disturb the tranquillity of your home. Plus, it'll give you more freedom over where you're able to place the appliance too.

EcoSilence Drive™
Keeping the washing machine noise down, Bosch’s EcoSilence Drive™ uses a brushless, energy-efficient motor to reduce friction. This not only keeps the noise down but also helps give the machine a longer working life.

Load laundry mid-cycle
Forgot a sock or your favourite t-shirt? No worries - the reload function lets you simply add missed out clothes or remove clothes during a wash cycle. Just press pause, open the door, add your forgotten items into the drum and continue the wash.

VarioDrum treats your clothes with care
Unique to Bosch, the VarioDrum structure means even your most delicate clothes get a thorough, but gentle washing. Water is distributed evenly and the paddles rotate the laundry to the centre of the drum, giving your clothes an intensive clean whilst avoiding stretching and creasing.

Automatic Load Adjustment
Cleverly weighing each load automatically to provide a tailored cycle, the sensors in this washing machine adjust programme times precisely, ensuring optimum treatment for every garment. Your laundry comes out with that fresh, new feeling every time, plus you save water and energy.

Digital Display
Smart and stylish, the digital display shows how long your cycle has left, and the progress of the timer delay, making planning your cycle much simpler.

Quick Wash Cleans clothes in Under 30 Minutes
It's Sunday night and you've just realised you forgot to wash the little one's school uniform. No worries: the quick wash option has you covered. Cleaning clothes in under 30 minutes, the high-speed spin shortens drying times to ensure you'll never be short on a shirt or skirt.

Delicates Programme
The pain of hand washing your favourite blouse is over. Ideal for lingerie, lace or silk, take advantage of the delicate programme to keep your more treasured clothes looking at their best.

Wool friendly washing
Who said washing your favourite knit had to be a pain? Saving you the time and hassle you would've spent cleaning it by hand, the special wool programme included with this machine means you don't have to worry about dropping laundry off at the dry cleaners anymore. Winter just got that little bit easier.

So quiet it's worth shouting about
Quiet Mark approval means sounds are kept to a minimum and you're not disturbed by excess noise. Handy if you want to make the most of off-peak energy prices too.

name: John Lewis Draper Motion Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa with Footrest Mechanism, Dark Leg, Piccadilly Black
description:
Stylish and functional, the Draper range is thoughtfully designed with tailored arms and slender legs. The modern proportions of the button detail seat and back cushions offer a deep and supportive sit. This is our Motion version which includes a footrest, so you can really kick back and relax with your feet up.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy

They can be squashed, folded and bundled and will always return to their original shape; lasting freshness is also guaranteed due to the natural anti-bacterial properties of Everywear™.

name: Denby White Speckle Stoneware Coupe Dinnerware Set, 12 Piece, White
description:
Denby White Speckle is a combination of simplicity and beauty with a soft textured glaze combined with Denby's much-loved shapes creating a collection that's both practical and stylish.

This 12-piece Denby White Speckle dinnerware set is dishwasher, microwave and freezer safe, as well as oven safe to 250°C. Included are four coupe dinner plates, four medium-sized coupe plates and four cereal bowls.

Made at the Denby Pottery in Derbyshire, England, using locally sourced clay, each piece of Denby stoneware is handcrafted using pottery skills passed down through generations and can pass through as many as 20 pairs of hands. Every item of pottery is expertly glazed by skilled craftsmen and the distinctive glazes are renowned for their practicality, durability and chip resistance.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: Monsoon Linen Wide Leg Pull On Trousers, Cobalt
description:
Effortlessly chic, this pair of culottes from Monsoon sit naturally on the hips and are cut with an ample wide leg.

Comfortable in pure linen, they are longer in length and play nicely with print thanks to their plain canvas.

name: Soaked In Luxury Clara Lace Trim Slip Dress, Broken White

Balancing clary sage with herbaceous, citrus notes renews your senses, leaving skin gently cleansed and fragrant.

Perfect for spring, this revitalising hand wash evokes the air of the mountains - a classic choice for your en-suite.

name: John Lewis Emily Kitami Bed Frame, Single, Relaxed Linen Putty
description:
Meet Emily Kitami, our bed frame which is designed with an upholstered headboard and a sturdy solid oak base. It's a classic, clean-lined style but the well-padded headboard gives it a modern edge, and it can be upholstered in a fabric of your choice. Sprung slats in the base provide a supportive and responsive foundation for your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect is woven to create a linen-effect feel

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is woven with man-made fibres, making it exceptionally durable and versatile

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille has a velvet-style, chenille feel. It's woven with man-made fibres to create a beautifully soft yarn and can appear two-tone in different lights

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet is a soft and luxurious velvet-like fabric

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen is durable, resilient and versatile, woven from man-made and natural fibres

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Harriet is made from a short, dense pile of velvet that has a soft, brushed finish. An Aquaclean treatment has been applied to this resilient fabric which means you can banish the majority of household stains with water. The treatment covers every fibre with an invisible coating so it doesn't need to be retreated or re-coated. It will naturally develop lines, scuffs and shading over time.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Drawing inspiration from the opulent swagger of the 1920's Parisian bar scene Enville has a Deco feel thanks to the scalloping pattern across the backrest. The tapering legs contrast the Deco design of the body, making it equally suitable for a contemporary setting and brass-capped feet add a flash of luxury.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

name: John Lewis Java II Leather Armchair, Metal Leg
description:
Redesigned to more modern proportions, Java II features slender legs, generous bolster style arms and innovative Cortec™ pocket spring technology for a supportive sit.

Comfort and sustainability
We use innovative Cortec™ pocket springs to give excellent support in the Java II. These springs help retain the cushion shapes so they stay firmer for longer compared to foam seats. The air in the pockets also allows for natural ventilation, keeping upholstery clean and fresh, and with no glue used the springs are 100% recyclable.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy

description:
Sure to become a Royce wirefree favourite, Joely is simple yet stylish and designed using strong supportive fabrics with pretty stretch lace trims to ensure a perfect fit. This style comes with lining/pockets as standard.

VAT exemption

We would like to remind our customers who have had surgery for breast cancer that they do not have to pay VAT on their post-surgery bras. Our Customer Services team will be happy to reimburse you following your purchase. Please call them on 08456 049 049 and we wish you the very best on your journey.

Please note:

As this bra is delivered direct by our approved supplier, delivery will take 7 days. Further sizes to those detailed may become available as stock is produced by our supplier. If you are unable to see your required size, please ensure you check back regularly.

description:
Seraphine's signature knot front dress is a pregnant woman's secret weapon, ready in the wardrobe. The fit-and-flare empire line lends itself to the pregnant silhouette, for effortless elegance. The knot front detail creates gathers over the bump to flatter and add a sense of movement. Made of silky-soft stretch jersey, the dress drapes beautifully too.

The deep V-neck makes the most of your pregnancy cleavage and is also a practical solution for discreet breastfeeding. This versatile style suits the office and casual days. Just add jewellery and you have a glamourous look for evenings out.

description:
Lightweight, comfortable and breathable, the Eolie sandal is ideal for every day wear. Crafted from plain leather, it rests atop an outsole made from jute rope for a summery vibe.

The classic Geox rubber sole is based on an exclusive patent: the combination of the perforated sole and the resistant breathable and waterproof membrane allow for natural temperature regulation, creating the perfect microclimate inside the shoe that keeps feet dry and comfortable for the whole day.

Inspired by the neat folds of origami, Le Pliage from Longchamp delivers practical simplicity to a sleek everyday style. The light, foldaway bag has become recognisable worldwide.

description:
Newly added to Samsonite's range of hard-wearing luggage, the Proxis suitcase is a globetrotter's dream, with a hidden section that expands to provide extra storage space, a TSA-approved lock for security, and four double wheels to ensure easy movement.

Made from Roxkin™, an exclusive material developed by the brand, it bounces back into shape, offering remarkable strength, resilience and lightness. The sophisticated design resonates confidence and is fully equipped to meet all your travel needs. Lightweight, and fitted with two carry handles, it's also easily portable.

name: Superdry Everest Hooded Bomber Jacket, Deep Red

Designed with a faux fur trim hood for a warming feel, it is elevated with a zip through the front for easy fastening.

name: KETTLER Palma 7-Seater Corner Garden Mini Casual Dining Set with Wood-Effect Top Table
description:
A Palma corner set for casual dining outdoors, with seating for up to seven people. This set includes an 'L' shaped sofa, a casual dining table with a wood-effect top and two footstools.

With style and durability at the heart of the design, KETTLER's Palma outdoor furniture is made of weatherproof synthetic wicker with a 6mm half-round weave on powder-coated aluminium frames, creating a hard-wearing traditional rattan look.

Key features:

  • Corner garden sofa unit, 2 footstools, dining table
  • Comfortable shower-resistant cushions
  • Traditional-style handwoven synthetic wicker
  • Weatherproof, rustproof and UV-resistant
  • Lightweight yet robust aluminium frames
  • Easy to maintain
  • Match with other furniture in the Palma range

Seven-seater set
The set includes a corner sofa unit that comfortably seats up to five people. A pair of matching footstools add two extra seats and the dining table has a wood-effect top.

Durable and weatherproof
Built to last, the set is made with lightweight yet sturdy powder-coated aluminium frames and handwoven synthetic wicker with a tight 6mm half-round weave. The set is weatherproof, rustproof and UV-resistant, so it can remain outdoors all year round without it fading or cracking.

Low maintenance
The set needs just an annual clean with mild soapy water (without abrasive solvents). The cushions are sponge clean only. If you wish to cover your furniture, a breathable cover can be used but make sure the furniture is dry before pulling it over the top.

Soft and comfortable cushions
The seating comes with soft, comfortable seat cushions and backrests that keep their shape. The double-piped cushions are shower-resistant and easy to remove. Store them when not in use and bring them inside during winter months.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Garden | Garden Furniture Sets

name: Aspinal of London Pebble Leather Midi London Tote Bag, Tan
description:
Simple and understated, Aspinal of London's signature Midi London Tote is a versatile everyday companion.

Hand-crafted from full-grain leather, its semi-structured shape is instantly recognisable with the two stitched 'A' panels to the sides, accented by the signature shield and plaque charms.

This must-have piece can be carried by the soft top handles or worn cross-body using the detachable soft leather strap.

name: Hush Puppies Kids' Jezza Senior School Shoes
description:
School shoes don't have to be boring. Hush Puppies know that too. You want something that's durable, trendy; something that keeps growing feet at their best. And Jezza ticks all those boxes. Diamond weight 0.02ct

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

name: EAST END PRINTS apricot+birch 'C'est La Vie' Framed Print, White Frame, 36 x 31cm
description:
That's life! Keep your style French with this rainbow-coloured typographic print by apricot+birch.

The giclée art printing process and 210gsm acid-free archival paper create an exhibition-quality art print with long-lasting colours that more closely resemble the artist's materials and tones. A digital form of the original work is stored and then printed using a commercial printer and pigment-based inks. The print is presented with an acrylic glaze that's optically the same as glass yet lighter in weight making it easier and safer to hang. Ready to hang on your wall, it's framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes.

apricot+birch is led by Beth, an artist and designer specialising in modern, geometric and abstract designs. She is inspired by shapes, bold colours and a minimalist aesthetic. Beth lives in Washington, DC with her husband and three daughters.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm

  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

bettercotton.org/massbalance

name: John Lewis Rouen 2 Drawer Storage Upholstered Bed Frame, Double, Soft Touch Chenille Charcoal
description:
Our Rouen storage bed frame has a classic design that's enhanced with button detailing across the headboard. There's a soft-close drawer on either side of the frame that's brilliant for storing spare linens. Sprung slats provide additional support for you and your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets

Want to see it first?

name: Rangemaster Professional + 110 Electric Range Cooker, Gloss Black
description:
When a cooker is named the Professional, you can expect nothing less than professional results.

If you're a serious cook, you need a serious cooker. With a wealth of features, including two spacious ovens and a separate grill compartment with Rangemaster’s renowned glide-out-grill system, the Professional + range cookers offer the sleek modern lines of its contemporaries with a few extra treats thrown in. Available in a variety of beautiful finishes, it not only performs but it will look the part too.

The ceramic hob features 6 zones with hot hob indicators, and is an effortless form of heating for hob cooking. The left hand oven is a conventional oven with timer. A handyrack is attached to the oven door, giving easy access to all of your roasting trays, so that you don’t have to move the trays in and out of the hot oven. The right hand oven is fanned electric and has a large capacity, perfect for catering for friends and family. There's a dedicated variable electric grill where the grill pan glides out on runners for extra convenience, the cooker is height adjustable and has catalytic stay-clean liners for supremely easy cleaning. A storage drawer on the bottom right hand side is ideal for storing away bulkier pots and pans.

Rangemaster’s original range cooker, made in 1830, was a revelation to the cooking fraternity. They are still manufactured in Royal Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, benefiting from over 200 years of manufacturing excellence. Great cooking has always started with a great cooker and the new ranges still share the original dedication to quality, design and innovation.

name: Crane Garden Buildings 3 x 3m Garden Studio, FSC-Certified (Scandinavian Redwood), Cream
description:
The Crane Garden Buildings Studio features floor-to-ceiling glass panels, which let sunlight flood in to create an open and airy feel. Now you can have an inspiring office, hobby room, gym or lounge space for year-round use without the fuss and expense of an extension.

The studio is made in the UK from high-grade FSC-certified northern Scandinavian redwood. It is fully insulated and lined, and the exterior is coated in an attractive colour choice of either Cream, Sage, Flint, or Willow microporous paint that will protect the wood throughout the seasons.

With its pent roof design it has been designed to meet modern planning requirements.

Key Features

  • Delivery and assembly by Crane Garden Buildings
  • Hand made to order in the UK exclusively for John Lewis & Partners
  • Crafted from FSC-certified Scandinavian redwood
  • Under 2.5m high to meet modern planning requirements
  • Double glazed throughout
  • Toughened glass for durability
  • Fully insulated walls floor and ceiling
  • Internal vertical matchboard lining
  • Solid brass fittings
  • Mortice Lock for additional security
  • Falls within modern planning regulations
  • Available in a variety of colour options: Cream, Sage, Willow and Flint

Crane Garden Buildings at the Leckford Estate, Hampshire
You can visit the following Crane Garden Buildings on display at our Leckford Estate throughout the year.

Crane Garden Buildings 3.0 x 4.2m Large Garden Room, Cream

Crane Garden Buildings 3 x 5.4m The Hub Plus Left-Hand Corner Garden Studio

Aloe: hydrates

name: Crane Garden Buildings Shepherd Hut with End Door, 2.4 x 3.6m, Flint
description:
The Shepherd Hut by Crane Garden Buildings is a traditionally styled building designed to fit perfectly into a rustic country garden, becoming an outdoor focal point. Climb the stairs and enjoy the charms of this Shepherd Hut all year round as it comes fully insulated with double-glazed windows and solid pine lining. Whether you're using it as a quiet reading nook, a secluded garden office or peaceful retreat, you're sure to feel cosy, no matter the weather.

This Shepherd Hut is made in Norfolk from high-quality FSC-certified northern Scandinavian redwood and the exterior is finished in a choice of five paint colours to complement your garden: Shale, Sage, Flint, Willow or Cream. The paint is microporous, which protects the timber throughout the seasons.

Key Features:

  • Delivery and assembly by Crane Garden Buildings
  • Handmade in the UK exclusively for John Lewis & Partners
  • Double-glazed windows and door with toughened safety glass for durability
  • Door is on the shorter gable end
  • Crafted from FSC-certified Scandinavian redwood
  • 5-lever mortice lock with secured fittings
  • Fixed decorative wheels
  • Corrugated galvanised metal roof
  • Over 2.5m so planning permission may be required. Contact the Crane Garden Buildings helpline 01760 444229 for further advice or contact your local planning authority (LPA) through your local council
  • Available in five colour options: Cream, Sage, Flint, Willow, Shale

Preparing a base for your Shepherd Hut
Although all Crane buildings have timber floors, you need to have a ready, prepared base that has been laid by a professional before you take delivery. The base must be constructed of either paving slabs laid on mortar or a concrete base no less than 10cm thick. It is also recommended that your base is the exact size given in the base plans supplied by Crane Garden Buildings. It is necessary to stress the importance of having a solid, level concrete base for your building, as it is crucial to support its structure. Crane are unable to install the building if the base is not level (when tested with a spirit level).
All buildings, irrespective of style, also require clearance around the structure to aid installation, maintenance, redecoration and air circulation, as well as to allow space for the roof overhangs. Therefore, Crane require at least 30cm around all sides of your building. The base can be made in two ways: a solid concrete large pad or five smaller concrete pads, one for each wheel and one for the step.
Please refer to the concrete base plan in the Product Information PDF below and do not hesitate to contact Crane for further guidance.

By choosing this product you are supporting responsible management of the world's forests. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC®) is a global, not-for-profit organisation that helps take care of forests and the people and wildlife that call them home. To learn more, visit fsc.org.

name: Monica Vinader Corda Diamond Locket, Gold
description:
Get roped in with the Corda Diamond Locket. Recycled gold vermeil is crafted into a roped finish, and wrapped around a hand-cut diamond center. You can engrave both interior surfaces, or slip a special photo inside to ensure it's always close to your heart.

This item can be engraved in Monica Vinader boutiques, simply bring your purchase in for this complimentary service. Every hand-crafted Monica Vinader piece comes with a 5-year warranty and lifetime repairs.

Diamond weight is 0.03ct. It has been graded H in colour and I1 in clarity.

Diamond colour H falls into the group Near Colourless G-J. More common than D-F colour diamonds, the G-J diamonds provide a great value. Similar to D-F diamonds, these diamonds are best highlighted in white gold or platinum as the white colour of the metal enhances the colourlessness of the stone.

Clarity I1 falls into the group Included (I1, I2, and I3). Inclusions are apparent and can affect transparency and brilliance.

name: John Lewis Made to Measure 45mm Cell Blackout Honeycomb Blind, Black
description:
When it comes to decorating your home sometimes it’s worth the investment in getting something made just for you. Our Made to Measure blinds collection includes a whole host of styles and colours with choices to be made about the tiny details like what side of the blind you want the control mechanisms. It means you get exactly what you want, how you want it.

These are our Made to Measure blackout honeycomb blinds. The blackout quality means they eliminate light and give you 100% privacy. This makes them a perfect choice for bedrooms as they help you get a good night's sleep, blocking out light pollution as well as the early-rising sun in the spring and summer months.

Key features:

  • 45mm cell in a plain fabric with a white backing
  • Folds up into a compact stack when raised
  • Cordless operation makes it child safe as there are no loose hanging cords
  • Can be installed inside or outside a recess
  • Choose between 2 operation types (cordless top down or cordless top down bottom up)
  • Choose between 4 headrail colours and matching toggles (white, anodized, anthracite or black)

    • Warm in winter, cool in summer
    These blinds have an insulating quality, with a silver coating on the inside providing additional insulation. It protects against both heat loss and heat gain, regulating the temperature of your room so you’re kept warm in winter and cool in summer.

    Size restrictions:

  • Minimum size: W40 x Drop 40cm
  • Maximum size: W250 x Drop 250cm

    • Operation types explained:

      1. Cordless top down
      Imagine how a roller blind goes up and down, it’s the same thing. Except there's no side chain or cord, instead there's a small handle attached to the bottom rail and an auto-brake means it can stop in any position - fully raise, fully lowered, and anywhere in between.

      2. Cordless top down bottom up
      Again, there's no side chain or cord with this mechanism. It has the same small handle attached to the bottom rail for raising and lowering the blind and an auto-brake allows you to stop it in any position. The difference to Cordless top down is that this operation has an additional mid-rail. This means you can position the blind anywhere between the top and bottom of the window frame. In other words, the top of the blind doesn’t have to stay at the top of the frame; the mid-rail can be moved down the frame so there’s space between the top of the fabric and the top of the window.

      Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
      If you're interested in our Blinds Studio blinds and are ready to place your order, or need a little more advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
      Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: KILIAN PARIS L'Heure Verte Eau de Parfum Refill, 50ml
description:
This innovative new refill allows an easy spill-proof process for your 50ml fragrance bottle and your travel spray.

Inspired by the city of Paris, KILIAN PARIS introduces its new addition to the Liquors olfactive family: L’Heure Verte, an olfactive soundtrack to nightlife’s liberation to come. L’Heure Verte is named after the traditional French equivalent of ‘Happy Hour’, that early evening window of time when absinthe was served upon sugar into a glass and swirled with a spoon in a slow-paced ritual. The liquid turns pastel green; this hue reappears in L’Heure Verte’s own perfume elixir, an entirely naturally derived colour: tender like a Parisian haze, or a Van Gogh painting come to life.

The Perfume: Absinthe essence opens L’Heure Verte with an instant head twist into a nostalgic heart of violet leaf and licorice root absolute. Its dry-down articulates a unique and precisely chosen facet of patchouli that resonates throughout, and blends into a trio of earthy woods along with vetiver and sandalwood. A first-time collaboration between Founder Kilian Hennessy and French perfumer Mathieu Nardin, L’Heure Verte expresses Paris at its best—indulgent and life-changing in its luxuries and wonderful illusions.

Perfume notes: Absinthe, Violet Leaf and Patchouli.

Olfactive family: the Liquors.

Perfumer: Mathieu Nardin.

The bottle of the perfumes of The Liquors collection is styled as a speakeasy essential, like art deco glasses to recall the most fabulous bars. The weighted glass is engraved with the emblematic K motif to throw and catch the light at all angles, finished with a golden, diamond-shaped plaque signed in white serigraphy.

These details bring to the KILIAN PARIS creation a guarantee of luxury, that should not be ephemeral, but should last a lifetime.

True luxury should last a lifetime, and as such, all KILIAN PARIS fragrance bottles are designed to be refilled. In a desire to reinforce its commitment to sustainability, KILIAN enhanced the design of the refill bottles: the glass is now transparent in order to make sure that it can be recycled.

How to use:

Start refilling your bottle by carefully removing the atomizer. Plug your refill bottle into your flacon and make sure to hold it vertically. The cutting-edge dispenser will stop transferring the perfume automatically once the container is full.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy

name: Waterford Crystal Lismore Cut Glass Giftology Gift-Boxed Tumblers, Set of 2, 266ml, Clear
description:
A pair of elegant whisky tumblers featuring the diamond and wedge cuts that are the Lismore collection's signature pattern. Each tumbler is hand-crafted from the finest crystal glass and made with a thick and pleasingly weighty base.

Ideal for whisky, brandy or bourbon, the tapered side and wider opening allows your favourite liquor to breathe. The Waterford glassware is beautifully presented in a Giftology cylinder gift box, enhanced with luxurious golden touches.

Choose the perfect glassware

Glass comes in a range of weights, cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from, designed to suit every budget and occasion.

Soda LimeVersatile and available in many colours and styles, soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand, soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items.
Crystal GlassFiner in quality with greater clarity than soda glass, crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges.
Lead CrystalWith a beautiful clarity, weight and resonance, lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead', the glass has at least 24% lead oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed, only.
Sparkx®Neither Soda Lime Glass nor Crystal Glass, this ultra-clear glass is pure, transparent and free of heavy metals. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers.
SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass with all the same ingredients as Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that make it even stronger, with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even Sparkx®.
LUXION®100% lead-free crystal glass which replaces its former 24% lead crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency and exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable.
RecycledGlassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass.
Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime Glass.
HandmadeThis type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above, depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are usually suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion.
DecorativeThere are many ways to decorate glass including cutting, spraying, diamond etching, pantograph etching, silk screen printing, sand blasting, hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material.

  • This item comes in 3 separate flat pack boxes and requires assembly. It is estimated to take approximately 1 hour.

Safety warning: Serious or fatal crushing injuries can occur from furniture tip-over. Due to risk of overturning, this product must be permanently fixed to the wall using the wall attachment device provided. Ensure fastenings used are appropriate to the wall. Do not leave the child unattended.

name: John Lewis Waitrose Wool NO. 5 Pocket Spring Mattress, Medium Tension, King Size
description:
The Waitrose Wool Collection of mattresses have been carefully designed to provide classic comfort and support with active pressure relief. This range recognises all the natural benefits of British wool, such as its breathability and natural temperature regulation, and that it repels dust-allergens and is naturally biodegradable.

The Waitrose Wool No. 5 is a sumptuous, easy to maintain, no-turn pocket spring mattress with 6.15kg (per king size mattress) of natural wool from award-winning Waitrose and assured farms, which naturally wicks moisture away from the body to create a comfortable sleep experience. 2000 individual pocket springs (per king size mattress) work together to respond to body movement, whilst a comfort layer of fibres made from recycled fibres, encourages breathability.

Red Tractor traceable wool from Waitrose farms
The British wool in these mattresses is responsibly sourced from our Waitrose farms, as well as farms assured by Red Tractor Food and Farming Standards, so we know exactly where it’s coming from. Our Partnership ensures these farmers get a fair price for the wool that they produce. Plus, fleece wool has natural temperature regulating properties, so while it feels cosy, soft and springy, it also helps to keep your sleep environment cool and fresh.

Pocket spring system
The pocket springs in this mattress are produced in a tightly coiled format, so they respond and react as you move throughout the night and keep your body weight evenly distributed. Providing pressure relief, they also help to maintain the structure of the mattress.

Chemical free sleep surface
Traditionally, some manufacturers add chemicals to mattresses in order for them to be fire retardant and compliant with regulations. In our quest to be as kind to the environment as possible, our wool mattresses are naturally fire retardant and free from traditional chemical flame retardant treatments.

This mattress offers a medium feel and provides comfortable support from head-to-toe.

Try before you buy
This is an important purchase and it’s worthwhile to try your choice of mattress in one of our shops to make sure it's right for you. Our store Partners will be able to tell you more about its benefits, and recommend options based on your needs. For more information, call 03452 661 805 and we can tell you where the range you’d like to view is on display.

name: John Lewis Lianna Lace Strapless Bra, Black
description:
Designed to be versatile, the Lianna is designed with removable straps so you can wear them with your best Bandeau and off-the-shoulder styles while still getting the support you need. Not compromising on looks, it features delicate floral lace lining the cups, while a satin bow sits centre front and picot trim decorates the neckline. The underwire provides support and the balcony cut adds extra allure to the finished look. And the best thing is you can simply pop the straps back on when you want that extra bit of security.

CoppaFeel is on a mission to stamp out late detection of breast cancer. John Lewis & Partners are proud to support by taking part in their #BraHijack campaign.

name: Calvin Klein Intense Power Recycled Poly Swim Shorts, Pvh Black
description: Made from 100% recycled materials, these classic swim shorts feature signature Calvin Klein detailing and have a drawstring waistband to ensure the perfect fit.

name: John Lewis Spindle Round Wall Mirror, 100cm, Black
description:
A round wall mirror with a decorative wheel-like spindle design. It's ready to wall-mount using the fittings on the back of the mirror.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

name: Kit Heath Signature Classic Initial Pendant Necklace, U
description: Whether it's the initial of someone you love or a representation of yourself, this pendant necklace from Kit Heath is a simple, elegant and personal style. Made from sterling silver, the pendant has a classic font style and hangs from a delicate chain. The necklace looks beautiful on its own but can also be worn as part of a layered look.

name: John Lewis Grace Child Compliant Upholstered Bed Frame, Single, Brushed Tweed Beige
description:
The Grace bed frame has an understated sophistication to its design, thanks to button detailing on its curved headboard. Featuring sprung slats that offer additional support for you and your mattress, it's supported by robust wooden legs for a durable finish.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets

Worth Knowing: Child Compliant bed frames
This bed conforms to BS 8509:2008+A1:2011 (Childrens beds for domestic use. Safety requirements and test methods). We recommend it is used with a standard single mattress, L190 x W90cm. Not suitable for children under the age of 4 years.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

description:
Enhance your wardrobe essentials with this crew neck t-shirt by HUGO BOSS.

Perfectly refined with the label's signature emblem stamped on the chest, style it how you usually would.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Recycled Polyester Swim Shorts

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.
