name: TOM FORD Traceless Foundation Stick, Nude Ivory
description:
An essential tool in TOM FORD`s make up regime. Rich in hydrants, this foundation stick`s unique cream formula creates a flawless and smooth finish.
 
Portable and precise, it achieves versatility of sheer, medium or full coverage, always beautifully natural and undetectable. Or, when used as a concealer, it swiftly diminishes imperfections.
 
15g

name: Frederique Constant FC-206MPWD1S6B Women's Moonphase Diamond Bracelet Strap Watch, Silver/Mother Of Pearl
description:
This Frederique Constant women's watch has been designed with a stunning mother of pearl dial with applied diamonds on eight of the hours with four baton indexes to mark the rest of the hours. A moon phase window adorns the centre above the 6 o'clock hour and it is encased in polished stainless steel.

Finished with a polished stainless steel bracelet to match the case, it fastens with a fold over clasp for secure wearing.

Frederique Constant watches are defined by their high quality and precision in design. All their watches are manufactured in Plan-les-Ouates Geneva, Switzerland and each one is assembled with care by hand.

A passionate Swiss watch manufacturer, Frederique Constant is renowned for his classical and refined timepieces that evoke an opulent bygone era. Even today each watch is individually adjusted and checked on its accuracy before leaving their workshop.

If you would like to return this product, you will need to take it back to the Jewellery & Watch department in one of our John Lewis Branches. Only once the product has been verified and authenticated will a return be authorised.

name: OXO POP Square Large Kitchen Storage Container, 2.6L, Clear
description:
An airtight storage container that suits contemporary interiors and is ideal for keeping dried foods. Easy to open with just one hand when you're busy in the kitchen, it's part of OXO's POP range of containers.

POP containers are available in different shapes and sizes to suit your needs. They're made of clear, BPA-free plastic with rounded corners for easy pouring and a push-button opening. The button pops up to use as a handle for the airtight-sealed lid. A handy fill line helps prevent over-filling and the containers are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Home Storage | Kitchen Storage

name: Oakley OO4123 Men's Holbrook Prizm Polarised Metal Square Sunglasses, Matte Grey/Mirror Blue
description:
The Holbrook sunglasses by Okaley are a timeless, classic design of fused with modern technology. Inspired by the screen heroes from the 1940s, 50s, and 60s, this design epitomises the spirit of exploration and adventure. The iconic American metal frame design is accented by metal rivets and Oakley icons, perfect for those who seek equal parts performance and style.

    The sunglasses present the following characteristics and integrated technologies.
  • Plutonite® Lenses offer top UV Protection filtering 100% of all UVA, UVB, UVC and harmful blue light up to 400nm.
  • Patented High Definition Optics® (HDO®) provides superior optical clarity and razor-sharp vision at every angle.
  • O-Matter™ stress-resistant frame material is both lightweight and durable for all-day comfort and protection.

    • High Definition Optics®

    High Definition Optics® (HDO®) is a collection of patented technologies that allow Oakley eyewear to meet or exceed the testing standards of the American National Standards Institute for optical clarity, visual fidelity, and impact resistance.

    Polarized®

    Improving safety, comfort and performance, Oakley HDPolarized lenses filter out 99% of reflected glare without the haze and optical distortion that can come with polarized lenses made with conventional manufacturing techniques.

    Prizm™

    Prizm™ is a revolution in lens optics built on decades of color science research. Prizm™ lenses provide unprecedented control of light transmission resulting in colors precisely tuned to maximize contrast and enhance visibility.

    UV filter 100%

name: Philip Kingsley Pure Colour Frizz Fighting Gloss, 50ml
description: Pure Colour Gloss instantly smoothes and controls frizz, leaving hair beautifully soft and silky, with reflective shine. Our conditioning, heat-protecting formula improves moisture retention and extends colour longevity. Our sulphate-free Anti-Fade Shampoo, Reviving Conditioner and Frizz-Fighting Gloss create a 360 regime to lock in colour and nourish strands, extending time between salon visits. Locking in the good and blocking out the bad, the regime optimises the condition of your hair and scalp, for stronger hair and longer-lasting colour.

name: The Little Tailor Baby Stripe & Rocking Horse Booties, Pack of 2, White
description: A great gift for new arrivals, this supersoft two-pack of booties feature sweet designs with stripe and rocking horses. Made from supersoft cotton for ultimate comfort.

name: Frith Sculpture Highland Cattle by Veronica Ballan, Bronze

This standing sculpture by Veronica Ballan captures the imposing nature of this iconic breed of cattle from the Scottish Highlands.

name: TOM FORD Shade & Illuminate Concealer, 2W1 Taupe
description:
Crease-proof concealer to boost radiance and even skin tone.

Shade and Illuminate Concealer is a medium-buildable, waterproof formula merging three-dimensional skincare with three-dimensional radiance. Infused with Hyaluronic acid, this crease-proof concealer moisturises, smooths, and obscures redness, dark undereye circles and fine lines – creating a flawless base for Shade and Illuminate Soft Radiance Foundation.

Hyaluronic Acid: moisturises and helps maintain skin’s moisture barrier, helping it look plump.

name: Mango Figo Long Sleeve Tee
description:
Bolstering your daytime collection, this t-shirt by Mango has a textured effect for a bold look.

Classic in cut with a v-neckline and long sleeves, it is made from a light yet durable blended fabric and is an easy daytime option.

name: Boden Yoke Detailed Frill Sleeve Midi Dress, Navy/Abstract Vine
description:
Designed in a flattering A-line shape, this midi dress by Boden boasts a floral flourish for added appeal.

With a neat round neckline and frill short sleeves, this piece is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: OPI Nail Lacquer, Alpine Snow
description:
OPI nail polish provides a comprehensive palette of gorgeous colours to suit your every mood, outift and season. With fun, descriptive names and a chip-resistant formula.

OPI nail polish is used in professional nail salons all over the world on both acrylic and natural nails.

Neither OPI nail polish or any other OPI product is subject to animal testing.

name: Panache Anya Riva Spot Balconette Swimsuit, Navy/Vanilla
description: Panache's Anya Riva balconette swimsuit has a classic look with its spot print. Inner panels offer tummy control, providing confidence and a smooth fit whilst the adjustable straps allow you to get properly comfy. Wired hidden cups provide support and shape for the fuller bust and outer powermesh lined wings with 30mm clasps on all sizes provide further anchorage. It all comes together to create a sophisticated suit with a classic and functional style.

name: Ted Baker Ellerby Stripe Polo Shirt, Navy/White
description:
Refresh your approach to timeless staples with this​ cotton blend polo shirt from Ted Baker.

Reworking classic stripes into your perennial wardrobe, you can style it with anything and everything to suit your mood.

name: Haglöfs Roc Men's Recycled Waterproof Gore-Tex Jacket, True Black
description:
• Made from 3-layer GORE-TEX fabric
  • 2-way water repellent front zip with inner placket for keeping moisture out
  • Two mid mounted hand pockets keep essentials close
  • Adjustable, climbing helmet-compatible hood with laminated peak
  • Cord adjustment in waist hem
  • Articulated sleeves and velcro adjustable cuffs to keep out the elements

Ideal for an urban lifestyle, Haglöfs' Roc jacket keeps true to the brand's innovative and daring ethos. It's breathable, offers great protection from the elements, and it´ll take you outdoors and get your pulse racing, even in bad weather and harsh conditions.

Created to a minimalistic design, a jacket of this quality just becomes an outdoor essential once you've had it long enough. Made from 3-layer GORE-TEX®, the techy fabric comes waterproof, windproof and breathable as standard; the kind of reliable performance you need out in the wilderness.

Equipped with a slightly longer fit, for better protection while you're active, its rendered with two mid mounted hand pockets that'll keep hands and valuables protected from the worst of winter's weather. And because no one likes a high maintenance jacket that requires specific washing or intricate caring routine, this comes as machine washable, drying fast and maintaining its protection.

name: MAC Pro Longwear Nourishing Waterproof Foundation, N18
description:
A tenacious waterproof formula that can be used as a foundation or concealer, wearing for an unprecedented 16 hours. Neither rain nor tears can budge this oil-free watertight product that actually repels moisture from the surface of the face. The formula blends seamlessly on the skin with medium to full weightless coverage and a natural satin finish.

MAC Pro Longwear Nourishing Waterproof Foundation Collection:
The latest addition to MAC's ever-popular Pro Longwear lineup features a tenacious waterproof formula that can be used as a foundation or concealer, wearing for an unprecedented 16 hours. Blends seamlessly on the skin with medium to full weightless coverage and a natural satin finish.

For those looking for a wet-proof velvety matte finish, try MAC Pro Longwear Powder/Pressed, which promises zero shine with sheer to medium coverage for up to 12 hours in any climate.

name: Nora Rose by Cyberjammies Maeve Floral Print Dressing Gown, Grey Multi
description: Made from a comfortable cotton blend that you won't be able to wait to slip into, this dressing gown from Cyberjammies will raise your spirits with its beautiful floral print.

name: L.K.Bennett Juliette Mesh Peep Toe Ankle Boots, Black
description:
Balancing function and form, this pair of ankle boots from L.K.Bennett is made with textile uppers for light and comfortable wear.

name: MakeBox & Co Floral Finch Cross Stitch Hoop Kit
description:
Flora the finch is a cross-stitch that truly celebrates joyful floral colour. This prettiest little plump bird is perched on a branch surrounded by an array of folksy flowers in different designs and seven different colours.

Cross stitch is a simple embroidery technique likened to painting by numbers. Each square of the Aida fabric is filled with a little cross of colour, which is where it gets its name. This box contains a full easy-to-follow cross-stitch guide as well as a pattern.
breadcrumbs: Sport & Leisure | Haberdashery | Craft, Crochet & Sewing Kits

name: Hydro Flask Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Drinks Bottle, 621ml, Trillium
description:
Take your refreshment with you in this insulated Hydro Flask water bottle, powder-coated for an easy grip that's sweat-free and durable. Thanks to the brand's TempShield double-walled, vacuum-insulated technology, it guards the temperature of your drink, keeping beverages cold up to 24 hours and hot up to 12 hours when using the lid.

Made with pro-grade stainless steel, a robust metal known for its resistance and purity, the bottle protects against the transfer of flavours, keeping your water pure-tasting. The durable construction ensures no condensation or heat transfer to the outside of the bottle and it's easy to clean. Both the bottle and its lid are dishwasher safe.

This leak-proof design is BPA-free and comes with a Standard Mouth Insulated Leak-Proof Flex Cap for even better temperature control, plus a carry handle for drinking on the go.

name: G Plan Vintage The Seventy One Small 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Cambridge Slate
description:
The Seventy One has laid-back proportions and deep, soft seats which invite you to sink into a stylish embrace. Luxurious top stitching and cushioning details provide an elegant touch whilst the distinctive wooden trim offers mid-century charm.

This sofa comes just as you see it, with no hidden extras. There is another version of this small 2-seater sofa though, which has a concealed USB charging point for a modern twist.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. description:

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Canvas is a durable, textured weave that's ideal for styling with bold colours and darker shades

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect is woven to create a linen-effect feel, and is available in a versatile palette of colours

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is woven with man-made fibres, making it exceptionally durable and versatile

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille has a velvet-style, chenille feel. It's woven with man-made fibres to create a beautifully soft yarn and can appear two-tone in different lights

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet is soft and luxurious like velvet and available in a rich colour palette

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets

description:
No more compromises: one click and you can have it all ! This 3-in-1 hybrid lipstick is rich like a balm, precise like a pencil and intense like a premium pigment. In just one stroke, it reveals the boldest colour impact all day long.

Absolute coverage and velvet-smooth comfort upon application through an ultra-feminine gesture. Its ergonomic drop-shaped tip instantly outlines the contour and fills the lips. A range of glamorous shades from nude to pop to give your lips a bespoke touch of style.

Travel. Exploration. Adventures near and far.

The Classic All-Terrain Clog is ready for it all, even in the harshest environments. Lightweight Croslite™ construction makes them a practical and packable choice for any outing. It's time to shift into all-wheel drive. Flip that strap back and go find your fun!

name: John Lewis Chester Leather Snuggler, Dark Leg
description:
A modern twist on a classic shape, Chester features deep, feather-wrapped seat cushions and buttoned back detailing for an inviting sit, finished with brass-capped tapered legs.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Sofas & Armchairs | Sofas & Sofa Beds

name: Barbour Liddesdale Quilted Jacket
description:
With its classic padded shape and reliable protection against the cold, reach for this quilted jacket from Barbour.

Constructed from robust fabric, it is regular in length and fastens with a zip for effortless on-off.

name: Maxi-Cosi Iora Co-Sleeper Bedside Crib
description:
Rest easy knowing that your baby is sleeping in luxury only an arm's reach away with the Maxi-Cosi Iora bedside sleeper - a sophisticated, adjustable crib with an extremely comfortable mattress.

Just because it’s time to sleep doesn't mean your bonding time has to end. Thanks to the Iora's five different height positions and easy co-sleeping slide function, your baby fits perfectly next to you. Plus it's easy fold and a convenient travel bag, the crib can also be taken with you where ever you need to go.

Whether you need to feed, change a nappy, or even the sheets in the middle of the night, all the essentials are within reach in Iora’s large storage basket below.

When you're ready to give your little one their own space, simply move Iora to the baby’s room. Its comfortable mattress and sturdy frame are perfect to double as a stand-alone crib, allowing baby to continue sleeping in their own, familiar bed.

The benefits of co-sleeping:

  • Suitable from birth - 9kg or 6 months
  • It helps the newborn to adjust sleeping-awake times.
  • It helps with breastfeeding for mothers.
  • It reassures parents and makes the child feel safe.
  • It strengthens the bond between child and parents and it helps the child to grow more self-confident and sociable.
  • Sleeping in the same room (but not in the same bed) reduces the risk of SIDS.
  • Matching sheets available (sold separately)

Good to know: The size of the mattress included is 58.5 x 80.0 x 3cm
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Nursery Furniture & Furnishings | Moses Baskets & Cribs

name: Farah Blanes Slim Fit Organic Cotton Polo Shirt
description:
The Blanes polo. Sure, on the outside it's business as usual: slim fit, short sleeves, button neck, collar - you know the drill. But look a little closer and you'll see a little bit of magic in this top.

Rendered from pure Organic cotton that's just as gentle against delicate skin as it is on Mother Nature, this eco-conscious option shows everyone just how much you care about the planet.

When it comes to styling, do whatever feels right. Jeans, chinos, shorts, big polka dot underwear - it's totally up to you.

Quintessentially British, Farah was once the uniform of Mods, Rude Boys and Indie rockers alike. Loved for their line-up of thoughtfully designed classics and trend-led pieces, the brand has always been about giving you the right tools to confidently create your own style. An ethos they carry to this day.
breadcrumbs: Men | Men's Polo Shirts & Rugby Shirts

name: HUGO 1540112 Women's EDGY Chronograph Two-Tone Bracelet Strap Watch, Gold/Silver
description: This HUGO watch from the #EDGY family is a casual inspired watch featuring a 38mm ionic plated two-tone stainless steel case. The simple sunray dial boasts 3 sub-dials that show the day, date and 24 hour time. It is finished with a sleek stainless steel two-tone bracelet strap.

name: White Stuff Nelly Notch Neck T-Shirt, Plain White
description:
For the casual every day, this t-shirt from White Stuff will give your wardrobe the refresh it needs.

With a flattering v-neckline and cap sleeves, it's made from organic cotton making it naturally soft and breathable and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

name: Superdry Organic Cotton Slim Straight Jeans, Jefferson Ink
description:
A classic when it comes to downtime denim, refresh your collection with these slim jeans from Superdry.

Bound to be a staple, couple yours with a failsafe tee and your latest kicks, because this style is one worth holding onto.

Less Laundering
It’s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible.

name: Calvin Klein Bucket Hat, Travertine
description: Topping off your weekend ensembles with logo appeal, this bucket hat from Calvin Klein is slapped up with a pure cotton canvas that's primed for days spent under the sun.

name: Laines London Classic Faux Fur Corgi Slippers
description: Slipping on with ease for relaxing at home, these slippers by Laines London are crafted from soft faux fur for a luxurious finish.

name: Levi's 724 High Rise Slim Fit Coated Jeans, Shine Like A Diamond
description: High rise. Slim fit. Skinny leg. Levis' took your favorite high rise and updated it with an ultra-modern skinny leg. Part of their signature ‘Lot 700’ fits, our 724 High-Rise Skinny Jeans are designed with Levi's® Stellar Stretch to flatter, hold and lift—all day, every day. This pair features a coated rinse, making them extra covetable. Pair them with our graphic tees, smocked blouses or classic button-ups. Thanks to excellent built-in recovery, they champion your curves and move with you—without sagging or bagging—everywhere and every wear.

name: Rangemaster Longstock 90 Induction Hob Oven Range Cooker, Black
description:
Rangemaster's LSK90EI cooker is built with two fan ovens and a separate glide-out grill. The induction hotplate has 5 cooking zones.

Large cooking capacity
The main oven has a large 79-litre capacity and the second oven has a 67-litre capacity, allowing for a range of different meals to be cooked simultaneously. Both ovens have 2 shelves and 5 different shelf positions to give you plenty of space to add a roast or a couple of dishes. The solid doors are triple-glazed to help seal in the heat for a better cooking experience.

Induction
The induction hotplate features 5 cooking zones. Induction heating gives near-instant heat (comparable to gas) and allows you to precisely control the temperature at which you cook. As only the area at the base of the pan is heated, it's also highly efficient. Only use pans suitable for induction hobs. These include: enamelled steel, iron, stainless steel (depending on the alloy) and some aluminium pans with a ferromagnetic base. Glass and copper bases are unsuitable.

Energy efficient
With an energy efficiency rating of A, the LSK90EI is more eco-friendly and saves on your next utility bill.

Programmable timer
This cooker has a programmable timer, so you can easily have multiple dishes on the go without losing track of cooking time for each.

Easy cleaning
Featuring Catalytic liners that absorb fat and steam during cooking, this cooker then releases these deposits to the base when above 200 degrees, ensuring that the oven is kept as clean as possible with minimum effort.

Note:
This cooker requires compatibility with a 45 amp fuse, with a maximum power load of 7.4kW at 230V. Please check your connection before purchasing.

Rangemaster’s original range cooker, made in 1830, was a revelation to the cooking fraternity. They are still manufactured in Royal Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, benefiting from over 200 years of manufacturing excellence. Great cooking has always started with a great cooker and the new ranges still share the original dedication to quality, design and innovation.

Worth knowing: If you have a heart pacemaker, do seek advice from your doctor before using an induction hob.

name: Crew Clothing Classic Micro Gingham Check Shirt, Sky Blue
description: Offering a soft and durable handle, this crisp shirt from Crew Clothing comes in classic micro Gingham checks and is cut to a fluid fit that transitions from daytime escapades to after-dark soirees.

name: Estée Lauder Double Wear Radiant Concealer, 8N Very Deep
description:
Loves your skin. Matches your skin tone.

Conceal and contour with this creamy, comforting concealer that is super blendable, long-wearing for 12 hours and crease-resistant.

Nourishes with botanical extracts, including Chia, and Camelina and Kukui Nut Oils. The radiant formula brightens the eye area, as it conceals dark circles. Hides spots and tones down redness.

Oversized two-sided sponge tip applicator has a flat-angled edge for concealing, contouring and highlighting larger areas of the face and a precision tip for perfectly covering dark circles.

Medium-to-full coverage. Radiant finish.

Good to know: Due to the high coverage of our Double Wear Radiant concealer you may want to try a shade one level lighter than your Double Wear foundation to achieve your perfect radiant look. For example, if your Double Wear foundation is shade: 3N1 Ivory Beige we’d recommend using Double Wear Radiant concealer shade: 2N.

name: John Lewis Grace Kitami Bed Frame, Double, Cotton Effect Grey
description:
Meet Grace Kitami, our bed frame which is designed with an upholstered headboard and a sturdy solid oak base. It's a classic shape, but the gently curved and well-padded headboard gives it a modern edge. It's accented with button detailing and it can be upholstered in a fabric of your choice. Sprung slats in the base provide a supportive and responsive foundation for your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect is woven to create a linen-effect feel

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is woven with man-made fibres, making it exceptionally durable and versatile

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille has a velvet-style, chenille feel. It's woven with man-made fibres to create a beautifully soft yarn and can appear two-tone in different lights

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet is a soft and luxurious velvet-like fabric

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Harriet is made from a short, dense pile of velvet that has a soft, brushed finish. An Aquaclean treatment has been applied to this resilient fabric which means you can banish the majority of household stains with water. The treatment covers every fibre with an invisible coating so it doesn't need to be retreated or re-coated. It will naturally develop lines, scuffs and shading over time.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Amazon Fire 10 Kids Pro Edition Tablet (11th Generation) with Kid-Friendly Case, Octa-core, Fire OS, Wi-Fi, 32GB, 10.1"
description:
Created for kids and ideal for ages 6 to 12, the Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Pro Edition comes with a durable, lightweight case and a Full HD touch display. Fire is great for apps and games as well as reading books and streaming videos, while a robust design makes it a durable device to stand up to the stresses of everyday life.

Robust shell
Fire Kids Pro Edition comes with a slim kid-friendly case, to protect from drops, bumps and more. Durable and lightweight, the case is designed for smaller hands and is the perfect solution for parents with always-on-the-go kids.

Set child profiles
Parents can create individual child profiles, putting you in control of managing and customising your kid’s experience. Set bedtime curfews and employ tighter controls on screen time and content when they are young and relax restrictions as they get older. Child profiles do not have access to in-app purchases, ads, e-mail or social media features.

Amazon Kids+
Amazon Kids+ (formerly Fire for Kids) is an all-in-one subscription with thousands of books, movies, TV shows, educational apps, games and Audible audiobooks for kids aged 3–12. There are Age Filters to ensure kids see age-appropriate content. Parents are able to temporarily download a limited number of video titles across devices linked to your Amazon Kids+ subscription.

Fast and responsive
A 2.0 GHz Octa-core processor enables quick app launches, smooth games and videos and great overall performance.

Expandable storage
Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Pro Edition comes with 32GB of storage space for your apps and games. A microSD card slot means you can increase this space by up to 1TB, making it possible to keep all of your music, photos and movies with you too. Plus all of your Amazon content is automatically stored in the cloud for you to download whenever you need it.

Go wherever the day takes you
With a battery life of up to 12 hours and a durable design, Amazon Fire 10 Kids Pro Edition is ready to travel with you all day and survive everyday bangs or scrapes.

2 year worry-free guarantee
All Fire Kids tablets come with a 2-year worry-free guarantee - if it breaks, return it and we'll replace it for free.

name: Jon Richard Cubic Zirconia Drop Earrings, Silver
description:
These fine drop earrings are a must-have in your jewellery box this season. Featuring a string of sparkling cubic zirconia stones, these earrings can be worn separately or layered with other pieces.

Post and catch fastening.

These earrings are for pierced ears only.

name: John Lewis Optic Glass Highball, 502ml
description:
Bring colour to the table with this contemporary highball made of optic glass.

Choose the perfect glassware

Glass comes in a range of weights, cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from, designed to suit every budget and occasion.

Soda LimeVersatile and available in many colours and styles, soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand, soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items.
Crystal GlassFiner in quality with greater clarity than soda glass, crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges.
Lead CrystalWith a beautiful clarity, weight and resonance, lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead', the glass has at least 24% lead oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed, only.
Sparkx®Neither Soda Lime Glass nor Crystal Glass, this ultra-clear glass is pure, transparent and free of heavy metals. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers.
SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass with all the same ingredients as Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that make it even stronger, with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even Sparkx®.
LUXION®100% lead-free crystal glass which replaces its former 24% lead crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency and exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable.
RecycledGlassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass.
Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime Glass.
HandmadeThis type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above, depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are usually suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion.
DecorativeThere are many ways to decorate glass including cutting, spraying, diamond etching, pantograph etching, silk screen printing, sand blasting, hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material.

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: Mulberry Small Darley Heavy Grain Leather Shoulder Bag
description:
A celebration of Mulberry's signature Postman's Lock and the iconic Darley Bag, the new Darley Shoulder Bag offers a refined and contemporary silhouette for everyday that is elegant enough for the evening.

This small version offers a flap-over style with a roomy interior containing slip pockets that help organise your essentials. The chain and leather strap can be worn as a cross body or short on the shoulder by doubling the strap.

Created using responsibly sourced leather, this bag is one of Mulberry's Sustainable Icons. Made in the brand's carbon-neutral Somerset factories, the materials are sourced from a tannery accredited a gold standard rating by The Leather Working Group.

Caring for your Mulberry product

To ensure you get the most out of your leather bag, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance of your product. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather to resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Please be aware that darker coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Please take extra care using products with dark coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour transfer to lighter coloured fabrics or objects.

name: DockATot Nursing Pillow
description: From DockATot, this stylish accent cushion is actually a smartly designed nursing pillow in disguise. name: Giorgio Armani Lip Maestro, 415 Redwood
description:
UK #1 Liquid Lip Product in the Prestige Makeup market.*

Armani Beauty's Lip Maestro is our first liquid lipstick with a comfortable velvety texture and a luminous matte finish. Lips appear instantly plumper and radiant. The sensual, non-sticky texture offers hydrated and comfort feel. Concentrated pigments offer an intense, seductive, illuminating lip colours.

  • Born backstage: Backstage at the Spring 2011 haute couture show, Mr Armani requested a result that did not yet exist in terms of colour effect and finish: a plum lip, as intense and soft-looking as velvet. Blending a translucent velvet gel with a high concentration of plum pigments, Linda Cantello created a lip product that was both saturated with matte colour and intensely glowing
  • A velvet sensation: Lip Maestro’s formula provides up to four hours of continuous hydration and comfort. And just as velvet is renowned for its sensuous, smooth feel, Lip Maestro is composed of a network of bouncy, soft and supple spheres that roll and morph with every lip movement, creating a perfectly seamless colour and an unprecedented soft and fluid sensation
  • A backlit glow for a revolution in colour: For a truly saturated yet luminous lip colour, Giorgio Armani beauty has created a revolutionary backlighting technology. Lip Maestro’s translucent gel base allows light to interact with pigments and to be bounced back. This results in the pigments appearing backlit, creating lip colours that appear to be radiant from within, for a luminous, velvet glow
  • Shade 400 – our iconic universal red: It took over 90 lab trials to create shade red 400, achieving the delicate balance between the yellow, orange and blue pigments to light up the face and lend a timeless, glamorous mood

"With Lip Maestro, we wanted to create pure, vibrant colours that fit with every complexion. Outstanding, luxurious colours enhanced in a luminous matte formula." Linda Cantello, Makeup Artist for Giorgio Armani Cosmetics.

*Source, The NPD Group Inc./BeautyTrends ® UK. Prestige Makeup market, Total Liquid Lip Segment. Calendar year 2019, based on value and unit sales.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.

bettercotton.org/massbalance

name: Stoves Richmond Deluxe S1000Ei 100cm Induction Electric Range Cooker
description:
The centrepiece of your kitchen, Stoves has made sure this range cooker does more than just look the part. Its four cavities make multitasking at mealtimes effortless, and you'll be able to choose from various options including conventional, fan, steam and slow cooking to ensure your dishes always come out tasting their best. Available in a variety of colours, the versatile 5 zone induction hob allows you to, boil, fry and sear to your heart's content. Plus, if you need a hand managing cooking times, the intelligent Zeus™ app also lets you set a timer from a smartphone or tablet.

Four cavities with 179L total cooking capacity
This model features a large Multifunction Main Oven, large Fanned Oven, smaller Conventional Oven and a dedicated Slow Cook Oven.

5 zone induction hob with touch control
Induction technology works by heating the pan rather than the hob, offering a faster, safer and more energy-efficient way to cook. This model boasts 5 cooking zones with easy to use touch controls and 10 power settings. Packed with handy features including pan overheat detection and a timer function, this sleek and versatile hob meets all your cooking needs.

Multifunction main oven with Equiflow™ technology
The Stoves multifunction oven allows you to select from 11 different cooking functions and Equiflow™ Technology provides excellent heat distribution, so you'll always get the best results, whatever you're making. If you do need to move anything around, the telescopic shelf sliders let the shelves slide out smoothly.

Zeus™ Bluetooth® connected timer
Control and adjust cooking times without having to be in the kitchen. Using Bluetooth® technology, the Zeus™ free downloadable app lets you use your smartphone or tablet to control the timer on your oven, save your favourites and automatically update your clock. With Zeus™ you can set the cooking duration and end time, keep an eye on your timer and adjust it without having to be in the kitchen.

Steam & Infuse™
Healthy cooking quickly, optimising an even cook and fuller flavour every time. Steam & Infuse adds moisture and flavour to your dish turning every meal into a masterpiece. Simply adding water, stock or infused spices to the pot serves to steam from the inside, optimising the taste and texture of your food.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new cooker, along with removing and recycling the old one too. Simply add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

name: John Lewis Ines Daylight Roller Blind, Citrine, W122 x Drop 190cm
description:
This daylight blind offers privacy, while still allowing some light into your room.

Key features:

  • Can be installed either inside or outside the window recess, to the wall or ceiling
  • Can be standard or reverse rolled. Standard gives a close fit to the window, helping eliminate light. Reverse brings the material forward over the roll which conceals it and creates space between the blind and window
  • Chain mechanism can be attached on the left or right-hand side, without affecting the way the blind is rolled
  • Width can be cut to size
  • Supplied with easy fit universal brackets
  • Includes safety devices to keep children safe

    • Worth knowing...
    The width stated in our product specifications is the total width of the blind including mechanisms and brackets. The width of the fabric alone will be a few centimetres less than this.

    Safety warning
    Young children can be strangled by loops in pull cords, chains, tapes and inner cords that operate the product.

  • To avoid strangulation and entanglement, keep cords out of the reach of young children - cords may become wrapped around a child's neck
  • Move beds, cots and furniture away from window covering cords
  • Do not tie cords together. Make sure cords do not twist and create a loop

    • More information on child safety can be found on our Child Safety Hub

name: New Dawn 4500 Mattress, Regular Tension, Double
description:
Turn Free for your convenience, the New Dawn 4500R offers a Medium support. A luxury, contemporary knit top foam-free mattress, handcrafted in Yorkshire by artisan bedmakers exclusively for John Lewis.

Superior support from award winning 100% recyclable Cortec™ Quad Revolution® pocket springs that contour to your body with greater accuracy and precision. The absence of glue allows each spring to work individually for maximum efficiency, with excellent airflow for the ultimate in temperature control.

Amazing comfort from layers of Posturfil Micro Springs close to the sleeping surface. Each flexible spring is encased in a breathable pocket for enhanced ventilation and react instantly to a sleeper’s movements for targeted support; relieving pressure.

With multiple layers of next generation FibreLux filling, these layers are 5 times more breathable than conventional foam, dust free and contain no harmful VOC’s. A 100% recyclable filling that is British made.

Finished with a FR chemical treatment free, fully removable and washable cover. With a high GRS content SecondLife™ stretch breathable knit fabric. Each cover can be washed at home and features four unique, tuck-away carrying handles for ease of movement/turning.

Foam Free, Glue Free and FR Chemical Treatment Free, zero to landfill and fully recyclable at end of life. Made from a high content of recycled materials with zero compromise on comfort. Each mattress comes with a 5 Year Manufacturer’s Product Guarantee.

Mattress depth: 31 cm

Try before you buy

name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen & Blur Primer Duo
description:
Add a touch of radiance to your makeup look with two of YSL’s Beauty icons.

Create the perfect canvas with Touche Éclat Blur Primer, to even and smooth pores and fine lines, helping your makeup last longer. Complete your look with Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen, to brighten and perfect your complexion with a natural, luminous finish.

Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen Instantly brighten, smooth and perfect your complexion with a natural, luminous finish. Enriched with micro-lightening pigments complex and soothing marigold*, it sculpts facial features with light, not shadow, for 8hr of hydration and an all-day rested look. This Illuminating Pen can be used in multiple ways to provide 8 hours of beauty sleep in just one click:

  • Illuminate eye and brow area
  • Remove shadows and fine lines
  • Plump and define lips

Formulas are infused with colour correcting pearls that target different skin colour concerns: Rosy for dull skin, Lavender for yellowish skin, Green for reddish skin. Apply after foundation or simply after Touche Eclat Blur Primer.

*From the YSL Beauty community Gardens.

Touche Éclat Blur Primer: Achieve a seamless complexion with the new generation Touche Éclat Blur Primer. This light-infused, fluid primer evens out skin tone and minimises the appearance of enlarged pores and fine lines, creating a smooth surface that helps makeup last longer. Transparent to allow optimal light diffusion and free from dulling opaque filters, the light-infused gel uses advanced blurring technology to create an instantly radiant and flawless canvas. Wear it under foundation or alone for an illuminated complexion.

  • Easy-to-use fluid format
  • Boosts radiance of your foundation
  • Improves appearance of skin texture
  • Inspired by the iconic Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen
  • For use under foundation or alone for a 'no makeup' makeup look

Set contains:

  • Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen, 2.5ml
  • Touche Éclat Blur Primer, 10ml

description:

name: EAST END PRINTS Lemon Mug, 300ml, Yellow/Blue
description:
Vibrant and modern, this mug features a fruit design by Berlin-based artist Rosi Feist for EAST END PRINTS. Made of bone china in the UK, the mug is fired overnight in a traditional kiln for a long-lasting finish. It's microwave and freezer safe.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Stainless Steel Kitchen Scissors, 8cm, Black

Worth knowing: By law, we are not permitted to sell a knife or blade to any person under the age of 18. Criminal Justice Act 1988 (as amended).

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: IBB Personalised 9ct Gold Unisex Oval Signet Ring, Gold
description:
Style is always personal with this IBB oval ring from the personalised range.

In solid gold, the piece comes in a slightly oval shape which extends towards the shoulders. The ring can be engraved with a single letter in a choice of styles or a symbol.

Personalising your product

1.Place your order
2.Decide how you would like to personalise your product, please see the product images for character limit, available font styles and engraved examples.
3.Email your personalisation details to johnlewis@ibblondon.com. Please include the following information in your email:
  • a) Your details: name, order number and contact information
  • b) The text you would like to have engraved or let us know that you do not want the item to be engraved. Please type your text exactly as you would like it to appear i.e. using the desired upper or lower case, and any symbols that you wish to be included. For example if you would like your engraving to be in all capital letters then please type it in all capital letters i.e. JANE or with a name like Anne-Marie, make sure to include the – and both capital letters.
  • c) The font you would like us to use for the engraving
    • If you are purchasing this as a gift and do not wish the recipient to be contacted, please ensure that you put your own contact details for this order.

    4.Please note that orders will not be processed until we receive this email, this includes orders where no engraving is required.

    Refund policyThis item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more. This does not affect your statutory rights

    You may be contacted by the supplier about your order.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Beautiful Skin Foundation, 4 Warm
description:
"Darlings, my new Beautiful Skin Foundation gives everyone skin that looks beautifully hydrated, plumper, smoother and brighter! This medium coverage, hydrating foundation has been expertly formulated with skincare ingredients to combine instant glow and buildable coverage with long-term skincare benefits. With brightening Rose Complex and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid to improve the look of skin with each wear*, my new Beautiful Skin Foundation is the secret to your best, healthy-looking skin day, every day!" Charlotte Tilbury.

1 Neutral is the perfect shade for you if you have very fair skin with neutral undertones.

Discover The Clinically-Proven Results...

  • Beautifully radiant by 285%*
  • Beautifully hydrated by up to 166%*
  • Skin looks beautifully plumper and smoother by up to 181%*
  • Skin tone appears more even by up to 210%*
  • Over 90% agree beautiful skin foundation improves the appearance of skin with each wear**
  • Over 90% agree beautiful skin foundation helps to minimise the appearance of pores, pigmentation and dark spots**

What make it magic:

  • Hydrates: Hyaluronic Acid floods the skin with moisture and revitalises the skin’s outer, visible layers
  • Smooths: Bix’Activ™ helps to decrease the appearance of oiliness and visibly reduce the look of shine and pores
  • Brightens: Rose Complex targets all signs of stress in the skin including dullness, dryness, pigmentation and dark circles for skin that looks brighter, smoother, hydrated and more youthful
  • Evens: Hyalurosmooth™ targets uneven texture, dryness and dullness, and locks in moisture for a fresher, plumper, smoother and even-looking skin tone
  • Plumps: Coconut Extract improves skin’s ability to hold water by helping strengthen the skin barrier over time for plumper, younger-looking skin
  • Defends: C.T. Defence prevents pollutant particles from penetrating the skin and strengthens the skin barrier, to improve skin quality over time for more healthy-looking skin
  • Long-lasting with 16HR wear
  • Vegan-friendly formula
  • Beautifully packaged in an easy-to-use, Recyclable tube

*312 people tested daily over 4 weeks. **Tested on 33 people over 4 weeks. Bix’Activ™ and Hyalurosmooth™ are trademarks by BASF Beauty Care Solutions France SAS.

name: Brother DCP-L2530DW Wireless Compact Three-In-One Mono Laser Printer, Black
description:

name: Blanco Claron 340-U Single Bowl Undermounted Kitchen Sink, Stainless Steel
description:
Made from 18/10 quality stainless steel, this Blanco kitchen sink has an extra deep bowl with the smallest possible radii, which makes optimum use of your kitchen space.

The Blanco Claron range delivers an elegant design with no visible base pattern. The sink comes with the streamlined and highly functional, manually operated InFino waste.

Cabinet width: 400mm. Bowl depth: 190mm. Bowl width: 340mm.

Worth knowing: Waste and overflow kit is included. Plumbing kit sold separately.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Choose the perfect sink for your kitchen

Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect kitchen sink, from material to sink configuration.

Stainless Steel Stainless steel is the most popular material, made from premium 18/10 nickel steel. It looks beautiful, is resistant to staining, chipping, rust and corrosion, is heat proof and non-fading, hygienic and suitable for food preparation.
Ceramic Kiln-fired porcelain for a tough, smooth gloss finish which is able to stand up to even the harshest treatment. Very hard-wearing, mostly used in classic, country style kitchens. Can be inset, undermounted or the classic Belfast style.
Composite Granite Contains 80% tough granite particles with an acrylic of synthetic material which gives great strength. They are resistant to burns, dents, chips scratches and stains - 100% food safe, 100% acid resistant, 100% non-fading. They can resist up to 280 degrees of heat.
Undermounted vs Inset Sinks Traditional inset sinks are extremely practical. They can be cheaper than undermounts, and simpler to install. Undermounts give a seamless appearance to worktops which can have drainer grooves cut into them. Both styles can be found in Stainless Steel, Ceramic or Composite Granite.
1 bowls vs 1.5 bowls The 1.5 bowl is the most popular configuration, if space permits. The smaller bowl can be used for washing cutlery or glassware to save water and time. Can also be use with a drainer basket to drain vegetables, rinse salads etc.

description: Tailored in fit for a modern aesthetic, these suit trousers from Moss comes in a charming flannel check pattern that's ideal for office and occasion styling.

name: Nina B Satin Flower Stud Earrings, Silver
description:
These feminine Nina B stud earrings will add delicate charm to your everyday silhouettes.
 
Made from sterling silver into a pretty flower design, the earrings offer brushed finish petals and delicate gold-plated centre. They fasten with classic butterfly fittings that are for pierced ears only.
 
Presented in a chic branded gift box.

name: Crew Clothing Kids' Lightweight Gilet
description: Keeping little ones warm (but looking super cool), this lightweight gilet features contrast trims, a funnel neck and zipped pockets. Crew are big fans.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Girls' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Girls' Coats, Jackets & Gilets

name: John Lewis Camber Leather Armchair, Dark Leg
description:
With an elegant slender scroll arm, the Camber range delivers maximum style without compromising on comfort. A supportive sit, with a high back.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: John Lewis Spindle Dining Chair, Set of 2, Blue, FSC-Certified (Beech Wood)
description:
We've made these dining chairs from sturdy beechwood in a range of painted finishes. Supplied as a pair with spindle rods forming the backrest and sleek, tapered legs, they're useful in smaller rooms and ideal if you want a quick room refresh. Create an eclectic look by mix-and-matching different colours around your dining table or keep things simple with a neutral colour block.

By choosing this product you are supporting responsible management of the world's forests. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC®) is a global, not-for-profit organisation that helps take care of forests and the people and wildlife that call them home. To learn more, visit fsc.org.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there’s joy to be found in ANYDAY.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Dining Room | Dining Chairs

name: Simon Carter Floral Silk Tie, Navy
description: Woven from pure silk into a floral design, this tie from Simon Carter is ideal for injecting tactile yet luxurious style into your look. Keep in your accessories collection for years to come.

name: Crew Clothing Izzy V-Neck Cardigan, Denim Blue
description: Layering neatly over dresses and tops alike, this cardigan from Crew Clothing is made from long-lasting fabric that will see you through season after season.

name: Fujifilm Instax Link Wide Mobile Photo Printer, Ash White
description:
Create the largest prints in the instax line-up with the instax Link Wide printer. This wide-format mobile smartphone printer is super-handy to take with you, the wide format photos ensure everyone fits in the pic, and you can customise your pic using an app.

Simple printing
Connect your smartphone by Bluetooth and print off instant Wide format photos of your favourite snaps.

Snap appy
Not only does the instax Link Wide get everyone in, the instax Link Wide app adds more that you can do. You can simply print beautifully framed Wide prints, but you can also add text, resize, apply a filter, play with the contrast, for endless creativity. Choose your settings before you connect wirelessly via Bluetooth to the instax Link Wide, swipe up, and print.

And more
And when it comes to changing up your look, you can delve into its colour modes: instax Rich for all the colour, and instax Natural for a classic feel. Add a sense of occasion with over 30 editable templates. Enhance your snap with QR codes linking to a URL of your choice, sounds, secret locations and even secret messages. Or add some personalisation with the Sketch, edit and print mode.

In addition to smart phones, the Link Wide printer is also compatible with the FUJIFILM X-S10 mirrorless digital camera (sold separately).

This device uses Instax Wide Film (not included).

name: KAFFE Vilera Floral Dress, Black/Toffee
description:
Easy to wear in an A-line silhouette, this midi dress by KAFFE is doused in pretty florals.

With a ruffled crew neck and long sleeves, this piece is one you'll reach for on relaxed days with friends.

name: John Lewis Charlotte Small 2 Seater Sofa
description:
The traditional Charlotte range, combines gently flared scrolled arms and tapered legs for an elegant look with fibre-filled cushions you can really sink into.

Environmentally friendly fillings
We use Quallofil® Blue fibres in our Charlotte range as a more sustainable choice than chemical-based foam fillings. Quallofil® Blue fibres are made using 50% recycled plastic from Plastic Bank; a globally recognised and award-winning solution to stop ocean plastic whilst improving the lives of people living in poverty, who collect the plastic. These fibres give firm, controlled support and are long-lasting so they'll retain the cushion's original appearance instead of becoming squashed and flat over time.

Sustainably sourced timber
We make sure Charlotte's timber frames are sourced from carefully managed, sustainable forests.

Sustainable manufacturing
We're proud to work with Westbridge, our manufacturing partner based in North Wales who make our Charlotte range of sofas for us. Westbridge have been making more environmentally friendly choices for over a decade and haven't sent anything to landfill since 2007. They also continue to work hard to offset their carbon footprint by introducing energy-saving procedures and equipment throughout their factory.

Pattern placement
We have a wide range of fabrics for you to choose from as part of our Design Your Own service. There's a spectrum of colours and textures, as well as a mix of plain and patterned designs. If you choose one of our patterned fabrics just be aware that the image above is there as a guide and may not be representative of the finished item. We've reproduced the product as best we can but the pattern placement may vary.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Designers Guild Massari Furnishing Fabric, Azure
description:
A refined chenille texture with an interlacing small scale geometric pattern on a subtle neutral ground.

Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
If you'd like to purchase this fabric and are ready to place your order, or need a little styling advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: Superdry Organic Cotton Blend Vintage Lace Trim Vest
description:
Channelling 90s chic, this crop top from Superdry will give your wardrobe the refresh it needs.

Cut with a softly rounded neckline and a sleeveless design, it is made from a comfortable cotton-rich fabric and pairs effortlessly with floaty summery skirts for warm days spent with good friends.

name: John Lewis Derby Crepe Suede Shoes
description:
Our ideal smart-casual shoe combines the versatility of the derby silhouette with the comfort of a crepe-effect sole.

Made in premium suede with leather/textile lining, it features an Ortholite insole that provides long-term cushioning, high-level breathability and Antimicrobial protection.

name: Bose Sport Earbuds True Wireless Sweat & Weather-Resistant Bluetooth In-Ear Headphones with Mic/Remote
description:
Bose Sport Earbuds energise your exercise with motivating, high quality audio, and a secure fit that stays comfortable throughout your whole workout. Your music stays clear and balanced, regardless of volume, and they’re moisture-resistant for high-impact and outdoor exercise. Feel the liberating freedom of wire-free listening, and recharge them in the included carry case.

Truly wireless freedom
Totally cable-free design frees you up for comfortable, maximised movement. With top of the range Bluetooth, these earbuds are designed to play reliably and consistently, with a pure and stable signal. As long as you’re within 30ft (9m) of your device, you’ll stay securely connected to your sounds.

Resistant and durable
The Bose Sport Earbuds are rigorously tested for durability against moisture from sweat, and the weather. They’re also IPX4 rated to ensure protection from water splashing when running in the rain.

Simple touch controls
Instead of buttons, control your wireless earbuds with a series of simple gestures. On the right earbud, swipe up and down for optional volume control, double-tap to play or pause music and to answer calls. On the left earbud, double-tap to engage a Shortcut function like checking your battery level or skipping a track.

Brilliant Bose audio
Bose’s patented acoustic port design and premium, high-efficiency drivers deliver big sound from a small package. Music is realistic and authentic, and Volume-optimised Active EQ keeps the audio balanced at any loudness level. StayHear Max tips create a tight seal for effective delivery of deep bass.

Secure comfort
With three sizes of StayHear Max tips included, you can find just the right fit. Made from silicone, they stay comfortable over a long wear, and stay securely in place, no matter how much you’re moving.

Recharging carry case
The Sport Earbuds keep going for up to five hours off a single charge. They recharge in the included carry case, which, when fully charged, contains up to ten more hours of power. And if you’re short on time, a quick fifteen minute charge gives up to two hours of playtime.

Bose Music app
The Bose Music app (available on iOS and Android) lets you name the Earbuds, customise controls, check battery life, choose your voice assistant, and more.

These True Wireless headphones are compatible with all smart devices with Bluetooth, including from Apple, Samsung and Google, and other Android smart phone brands.

name: Nina Campbell Lorette Furnishing Fabric, Red/Orange
description:
A geometric jacquard woven with contrasting yarns to resemble stitch work. Named after one of the artist's professional models.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Ditsy Side Tie Bikini Bottoms, Pack of 2, Capri Blue
description:
Go floral, go plain, or mix and match for a bit of both. We've created our Ditsy bikinis as a set of two so the choice is yours.

This season all of our ANYDAY swimwear is latex-free and made, in part, from recycled materials in both the outer fabric and lining.

With great prices and great design, our new brand offers style and quality for modern living today. Whatever you need, there's joy to be found in ANYDAY.

name: AEG DKB4950M Chimney Cooker Hood, Stainless Steel
description:
The DKB4950M Chimney Cooker Hood from AEG is powerful, energy-efficient and easy to install against kitchen walls as a standalone unit or between furniture. With both recirculation and extraction modes, it will rid your kitchen of lingering cooking odours and fumes so that your space stays clean and fresher for longer.

Thanks to a powerful motor and carbon filters, this efficient cooker hood will ensure air is well distributed around your kitchen. Three variable electronic speed controls can be easily selected via a push button control, while the long-lasting disposable filter can be washed and reactivated to ensure high odour-filtering performance.

You also gain the benefits of its two LED lights, which provide ideal task lighting over a hob to illuminate your food and cooking space.

name: Ray-Ban RB4246 Clubround Polarised Round Sunglasses, Tortoise/Dark Green
description:
Blending two iconic styles - Clubmaster and Round, these sunglasses from Ray-Ban are a truly modern legend.
 
The pair features a lightweight acetate half frame and stylish round lenses with a protective anti-reflection polarised finish. The design is complete by polished gold-toned accents for the ultimate edgy touch.
 
UV filter 100%

name: Joules Chesterfield Pet Bed, Navy, Small
description: Your four legged friend is tired. Because when you've been on your (four) feet all day, it's four times as tiring. So Joules have come up with a place for your companion to snuggle, feel safe and recharge those batteries. Say hello to the Chesterfield Pet Bed. Inspired by Joules' best-selling Windsor Sofa (for humans). It comes in a soft-touch fabric, is thickly padded for warmth and comfort and has a non-slip base. Perfect for those slippery kitchen floors. We're getting sleepy just thinking about it.

name: Rachel Ellen Princess Party Invitations, Pack of 8, Pink/Multi
description: A fabulous pack of bright, eye catching, die-cut Princess party invitations. Each pack contains 8 cards and 8 white envelopes, packed in a hanging bag with header. They are printed with vibrant inks on a thick textured board and die-cut into shape.

name: Everdure By Heston Blumenthal 4K Outdoor Electric Ignition Charcoal BBQ Cooker
description:
Combining contemporary style with traditional charcoal barbecuing, this outdoor cooker can tackle tasty fast-flame cooking or slow cooking for more tender and succulent results. The oven's cooking range is from low and slow (110C) to intense (+400C). Select the right temperature using the easy-to-read digital display setting.

With the fast-flame ignition you simply press the button and within 10 minutes you're ready to cook. The cooker uses charcoal efficiently (1kg coal for 9 hours of cooking).

Other features include a unique auto-locking hood, handy internal lighting and an airflow design for more controlled cooking.

The robust yet lightweight aluminium construction comes with a stainless steel cooking grid, a cast iron cooking grid and a high-temperature pizza stone to cater for a variety of cuisines.

  • Elegant contemporary kamado barbecue design
  • Charcoal and electric element
  • Low and slow (110C) to intense (+400C) cooking range
  • Ready to cook in 10 minutes, thanks to the Fast Flame Ignition System
  • Efficient charcoal use - 1kg coal for 9 hours of cooking
  • High-temperature pizza stone/li>
  • Auto-locking hood
  • Unique airflow design
  • Internal lighting
  • Protective cover included

Charcoal range
The evolution of man is largely thanks to the evolution of fire and energy. Cooking over a fire was once part of everyday life, in many parts of the world, it still is. More than just visual theatre, or a traditional ‘back to basics’ approach, authentic charcoal cooking adds a distinctive smoky flavour to food. Mastering the heat, and managing a fire, made it challenging for many barbecue enthusiasts to fully embrace its charms – until now.

name: IBB 18ct Gold Bangle Bracelet, Gold
description:
Made from 18ct gold with a polished finish that gleams, this bangle bracelet from IBB is a simple way to accessorise. This versatile style looks great on its own but can also be worn as part of a layered ensemble.

If you want to return this product, you'll need to take it back to a John Lewis & Partners shop for verification, and not return it by post or courier. We'll process your refund once the item has been returned to and checked by our specialist, so please allow us time to action your full refund.

name: KAFFE Sinem High Waisted Jeans, Blue Washed Denim
description:
Offering both comfort and ease with a straight-leg silhouette, these high-waisted jeans from KAFFE sit at the ankle for a contemporary finish.

They're versatile enough to be dressed down for a casual day or dressed up with stilettos for an after-work dinner.

Less Laundering
It’s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible.

name: Barbour Essential Wool Crew Neck Jumper
description: This pared-back men's staple sweatshirt offers timeless appeal for weekend wardrobes. It's imagined in super-soft wool to keep you warm, while the crew neck cut means it's perfect for styling over a t-shirt.

name: Libertine-Libertine Miracle Wool Blend Shirt, Brown Check
description: Cut from a high-quality Italian recycled wool-poly blend with a bit of stretch for better comfort, this classic regular-fit overshirt from Libertine-Libertine is framed by a straight point collar and slightly curved hemline for a modern edge.

name: Menagerie - Vintage Unframed Canvas Print, 120 x 80cm, Green/Multi
description:
A colourful vintage-style menagerie, reminiscent of Noah's Ark. This large unframed canvas print is ready to hang on your wall using the included fixings on the back.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

name: Live Unlimited Wave Print Curved Hem Shirt, Black/White
description:
Bringing a neat addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from Live Unlimited boasts abstract stripes throughout.

Accented with a high neckline and long sleeves, it is made from soft viscose and effortlessly transitions from daytime escapades to after-dark soirées.

name: Whistles Rita Easy Dungarees, Light Wash
description:
Framing the décolletage with a square neckline, this sleeveless pair of dungarees by Whistles is cut to a wide-leg silhouette and is made from a lightweight cotton blend for maximum breathability.

Perfectly understated and plain, this wardrobe saviour is oh-so easy to throw on at a moment’s notice.

name: Gina Bacconi Kora Moss Overtop Crepe Dress
description:
An elegant choice for summer celebrations and weddings, this beautiful Kora dress and overtop by Gina Bacconi plays on different textures for a striking look. It's made from a luxury moss crepe which is fully lined for smooth comfort and features a cropped overtop cut from corded lace for added sophistication.

Softly shaped the slight ruching on the waist flatters the figure and adds definition with a concealed zip fastening at the back keeping things nice and sleek. Pair this dress with your favourite heels for instant polish.

name: Kin Slim Stripe Long Sleeve Shirt
description: A modern classic that's ideal for dressing up or down, this shirt comes in a timeless stripe pattern with oversized patch pocket accent.

name: Edwin Hana No Short Sleeve Shirt, Multi
description: Offering a soft and durable handle, this crisp shirt from Edwin is rendered in a modern abstract print and is cut with a relaxed silhouette that conveys a sense of nonchalant cool.

name: Radley Women's Series 8 Silicone Strap Smartwatch
description:
Introducing the Radley London Series 8 smart activity tracker with colour touch screen and up to 7 day battery life.

A stylish way to keep a track of your health and call, the watch features include a heart rate monitor, GPS function, 6 different dial choices, receiving call and message notifications, track specific activities (running/walking/cycling/climbing) in real time, distance/steps/calorie tracking, live weather updates from your watch, selfie camera control, find your phone function, track your sleep, alarm and reminders.

The watch is designed with a silicone strap and is complete with charm. Each watch is packed in a Radley London presentation gift box complete with an instruction manual, USB charger (sealed rechargeable battery) and a 2 year manufacturer guarantee.

Download the free Radley Active App now to explore in more detail. IOS & Android Compatible. Typical Usage time of 10 Days charge time: 2 hours.

Please note: Radley have recently introduced new packaging across their jewellery and watches which is being gradually introduced into the John Lewis collection, so packaging received may vary from the image shown.

name: John Lewis Java II Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Metal Leg
description:
Redesigned to more modern proportions, Java II features slender legs, generous bolster style arms and innovative Cortec™ pocket spring technology for a supportive sit.

Comfort and sustainability
We use innovative Cortec™ pocket springs to give excellent support in the Java II. These springs help retain the cushion shapes so they stay firmer for longer compared to foam seats. The air in the pockets also allows for natural ventilation, keeping upholstery clean and fresh, and with no glue used the springs are 100% recyclable.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Whistles Rosa Double Trim T-Shirt, White
description:
This Rosa T-shirt is an elevated take on a wardrobe basic from Whistles.

Made from soft cotton in a relaxed silhouette, the double trim crew neckline adds a subtle statement finish.

name: Danish Design Pet Cooling Mattress, Medium
description: Cooling mattress to keep pets cool in the warmer months, which can be used as a stand-alone mattress or on a pets current bed. Contains a non-toxic gel which is cool to the touch to provide instant relief for pets and can be placed in the refrigerator to increase the cooling properties. Made with a hard wearing fabric and can simply be wiped clean with a damp cloth.

name: Ray-Ban RB3025 Unisex Aviator Sunglasses, Silver/Grey
description:
An original icon, these aviator sunglasses from Ray-Ban offer versatility and distinction in style.

Fitted with stylish gradient crystal lenses on a thin metal frame, the design is complete with comfortable Havana plastic tips.

Note: the lens is made from glass, therefore it will be slightly weightier than normal sunglasses.

name: Halo Groucho Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa
description:
A stunning leather sofa, Groucho is ideal for adding a little character to hallways, landings and making the most of smaller spaces.
