name: Little Mistress Avery Velvet Sequin Blazer Mini Dress, Navy
description:
Wrapping over at the front for a shapely silhouette, this mini dress by Little Mistress is embellished for a distinguished edge.

Framed with a flattering v-neckline and long puff sleeves, it is a faithful favourite you love to call on for any party.

name: Nkuku Ela Dinner Plate, 27.5cm, Cream
description:
The Nkuku Ela ceramic collection is made by skilled artisans in Vietnam. Every stage of the production process is done by hand using traditional tools and techniques, from shaping the white clay on a traditional potter's wheel, to placing each individual drop of natural wax around the rim, creating the beautiful raised drop texture.

The natural process of producing the collection means no chemicals are required and adds to the beauty of the products, making every piece an extra special addition to your table.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, perfect for everyday. Its cream colour and low firing temperatures allow for designed pieces.
StonewareTougher than earthenware and chip resistant. Ideal for heavy use and can often go into the oven to temperatures of up to 250°C.
TerracottaUses a clay with a rich body colour giving the characteristic base colour, and has a low glaze firing allowing bright coloured glazes. Porous body allows for good thermal expansion and contraction properties making it an ideal body for cookware such as tagines and roasters.
PorcelainDelicate yet strong. Carefully selected clays give whiteness and translucency. It can often go from oven to table.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china whilst maintaining the benefits - strength, translucency and delicacy.
Bone china Bone china is made from 40% bone ash. This makes strong yet thin and delicate pieces which are microwave, dishwasher* and usually oven safe making each piece ideal for everyday use, not just formal.
*Unless product has metallic details - always check individual item for specific care instructions

name: Under the Rose Birthstone Turquoise Chain Bracelet, Gold
description:
Handcrafted with a unique birthstone to represent your birth month, this delicate bracelet makes a great style with a subtle personal touch. Turquoise symbolises prosperity, happiness and health-promoting self-healing and boosting confidence.

This stunning bracelet features 7 turquoise stones, skilfully assembled onto a thin chain. It also includes a pulley clasp to ensure the best fit for your wrist. The bracelet comes in a signature Under The Rose gift box.

name: Made With Love By Tom Daley Rainbow Admire Vest Knitting Kit
brand: Made With Love By Tom Daley
description:
A great way to layer and learn how to make a classic V neck, with simple shaping, to add a new staple to your wardrobe.

Contents:

40g "The Chunky One" yarn in Limoncello; 40g "The Chunky One" yarn in Aqua Blue; 40g "The Chunky One" yarn in Jump Pink; 40g "The Chunky One" yarn in Robbie Red; 40g "The Chunky One" yarn in Deep Dive Blue; 10mm (US 15) x 35 cm Knitting Needles; 12mm (US17) x 35cm knitting needles; wide-eyed darning needle; pattern.

For the main colour:

  • XS contains 4x 100g balls of Lychee White
  • S/M contains 4x 100g balls of Lychee White
  • L/XL contains 4x 100g balls of Lychee White
  • XXL contains 5x 100g balls of Lychee White

name: Chantelle Soft Stretch High Waisted Knickers, White
description:
Offering a second skin feeling, these Soft Stretch briefs from Chantelle will make the perfect foundation to your outfits. They won Innovation of the Year at the UK Lingerie Awards 2018 for their soft stretch knit design that adapts to your body for a custom fit.

The full briefs sit high on the waist and boast a seam-free legline and sides for complete invisibility.

The gusset is lined in a pure cotton fabric.

One size fits sizes S-XL (10-16).
breadcrumbs: Women | Women's Lingerie & Underwear | Women's Knickers & Briefs

name: John Lewis Zegna Recycled Wool Regular Fit Suit Trousers, Charcoal
description:
Made from premium Italian cloth from luxury Italian Fashion House Zegna, this fabric is woven in 100% recycled wool in a modern semi-plain check design.

These suit trousers are tailored to our regular fit specification which features a mid-rise and a straight leg, finished with AMF stitching on the front pockets. Inside, the trouser is lined with ecru pocketing and ecru waistband.

name: Elizabeth Arden Prevage® Anti-Aging Neck & Décolleté Firm & Repair Creme, 50ml
description:
The most powerful antioxidant* now targets the neck and décolleté.

Infused with the powerhouse antioxidant, Idebenone, NEW PREVAGE® Anti-aging Neck and Décolleté Firm & Repair Cream helps fight the signs of environmental damage like fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots and loss of firmness. In fact, 7 out of 10 women noticed firmer, more lifted skin in the neck area and a reduction in the look of lines and crepiness in the décolleté.**

Formulated with the highly potent antioxidant, Idebenone, and a protein restoring complex, this luxurious cream targets the signs of environmental damage in the neck and décolleté area.

Immediately, skin feels firmer, softer, smoother and nourished.

Helps provide an overall younger look:

  • 83% of women saw more radiant skin in the décolleté**
  • 72% of women noticed improvement in skin’s elasticity in the neck area**

*When compared to antioxidants in face products, Idebenone in PREVAGE® surpasses ferulic acid, alpha lipoic acid, kinetin, vitamin C, vitamin E, ubiquinone and resveratrol in environmental protection against oxidative stress due to sun, smoke and pollution.

**Based on a US home use consumer test on 54 women aged 30-59 after 8 weeks.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: NRBY New Willow Cap Sleeve Jumper, Light Grey
description: Layering neatly with a v-neckline, this lightweight jumper from NRBY is blended with cashmere for a smoothly soft touch.

name: CHANEL Stylo Yeux Waterproof Long-Lasting Eyeliner, 46 Vert Émeraude
description:
A waterproof eye pencil that traces intense eyes. Its very long-lasting line resists water, humidity and sebum.

Its retractable tip and integrated pencil sharpener facilitate application.

name: DIOR Vernis Nail Polish
description: Discover the new-generation DIOR Vernis with its gel effect finish and couture colours. Enriched with organic silicon, the new DIOR Vernis provides extra-long wear: the technopolymer formula creates a seamless bond between the nail and the enamel. Formulated without toluene, formaldehyde, phthalates or camphor, feed your desire for colour with new high-pigment shades.

name: Hourglass No.28 Lip Treatment Oil, 7.5ml
description:
As a follow up to No.28 Primer Serum, this highly advanced lip treatment oil has both short- and long-term benefits for the lips. The combination of powerful actives, essential oils, plant oils, and vitamins works on contact to condition lips, relieve dryness and chapping, and shield against environmental elements.
 
In addition, three advanced active ingredients strengthen the moisture barrier; boost skin smoothness; and elevate the appearance of lip texture, shape, and volume. No.28 Lip Treatment Oil is dispensed via an opulent 24KT, anti-bacterial, gold-plated tip to create a soothing effect.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | Lip Care

name: TOM FORD FT0688 Women's Wallis Rectangular Sunglasses, Red Tortoise/Burgundy Gradient
description:
Create a statement look with these TOM FORD sunglasses.

The chunky rectangular frame is made from a lightweight acetate plastic, that is resilient and offers, at the same time, comfortable wear. The polycarbonate lenses are specifically designed to improve UV protection and resist to various impacts.

name: John Lewis Gustav Double Wardrobe, Grey
description:
Using water-based paint only, the Gustav range is hand painted so brush strokes will be visible, leaving an attractive finish. Other features include; end sections that are lightly sanded to give a distressed, matte look.

This Gustav spacious double wardrobe from high-quality solid poplar, MDF and safety glass. There's a metal hanging rail inside and three versatile storage shelves beneath the main hanging section.

Good to know: this wardrobe requires a large space in order to be able to construct effectively. Please ensure you have a suitable clear area for construction before buying.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Raging Bull Logo Leather Wash Bag, Brown
description: You'll love this Raging Bull leather wash bag. Made in supple calf leather, this one is perfect for those holiday breaks and business trips.

name: HUGO BOSS Filano Jumper, Open Blue
description: Framed with a turtleneck for snug wear on chilly days, this jumper from HUGO BOSS keeps the cold at bay with the wool-rich blend.

name: Selbrae House Deluxe Slate & Metal Bowl Mezze Set, Black/Gold
description: Three metal serving bowls with gold-toned interiors, on a slate base. Perfect for condiments. Designed in Scotland and traditionally handmade.

name: Moda in Pelle Madisonbag Embellished Mini Bag
description:
Modern, fun and ultra on-trend, keep the most important of possessions close to hand with this mini bag from Moda in Pelle.

Constructed from hardwearing fabric that's sure to last​, it fastens with a secure flapover front.

name: InWear Calene Knee Length Coat, Black
description:
Easy to pack for those will-it-won't-it days, this parka by InWear falls to a versatile knee-length hem to keep out the chill.

Streamlining the figure with a neat funnel neck, it provides you with a functional yet stylish choice that'll protect you from the elements too.

name: Aab Matrakci Floral Hijab, Green/Multi
description: Lift your look with this range of prints exclusive to Aab. A rich selection, from fun florals to abstract art, paisley to geometric patterns, there's one for everyone! Super soft, breathable and easy to style. Perfect to pair with your everyday outfits.

name: Benefit Gimme Brow Goals Brow Makeup Gift Set
description:
Full-size volumising brow gel & mini volumising brow pencil.

  • Benefit’s ultimate brow-volumising duo at a deal!
  • New Gimme Brow+ Volumising Pencil and Benefit bestseller Gimme Brow+
  • Volumise, tame, tint and texturise brows

Brow goals achieved!

For your fullest brows yet! Includes a full-size fan-fave Gimme Brow+ brow gel to volumise, tame and tint brows and a mini of new Gimme Brow+ Volumising Pencil to volumise, fill and define brows. This is the first brow pencil with fibres and powder that adheres to skin and hairs for natural-looking texture and fullness that lasts 12 hours*.

*Instrumental test on 20 participants.

Set contains:

  • Gimme Brow+ brow-volumising fibre gel in shades 2, 3, 4 & 5, Full Size
  • Gimme Brow+ Volumising Pencil volumising fibre eyebrow pencil in shades 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4 & 5, Mini

name: IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better Foundation + Skincare, Deep Neutral 61
description:
Experience a better-looking complexion instantly! Your Skin But Better Foundation + Skincare features lightweight, medium buildable coverage that instantly improves the look of skin - minimising the look of pores and imperfections while delivering all-day hydration and wear with a natural radiant finish.

Suitable for all skin types and infused with hyaluronic acid, aloe vera extract, vitamins E & B5 and hepes acid, your skin-loving foundation works behind the scenes as you wear it. IT visibly evens the appearance of skin tone and refines the look of skin texture. IT’s truly your foundation for better-looking skin!

Key benefits:

  • Skincare infused foundation delivers a better-looking complexion instantly and better bare skin
  • Micro-fine pearl powder provides a natural radiant finish while lightweight formula delivers all-day hydration
  • Medium, buildable makes it easy to customise your makeup look
  • Suitable for all skin types and infused with hyaluronic acid, aloe vera extract, vitamins E & B5 and hepes acid

Key ingredients:

  • Hyaluronic Acid & Aloe Vera Extract: Instantly hydrate and smooth the look of skin
  • Vitamins E & B5: Moisturise the skin and fight free radicals to help strengthen the skin barrier
  • Hepes Acid: Gently exfoliates for a brighter-looking complexion

name: Gucci Fluide De Beauté Fini Natural Finish Fluid Foundation, 130W Fair
description:
Gucci Beauty continues to place individuality and diversity above all with the launch of its beautifying liquid foundation - Fluide De Beauté Fini Natural.

Suitable for everyone regardless of gender or skin type, Fluide De Beauté Fini Natural Finish Fluid Foundation offers adjustable coverage results thanks to a lightweight formula both buildable and long-wearing. Creating a visibly perfected complexion, this silky-smooth beautifying foundation achieves the ultimate natural finish and helps to subtly blur away imperfections. The product forms an imperceptible veil that enhances natural beauty every time it’s worn.

Designed with a texture that appears to blur blemishes and make pores appear less visible, the feather-light, buildable formula of Fluide De Beauté Fini Natural Finish Fluid Foundation offers controlled coverage results without ever masking natural beauty. Comfortable on the skin all day long, this lightweight, silky foundation is non-greasy, easy to apply and creates a visibly unified complexion.

Apply using the fingertips to achieve a second skin effect with a naturally perfected and smooth finish.

Ranging from very fair for pink undertones, all the way to a deep dark tone for neutral palettes, Fluide De Beauté Fini Natural Finish Fluid Foundation is available in 40 shades, ensuring a colour match for every skin tone and type. Encased within a transparent heavy-set frozen glass tube and a pale pink cap, the bottle is finished with iconic Gucci lettering.

Benefits:

  • Visibly unified complexion
  • Natural Makeup Finish
  • Non-Greasy Formula
  • Smooth looking complexion
  • Supple skin all day long

name: Skagen Elin Crystal Circle Necklace, Silver Skj0833040
description:
Opt for sheer sophistication with this beautiful Elin Circle necklace from Skagen.

With a delicate chain and a simple lobster fastening, this piece features a beautiful circular pendant which is embellished with a sparkling crystal. The chain-link necklace can be adjusted to your preference of short or mid-length.

name: John Lewis Tortona 5+ Seater LHF Chaise End Sofa
description:
With its clean lines, the Tortona range pays tribute to timeless Italian sofa design. The extra-deep, feather and foam filled cushions are perfect for sinking into.

Pattern placement

name: Live Unlimited Matte Satin Waterfall Neck Jacket, Black
description:
For smarter settings that call for a tailored touch, this blazer from Live Unlimited falls to a regular length.

With a cascading waterfall neckline, it's woven from a satin smooth material for a sleek finish.

name: Milton & Humble Jewellery Second Hand 18ct Yellow Gold Diamond Collarette Necklace, Dated Circa 2000s
description:
Beautifully designed, this is an exquisite Milton & Humble piece of jewellery. Crafted from 18ct gold and hallmarked in Edinburgh, the necklet is estimated to date back to before the 2000s.The gold curved centrepiece features a decorative ribbed design with diamonds arranged in 5 rows - their setting is rhodium plated to highlight the glimmer of the diamonds.

This piece would look fantastic as a set with the matching Milton & Humble's 18ct gold diamond set bangle.

The diamonds are thought to be G-H colour and VS1-VS2 clarity and have an approximate total weight of 0.75ct.

Colour G-H which falls into the following group:
Near Colourless G-J - More common than D-F colour diamonds, the G-J diamonds provide a great value. Similar to D-F diamonds, these diamonds are best highlighted in white gold or platinum as the white colour of the metal enhances the colourlessness of the stone.

Clarity VS1-VS2 which falls under the following group: Very Slightly Included (VS1 and VS2) Inclusions are observed with effort under 10x magnification and are defined as minor. The inclusions are not visible to the naked eye.

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

If you want to return this product, you'll need to take it back to a John Lewis & Partners shop for verification, and not return it by post or courier. We'll process your refund once the item has been returned to and checked by our specialist, so please allow us time to action your full refund.

name: Pretty You London Elsa Slippers, Grey
description: Slipping on with ease for relaxing at home, these slipper boots by Pretty You London are made with textile uppers for a light and comfortable wear.

name: Panache Blossom Balconnette Bra, Raspberry
description: New to the Cleo collection is Blossom! Featuring a much-loved fit, with stabiliser-lined embroidered cups and vertical seams to create a rounded shape. With two-ply stretch mesh wings and fully adjustable decorative straps, this delicate, floral, supportive bra in a pretty and on-trend lilac shade, is a perfect staple for the AW collection.

name: chesca Wavy Line Stripe Jersey Dress, Grey
description:
A multi-occasion dress, this chesca piece will make you presentable in an instant.

Falling just below the knee, this jersey piece offers a delicately swirling stripe pattern that brings fine texture to the look. The outsize metallic buttons at the neck create a statement and don't necessarily require a necklace.

Team with accessories in a colour palette that matches the dress.

name: Rituals The Ritual of Namaste Glow Anti-Ageing Day Cream Refill, 50ml
description:
Show respect for your skin and respect for nature with this eco-chic refill for your anti-ageing day cream from The Ritual of Namaste.

It fits perfectly in your luxurious jar and contains the same light formula to revitalise the skin and boost its radiance. Enriched with our new iconic Bakuchiol Repair Complex, this cream helps to visibly minimise the appearance of fine lines, improve the skin's elasticity and protect against the negative influence of free radicals.

The result? Softer, suppler and younger-looking skin.

  • 97% ingredients from natural origin, 3% lab made to ensure product texture and stability
  • Boost radiance
  • Minimise appearance of fine lines
  • Vegan-friendly
  • Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
  • Dermatologically tested
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: John Lewis Kids' Coco Biker Boots, Black
description: These scaled-down biker boots tick all the boxes necessary: sturdy leather, distinctive gold eyelets, and of course, a cushy sole that tiny toes can jump around on. The best part? They're designed with a zip at the ankle, so they're easy for little rockers to take on and off.

name: Selbrae House Crown Giraffe Slate Coasters, Set of 4, Black/Gold
description: Four square slate coasters etched with a giraffe design and finished with a gold-toned crown. Hand-cut, etched and finished in Scotland.

name: Silentnight Merlin Strutted Headboard, Single, Maritime
description:
The Merlin is a luxurious seashell shape upholstered fabric headboard, decoratively detailed with deep vertical lines and a for a contemporary twist on a classic design. The padded headboard offers added comfort when sitting up in bed and is available in a number of colours to suit all manner of bedroom schemes. High quality struts allow the headboard to be fixed to any standard divan base bringing great comfort and style to your sleep space.

Choose from Silentnight's range of smooth velvet or flat woven fabrics.

Smooth Velvet: Featuring a very fine high pile, matt look, and extreme softness. It's soft feel and low sheen ensures smooth velvet remains a timeless favourite in home interior design. Smooth velvet beds are an affordable way to bring a touch of luxury into the bedroom. Colours: mink, dusky pink & maritime.

Woven: Featuring a soft and subtle feel which is durable and long lasting. This woven fabric is ideal for both traditional and contemporary styled bedrooms. Colours: ebony, slate grey, light grey & whisper

All of Silentnight’s fabrics are Oeko-tex approved. The Oeko-tex standard 100 label involves testing for harmful substances and ensuring high product safety.

Please note: not all our ranges are on display in our shops. For more information, please speak to a furniture Partner in store, or call 03452 661805 and we can tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Harlequin Sumi Geometric Print Fabric, Azure
description:
Get creative with this printed fabric.

Suitable for dressmaking, craft and quilting, it features a geometric print that has been digitally printed in the UK and is made from pure cotton poplin.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.

name: MAC Dazzleshadow Extreme Eyeshadow, Pro Palette Refill Pan, Illuminaughty
description:
Intensify eyes with new and revamped eye formulas. All-new Dazzleshadow Extreme features one-swipe molten metallic colour with 12-hour staying power – while even more pigment-packed Eye Shadow colours and textures offer infinite, multidimensional looks. Boost your brow game with new Eye Brows Big Boost Fibre Gel. Get a voluminous boost in a single swoop with this 24-hour formula for perfectly polished to expertly untamed looks.

Reimagine your Dazzleshadow with extreme molten metallic shades featuring one-swipe saturation and 12-hour staying power. This pressed powder shadow features a cream-like texture that glides across lids, leaving a wet-like metallic finish on eyes that looks like melted metal. The formula is infused with lustrous pearlescent pigments for colour that boasts the utmost clarity and brilliance. Create a customised palette of shades by fitting into any Pro Palette Eyeshadow / Concealer Insert for easy storage and transport.

name: MAC Powder Kiss Soft Matte Eye Shadow, Strike A Pose
description:
Matte has been reinvented.

Meet the velvet comfort you love on your lips now for your lids. Experience a weightless kiss of colour with Powder Kiss Soft Matte Eye Shadow.

Enwrap eyes with pillow-soft, matte colour using Soft-Focus Filter Technology that delivers a beautifully diffused, blurring effect. The highly blendable, luxurious formula smooths onto lids with unbelievable slip. Its exclusive Cream Matrix formula allows for an ultra-creamy, exceptionally soft and gliding texture.

This next-generation matte formula is available in lip-toned colours translated for the eyes.

name: HUGO BOSS Vesala Satin Midi Skirt, Open Pink
description:
Cut to a classic A-line silhouette, this midi skirt by HUGO BOSS allows you to showcase its versatility.

Made from a resilient fabric and sitting at the waist, watch as it easily slots into your wardrobe.

name: AllSaints Harland Suede Desert Boots, Taupe
description: Any weather, anywhere, AllSaints Harland Boots are a seasonal staple. Crafted from smooth suede in a classic desert boot shape with a lace-up front and sleek sole, they're punctuated with branding to the back heel.

name: Silentnight Healthy Growth Miracoil Children's Mattress, Firm, Single
description:
Help your young ones to get the rest and support their growing bodies need. Manufactured with breathable fillings, Silentnight’s Healthy Growth mattress keeps children comfortable at night by regulating their sleeping temperature. It is free from foam and chemical treatments and contains only clean and odourless polyester fillings, making it hypoallergenic and dust mite-free.

The Miracoil spring system is designed specifically to align a child's spine as they grow, with edge to edge support that gives growing bodies the extra support and space they need. Finally the knitted quilt top gives a softer surface feel, perfect for a cosy night’s sleep.

The mattress's Allergy UK-approved Purotex® cover is 100% natural, with friendly bacteria that reduce mould and moisture, keeping dust-mites at bay and reducing allergens. This creates a drier, fresher and all round healthier mattress, ideal for helping you and your family to get the sleep you deserve.

Worth knowing
Due to demand and global fabric shortages, the mattress you receive may have a slightly different pattern on the cover compared to the image. This will not impact the comfort of your model.

Try before you buy
This is an important purchase and it’s worthwhile to try your choice of mattress in one of our shops to make sure it's right for you. Our store Partners will be able to tell you more about its benefits, and recommend options based on your needs. For more information, call 03452 661 805 and we can tell you where the range you’d like to view is on display.

name: John Lewis ANYDAY Plain Ribbed Cropped Cardigan
description:
No wardrobe is complete with a classic cardi and we love this option from our ANYDAY collection for those awkward, in-betweeny days where there's still a chill in the air. Woven from 100% cosy cotton, it comes in a modern, cropped shape with vintage-inspired tortoiseshell-tone buttons down the front.

Better Cotton

name: Cole & Son Savuti Wallpaper, 109/1002
description:
The Savuti is one of Africa’s most loved and well known national parks where hoopoes and hornbills call and sing whilst baboons and chameleons sun themselves in flowering coral trees.

Have you thought about wallpaper accessories? Shop here.

name: The Elf on the Shelf Book & Boy Elf with Blue Eyes Set
description:
This beloved family tradition has captured the hearts of children everywhere who embrace the magic of having a Scout Elf who reports to Santa each night during the holidays. This boxed set has everything needed to bring the tradition to your family and make lasting Christmas memories including:

  • Adoptable Scout Elf

name: Hunter Intrepid Tall Quilted Snow Boots, Black
description:
Extreme cold weather calls for the Intrepid Snow Boot. Handcrafted with a recycled nylon upper, recycled fleece lining and an innovative Ortholite footbed, tread through frosty excursions with the comfort and support you can rely on. The elasticated drawstring and toggle along the topline retain warmth.

These boots can be worn in temperatures as low as -20°C (-4°F). Certified Vegan.

name: MAC Lustreglass Sheer-Shine Lipstick, $ellout
description:
Sheer high-shine colour. All-day moisture. Introducing newly revamped Lustreglass Lipstick.

The formula you love, has had a major upgrade.

Now with 28 shades, this revamped formula infused with Hyaluronic Acid nourishes, hydrates and conditions lips, leaving a luminous pop of sheer high-shine colour. Enriched with a luscious blend of lip-loving ingredients – including Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, Jojoba, Raspberry Seed, Olive and Coconut Oils for ultra-hydrating colour.

The result? Comfortable, buildable colour, a luminous, long-wearing finish and softer, smoother and more supple lips that look as good as they feel.

name: John Lewis Fireside Armchair
description:
Compact and classically styled, Fireside has been designed with a supportive high back and turned wooden legs.

This crochet carousel baby blanket is the perfect addition to your little one's nursery.

Never compromise on the most cherished moments in your life: Bo Peep Luxury Baby is a sumptuous blend of the purest Falkland Islands wool and finest nylon, perfect to wrap your favourite little people in.

name: Alpha Industries X NASA Reflective Logo Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: Perfect for casual days and weekend styling, this T-shirt from the Alpha Industries X NASA collaboration is made from pure cotton for a super-soft and breathable handle. Framed by a classic crew neckline and short sleeve cut, the iconic NASA logo is stitched proudly onto the chest, with reflective logo detailing offering a stand-out finish.

name: Rodd & Gunn Cove Road Linen Blend Slim Fit Blazer, Grey
description: Original Fit. This fuller-fit jacket, designed for comfort and everyday wear is Woven in Northern Italy by Albini, the fabric masters. A deconstructed construction has a lighter, more natural shoulder shape whilst a single-breasted closure keeps things simple for both relaxed and formal settings.

name: Jellycat Pretty Patisserie Tarte Au Citron Soft Toy
description: It's time for a citrus delight with the Pretty Patisserie Tarte Au Citron. With a lemon slice on top and a sweet stitched smile, this small foodie is a friend for life.

name: LeapFrog Magic Adventures Globe
description:
Young explorers can travel the world and see everything in it with the Magic Adventures Globe from Leapfrog.

Using the stylus, children can tap on the 10" interactive learning globe and experience new places, languages, cultures, animals, geography, habitats and more through high-quality BBC videos.

Featuring a 2.7" integrated video screen, animations and live-action videos fully immerse kids in the curriculum to provide a better understanding of the world through more than 5 hours of videos. They can also play three interactive games called Around the World, Quiz Show and Where in the World to explore the globe, challenge a friend and solve mysteries.

description:
Refresh your approach to timeless staples with this organic cotton round neck t-shirt from La Paz.

Stamped with the brand's label, this piece is testament to the power of a good logo.

name: Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Glow Glide Face Architect Highlighter, Champagne Glow
description:
"Darlings, get your Hollywood Glow on with my Hollywood Glow Glide Face Architect Highlighter. "Combining the rich pigment pay-off of a pressed powder with the skin-gilding satin texture of a liquid highlighter, my Hollywood Glow Glide Face Architect Highlighters brighten, lift and sculpt the look of your skin without creasing, caking or settling into fine lines for a confidence-boosting glow. Use this illuminating, sculpting-effect highlighter on your cheeks, jawline, eyes, nose, brows and lips for a glowing, defined-looking facial structure. "Find your flawless match! Charlotte Tilbury.

  • 100% agree the skin looks younger*

name: Jigsaw Merino Fishermens Ribbed Funnel Neck Jumper
description: Bringing modern elegance to the classic roll neck with its funnel neckline, this jumper by Jigsaw is made from pure wool for a luxe warm handle.

name: Be-Jewelled Sterling Silver Amber Drop Earrings, Multi

Colourful and eclectic, these Be-Jewelled drop earrings will add a quirky touch to your holiday jewellery.

With classic sterling silver hook fittings, the earrings come with polished cognac and lemon amber and bamboo coral stones in natural shapes. Each piece of jewellery is individually crafted hence shapes, sizes, markings and colour of stones may vary.

Please note that these earrings are for pierced ears only.

Delivered in a branded jewellery box.

name: John Lewis Triple Chain Layered Necklace, Silver

The necklace is secured with a lobster clasp and can be adjusted in length to ensure a great fit.

description:
Inspired by the opulent casino lounge armchairs of 1950s Las Vegas, Porto from Swoon is button-backed, brass-capped and full of Mid-century character.

Ideal for the changing weather, this parka by Barbour International gives plenty of coverage with its longer-length hem.

A practical option with its built-in hood and detachable faux fur trim, it is made from durable fabric with frequent use in mind so slip it on and make this season yours.

name: Julian Bowen Maine Triple Wardrobe with 2 Drawers, White
description:
Maine is an elegant New England style range of bedroom furniture. The combination of exquisite surf white painted finish with characteristic side panelling and detailed chamfered cabinetry makes for a soothing and refined aesthetic with timeless appeal, while delicate pewter handles add the perfect finishing touch. The Maine triple wardrobe is designed with a hanging rail, next to three deep shelves and underneath two storage drawers sit side by side, providing plenty of bedroom storage space.

name: L.K.Bennett Valerie Wool Blend Peplum Cardigan
description: Framed with a classic round neckline and a peplum waist, this lightweight cardigan by L.K.Bennett keeps the cold at bay with the wool-rich blend.

name: Björn Borg Cotton Stretch Boxer Briefs, Pack of 5, Multi
description: These Björn Borg Cotton Stretch Boxers come in a favourite five-pack of the original classic boxers made from soft cotton stretch quality fabric. They have a mid-rise waist, a medium leg length and medium support with the perfect fit, and a soft elastic waistband in microfibre for added comfort.

name: Moss Knitted Silk Tie, Navy
description: Give your tailored ensembles a touch of levity with this Moss tie, woven from pure silk in a charming knitted construction.

name: Islamic Impressions Sultan Thobe Jubbah, Dark Brown
description:
The Islamic Impressions full-length robe is commonly known as a thobe or jubbah depending on the region in the Middle East. The collared Thobe has a stiff collar often worn in Qatar, Kuwait or Saudi Arabia. Worn at faith events, social gatherings or as loungewear, the Qatari Collection is understated and has double cuffs which makes it perfect for celebrations and events.

  • Full length
  • Lightweight design
  • Two side-pockets
  • Unlined
  • Button fastening with tassle cover
  • Ablution friendly

Established in 2004, Islamic Impressions is one of the UK's most recognised department stores offering items related to British Muslims and the finest in Arabian culture.

name: Recognised Dove Popon Pendant Charm, Gold
description:
This Recognised Dove Popon pendant charm is a beautiful and meaningful gift. The symbol of mental health, this pendant takes the shape of a dove with a sleek polished finish.

100% of Popon profits are donated to support the powerful work of leading Mental Health charities MQ and Student Minds.

Purchase alone or add to Recognised jewellery bases to complete your meaningful piece. The chain presented in the images is not included.

name: Simplicity Misses'/Miss Petite Knit Costumes Sewing Pattern, 8866, R5
description:
Make your own fantasy costumes for your next party or cosplay event with these Simplicity sewing patterns.

Following the step-by-step instructions you can create a duo of majestic dresses.

name: French Connection Comfort Straight Leg Jeans, Mid Blue
description:
Cut straight for an on-trend silhouette, these mid rise casual trousers from French Connection make for a timeless choice in cotton-denim.

Plain for ultimate versatility, slip on with whatever takes your fancy.

name: Chelsea Peers Linen-Blend Long Sleeve Shirt, Navy
description: Wear this linen-blend overshirt unbuttoned over swim shorts for an easy beach transition. Or style it up with linen day shorts for holiday lounging.

name: Morris & Co. Chalk Matt Emulsion, Chrysanthemum, 5L
description:
Gorgeously flat and with a great depth of colour, Chalky Matt Emulsion from Morris & Co. offers the perfect heritage hue with each brushstroke.

Made with only premium ingredients that are planet-friendly, Chalky Matt's wipeable finish leaves an enduringly harmonious look. Made for the modern craftsperson with colours sourced from the Morris & Co. archive, Chalky Matt is ideal for enveloping walls and ceilings in a timeless Morris & Co. palette.

Approximate coverage 15m²

name: Radley Pocket Essentials Responsible Large Backpack, Black
description: Radley have made one big change to their Pocket Essentials collection. It’s not the namesake slip pocket. And it’s not the little metal Scottie dog either. It’s all in the fabric. Pocket Essentials is now part of the Radley Responsible range. So, this backpack is made with more eco-friendly materials, like recycled nylon and a Better Cotton lining. The same signature bag. Now a lot greener.

name: Chelsea Peers Kids' Organic Cotton Leopard Print Vest Top, Pink
description: This kids' vest top stands out for its vibrant abstract design and super-soft organic cotton fabric. It's the perfect piece for their adventures!
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Girls' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Girls' Shirts & Tops

name: Moss Tailored Fit Linen Waistcoat
description:
Lightweight and breathable, linen is an ideal choice for keeping your cool during formal events. Introduce Moss'ss indigo waistcoat to proceedings to combine the effortless lines of the tailored fit with the natural airflow of the fabric.

Perfect paired with the matching suit trousers and jacket, finish the look with a knitted tie and leather brogues.

name: King Cole Bamboo Cotton DK Knitting Yarn, 100g
description: King Cole Bamboo Cotton DK is made with some of the most sustainable plant-based fibres found anywhere. With fantastic stitch definition, Bamboo Cotton DK is available in a wide range of on-trend shades.

name: Hermès Rouge Hermès Satin Lipstick, 18 Rose Encens
description:
The Rouge Hermès collection is dedicated to lip beauty. It makes a daily ritual exquisite, oozes charm, and showcases the colour of a personality.

Rouge Hermès represents 24 shades with 10 matte and 14 satiny finishes. The choice of 24 is not insignificant, but a nod to the maison’s historic address, 24 rue Faubourg Saint-Honoré in Paris.

A radiant satin lipstick with a refined, silky texture, the promise of soft, comfortable lips.

The highly-concentrated pigments leave their mark with a single stroke. The combination of a moisturizing complex and White Mulberry extract in the heart of the formula takes care of the lips.

Designed by Pierre Hardy, the polished and brushed, lacquered metal object is protected by a canvas bag and slipped inside a small orange box. Its design creates tension between the maison’s contemporary spirit and its history told by the Ex-Libris.

Rouge Hermès is refillable. It is made from high-quality materials to ensure it lasts. Only the lipstick bullet is temporary.

name: Raging Bull Negative Bull Tee, Green Marl
description:
Make weekend dressing effortless with this round neck t-shirt from Raging Bull.

With the label's logo subtly refreshed on this tee, this timeless style will look good for years to come.

name: Lee 80s Graphic Logo T-Shirt
description:
Enhance your wardrobe essentials with this cotton crew neck t-shirt by Lee.

Perfectly rounded off with the graphic logo detailing at the front and back, style it denim.

name: Superdry Rookie Fur Parka
description:
Combining practicality with timeless style, when inclement weather hits reach for this parka by Superdry.

Crafted to a slim fit from robust fabric that will stand the test of time, it is waterproof, regular in length and fastens with an easy zip to ensure easy layering whatever you choose to wear underneath.

name: Dune Edorchie Quilted Chain Handle Shoulder Bag, Black
description:
A forever style that transcends seasons, this Edorchie quilted shoulder bag from Dune will inject an element of timeless chic into any look.

Designed with a gold chain top handle this fold-over style fastens with two press studs. Complete with an extra internal zip compartment and slots for your cards, Edorchie is the perfect plus one.

name: Aubin Foxhil Cap
description: A cool, casual addition to your accessories collection, this flat cap from Aubin is crafted from breathable and lightweight pure cotton for a look you can rock every day of the year.

name: John Lewis Aspect Single Mirrored and Illuminated Bathroom Cabinet
description:
Our Aspect bathroom cabinet has a double-sided single mirror door with ambient lighting from its underside as well as border illumination. This thin, precise lighting around its edges gives the cabinet a really sleek aesthetic.

Additional features include:

  • 3 adjustable shelves so you can arrange however you need to fit all your accessories and bathroom products
  • Demister pad which warms the area behind the glass and helps condensation evaporate, guaranteeing a perfectly clear reflection even after a steamy bath or shower
  • Infra-red sensor for touch-free operation of the light on and off
  • Integrated shaver and USB socket
  • Mould-resistant and removable 'keep clean' mat

    • Worth knowing...
    This cabinet doesn't come with wall fixings as the fixings you'll need will be dependent on the type of wall. Make sure you use the correct screws/fixings and seek professional advice if you're not sure.

    Want to see it first?
    You may want to see this cabinet in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Bathroom Accessories | Bathroom Cabinets

name: Superdry Hooded Longline Puffer Coat, Chateau Gray
description:
A staple for wintery days, this puffer coar from Superdry instantly flatters with its longline cut.

Designed for practicality with a built-in hood, it provides you with a functional yet stylish choice that'll protect you from the elements too.

name: Dune Dorchester Quilted Shoulder Bag
description:
Refresh your occasion edit with the Dorchester bag from Dune London.

Desgined with quilted detail, this box shaped clutch with front clasp features two slip compartments, keeping all your essentials securely tucked away. Finished with a twisted link chain carry strap, you can spend your evening in hands-free ease.

name: Le Feu Bio Fuel Ground High Tripod Portable Indoor / Outdoor Fireplace, Black/Smoked Oak
description:
Elegant and eco-friendly, the Ground High fireplace from Le Feu gives you warmth and ambience in your home or out on the patio with its fireplace dome on tripod legs. The modern dome is smooth and handcrafted, a statement freestanding design on its 79cm legs.

The dome uses smokeless and efficient bioethanol fuel, which is cleaner than fossil fuels and doesn't require a chimney or flue.

Once the dome has cooled, it's portable so you can use it on the tripod indoors or outdoors. Use the fireplace to extend summer evenings on the patio or indoors for extra winter warmth with all the benefits and atmosphere a real fire creates.

Good to know: Bio fuel is not included and must be purchased separately.

name: kate spade new york Cubic Zirconia Heart Stud Earrings, Gold/Clear
description: With a pretty heart shape, these stud earrings from kate spade new york add a touch of sparkle to your look. Secured with a post fitting, it is suitable for pierced ears only.

name: Burgs Paington Merino Wool Jumper
description: Styled with an easy round neckline, this jumper from Burgs is fashioned with a textured finish and is made from a soft wool-blend.

name: Geox Siron Leather Moccasins
description: These Geox Siron moccasins offer a smart-casual footwear choice. Crafted in leather, these have stitch detailing accents throughout. Completed with a classic Geox sole, these are breathable and waterproof and offer temperature control- keeping feet dry all day long.

name: Paradox London Darcy Envelope Clutch Bag, Nude
description:
Sophisticated and still practical, simply fill with your necessities and you're ready for your evening event with this clutch from Paradox London.

Crafted from a light yet durable fabric, it is easily fastened with poppers.

name: John Lewis Stripe Gift Bag, Bottle, Navy
description: A striped gift bag made using FSC certified paper.

name: This Works Sleep Plus + Pillow Spray, 50ml
description:
A naturally effective, fast-acting, vegan sleep spray with Lavender, Vetivert and Camomile essential oils to help restore normal sleep patterns.

When: Spray over your pillow, pyjamas and bed linen at bedtime or during wakefulness throughout the night to help pave the way to a good night's sleep.

How: A Superblend of Lavender, Vetivert and Camomile essential oils, encapsulated naturally within a vegan format and released during the night to create a calming environment for a less disrupted, more restful sleep.

Why: Good quality sleep helps your mind and body rest and recover so that you wake up feeling fresh and looking your best - the secret to great skin.

  • 94% felt they had a less disturbed sleep*
  • 94% felt their quality of sleep improved*
  • 93% felt more refreshed on waking*
  • 91% felt less tired during the day*

*In a 7-day user study of 100 subjects (aged 18+) with self-diagnosed sleep issues compared to a placebo.

name: CHANEL Les Beiges Healthy Glow Foundation Hydration And Longwear, B40
description:
A natural-looking foundation that infuses the skin with the radiance of a day spent in the great outdoors.

Its fine, silky texture glides over skin and forms a layer that is both invisible to the eye and imperceptible to touch, like a second skin.

Its combination of light-reflecting powders and pigments makes the skin's texture appear smoother. Imperfections are diminished. The complexion is unified, without a trace.

With its adjustable coverage and longwear formula, skin glows for 12 hours.*

The formula also protects skin from external aggressors such as pollution.

Enriched with hydrating ingredients, it delivers a sensation of immediate comfort and hydrates skin day after day.

Available in 35 shades, the LES BEIGES HEALTHY GLOW FOUNDATION HYDRATION AND LONGWEAR allows each woman to find a shade that is a perfect match.

*Clinical evaluation on 21 women.

name: Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation, 425C
description:
New formula, infused with advanced airwear technology. ultra-thin, ultra-breathable, full-coverage long-wear.

The new and improved Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation:

  • Up to 24h wear
  • Undetectable full coverage
  • With a natural matte finish
  • Adapting to every skin shade and skin concern

Experience a new level of performance:

  • Ultra thin, ultra-breathable
  • Sweat and humidity proof
  • Perfect shade match

What makes it different:

A renovated formula suitable for all skin types and skin tones from dry, sensitive, and acne-prone skin. Seamlessly covers imperfections. Concentrated with Hyaluronic Acid and 81% skincare serum it helps to protect the skin barrier against external aggressors. With up to 45 shades, 97% of people find their perfect shade*.

*Based on a consumer test with 215 people.

What else you need to know:

Ultra thin, ultra-breathable long wear, for full coverage, without drying, or creasing. SPF 35. With a smooth and easily blendable texture, that leaves the skin perfectly smooth, just a flawless natural matte finish and reduces shine.

Ingredients:

Our 81% skincare serum reformulation includes these protective ingredients:

  • Hyaluronic Acid: Hyaluronic Acid plumps and hydrates the skin, boosting moisture and smoothening fine lines for a natural result

How to use:

Discover tips for a flawless application, every time.

  • 1. Add one pump of foundation to your sponge
  • 2. Swipe over cheeks, forehead, chin and nose
  • 3. Use the sponge to blend the foundation with light dabbing movements

name: John Lewis Matlock Rug, Multi, L240 x W170cm
description:
A blend of natural grey wools in a textured flat weave style, this classic hued rug will blend seamlessly well into any Croft inspired décor.

The John Lewis Foundation: This rug has been handmade in an area of India where not all children have access to education. Through the John Lewis Foundation, which was set up to help improve the well-being of disadvantaged communities, we have worked with a local charity Care & Fair India to fund the building and running of a new school offering secondary education to teenage girls who would not otherwise have this opportunity.

John Lewis Foundation, a registered charity: 11181620.The John Lewis Foundation was established to benefit communities in the UK and overseas. Since 2007, it's supported 50 charities in 9 countries promoting education, enterprise and employment.

About your new rug

  • We recommend John Lewis & Partners Rug Hold Underlay. It prevents your rug from moving underfoot and protects against colour transfer to the floor
  • Natural fibres may shed. This will reduce over time, and shouldn’t affect your rug’s lifespan or performance
  • When vacuuming your rug, use suction only. Rotating brushes may damage the fibres
  • Blot any spills with a clean, dry cloth. Do not rub or use harsh detergents.
  • Textile backed

name: Medela Maternity & Postpartum Belly Support Band, White
description:
Support your bump and back throughout pregnancy while getting extra coverage with this comfortable support belt from Medela.

Made with reinforced panels around the back and lower tummy that provide light support and relief in these areas. Made from seamless, breathable material, the maternity belly band is comfortable to wear and feels nice and snug around your belly.
breadcrumbs: Women | Women's Lingerie & Underwear | View All Women's Lingerie & Underwear

name: Ted Baker Debrie T-Shirt
description:
Bolstering your daytime collection, this relaxed fit t-shirt by Ted Baker makes for the perfect companion to patterned accessories.

Framed with a neat crew neckline and short sleeves with dropped shoulders, it's made from soft cotton and makes for effortless daytime dressing.

name: Rainbow High Deluxe Fashion Closet Playset
description:
Rainbow High Deluxe Fashion Closet playset includes a rainbow of fashions (doll clothes and doll accessories) that you can mix & match to create 400+ glamorous looks.

Enjoy endless fashion play with 31+ fashion pieces including doll dresses, doll pants, doll skirts, doll tops, doll shoes and all the amazing doll accessories, including earrings, belts and purses, for endless mix and match fun. Style your dolls for all their fun events with the fashion-forward pieces and accessories.

After your doll chooses from her favorite fashion or accessories, she can sit at the vanity in her acrylic chair to admire her outfit in the built-in mirror! Get organized and display.

It comes with high-end, clear shoe cases to store your fabulous doll shoes or any of the other doll accessories. And use the hangers to organize all your doll clothes in the closet. Store all your favorite Rainbow High doll clothes and doll accessories in your Rainbow High Deluxe Fashion Closet. Your Fashion Closet even comes with a gold pad lock so you can lock it up for safe keeping.

The closet is portable! Close up your Fashion Closet, lock it with a padlock (push button/front medallion to unlock), grab the handle and take it with you anywhere around the house or to play at your friends.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Dolls, Doll Houses & Doll Prams

name: Small Stuff Kids' Initial Rucksack
description: They are going to love this initial rucksack from Small Stuff. Ideal for carrying all their essentials, this will become a favourite.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Girls' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Girls' Accessories

name: Venice Beach Mia Short Sleeve Gym Top, White
description:
• Ideal for yoga, gym workouts, and athleisure looks
  • Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
  • Front logo print

Workouts don't have to be hard. Not when you're wearing something like Mia here anyway. Keeping you cool, sweat-free and focused throughout, it's the kind of top that you wear, wash, and workout in again and again, without a moment's hesitation.

name: HotSquash Floral Lace V-Neck Dress, Mustard
description: In stunning floral lace, HotSquash's fit and flare dress will stylishly take you through this season and beyond. Offering elegant pieces that are comfortable and easy-to-care-for, it's made from crease-resistant, stretch fabric this knee-length design is perfect for bridesmaids, parties and holidays.

name: Brora Cashmere Fair Isle V-Neck Cardigan
description: Easy to layer with its open neckline, this cardigan by Brora is printed with timeless Fair Isle pattern and is elegantly cosy with its super light cashmere fabrication.

name: Rodial Retinol Drops 10% Retinol Complex Facial Treatment, 30ml
description:
10% Retinol Complex is a potent, skin rejuvenating active that delivers proven anti-ageing results.

It boosts skin rejuvenation, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and age spots, evens skin tone and minimises the look of pores.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: Phase Eight Teigan Popper Front Jersey Shirt, Black/Ivory
description:
Making an impression, this shirt by Phase Eight makes an impact with its abstract print.

Framed with a collared neck and long sleeves, it is made with durable fabric for longevity of wear and is sure to act as the cornerstone of your everyday looks.

name: adidas Duramo SL 2.0 Men's Running Shoes
description:
• Lightmotion midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
  • Mesh upper allows the foot to flex naturally
  • Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content

From a morning gym session to a day of errands to an evening with friends, keep your feet comfortable and your style on point in these adidas shoes. Pair them with your favourite running shorts for the ultimate athletic-casual vibe. A mesh upper helps you stay cool, while superlight cushioning cradles every step you take.

name: Hunter Original Tall Wellington Boots, Navy
description:
Your go-to for drizzly days, this pair of wellington boots from Hunter offers a practical choice thanks to its robust rubber composition.

Set on a flat heel, they are shaped with a round toe for everyday appeal.

Heel height: 3cm

name: Cricut EasyPress Mini, Zen
description:
Unusual objects and improbable projects are no longer a challenge with the Cricut EasyPress Mini.

This mini iron makes professional heat-transfer results possible for even your most shapely objects and projects, including baby shoes, hats, stuffed animals, and more.

Its thoughtful, compact design makes it effortless to curve with contours, get between buttons, and squeeze into seams.

Contents:

  • Cricut EasyPress Mini
  • Safety base

name: Cath Kidston Strawberry Garden Cushion, Red / Multi
description:
Lovingly embroidered, the strawberries and roses featured on this lovely cushion have all been inspired by archive Cath Kidston prints.

Presented on cotton and beautifully finished with a bound scalloped edge featuring a pop of red colour - flip over for a hidden detail to remind you that home is where the heart is.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Cushions & Bean Bags | Cushions

name: John Lewis Tortona LHF Chaise End Leather Sofa, Dark Leg
description:
With its clean lines, the Tortona range pays tribute to timeless Italian sofa design. The extra-deep, feather and foam filled cushions are perfect for sinking into.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Sofas & Armchairs | Sofas & Sofa Beds

name: Lyle & Scott Plain Shorts, Olive
description:
In a blank canvas design that's perfect for mixing and matching, these shorts from Lyle & Scott are made from robust fabric that'll last year after year.

In a casual cut that calls to sun-soaked afternoons spent with friends, slip on with cotton tees and your favourite kicks to complete the look.

name: KAFFE Fenia Astrid Cardigan, Java
description: A handy layering piece for when the temperature cools, this cardigan from KAFFE is made with smooth, blended fabric for light and comfortable wear.

name: Libertine-Libertine Crown Crew Neck Wool Jumper
description: Shaped at the neck by a classic crew framing, this jumper from Libertine-Libertine is finished in a textured handle for a tactile edge and is made from pure wool for a premium feel.

name: French Connection Armina Organic Cotton Blouse, Red
description:
An essential addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from French Connection makes for the perfect companion to patterned accessories.

Cut with a classic v-neck and short sleeves, it's made from soft and breathable cotton and pairs well with tailored trousers and courts for a killer office ensemble.

name: Monsoon Kids' Boutique Cotton Floral Embroidered Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Ivory
description: They'll love this floral embroidered top, featuring a delicate frill trim and made from pure cotton so it's soft and breathable on the skin. Perfect for smart occasions or jeans for weekend adventures..
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Girls' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Girls' Shirts & Tops

name: Passenger West Coast Jacquard Bobble Hat
description:
The West Coast bobble hat tops off any look perfectly. Made in Recycled materials with a vintage inspired jacquard pattern and contrast bobble and rib.

Made using recycled materials, helping us to reduce our impact on the planet.

name: Belly Button Designs Stripe Gift Bag
description:
A printed and foil stamped gift bag by Belly Button Designs.

By choosing this product you are supporting responsible management of the world's forests. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC®) is a global, not-for-profit organisation that helps take care of forests and the people and wildlife that call them home. To learn more, visit www.fsc.org.

name: Citizen Women's Silhouette Crystal Eco-Drive Bracelet Strap Watch, Gold/Silver Em0844-58d
description: The Citizen women's Silhouette Crystal timepiece is an elegant choice for day-to-evening wear. The sleek stainless steel watch is accentuated with a series of sparkling inset crystals throughout the bracelet strap, on the bezel and as hour markers on the mother-of-pearl face. Water resistant up to 50 metres and powered by Citizen Eco-Drive technology, it is as practical as it is pretty.

name: French Connection Rhodes Short Sleeve Shirt Dress
description: In a smart, shirt style, this knee length dress from French Connection is whisked up from the breeziest of fabrics. Confidently cut with a collar and short sleeves, it is kept minimal for a truly seasonal collection.

name: Simply Sleep Opulent Velvet Quilted Bedspread
description: Add luxury to your bed with this opulent velvet bedspread. Textured and softly gathered on the top, the filling is made from lightweight polyester.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Bedding | Throws, Blankets & Bedspreads

name: Givenchy Rose Perfecto Liquid Lip Balm, Rouge Grainé
description:
The first marbled couture liquid lip balm>

The enveloping marbled texture of Rose Perfecto Liquid Lip Balm swathes lips in moisturiser-infused colour. With 97% skincare ingredients**, its hydrating and comfortable formula is enriched with hyaluronic acid, Vitamin C, shea butter, and pink pepper for a nourishing, smoothing, and plumping effect. Day after day, lips are soothed, moisturised, and radiantly healthy.

Hydrate, plump and nourish: Lips are instantly beautified thanks to the immediate plumping effect and ultra-caring creamy texture. Swathed in 24-hour hydration*, the lips are nourished and smoothed.

Iconic marbled shades: The new marbled moisturiser formula is infused in colour and care to tint the lips with a couture range of fresh shades. The light coverage brings a healthy glossy finish. Iconic shades Pink Irresistible and Black Pink adapt to the pH of the lips to create a unique, made-to-measure finish.

*Instrumental test on 11 volunteers. **Minimum percentage of the liquid balm base in order to hydrate before adding colouring ingredients.

This new marbled formula is encased in an innovative vegan cactus-based case developed thanks to a unique partnership between Givenchy Parfums & the Mexican start-up Desserto®. Rose Perfecto Liquid is also the first Givenchy liquid balm made with a glass bottle.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | Lip Care

name: Brakeburn Not Everyday Denim Jacket, Blue
description:
A forever favourite, this denim jacket from Brakeburn falls to a regular length.

Framed with a collar neckline, it is made from a comfortable cotton blend.

name: Longchamp 3D Leather Belt, One Size
description: Inspired by Longchamp's equestrian heritage, this belt features an elegant stirrup buckle. Its washed calf leather signature of the Longchamp 3D line reveals the Maison's know-how. Here in a width of 40mm, its casual look brings authenticity to the outfit

name: Seafolly Sea Dive Hipster Bikini Bottoms, Fuchsia
description:
Seafolly's Sea Dive bikini bottoms are in a low rise hipster style and provide medium coverage across the front and back. Made from a nylon-elastane mix they have soft edges for comfort so there's no excuse for not getting involved in that game of beach volleyball.

Pair with one of the matching bikini tops.

name: Cyberjammies Katherine Spot Print Dressing Gown, Magenta
description: Printed spots are a timeless nightwear look and Cyberjammies have given theirs a unique touch by using a herringbone fabric as a base in the Katherine dressing gown. Made from super-soft viscose, the dressing gown is trimmed with delicate lace. In a wrap-front, kimono style, the dressing gown fastens at the front with a self-fabric belt and has two side pockets.

name: Stokke Tripp Trapp Highchair Tray, Grey
description:
The Tripp Trapp® chair from Stokke is designed to fit right into your table, bringing your baby into the heart of your family. However, for certain occasions a tray that fits on the chair with Tripp Trapp® baby set can be a valuable accessory. Turn your Tripp Trapp® into a stand-alone high chair with the Stokke® tray. Perfect for quick feedings or crowded tables, the Scandinavian-designed Stokke® tray's clean lines compliment the Tripp Trapp® for a unique, stunning seat.

Suitable for 6 months to 3 years.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Feeding | View all Weaning

name: Benefit Boi-ing Cakeless Liquid Concealer, Shade 9
description:
This multitasking full coverage liquid concealer hides it all, from dark undereye circles to blemishes and discolouration....yet it feels lightweight and doesn’t cake or crack. The Cushion Tip applies smoothly and blends seamlessly for long-wearing, waterproof** coverage.

  • 24-hour long wear*
  • Waterproof**
  • 97% said it looks smooth***
  • 94% said it doesn’t look cakey***
  • 95% said it conceals dark undereye circles***

*Instrumental test on 20 women.**Instrumental test on 22 women. ***Self-evaluation by 109 women after 1 week.

name: Lace & Beads Diva Tiered Hem Maxi Dress, Sage
description:
Making a dramatic entrance at your next event, this tiered maxi dress by Lace & Beads is a muted, yet chic addition to your repertoire.

Framed with a round neckline and sheer cap sleeves, it pairs up with heels for your evening out.

name: Ghost Olivia Satin Maxi Dress, Dusty Green
description:
In a feminine style with its empire line shape, this floor-skimming maxi dress by Ghost is designed with a flattering gathered bust detail.

Topped with a boat neckline and cap sleeves, it is cut from a soft satin blend to give it a luxurious feel and can be paired with your favourite heels to wear for any occasion.

name: Orla Kiely Flower Print Kitchen Storage Tins, Set of 3, Assorted
description: Celebrating playful print and pattern, this set of three kitchen storage canisters have retro floral designs. The colourful set includes three different sized tins with lids.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Home Storage | Kitchen Storage

name: Trotters Confiture Baby Anna Petal Collar Jersey Dress, Navy
description:
Made from a super soft jersey, this smart dress has a lovely drape giving a wonderful shape as you move and twirl.

Featuring a pretty petal collar in contrasting white cotton and navy velvet bow, this dress is the perfect combination of comfort and elegance.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Baby & Toddlerwear (0-3 yrs) | Baby & Toddler Dresses & Skirts

name: Eclectica Vintage Textured Domed Clip-On Earrings, Dated Circa 1980s, Matte Black
description:
Designed in a large domed shape with a slightly textured enamel finish, these earrings are a great style to add a little 'je ne sais quoi' to your look. Secured with clip-on fastenings that can be worn by anyone, these earrings are thought to have been made circa the 1980s.

Please note, this is a limited production piece of vintage jewellery.

Avoid contact with liquids and other beauty products.

Please note that vintage jewellery was produced prior to the introduction of the 2002 law prohibiting the use of nickel or nickel compounds. Customers allergic to these metals may experience skin rashes or irritation where the metal is in contact with the skin.

name: BY TERRY Brightening CC Serum, Apricot Glow
description:
As a true Colour-Control serum, this radiance-enhancing care diffuses its brightening, moisturising and corrective skincare properties into the heart of the epidermis. The rejuvenating formula, enriched in White Roses Native Cells and combined with a cell renewing Brightening Agent and anti-free radical Vitamin E, boosts radiant luminosity and lastingly protects the skin.

Rare Light-Reflecting Prisms associated with Soft-Focus Micro-Spheres blurs imperfections, smoothes features and fills in the microsurface. Its fluid and smooth stretch texture perfectly blends into all skin tones.

Apply Cellularose Brightening CC Serum if your complexion is uneven or has blemishes.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: Ion8 Insulated Steel Leak-Proof Drinks Bottle, 920ml, Black
description:
Vacuum-insulated and leak-proof, this large drinks bottle from Ion8 fits wider or adjustable cup holders, external adult rucksack mesh pockets and standard bike bottle cages. When closed, the spout and vent are completely sealed to prevent leaks. The bottle keeps hot drinks hot and cold drinks icy cold and fresh for hours.

The OneTouch lid opens hands-free with just one finger and locks closed for peace of mind when throwing into your bag. OneTouch bottles have an air vent and the spout is at the side of the lid rather than the centre, so you only require only minimal tilt for easy hydration. The drinking spout is clean and hygienic, with a cover to keep germs and dirt out, and the design ensures a smooth liquid flow, effortlessly.

Use the built-in ring handle to carry it with you or hang it on a coat hook or rucksack carabiner.

Made from vacuum-insulated stainless steel and coated in a durable scratch-resistant powder paint, this refillable and durable drinks bottle is food-safe, odour-resistant, easy to wash by hand or in the dishwasher, and keeps drinks fresh and full of flavour.

Designed with two openings at either side in order to slot easily into the back of your divan base, our Grace full depth headboard has a simple, gently curved shape. Enhanced with button detailing, its well-padded filling ensure it's a functional and comfortable addition to your bed.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

name: KETTLER Freestanding Parasol & Base with LED Lights & Wireless Speakers, 4 x 3m, Grey/Stone
description:
A premium and extremely large KETTLER parasol, this design has a 4-metre by 3-metre rectangular non-crease canopy with spring-loaded spokes for a tighter fit. It includes LED lights and a wireless speaker.

It's easy to operate by the wind-up mechanism and has vertical and horizontal tilt adjustment for selecting the right angle of protection from the sun. It's made with a durable aluminium frame and a shower-resistant canopy offering UV50+ sun protection.

With 360-degree free-arm rotation, the base doesn't need to be moved when raising and lowering the parasol. When not in use or in windy weather we recommend you close the parasol down. It comes with a weatherproof night cover.

Fill the four-part base with sand and water to weigh it down in your chosen location in the garden. Make sure that you're happy with your parasol's location before filling the base.

Key features:

  • Wind-up mechanism to open the canopy
  • Vertical and horizontal tilt adjustment
  • LED lights and wireless speaker
  • UV50+ sun protection and shower-resistant polyester canopy
  • Aluminium pole
  • Parasol base included
  • Weatherproof night cover included

Good to know: The parasol is designed for sun shade protection only. In windy weather, take down the parasol and store safely.

name: Ted Baker Diveena Knit Bodice Mini Shift Dress, Black/Multi
description: With clean, simple lines, this thigh-grazing dress from Ted Baker is knitted from a blend of fabrics. Featuring a round neckline, this style has a subtle textured effect for an elevated touch.

name: John Lewis + Swoon Roche Stoneware Cereal Bowl, 16cm
description:
Designed by Swoon, made by us. With a shared commitment to exceptional design and quality, we've collaborated to create an exclusive collection for the modern home.

The Roche range has been designed with contemporary everyday living in mind. Made of durable stoneware and glazed with a well-considered colour pallet, the range has a subtle embossed texture. This cereal bowl is microwave and dishwasher safe for everyday use.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: John Lewis Belgrave Leather Armchair, Dark Leg, Contempo Black
description:
The Belgrave range has a contemporary tailored appearance, with modern proportions. The deep foam and feather seat offers an inviting and supportive sit.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Mulberry Alphabet Leather Colourblock Keyring
description:
Spell out your personal style with these Alphabet keyring charms from Mulberry. Made from coloured leather, the charms add a playful touch to your look.

Caring for your Mulberry product

To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

name: British Boxers Tartan Brushed Cotton Nightshirt, Bordeaux
description: The British Boxers nightshirt is made from the softest brushed two-fold cotton flannel in the brand's classic tartan. It's the perfect garment for lounging all year round. The fabric is woven with care to the in-house design and the fibres are brushed repeatedly to feel wonderfully luxurious against the skin. It's the brushing process that creates the ultimate in soft cotton flannel.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Éclat Le Teint Foundation SPF 22, BR20
description:
YSL’s bestselling foundation, Touche Éclat Le Teint is a medium, breathable coverage foundation infused with the illuminating light of Touche Éclat for a natural healthy glow.

Touche Éclat Le Teint Foundation offers up to 24-hour breathable coverage for a truly weightless feel, and 24-hour hydration for a long-lasting, flawless finish. The buildable coverage formula allows you to layer the product to move from medium to full coverage if you wish to do so. Touche Éclat Le Teint Foundation includes SPF 22 for everyday skin protection.

Now in a new, covetable glass bottle with gold details.

  • Up to 24hr comfortable wear
  • Up to 24hr breathable coverage

  • Natural healthy glow

  • Weightless feel on skin

  • BD or 'BEIGE DORÉ' is best for warm undertones

description:
Thanks to its flat, straight shape, the Eyeliner Brush lets you highlight the lash line with an eyeshadow, intensify your make-up, line the eyes, define or blend a crayon line. Its straight and synthetic, incomparably soft bristles were specifically designed and selected to apply colour very precisely.

For the development of these brushes, Sisley has worked with Raphaël, French master brushmaker since 1793, to offer makeup accessories that bring out the very best of our formulas.

Bonus: the brush's function is written on the handle. No chance of using the wrong one!

#beyourownmakeupartist
