name: Apple Watch Series 8 GPS + Cellular, 41mm, Stainless Steel, Regular, Silver
description:
Apple Watch Series 8, your handy health companion, is even more powerful. As well as all the great Apple Watch wellbeing features, Apple have added temperature sensing for deeper insights, and Crash Detection should you ever need help in an emergency*. Sleep stages let you understand your sleep even better, and you can stay fit in new ways with the enhanced Workout app. It automatically detects when you start a work-out, and can monitor blood oxygen, heart rate, sleep, and more, to guide you towards the healthiest you.

Always-On Retina display …take it all in
It features a big, bright, Always‑On display. Narrow borders push the screen right to the edge, resulting in an elegant integration with the curvature of the case. It makes detailed watch faces look stunning and easy to read, even when your wrist is down. The larger display makes tapping, typing and swiping a snap.

Temperature sensing
It has an innovative sensor that tracks your temperature while you sleep, so you can see changes over time. Cycle Tracking uses this data to provide a retrospective estimate of when you likely ovulated. When combined with your heart rate and logged cycle data, you’ll get a detailed view of your menstrual cycle.

Sleep insights
The Sleep app doesn’t just keep track of your time asleep. It shows you how much time you spent in REM, Core or Deep sleep, as well as when you might have woken up.

Crash detection
We hope you’ll never need this innovation. Apple Watch Series 8 is able to detect if you’re in a severe car crash. When a crash is detected, Crash Detection can automatically connect you with emergency services, provide dispatchers with your location and notify your emergency contacts.*

Blood oxygen
Apple Watch Series 8's blood oxygen sensor incorporates LEDs and photodiodes in the back crystal. You can easily take readings of your blood oxygen, or let the watch capture background readings, day and night, to provide this key indicator of your overall wellness.

Workout
Squat, spin, stride, you name it…Apple Watch has a workout for it in the enhanced Workout app. And with Workout Views, you’ll be able to see more advanced metrics at a glance, like Heart Rate Zones and customised intervals to keep you going strong.

Durable
It’s incredibly durable. A thick front crystal, robust geometry, and a flat base make it resistant to cracking, and it’s IP6X dust resistant too.

Dive in
It’s swimproof with WR50 water resistance, down to a depth of 50 metres.

Tap and pay
Just hold the Watch to the checkout reader to make payments via your credit or debit card. No matter how you use it, Apple Pay keeps your financial information completely private and secure.

Great GPS
The handy, built-in GPS measures your workout accurately, so whether you're going for a swim, run or a ride, you can leave your iPhone at home. Distance, speed and pace are all precisely recorded for you, ready for when you get back home to review your route on your iPhone. Additionally, your Apple Watch Series 8 comes with an always-on barometric altimeter, so your wrist-based coach can continuously track your elevation changes in real time.

Super cellular
You can still stay in the loop, even when you're away from your iPhone, thanks to your Apple Watch Series 8's cellular feature. With the Apple Watch Series 8, you can make calls or send text directly from your wrist. (Please note: a cellular service is required for this feature to operate.)

Get world-class workouts with Apple Fitness+
Choose from a catalogue of workouts and meditations led by expert trainers and see in-session metrics from your Apple Watch, like heart rate and calories burned onscreen. There are over 30 new workouts and meditations added each week, so if it's HIIT, Pilates, Strength, or Yoga - no matter your focus, there's a programme fit for you (subscription required, click here for more details).

Apple Fitness+ requires an Apple Watch Series 3 or later. Available when paired with iPhone 6s or later with iOS 14.3 or later.

*Emergency SOS requires a cellular connection or Wi-Fi Calling with an internet connection from your Apple Watch or nearby iPhone.


What's the difference between Bluetooth and cellular?

Bluetooth connectivity
Some smart watches with Bluetooth can let you send and receive text messages, answer telephone calls and receive notifications when it's connected to your (compatible) phone via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi.

Bluetooth + cellular
Smart watches with built-in cellular offer the freedom to send and receive text messages, answer phone calls and even receive notifications when you don't have your phone with you.

Cellular carrier support
Connecting your cellular enabled smart watch to a cellular network requires the same carrier as your (compatible) phone.


Please be aware: Blood Oxygen app measurements are not intended for medical use, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only designed for general fitness and wellness purposes.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.

We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.

description:

Dive under the waves with Disney's Ariel and visit her home! Listen to Sebastian play in the music area as you dance on the octopus spinner with Flounder and Arista. We've added leather upholstery for comfort, but this also gives the chair a tactile contrast and an artisan finish. When today's world places emphasis on flexible living, this chair really comes into its own. It's so versatile that you can style it around the house, from dining room to living room. Take your pick.

A classic design with a contemporary twist, Otley has solid oak turned wooden legs, low curving arms and a supportive seat platform. It's also 100% foam-free, making it a more environmentally-friendly choice.

Designed to be kinder to the environment
We've used fibres made from recycled materials rather than foam to fill the seats and cushions on our Otley range. By using a foam alternative it means you can recycle this piece of furniture once it reaches the end of its life and avoid landfill. And the benefits of fibre-filled cushions don't stop there as they create a more casual look and a softer sit, perfect for curling up on.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

name: Denby White Speckle Stoneware Medium Coupe Plates, Set of 4, 21cm, White
description:
Denby White Speckle is a combination of simplicity and beauty with a soft textured glaze combined with Denby's much-loved shapes creating a collection that's both practical and stylish.

This set of four medium coupe plates are dishwasher, microwave and freezer safe, as well as oven safe to 250°C, making them suitable for informal dining and entertaining every day as well as for special occasions.

Made at the Denby Pottery in Derbyshire, England, using locally sourced clay, each piece of Denby stoneware is handcrafted using pottery skills passed down through generations and can pass through as many as 20 pairs of hands. Every item of pottery is expertly glazed by skilled craftsmen and the distinctive glazes are renowned for their practicality, durability and chip resistance.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: little home at John Lewis Christmas Woodland Penguin Stripe Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set, Multi
description:
Bring the festive season to life with this wonderful Christmas Woodland duvet and pillowcase set from our little home collection. Crafted from pure cotton for a breathable feel that won't irritate sensitive skin, it has a 144 thread count to ensure they stay comfortable at all times.

With wonderful wintery scenes on the front and classic candy stripes on the back, it brings a whimsical touch to an otherwise practical piece. It comes packed in a matching printed reversible bag.

Good to know: The single set comes with one standard pillowcase and the double set comes with two standard pillowcases.

To fit duvet/pillow size (cm)

  • Standard pillowcase, L75 x W50cm
  • Cotbed duvet cover, L140 x W120cm
  • Single duvet cover, L200 x W135cm
  • Double duvet cover, L200 x W200cm

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.
This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton.
bettercotton.org/massbalance

name: Professor Puzzle Escape from the Grand Hotel Game
description:
Owned by the wealthy but mysterious Blossom family, this once magnificent hotel was in danger of being closed for good until the sudden return of the Blossom son, Kurt and his beautiful wife, Lauren. They want to restore the hotel to its former glory but nothing is quite what it seems!

When their glamorous, rich and influential guests arrive for the grand re-opening, they’re ready for a night to remember – little do they suspect it will be for all the wrong reasons! Invite your guests, set your scene and get ready to host a night of fun and intrigue. Each guest can come dressed as one of the eight characters, ready to play their role. During the evening, they must travel through the hotel solving the series of mysterious puzzles that release them from each room. The ultimate quest? To uncover the dark, hidden secret of The Grand Hotel.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Games & Puzzles | View All Games & Puzzles

name: KitchenAid 175 Artisan 4.8L Stand Mixer, Black
description:
Channel your inner baker and whip up a feast fit for royalty with this revamp of a timeless classic, the 175 Artisan Stand Mixer by KitchenAid . From cakes and tray bakes, to pizza, pasta, dips and sauces, you'll be well on your way to a baking champion with this new edition to your kitchen.

A piece of iconic design, the KitchenAid 175 Artisan stand mixer will be a stylish addition to your kitchen. It's sturdy design and powerful motor combined with high-quality craftsmanship make this the ultimate cooking companion. Full metal construction adds to the high-gloss look of this appliance, while ensuring a stable and robust mixer. Choose from a range of appealing colours to perfectly match your kitchen.

The KitchenAid 175 Artisan stand mixer comes with a wide range of culinary tools that will help you bake and create an array of treats for your family and friends.

4.83L Artisan® Bowl
A large bowl is crucial for most baking recipes, it makes working with the ingredients easier and causes less mess. Made from easy to clean stainless steel for a sleek finish, with an ergonomic handle to make baking easier and more enjoyable.

Pouring shield
Not only does this clever shield let you add ingredients to your bowl while mixing, it also prevents splashing. Made out of robust and transparent Lexan, it also gives you full view of your ingredients as you work.

Wire whisk
Made from stainless steel with an aluminium head, this 6 wire whisk is perfect for gently folding air into eggs and egg whites, whipping light, fluffy cream or making dips and sauces.

Dough hook
Let the dough hook do all of the hard work for you when mixing and kneading the perfect yeast dough for bread, pizza and pasta. This piece is made from aluminium with a robust non-stick nylon coating, which makes it easier to work with. It is also dishwasher-safe to make cleaning easy and efficient.

Flex edge beater
Used for normal to heavy mixtures such as cakes, frostings, cookies and mashed potatoes. The flexible edge design guarantees faster mixing, without stopping the motor and using a spatula. Coated metal with silicone side. Dishwasher-safe.

Artisan® Flat Beater
An ideal tool for cake mixtures and frostings, or even mashed potatoes for your Sunday roast. Made from aluminium with a robust non-stock nylon coating so mixtures don't stick. It can also be put in the dishwasher for easy and hygienic cleaning.

The distinctive ‘planetary’ motion of this model ensures thorough and swift mixing, and the useful tilt-up head design makes light work of larger batches too. With a powerful 10 speed motor there is plenty of range to suit whatever food you are preparing. And for even more versatility, the power hub fits other optional attachments from food grinders to pasta makers and more.
breadcrumbs: Electricals | Food Processors, Mixers & Blenders | Food Mixers

name: Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk Foundation, 4.5
description:
Discover Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk Foundation, a lightweight, medium buildable coverage fluid foundation that creates a perfect natural-looking glowy skin, available in 40 shades.

This multi-award-winning foundation** gives you a healthy born-like-this glow while blurring the look of imperfections for a flawless skin finish.

Infused with glycerin, the formula provides all-day hydration, ensuring your skin stays looking nourished and radiant. The foundation has a delicate, lightweight texture that feels like silk. It is blendable and melts into your skin upon application. It gives you coverage that lasts all day and good wear even after an intense, active day.

With an extensive range of 40 shades, Luminous Silk Foundation is suitable for all skin types. Achieve a radiant finish by applying the foundation with a brush and build your desired coverage. For an all-over-enhanced glow, mix it with Fluid Sheer liquid highlighter to illuminate or create a warm glow.

**We’re honoured that Luminous Silk is an award-winning foundation:

  • Tatler 'Tatler Beauty Awards' 2023 Best Foundation
  • Daily Mail ‘Inspire Beauty Awards’ 2022 Best Foundation
  • Selfridges ‘Selfridges Beauty Awards’ 2021 Best Base Product
  • Beauty Bible ‘Beauty Bible Awards’ 2020 Best Liquid Foundation Bronze Award
  • Daily Mail ‘Inspire Beauty Awards’ 2019 Best Foundation
  • Hi Magazine ‘Hi Style Best Beauty Buys’ 2018 & 2019 Best Bridal Foundation

name: Panache Tango Balconette Bra, Blush
description:
Another best seller from Panache, the Tango Balconette bra is a popular choice for sculpting and lifting.

Made from an opaque mesh, the bra is crafted with a three-part cup that lifts and offers coverage over the bust. Wide wires separate the bust in the centre to give a flattering silhouette, while the Austrian designed leaf embroidery adds subtle detail.

name: Superdry Long Smocked Dress, Bandana Multi
description:
Flaring out at the hem for a feminine silhouette, this shirred maxi dress by Superdry draws the eye with an abstract animal print.

With a traditional round neckline and long sleeves, this piece is always ready for the dancefloor.

name: Mulberry Women's Freya Cat's Eye Sunglasses, Nude
description: Inspired by classic cat-eye frames, Mulberry's Freya sunglasses are a modern take on a feminine style, with an exaggerated yet elegant silhouette that would suit any face and are finished with Mulberry branding at the temples. Comes with a box, case and lens cleaning cloth. Store in case when not worn and clean regularly for longevity.

description:
These earrings are part of the Dextera family from Swarovski, designed by Creative Director Giovanna Engelbert for Collection II.

Celebrating Swarovski's sophisticated pavé technique, these intricately detailed yet boldly constructed, medium, hoop earrings make a modern statement. Delicate crystals embedded in rhodium-plated settings highlight an industrial-inspired design that you can wear alone, or stacked on the ear with other pieces from the Dextera family.

With a post fitting, the earrings are for pierced ears only.

name: Aab Pleated Origami Midi Dress, Nude
description: Made from fluid fabric, this Origami midi dress from Aab features a front pleat placket and pointed collar. Cut in an A-line silhouette, it features cuffed sleeves and handy pockets.

name: Dolce & Gabbana DG4383 Women's Butterfly Sunglasses, Black/Grey Gradient
description: With a feminine butterfly shape, these Dolce & Gabbana sunglasses are a great choice if you want a statement look different to cat's eye designs. The polyamide lenses are impact-resistant and lightweight for comfortable wear, repelling water and dust for higher clarity.

name: Woodmansterne Birthday Blooms 60th Birthday Card
description:
A greetings card from Woodmansterne to send happy birthday wishes.

With a message inside that reads Wishing you a wonderful day, this card comes with a white envelope.

This card is FSC certified meaning you can be assured the material used has come from a forest approved by the Forest Stewardship Council, an international non-profit organisation dedicated to promoting responsible forestry.

Sourced and made in the United Kingdom.

All the cards we sell are made without using glitter and are recyclable.

description:

  • Bath towel, L130 x W70cm

name: John Lewis Draper Motion Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa with Footrest Mechanism, Dark Leg, Contempo Black
description:
Stylish and functional, the Draper range is thoughtfully designed with tailored arms and slender legs. The modern proportions of the button detail seat and back cushions offer a deep and supportive sit. This is our Motion version which includes a footrest, so you can really kick back and relax with your feet up.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

description: Cut to a regular fit for a little more room to move, Moss' Performance waistcoat packs plenty of properties into its clean lines. name: Vispring Premier Divan Base, Double, FSC-Certified (Spruce)
description:
A sprung, supportive and durable foundation for your mattress, the Premier divan base from Vispring is made from high-quality FSC-certified materials. Handmade in the UK and traditionally glued and screwed, the upholstered base features a hand-nested pocket spring system that’s encased with temperature-regulating, natural fillings.

Pocket springs and natural fillings
Insulating wool and breathable cotton ensure good ventilation, while the pocket springs are produced in an edge-to-edge format that maintains the structure of the base and helps to keep your body weight evenly distributed.

FSC-Certified
Made from slow-grown Scandinavian softwood and hardwood, all timber used in this base has accreditation from the Forest Stewardship Council. The production process is monitored and all materials used can be traced to ensure responsible manufacturing.

Shepherd castors
Sturdy and smooth-running castors ensure this divan base is easy to move around your bedroom. The castor height is 7cm.

Vispring’s 30 year guarantee
To register your guarantee, please click here

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Returns policy:

If you've changed your mind about keeping your purchase, please return it in its original condition with proof of purchase and we'll exchange or refund it. Unless faulty, this should be within 35 days of receiving your order. By original condition, we'd expect this to mean that the red Kimble attachment and all labelling is still on the product, and that the item is undamaged and unused.

name: Polarn O. Pyret Kids' Plain Waterproof Gloves
description: Wind and waterproof gloves with a breathable membrane and cosy Primaloft Gold ECO padding to keep hand warm. name: Giorgio Armani Code For Women Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description:
Simple yet sensual, comforting yet captivating, a spellbinding fragrance evoking the same elegance as a Giorgio Armani red-carpet dress. Armani Code is the signature fragrance for women by Giorgio Armani.

Orange Blossom is the Muse of this creation: a miracle of the nature, the quintessence of femininity. A unique creation reveals this flower's full magic and operates its metamorphosis by the fresh heart of orange blossom and an evocative and sensual base of vanilla and honey.

  • Top notes: Bitter orange, Italian orange, jasmine
  • Heart notes: Ginger, jasmine, orange blossom

description:
Cut with a straight leg and fitted with traditional details, refresh your edit with this pair of jeans by AllSaints.

Less Laundering
It’s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible.

name: DIOR Rouge Blush Couture Colour
description:
What it is: An ultra-pigmented, long-wear blush for intense cheek colour.

What it does;

1. Product category: Rouge Blush is our only blush that gives cheeks intense and ultra-pigmented colour guaranteed to last. The range of iconic Rouge Blush shades is inspired by the legendary Rouge DIOR lipstick. Colour intensity can be adjusted for a softer or bolder finish to suit your desires. Rouge Blush is available in a variety of finishes, from matte or iridescent to satiny.

2. Benefits: The intense colour of Rouge Blush reveals a genuine femme fatale with cheeks highlighted with irresistible and long-lasting colour for a radiant, healthy glow.

3. Texture: Its ultra-pigmented formula gives Rouge Blush intense, buildable colour on the cheeks. The texture blends seamlessly onto the skin for flawless, all-day wear.

4. Shades and finish: Inspired by the iconic DIOR lipstick Rouge DIOR, Rouge Blush gives full expression to bold femininity with warm and ombré shades. The palette of colours extends from the softest pink to the deepest plum, not to mention vibrant coral and delicate nude.

Rouge Blush is available in matte, satiny or iridescent finishes.

A slipper that travels well outdoors, the Tasman features the same light, durable outsole as the UGG Classic boot. Lined with plush wool, it's crafted from suede with an easy slip-on silhouette, so you can run out the door for weekend plans or to work.

Braiding on the collar provides an authentic finish and looks great paired with boyfriend jeans and a knit sweater.

This product was made in a factory that supports women in our supply chain with the help of HERproject, a collaborative initiative that creates partnerships with brands like ours to empower and educate women in the workplace.

name: Superdry Organic Cotton Long Sleeve Pocket Top

An all-year essential, this jersey top by Superdry is plain for easy mixing and matching.

With a flattering v-neckline and long sleeves, it is made from soft and breathable organic cotton and will slot seamlessly into your everyday wardrobe.

name: Phase Eight Jean Floral Wrap Midi Dress, Powder Blue/Pink
description:
Wrapping over at the front for a shapely silhouette, this midi dress by Phase Eight is doused in pretty florals.

Accentuating the figure with a wrap over front and long blouson sleeves, this piece has you covered when the temperature starts to heat up.

name: Dower & Hall Men's Pebble Charm Pendant Necklace, Silver
description: With a large pebble charm suspended beautifully on a simple trace chain, this pendant necklace from Dower & Hall has a wonderfully organic feel that will elevate your look.

name: DIOR Addict Shine Refillable Lipstick, 418 Beige Oblique
description:
Discover DIOR Addict, the shine lipstick by DIOR. Designed like a genuine couture piece, the new case is adorned with a couture lid.

Made with 90%* natural-origin ingredients, the DIOR Addict enhances your lips with 6h** of intense, ultra-glossy colour. Its formula is infused with jasmine wax and vegetable-based oils which hydrates lips for 24h*** and enhances them in bright, luminous shades.

Now refillable, DIOR Addict lipstick is part of the eco-design initiative of the House of DIOR.

*Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. **Clinical test on 25 subjects. ***Instrumental test on 10 subjects.

name: Superdry Stacked Logo Print Loose Hoodie
description: A weekend must-have, this jumper from Superdry is patterned with a logo print and makes everyday layering simple with its cotton construction.

name: Original BTC Hector Medium Dome Floor Lamp, White/Satin
description:
Marrying style and function, the Hector Dome floor lamp is one of Original BTC's British design classics. The shade is made from translucent bone china that's supported by a metal frame finished in either satin or brushed brass. It's easy to move the shade to provide a direct wash of warm light exactly where you need it. A great reading lamp with a hint of art-Deco about its design, it's well-placed next to your armchair or sofa.

More about the design process
The bone china used on this wall light has been manufactured by a highly-skilled team in a ceramic factory in Stoke-on-Trent. It has been biscuit fired or dipped in a glaze and gloss-fired to create the natural white finish.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Shop Lighting | Floor Lamps

name: Tommy Hilfiger Heritage Slim Fit Polo Shirt, Apple Red
description:
Bolstering your daytime collection, this t-shirt by Tommy Hilfiger is printed with an eye-catching logo.

name: Mulberry Medium Lily High Shine Calf Leather Shoulder Bag, Black
description:
Set your look apart with the medium Lily shoulder bag by Mulberry.

The medium Lily is the larger version of the effortlessly elegant Lily bag. Presented with the classic for the design woven leather and chain strap, the bag can be worn short or long depending on your style. It is complemented by the equally iconic postman's lock and leather padlock fob.

Created using responsibly sourced leather, this bag is one of Mulberry's Sustainable Icons. Made in the brand's carbon-neutral Somerset factories, the materials are sourced from a tannery accredited a gold standard rating by The Leather Working Group.

Caring for your Mulberry product

To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

name: Albaray Fine Ribbed Sleeveless Vest Dress, Black
description:
Hugging the figure in a bodycon fit, this midi dress by Albaray features a textured effect for a standout look.

With a traditional round neckline and short sleeves, it is a care-free option for daytime dressing.

name: John Lewis Mid-Century Sweep Upholstered Bed Frame, Super King Size, Brushed Tweed Ocean
description:
Our Mid-Century Sweep bed frame has a sleek, retro-inspired shape. Its streamlined profile marries soft curves and sharp lines, resting on tapered wooden legs. Sprung slats in the base provide additional support for you and your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: La Prairie Platinum Rare Cellular Night Elixir Serum, 20ml
description:
La Prairie Platinum Rare Cellular Night Elixir features an innovative rejuvenating formula that detoxifies and defends while you sleep. Delivering energy directly to the skin, this overnight serum restores the skin's radiance while improving skin texture and reducing the appearance of lines and wrinkles. It supports the four functions essential to the skin’s complete regeneration process, detoxifying and nourishing to allow the skin to breathe and boost its own immunity. This delicate formula is housed in a unique diamond-shaped amethyst vessel.

The Platinum Rare luxury skincare collection features La Prairie’s Advanced Platinum Complex which delivers a singular, energy-rich active ingredient to the skin. Platinum is a natural antioxidant and helps to protect and nourish delicate skin whilst renewing damaged cells. Suitable for all skin types, the hydrating formula smooths the skin and improves its texture.

Backed by 90 years of cellular science, La Prairie's heritage is rooted in Swiss culture. Enriched with rare and advanced anti-ageing active ingredients, La Prairie crafts state-of-the-art formulas, elevating luxury skincare to an art form.
breadcrumbs: Beauty | Skin Care & Treatments | View all Skin Care

name: Cricut Smart Materials Gift Bundle for Cricut Explore 3 & Cricut Maker 3
description:
The Cricut Smart Materials Supplies Bundle is the perfect companion for your Cricut Explore 3 or Cricut Maker 3 machine.

Contents:

  • Smart Paper Sticker Cardstock (Bright Bows)
  • Smart Vinyl Permanent, 0.9m (Red)
  • Smart Vinyl Permanent, 0.9m (White)
  • Smart Vinyl Permanent, 0.9m (Shimmer Gold)
  • Smart Iron-On, 0.9m (Black)
  • Transfer Tape, 1.2m
  • Basic Tool Set

Smart Paper Sticker Cardstock:

Woo-hoo, no need for glue! This clever adhesive-backed paper works without a cutting mat, so you can just load and go. Just cut, peel, and stick to create fun cards, bold banners, attractive posters, and layered paper projects of all sorts.

Smart Vinyl:

Personalise a little or a lot. Make more in less time with Smart Vinyl™. This clever crafting material works without a cutting mat – just load and go. Now it's easy to create a label on the fly or a birthday banner with big impact, fashion a quick decal for your water bottle or decorate your mailbox. This vinyl is weather-resistant so your creations will last even in the great outdoors.

Smart Iron-On:

Wear your creativity on your sleeve, your pocket, or your trouser leg with Smart Iron-On. This clever crafting material works without a cutting mat, so you can just load and go. Smart Iron-On works fabulously on a wide variety of materials and outlasts 50+ washes! For effortless application, use a Cricut EasyPress™ (available separately).

Transfer Tape:

Transfer your custom vinyl cuts to a variety of surfaces with ease and precision. This specially designed Transfer Tape is made for most types of Cricut vinyl, including Patterned, Holographic, Holographic Sparkle, Metallic, and Matte Metallic. Use it to create custom decals, labels, decor, and so much more.

Basic Tool Set:

<,strong>

Craft in style with the Basic Tool Set in fresh, complementary hues. This 5-piece set gets you started with the basic tools you need for a Cricut crafting session. You'll be equipped to precisely and expertly handle most DIY projects, from vinyl for decals to iron-on decor projects, to cardstock masterpieces – and that's just the beginning. It's an essential companion for all Cricut cutting machines.
breadcrumbs: Sport & Leisure | Haberdashery | Scissors & Cutting Tools

description:
Complete your ideal kitchen with the John Lewis & Partners JLFSMC621 Double Dual Fuel Cooker. You'll be all set for everything from simple meals to complex menus and dishes.

The JLFSMC621 is 60cm wide and offers a two electric ovens with a combined 117 litres of capacity. The main oven features 3 shelves and 5 shelf positions. The top oven has 1 shelf and 2 shelf positions.

This cooker offers 4 gas hobs of various sizes, complete with cast iron supports, that sit under the glass lid. There's also an adjustable electric grill located in the top oven.

Features include a programmable timer so you can keep track of time with your culinary creations.

A Energy Rating
Cook up the right recipe for your bills and the environment with an A energy rating.

A promise from us to you
The John Lewis & Partners name is always an assurance of reliable quality, great design and absolute value. Incorporating the latest engineering features and electronic systems, our appliances are thoughtfully and stylishly conceived to meet all the demands of the contemporary home. There’s also a 3-year guarantee, backed by our very special reputation for excellent service.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new cooker, along with removing and recycling the old one too. Simply add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

Next, a pop of colour on the run is quick and easy with new mini lipsticks, lipglasses and pigments, all complementing your full size favourites. Fashionably false in look, but honestly real, this mascara's key benefits of volume and curl are matched by a dramatically exaggerated end look.

The unique edge: The ultra-thickening formula in combination with the plush-'em-up action of its unique double-lush brush douses lashes in a deluxe dose of pigment with each stroke. The result is incredibly magnified and multiplied lashes that are thick, long, curled and full-feathered.

name: EAST END PRINTS Honeymoon Hotel 'Palms Above' Framed Print, Black Frame, 83.4 x 63.4cm

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

    • The wide frame measures 3.5cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 36 x 31cm
  • 46 x 36cm
  • 56 x 46cm
  • 86 x 66cm

description: Loose-fitting button front tops with shaped hemline and collar and sleeve variations. Bow tie and pocket.

name: Celtic & Co. Merino Wool Ribbed Half Zip Jumper, Green
description:
Celtic & Co. has fused its sturdy rib knit in 100% Merino wool with a slightly sportier aesthetic to bring you the half-zip jumper.

An undisputable staple in any man's wardrobe, this cosy knit piece is topped with a zip at the neck which can be done up or pulled down to expose a flash of contrast at the inner collar.

Further character is introduced through patched panels at the shoulders, while branded accents sit at the side seam and hem to underline this piece's expert craftsmanship.

Made with 100% Merino Lambswool: Unbelievably soft with its super-fine silkiness, Merino wool is a hero yarn for so many reasons. This natural fibre is able to breathe equally effectively in both warm and cold conditions, creating an efficient microclimate around your body for ultimate comfort, whatever the weather.

Inspire LEGO builders with a dazzling array of building possibilities – from frozen lakes to arctic landscapes to something of their own imagination.

This baseplate has enough grip to hold LEGO building bricks at any angle, even upside down! And when the building stops, the firm grip gives kids a collapse-free way to transport and display their creations.

description:
An essential addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from Whistles boasts a textured dobby fabric that gives it a unique feel.

description:
In a decorative open frame, these L & T Heirlooms stud earrings come with faceted oval-cut garnet stone. The stone is claw set in a 9ct gold design. The earrings are for pierced ears only.

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

name: AllSaints Stripe Subverse T-Shirt, Jet Black/Opt Wht
description:
Make down-time dressing effortless with this cotton round neck t-shirt by AllSaints.

Lay a solid foundation for your casual looks by slipping this go-with-anything piece on with joggers or jeans.

name: Lollys Laundry Nicky Textured Shirt, Blue
description:
Updating your collection, this shirt by Lollys Laundry is full of texture for an elevated touch.

Carved with a crew neck and long sleeves, it is made with durable fabric for longevity of wear and makes for effortless daytime dressing.

name: Le Labo Thé Noir 29 Eau de Parfum Liquid Balm Rollerball, 9ml
description:
Thé Noir 29 is an ode to the noble leaf and the craft that surrounds it. Thé Noir 29 combines depth and freshness, softness and strength through permanent oscillation between the light of bergamot, fig and bay leaves and the depth of cedarwood, vetiver and musk.

A special extraction of black tea leaves wraps up the composition by bringing to the formula a dry, leafy, hay, tobacco feeling in the dry down to transform this creation into a sensuous and addictive essence.

Le Labo is proud to introduce its Liquid Balm. This new travel-friendly perfume rollerball glass vial can be used as an olfactive marker, to roll on your skin or someone else's your favourite Le Labo perfume.

name: Motorola VM855 Portable Video Wi-Fi Baby Monitor
description:
This 5 inch Portable Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi® enables you to keep an eye on things whilst at home on the parent unit and away on compatible smartphones and tablets. Take the portable, battery-powered camera with you around the house to watch your little one wherever they are and see the whole room clearly, day or night.

The free Nursery app allows you to receive sound, motion, and temperature notifications to your compatible viewing device, so you can always stay connected to what’s going on at home. A flexible mount included in the box allows you to set up the battery-powered camera more easily and 24 hrs event storage in the cloud is included.

name: Coach Studio 12 Glossy Patent Leather Baguette Bag
description: Mini me. Coach made a scaled-down version of their timeless Studio bag with all of the same details as the original. Crafted of glossy patent leather and finished with a crossbody strap, it has room for cash, cards, lipstick, and keys. (Great things come in small packages.)

name: Superdry Organic Cotton Micro Embroidered T-Shirt, Tois Burgundy Grit
description:
Bolster your staples with this organic cotton round neck t-shirt by Superdry.

Perfectly refined with a simple logo embroidered to the chest, style it to suit your mood.

name: Designers Guild Mirissa Furnishing Fabric, Chestnut
description:

name: AllSaints Anna Beverly Top, Grey/Multi
description:
Bolstering your daytime collection, this t-shirt by AllSaints features a signature animal graphic all-over and branding to the chest.

Designed with a classic crew neckline and short sleeves, it is light and breathable in cotton and is an easy daytime option.

name: Wool Couture Cheeky Chunky Wool Knitting Yarn, 100g, Pewter
description:
Wool Couture's original Cheeky Chunky yarn is a super soft and cuddly take on super chunky yarn. Easy and quick to knit with, it's perfect for all of your chunky knits and accessories. Each 100g ball of Cheeky Chunky yarn is made with 100% Merino wool.

Needle Size: 10-15mm, Crochet hook: 8-12mm

Care for your Cheeky Chunky yarn by hand washing and laying it flat to dry. Cheeky Chunky yarn is made from pure wool. Pure wool is great for our planet, it's biodegradable and renewable because every year a sheep grows a new coat. Merino wool fibres are extremely fine, making it soft and gentle next to your skin. Merino wool is also an active fibre that reacts to changes in your body temperature. So it helps you stay warm when the weather is cold, and cool when the weather is hot.

name: Ray-Ban RB1969 Unisex Polarised Rectangular Sunglasses, Silver/Blue Gradient
description:
Forming a rectangular shape, this pair of sunglasses by Ray-Ban softens a rectangular profile.

The polyamide lenses are lightweight and impact resistant for comfortable all-day wear. The application of polarisation to the lenses minimises reflected light off horizonatal surfaces for sharper contrasts and clearer vision.

name: Bertazzoni Professional Series XG 100cm Electric Range Cooker with Induction Hob, Red
description:
At the heart of the home is the kitchen. And the heart of the kitchen? The cooker. Made in Italy, Bertazzoni pairs distinctive style with innovative design for their Professional Series. Available in a variety of colours and finishes, two multifunction ovens allow you to explore different tastes and cuisines from around the world, and the versatile 5-ring induction hob has you boiling, frying and searing to your heart's content.

Main oven
The generous 58-litre multifunction oven has 10 cooking functions including 5 cooking levels, soft close doors, and several accessories such as telescopic guides and a temperature probe.

Second oven
The 46-litre secondary oven features static cooking and grill function, 4 cooking levels and an easy-clean enamel interior.

Induction hob
The induction hob guarantees perfect cooking in a simple and safe way. Five cooking zones ensure plenty of choice, with two of these zones having the option of combining to create a multi-zone; a single large cooking area. This flexible cooking area is ideal for large pots and pans.

5 cooking levels
5 different cooking levels in each oven guarantees maximum flexibility, allowing you to cook different dishes at the same time. Ideal when you need to quickly prepare more dishes or large quantities of food.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new cooker, along with removing and recycling the old one. Once you've checked it's the right fit, just add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

name: Rachel Jackson London Unfazed Medium Art Deco Oval Hoop Earrings, Gold
description:
Your new everyday go-to hoop earring, done the Rachel Jackson way with sculptural silhouettes featuring unique Art Deco line detailing. Wear solo or stacked. These earrings are for pierced ears only.

Unfazed is a collection from Rachel Jackson London about embracing life, treasuring every day fearless and free, expressing our true selves and living our best lives.

name: KOY Cotton Overshirt Jacket
description:
This is a casual style shirt-jacket with its four pockets punctuating the front includes subtle detailing of the authentic Kenyan Kikoy fabric under the pocket flaps, collar and sleeve cuffs.

Good to know: 5% of KOY's revenue goes back into sustainable charity projects in Kenya.

name: Shiseido Colorgel Lipbalm, 106 Redwood
description:
This lightweight-yet-hydrating balm melds seamlessly with lips thanks to high- and low-melting point waxes that provide the perfect amount of structure and slip.

Infused with patented humectant technology, this balm-lipstick hybrid offers lasting moisture and comfort leaving lips feeling softer and healthier with every use.

With shades inspired by nature indigenous to Japan, this nourishing formula boasts semi-sheer coverage, and a delicate, shiny finish. Dermatologist-tested.

name: Gerard Darel Shadya Trench Coat, Khaki/Beige

name: Cotswold Yanworth Waterproof Leather Hiking Boots
description: A pair of boots packed with technology - an internal waterproof membrane and moisture wicking lining that keeps feet dry whilst a memory foam foot bed and energy rebounding midsole provides underfoot cushioning. Designed in a classic countryside supple leather upper with internal breathable, waterproof membrane, they feature a soft leather gusset tongue, deep cushioned padded PU collar, and leather rear pull loop for easy foot placement.

description: Cosying up in classic checks, this long-sleeve pyjama set by Lauren Ralph Lauren is stitched together from a supremely soft brushed cotton twill blend for use throughout the year.

name: Playful Promises Dakota Snake Basque
description: Venomous vamps, the Dakota set is for you. With its slithering snake embroidery over black mesh and glistening gold and coloured embroidered florals, this set is bound to tempt you into taking a bite of that deliciously sinful apple.
breadcrumbs: Women | Women's Lingerie & Underwear | Basques & Bodysuits

name: Char-Broil 3500 Firebox Charcoal BBQ, Black
description:
Char-Broil's 3500 charcoal grill creates authentic barbecue flavours with better control over cooking temperatures and easier cleaning up afterwards.

The barbecue has an air vet system and built-in thermometer gauge on the lid to give you improved temperature control. Two side shelves provide additional work space and transporter wheels make it easy to move your barbecue into position when you're ready to cook outdoors.

Key features:

  • Powered by charcoal briquettes or lump charcoal
  • Big side air vents for optimum air circulation control
  • Clean-out door and removable ash pan
  • Porcelain-enamelled grates
  • 2 side shelves
  • Cool-touch lid handle
  • Warming rack
  • Storage shelf below
  • Two transporter wheels
  • Grilling area: 72.5 x 48cm

Cooking temperature control
The barbecue has a thermometer built into the lid for keeping an eye on the cooking temperature, and an innovative system to help control it. Control the grill temperature by opening and closing the air vents. To burn hotter keep the vent open, to lower the temperature, partially close it. A patented tray makes it easy to control the temperature by creating more efficient burning and less wasted heat and flare-ups. A side air valve assists for maximum air circulation control for grilling at high temperatures for long periods of time.

Easy to clean
The charcoal tray is easy to access and remove for cleaning. Easily remove leftover ash from your firebox with the convenient clean-out door. The porcelain-enamelled grates are rust-resistant and also easy to clean.

Adjustable grill height
The fire pan has an external crank for individual height settings which allows for an ideal grill control.

name: Bobbi Brown Skin Concealer Stick, Cool Sand
description:
What it is: Our first-of-its kind transformative stick makes great-looking skin look easy. This long-lasting concealer is a natural at instantly reducing the look of dark circles, discolouration, and imperfections for a skin-fresh look. The creamy, emollient-rich formula blends into skin for 12 hours of crease-proof, colour-true comfort and layers seamlessly under or over foundation.

  • Softens and blends on contact for transformative concealing that looks like skin. Glides on for sheer-to-full buildable coverage that layers seamlessly under or over foundation
  • Delivers immediate and long-term moisture for smoother, plumper, healthy-looking skin
  • Wears for 12 hours of non-creasing, colour-true comfort that’s waterproof and sweat- and humidity-resistant
  • Swipes on effortlessly with its stick format, creamy formula, and rounded tip

name: LSA International Borough White Wine Glasses, Set of 4, 380ml, Clear
description:
Designed with contemporary shapes, the Borough range of glassware from LSA International is stylish and refined.

Dishwasher safe, this set of four glasses are made of lead-free crystalline glass for brilliance, clarity and resilience. The shape of the glass suits white wines.

Choose the perfect glassware

Glass comes in a range of weights, cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from, designed to suit every budget and occasion.

Soda LimeVersatile and available in many colours and styles, soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand, soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items.
Crystal GlassFiner in quality with greater clarity than soda glass, crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges.
Lead CrystalWith a beautiful clarity, weight and resonance, lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead', the glass has at least 24% lead oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed, only.
Sparkx®Neither Soda Lime Glass nor Crystal Glass, this ultra-clear glass is pure, transparent and free of heavy metals. Plus, it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers.
SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass with all the same ingredients as Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that make it even stronger, with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even Sparkx.
LUXION®100% lead-free crystal glass which replaces its former 24% lead crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency and exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable.
RecycledGlassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass.
Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime Glass.
HandmadeThis type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above, depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are usually suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion.
DecorativeThere are many ways to decorate glass including cutting, spraying, diamond etching, pantograph etching, silk screen printing, sand blasting, hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material.

name: Ghost Beau Satin Maxi Dress, Navy Blue
description:
Turning heads with its ballgown silhouette, this maxi dress by Ghost is in need of no fussy details or prints to catch the eye.

With a traditional round neckline and a sleeveless design, this piece is an elegant choice for evenings to remember.

name: Yumi Longline Open Front Cardigan, Camel
description: Slipping on for easy layering, this cardigan from Yumi is made from long-lasting fabric that will see you through season after season.

name: 2022 Apple iPad Pro 12.9", M2 Processor, iOS, Wi-Fi & Cellular, 512GB, Silver
description:
The ultimate iPad just got a serious upgrade. Supercharged by Apple’s M2 processor, the 12.9” 2022 iPad Pro delivers astonishing performance, an amazingly advanced display, and stunning speed. Fitted with a Liquid Retina XDR display, a 12MP 122° field of view front camera, plus 12MP wide & 10MP ultra-wide rear cameras, your photos, videos, entertainment and games all look staggeringly good. This is a Pro level iPad experience.

Supercharged by M2
Say hello to next-gen performance. An evolution of Apple Silicon chip technology, the M2 processor delivers even more of the power and efficiency introduced by the M1. Blaze through your work with a more powerful 8-core CPU, and create stunning graphics with a lightning-fast 10-core GPU. With a 40 per cent faster Neural Engine to accelerate machine learning tasks and 50 per cent more memory bandwidth, M2 brings astonishing performance and new capabilities to iPad Pro.

5G speed
Get ready for the next generation of mobile internet and experience incredible download speeds, or play games without the fear of lag. Please contact your mobile service provider regarding the 5G options currently available to you.

Liquid Retina XDR display
iPad Pro’s Liquid Retina XDR display delivers crisp detail with a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, making viewing and editing HDR photos and videos, and enjoying your favourite movies and TV shows, a visual dream. It features 1,000 nits of full-screen brightness and 1,600 nits of peak brightness, while advanced display technologies such as P3 wide colour, True Tone and ProMotion keep everything supremely smooth and authentically lifelike.

Stunning photo and video capability
Featuring a front-facing, ultra-wide camera with a 12MP sensor and a 122 degree field of view, you’re all set to look your best for FaceTime and superior selfies.

The iPad Pro’s rear 12MP wide and 10MP ultra-wide cameras are able to help you capture exceptional photos and videos. And with support for ProRes video capture, iPad Pro is a complete mobile video studio. Thanks to the more powerful ISP in the M2 chip, iPad Pro now features Smart HDR 4 for even more true-to-life imagery.

LiDAR Scanner
The LiDAR scanner measures how long it takes light to reflect back from objects, so it can create a depth map of any space you’re in and unlock the world of immersive AR experiences.

Face ID security
Thanks to Face ID, it takes just a glance to unlock your iPad, or a gentle swipe up to access features. It's engineered for secure unlocking, and works in both portrait and landscape orientations. You can even log-in to apps and pay securely with just a glance, so there's less passwords to remember.

The speed of Thunderbolt
The supremely fast and versatile Thunderbolt port works with existing USB-C connectors and opens up an extensive ecosystem of high-performance accessories, such as external storage, displays, and docks. It’s capable of data transfer speeds of up to 40Gb/s.

Pro accessories
Apple Pencil, Magic Keyboard and the Smart Keyboard Folio open up even more ways to use your iPad Pro. Draw a masterpiece, take notes or make a business plan. These versatile accessories are designed to take your work and creativity to the next level. All accessories are sold separately.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device’s lifespan – this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.


We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.

description:

From the innovative technology that keeps you dry to the sustainably sourced padding, they're a staple of a snow enthusiast's wardrobe, hitting a consistent, subtle style that will go with your favourite layers or alternatively pair with the matching jacket.

description: These trainers are a twist on the bestselling adults’ look. The ‘90s style running silhouette from Gola’s back catalogue features an oversized EVA midsole to give an authentic nod to the original style. The one difference between this and the grown-up one? A riptape fastening.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Boys' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Boys' Shoes, Boots & Trainers

name: InWear Musette Pullover Stripe Jumper
description: Offering an elegance with its funnel neckline, this jumper by InWear is adorned with a simple stripe print for a sleek edge and is made with long-lasting fabric for longevity of wear.

name: On Cloud 5 Women's Running Shoes
description:
• Ideal for weekend runs, 10kms. everyday wear, urban exploration and travel
  • Soft CloudTec® cushioning and Speedboard™ technology provide amplified energy return with every step
  • Reshaped Cloud elements enhance grip across wet and dry terrain
  • Breathable mesh upper allows the foot to flex naturally and reduces odour-causing bacteria

Designed to be the lightest fully cushioned running shoe, the Cloud is a true On icon. Since launching in 2014, it's topped Olympic podiums and walked Parisian catwalks, winning awards and fans all over the world. Stylishly concealing state of the art running technology, the Cloud is the perfect performance shoe for all day, every day wear. It's the best-selling On for a reason.

CloudTec® Technology
Padded with Zero-Gravity foam and CloudTec® in the outsole to provide soft, cushioned landings, the reshaped Cloud elements on the sole deliver superior performance and grip across all terrains. That means you've got no excuse to skip out on training if it's a bit wet outside.

Fitted with a moulded heel that provides a snug, secure fit, the Speedboard™ transforms energy generated upon landing into forward motion. This means the more you push yourself out on the road, the more energy you're going to be getting back in return. The signature speed-lacing system lets your foot slip in and out with ease, yet keeps the shoe firmly in place on the move.

Breathable mesh Upper
The Cloud is famous for its unmatched step-in feel, thanks to the blend of soft-touch fabrics used in the upper. The breathable, antimicrobial mesh provides stay-fresh comfort, while soft, no-sew taped reinforcements across the shoe and toe cap support the perfect fit.

Good to Know: The more you run or walk, the more room you need. On trainers and boots are typically designed narrower in the heel and tongue; please consider going up a size if you have wide feet.

name: Bramley Digby Dog Grooming Parlour Gift Set

Key Features:

Avoid contact with liquids and other beauty products.

Please note that vintage jewellery was produced prior to the introduction of the 2002 law prohibiting the use of nickel or nickel compounds. Customers allergic to these metals may experience skin rashes or irritation where the metal is in contact with the skin.

name: Woodmansterne Wonderful News New Baby Card

name: DYLON Wash 'n' Dye Machine Dye, Velvet Black
description: Breathing new life into a faded top or old pair of jeans has never been so easy with Dylon. The Wash and Dye range makes reviving or transforming colours a breeze. DYLON Wash & Dye’s unique all-in-one formula dyes fabrics as it washes them, so you can achieve an intense new look or take faded greys back to black with minimum effort for permanent results you can be proud of.

name: John Lewis Striped Stackable Stoneware Mug, 250ml
description:
Designed with contemporary stripes, this mug is made of stoneware and is microwave and dishwasher safe for everyday use. The mug stacks together with other mugs in this series, for compact storage.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: Gina Bacconi Marinela Lace Shift Dress, Potpourri Pink
description:
Designed to a timeless shift silhouette, this midi dress by Gina Bacconi is embellished with intricate lace detailing.

Framed with a flattering v-neckline and a sleeveless design, this piece is perfect for evenings out.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Nautical Stripe Lace Up Hoodie, Newport Navy/White

Size XS/S has a 28.5" body length and a 19.25" sleeve length. Size M/L has a 29.5" body length and a 19.75" sleeve length. Body length is taken from the high point of the shoulder.

name: Silverlit My First Remote Control Helicopter

name: Canon PGI-570/CLI-571 Cyan, Magenta, Yellow and Pigment Black, Black Ink Cartridge Multipack, Pack of 5
description:
