This is compatible with the Canon PIXMA MG5750, MG5751, MG5752, MG5753, MG6850 and MG6851 printers.
breadcrumbs: Electricals | Printing | Printer Inks, Toners & Drums

name: John Lewis Deep Pile Pedestal Mat, White
description:
Pleasantly weighty and naturally plush, this cotton pedestal mat has a deep, cut pile with a higher density of longer loops than the average bath mat, giving it a wonderfully soft feel. It also has a slip-resistant backing to keep it in place on your bathroom floor.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.
This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton.
bettercotton.org/massbalance

Fresher, cleaner and odour-free for longer
This pedestal mat has a Life Natural finish. The innovative natural peppermint treatment contains antimicrobial protection to keep it fresher and cleaner for longer. And whilst peppermint is the basis of this finish it doesn't leave the mat with a minty fragrance. In fact, it helps keep it completely odour-free.

Quality, wash after wash
At John Lewis & Partners our bath linen is reassuringly well made. We test to the highest standards of durability, colour-fastness and performance.

Matching towels are available for you to complete the look throughout your bathroom.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Bathroom Accessories | Bath & Shower Mats

name: Rick Stein Coves of Cornwall Medium Pasta Bowl, Set of 4, Blue/White, Dia.16cm
description:
Dine in style with this beautiful set of four pasta bowls from Rick Stein's Coves of Cornwall collection. Each one has a different pattern and is named after a Cornish cove: Constantine Bay, Daymer Bay, Trevone Bay and St George's Cove.

This collection's alluring abstract patterns were designed by the students of Cornwall’s Falmouth University in competition. The winning entry was based on Rick Stein's memories of growing up in Cornwall and is loosely based on the legendary coves of north Cornwall. All artwork was painted by hand on watercolour paper, showing the depth and colour variations of the sea.

The clean design of the bone china forms complements the subtly changing shades of each cove, resulting in a unique and highly collectable range of coastal tableware. Each piece is dishwasher, microwave and freezer safe.

name: Fjällräven Greenland Fleece Lined Hooded Parka Jacket
description: A teddy-fleece lined winter parka in classic Fjällräven style. Durable and versatile for comfortable wear in all kinds of everyday outings.

name: Mela London Bardot Dipped Hem Dress, Black
description:
Beautifully feminine, this knee-length dress by Mela London complements bold accessories with its plain canvas.

Sitting off the shoulders with a Bardot neckline and short sleeves, it is a trusty choice to call on for parties.

name: John Lewis Wooden Hammer Bench
description:
• Helps develop fine motor skills and hand-to-eye coordination
  • Builds early knowledge of shapes and colour recognition

Perfect for little hands, they'll love taking out their frustrations of not being allowed to nap with this wooden hammering bench. Secretly they'll be learning about different shapes and colours, but they won't know that as they bash the colourful pegs into the holes on the bench before knocking them back out again!

name: Reiss Tatum Crepe Wide Leg Trousers, White
description:
Cut to a contemporary wide leg silhouette, these high-waisted tailored trousers by Reiss are made from a soft yet robust fabric.

A versatile choice thanks to its plain design, let your hair down and mix with bold patterns.

name: InWear Jincent Sleeveless Top
description:
An essential addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from InWear makes for the perfect companion to patterned accessories and layers.

Cut with a simple round neck and a sleeveless design, it is made from a light yet durable fabric and is ideal when partnered with floaty midi skirts for summer days spent strolling around the city.

name: Cyberjammies Riley Check Cotton Pyjama Bottoms, Navy Mix
description: Some say checks are an essential nightwear pattern and we'd have to agree. Cyberjammies' Riley Check pj bottoms are made from a super-soft, brushed 100% cotton, are fully elasticated at the waist with an adjustable drawstring and true fly-front, and have two side pockets.

name: Monica Vinader Siren Muse Mini Drop Huggie Hoop Earrings, Gold
description: Get newness for your ear stack with these Siren Muse earrings from Monica Vinader. These simple and delicate drop huggie hoop earrings have subtly hammered surfaces that radiate light adding texture and shine to your look. Suitable for upper and lower lobe, they are secured with post fittings that are for pierced ears only.

name: Phase Eight Emera V Neck Linen T-Shirt
description:
The foundation to all your looks, this t-shirt from Phase Eight makes for the perfect companion to patterned accessories.

Classic in cut with a v-neckline and short sleeves, it is made from linen for quality comfort in warmer weather and pairs effortlessly with floaty summery skirts for warm days spent with good friends.

name: Clinique Even Better Makeup Foundation SPF 15, Sand
description:
Our bestselling foundation. Dermatologist-developed formula instantly perfects, lasting 24 hours.

What it does:

  • Liquid foundation with 24-hour wear delivers flawless, moderate coverage in 39 shades
  • Built with BetterFlex Technology™, a special blend of polymers that give this foundation flexibility so it moves when you move and smiles when you smile

Non-creasing, non-caking, non-settling. Just all-day second-skin comfort.

  • Creamy formula hydrates, smooths, and leaves skin with a natural finish
  • Actively improves the appearance of skin
  • Broad spectrum SPF 15 helps protect against future discolouration
  • Stay-true pigments mean this face makeup won’t change colour on your skin

Proven results:

  • 94% say skin looks immediately more even toned*
  • 93% say skin looks more perfected*
  • 92% say skin looks fresh*
  • 90% say skin feels comfortable all day*
  • 90% say it feels weightless on skin*

*Consumer testing on 546 women after 2 weeks of product use.

Formula facts:

  • 24-hour colour-true wear
  • 24-hour defence against caking, settling, creasing, poring, streaking
  • Oil-free
  • Sweat- and humidity-resistant
  • Non-acnegenic
  • Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested
  • Fragrance free
  • Allergy tested

Free of: Paraben-free, Phthalate-free, Oil-free.

name: Monsoon Charlotte Crepe Maxi Dress, Cloud
description:
Easy to wear in an A-line silhouette, this maxi dress by Monsoon features a simple lace detail addition.

Framed with a flattering v-neckline and short sleeves, it is sure to impress at your next social event.

name: Clinique My Happy Peony Picnic Eau de Parfum, 15ml
description:
A fragrance romantic like an afternoon stroll in the park. Wander in a sun-drenched flower garden where giant blooming peonies and roses refuse to be ignored. A Floral Fruity scent to wear alone or layer.

Notes:

  • Black Currant Buds, Strawberry, Passion Fruit, Peony, Rose, Plum, Cedar, Amberwood, Vanilla

Style:

  • Romantic. Floral. Infectious

How to use:

No rules. Wear alone or collect the other My Happy™ fragrances to layer.

name: John Lewis Draper Medium 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Metal Leg, Piccadilly Black
description:
Stylish and functional, the Draper range is thoughtfully designed with tailored arms and slender legs. The modern proportions of the button detail seat and back cushions offer a deep and supportive sit.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.


It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Harlequin Floreale Furnishing Fabric, Maize/Mustard/Sage
description:
A vivacious floral fabric design digitally printed with overblown peonies, foxgloves and foliage.

Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
If you'd like to purchase this fabric and are ready to place your order, or need a little styling advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: Susan O'Hanlon Elephant and Cloud New Baby Girl Card
description:
A greetings card from Susan O'Hanlon to celebrate the birth of a new arrival.

Blank inside for you to write your personal message, this card comes with a pink envelope.

This card is FSC certified meaning you can be assured the material used has come from a forest approved by the Forest Stewardship Council, an international non-profit organisation dedicated to promoting responsible forestry.

Sourced and made in the United Kingdom.

All the cards we sell are made without using glitter and are recyclable.

name: Ted Baker Cardiff Wool Jumper
description: Making its way to your most-used drawer as the temperature cools, this crew neck jumper from Ted Baker has a soft woollen construction.

name: Bobbi Brown Skin Concealer Stick, Warm Ivory
description:
What it is: Our first-of-its kind transformative stick makes great-looking skin look easy. This long-lasting concealer is a natural at instantly reducing the look of dark circles, discolouration, and imperfections for a skin-fresh look. The creamy, emollient-rich formula blends into skin for 12 hours of crease-proof, colour-true comfort and layers seamlessly under or over foundation.

  • Softens and blends on contact for transformative concealing that looks like skin. Glides on for sheer-to-full buildable coverage that layers seamlessly under or over foundation
  • Delivers immediate and long-term moisture for smoother, plumper, healthy-looking skin
  • Wears for 12 hours of non-creasing, colour-true comfort that’s waterproof and sweat- and humidity-resistant
  • Swipes on effortlessly with its stick format, creamy formula, and rounded tip

name: Belling Farmhouse 100 Classic Cooker Hood, Cream
description:
Complete your ideal kitchen and ensure cooking smells are kept in check with the Belling Farmhouse 100 Classic Cooker Hood.

You can choose between 3 different speed settings. Twin round LED multi-spot lights provide brilliant illumination over your cooking surface, and give your kitchen ambiance. Maintenance is easy with three grease filters, as they are washable for no-fuss cleaning.

name: Clinique Chubby Stick, Cheek, Amp'd Up Apple
description: Creamy, mistake-proof cheek colour creates a healthy-looking glow in an instant. Oil-free.

name: kourt Walter Floral Print Chiffon Blouse, Black/Multi
description:
Bringing a neat addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from kourt is blooming with spring florals.

Framed with a modern square neckline and long sleeves, it's made from chiffon making it ideal for relaxed daytime wear.

name: John Lewis Charlotte Upholstered Bed Frame, Double, Deep Velvet Teal
description:
With a gently curved headboard and turned wooden legs, our Charlotte bed frame suits traditional settings. There are also supportive sprung slats in the base.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect has a laid-back and fine-textured look that looks like cotton, but it's made from durable polyester fibres

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is made with a brushed herringbone weave that has a cosy wool look and soft 'peach skin' feel. It's really hard-wearing and a brilliant all-rounder

Our Band A fabric, Soft Weave has a casual cotton look with a brushed finish that's soft-to-touch and a suble texture that's created by slight variations in the tones of the woven fibres

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille is made from a blend of fibres that give it a super-soft feel and added durability

Our Band B fabric, Boucle is luxe and oh-so cosy. This plush knitted fabric is super-soft and durable with a thick texture that calls for comfort

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet will bring warmth and luxury to your bedroom. It's a short pile velvet with a soft, plush feel

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Cord is rich in texture and available in neutral shades that will suit every space.

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen gives you the fine texture of cotton, the durability of synthetic fibres and the laid-back look of linen

Our Band C fabric, Marylamb is woven from both man-made and natural fibres, creating a tactile and soft-touch feel.

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Velvet will liven up your bedroom. It's plush, available in a range of bold colours and treated with Aquaclean so that it can be wiped clean with just water. A smart choice for families and those with pets

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: Barbour Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: Framed by a crew neckline and stamped with logo detailing upon the chest, this tailored fit t-shirt from Barbour is perfect for casual weekend styling.

name: BVLGARI BV7036 Men's Polarised Rectangular Sunglasses, Black/Grey
description:
This pair of rectangular shaped sunglasses from BVLGARI complement a round face shape.

The polycarbonate lenses are impact-resistant and lightweight for comfortable wear, repelling water and dust for higher clarity.

The polarised lenses are designed specifically for bright conditions as they reduce reflection and glare for a more comfortable visual experience.

name: Michael Kors Kids' Metallic Quilted Jacket, Gold
description: A mid-length down jacket with removable hood, long sleeves, and zipper closure. Finished with "MK" patch on the sleeve.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Girls' Clothes (2+ yrs) | Girls' Coats, Jackets & Gilets

name: Laura Mercier Petal Soft Lipstick Crayon, Zoe
description:
12hr Sheer Matte Lip Colour.

Sheer, easy-to-apply colour kisses your lips for a care-free effortless look.

Petal Soft Lipstick smooths the look and feel of lips for 12 hours of comfortable weightless wear. A nourishing fruit blend of Raspberry Seed Oil and Mango Butter locks in 24 hours of instant and overtime lip softening hydration. Available in 20 universal and carefree shades.

Fragrance-Free, Mineral, Paraben-Free.

name: Ro&Zo Double Breasted Crepe Blazer, Black
description:
Neatly tailored for a sharp finish, this blazer from Ro&Zo sits at the hips for practical coverage.

Collared for a confident feel, it is fashioned from long-lasting fabric that will see away the cold.

name: Jools by Jenny Brown Cubic Zirconia Teardrop Drop Earrings, Silver/Green
description: Sumptuous evening events with floor-skimming dresses and leg lengthening courts call for extra sparkly jewellery. These tear-drop earrings are oh-so perfect. Featuring a border of pavé set cubic zirconias, surrounding a wonderful tear drop coloured faceted stone. Just dazzling and utterly elegant, it is secured with a pin and butterfly backing that are for pierced ears only.

name: Myla Rose Courtenay Avenue Plunge Bra, Navy
description:
This sensual set offers a classic lace bra with an underwired plunge cup. Soft stretch lace and mesh make for a comfortable fit, with luxurious shimmering satin details to finish.

Style it with the matching Courtenay Avenue lace thong and suspender belt for elevated elegance.

Myla Rose is an exciting new line from London-born luxury lingerie brand MYLA. Inspired by the brand’s signature colourful style, floral essence and British heritage, Myla Rose encompasses everything ‘MYLA’ into a special collection in partnership with us here at John Lewis. For the women of today who expect comfort, functionality and pretty details all rolled into one, the Myla Rose collection is a curated range of wearable everyday styles and special occasion pieces that will take you from day to night. Featuring decadent details from French laces to foil-printed embroideries and available in an extended size range, Myla Rose will bring a little luxury to the forefront of your lingerie drawer.

name: L.K.Bennett Nolan Jacket, Midnight, Midnight
description: Expertly tailored with a pleated peplum hem for a soft, feminine feel, the Nolan jacket from L.K.Bennett is a staple addition to your workwear wardrobe. Working as part of a suit with matching trousers or a skirt, the Nolan is designed with a vintage-inspired round collar, covered buttons, a nipped waistline and flap over front pockets. Pair with statement ankle boots for a fresh take on a tailored look.

name: Warehouse Cuban Collar Hawaiian Print Short Sleeve Shirt, Black Pattern
description:
Build upon your summer looks in an iconic style from British fashion favourites Warehouse. A laid back alternative to your usual shirting, this one's all about the hours after the 9-5. Unashamedly relaxed, yet no less sophisticated than a traditional button-down, this shirt is framed by a Cuban collar and short sleeve cut. Finished in a vibrant Hawaiian print decoration, this top is destined for slim chino shorts and espadrille combinations.

As part of Warehouse's approach to sustainable lead designs, this Cuban collar has been constructed from a sustainable Viscose fabrication for a handle that's as light in wear as it is on the planet.

name: L.K.Bennett Misty Leather Platform Heeled Sandals
description:
Primed for evenings in good company, this pair of heeled sandals from L.K.Bennett is fashioned from leather for footwear that will last for years to come.

Sitting on a block heel, they are open-toed for added charm.

Heel height: 9.5cm

name: Calvin Klein Low Rise Cotton Stretch Trunks, Pack of 5, Black/Purple Multi
description:
Start every ensemble in premium fashion with these Calvin Klein trunks.

A handy pack of five, each is made from stretch cotton in a comfortable low rise silhouette finished with a signature contrast branded waistband.

name: TOM FORD FT0783 Women's Lennox Aviator Sunglasses, Rose Gold/Grey Gradient
description: The hallmark styling of this world-renowned fashion leader denotes high quality with a dedication to innovation and a strong tradition of craftsmanship. Prada is synonymous with an understated style that has always anticipated, and often dictated, new trends. Prada sunglasses use only the finest materials to strike the ideal balance of form and function.

name: Phase Eight Opal Suit Jacket, Black
description:
Carefully sketched to a sharp silhouette, this blazer from Phase Eight falls just to the knee in a mid-length cut.

Detailed with a collar, it is fashioned from long-lasting fabric that will see away the cold.

name: Base London Event Leather Lace Up Shoes
description:
Sure to become a staple, these casual shoes by Base London are made from supple leather for comfortable wear.

Complete with a lace-up front, pair with rolled up trousers for the ultimate weekend look.

name: Nina Campbell Sansui Wallpaper, Ivory, NCW4181-05
description:
An ornamental trellis named after a garden in Shanghai.

Have you thought about wallpaper accessories? Shop here.

name: Cricut Joy Smart Label Removable Writable Vinyl, 4 Sheets, Black
description:
Take pride in your kitchen, bathroom, or playroom organisation with Cricut Joy Smart Label Removable Writable Vinyl.

This clever material works without a mat, so you can just load and go with your Cricut Joy cutting machine. Pick from professional label designs, or create your own in the Cricut® Design Space® app. Use with compatible Cricut Joy Pens and Markers.*

*Cricut Joy Gel Pens are not recommended.

name: Josef Seibel Lenny 51 Waterproof Trainers
description:
A waterproof trainer-style lace-up shoe, the Lenny 51 from Josef Seibel is made using high-quality leather and a Top Dry-Tex membrane for a guaranteed waterproof finish.

With a hardwearing and robust sole unit for added grip and support underfoot, a cushioned removable footbed and a generous K-width fit this casual trainer-style shoe will keep your feet dry, protected and comfortable all day.

name: Bertazzoni Heritage Series 100cm Electric Range Cooker with Induction Hob, Ivory
description:
It's clear Bertazzoni love food (they are Italian in fairness; it comes naturally). Made in the Emilia-Romagna region - the culinary heart of the country - their Heritage Series of cookers match traditional styling with world-class engineering. The two multifunctional ovens implore you to try dishes from around the world, while the induction hob has you boiling, frying and searing to your heart's content.

Main oven
The generous 58-litre multifunction oven has 10 cooking functions including defrost, fast pre-heat, no-fan baking, and, obviously, a pizza setting. There are five different shelf positions for you to cook across too, making it super easy to adjust when cooking for friends and family.

Second oven
The 46-litre secondary oven features static cooking and grill function, 5 cooking levels and an easy-clean enamel interior.

Induction hob
The induction hob guarantees perfect cooking in a simple and safe way. Five cooking zones ensure plenty of choice, with two of these zones having the option of combining to create a multi-zone; a single large cooking area. This flexible cooking area is ideal for large pots and pans.

Made in Italy
Based in the Emilia-Romagna region, each Bertazzoni cooker is designed, constructed, and shipped from the family's hometown of Guastalla. For more than 135 years, they've helped people bring the best of home-cooked food to the family table; taking inspiration from the world-class engineering and craftsmanship that's so abundant in their surroundings.

We can help you get set up
Our professionally trained partners can install your new cooker, along with removing and recycling the old one. Once you've checked it's the right fit, just add the Installation & Recycling services to your purchase, and we'll do the rest.

Find out more details about installation and pricing for our support services here.

name: John Lewis Boys' School Adjustable Waist Stain Resistant Cargo Shorts, Grey
description:
• Stain resistant fabric
  • Adjustable waist
  • Core-spun thread for stronger seams
  • Pleated front with crease leg
  • Belt loops
  • 2 x leg pocket, 2 x front pockets
  • Ages 3-6 years feature a hook and fly fastening with no functioning zip
  • Ages 7 and above feature hook and fly fastening with functioning zip

They’ll be straight to the top of the class with our smart, comfortable Boys' Adjustable Waist School Cargo Shorts. Featuring a pleated front with crease leg these shorts have belt loops, an adjustable waist and handy cargo pockets.

Featuring stain resistant fabric, these shorts not only repel water, oil and other stains but make for quicker drying time and a longer-lasting garment.

Made from Recycled Polyester that is GRS certified (Global Recycling Standard), all our trousers, skirts, shorts and tunics are now more sustainable than ever.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | School Uniform Shop | View all Boys' School Uniform

name: Phase Eight Structured Bow Kitten Heel Shoes, Navy
description:
In a traditional court silhouette, this pair of shoes by Phase Eight is made with suede for a luxe addition to your footwear collection.

Sitting on a kitten heel, they feature a pointed toe for a sharp finish.

Heel height: 6cm

name: Sirdar Hayfield Soft Twist DK Knitting Yarn, 100g, Olive
description:
Hayfield Soft Twist is spun with a touch of pure merino wool and anti-pill acrylic for extra warmth and a fine twist to give beautiful definition.

Hayfield Soft Twist knits will retain their good looks wear after wear.

name: EAST END PRINTS Bo Lundberg 'Rome 73' Italy Framed Print, White Frame, 43.4 x 33.4cm
description:
A vibrant retro travel poster with Rome's Colosseum in silhouette, by artist Bo Lundberg.

This fine art-quality print on 210gsm acid-free archival paper is framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes. The acrylic glaze is light in weight and optically the same as glass. Made in the UK, it's ready to hang on your wall.

Bo Lundberg has clear memories of sitting at the kitchen table at the age of four, drawing one image after another. And he hasn't stopped since. Although Bo loves doing commissioned work, there is a specific sense of pride when someone appreciates work good enough to hang it on their wall.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

    • The wide frame measures 3.5cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 36 x 31cm
  • 46 x 36cm
  • 56 x 46cm
  • 86 x 66cm

name: Celtic & Co. Merino Cotton Abstract Socks, Navy
description: With an eye-catching pattern, these ankle socks from Celtic & Co. are made from a super-soft and warming woollen blend.

name: Claudia Bradby Boho Freshwater Pearl and Bee Charm Drop Earrings, Silver
description:
Claudia's boho bee hoops are handmade using recycled silver and, inspired by the bee itself, were designed to symbolise togetherness. A single bee is not recognized as a single organism, but rather as contributing to the health of the colony as a whole. The symbol to the left-hand side of the honey bee on the coin means 'stronger together' - we are better, and stronger together in this interconnected world. These alluring hoops were inspired by Claudia's beekeeping hobby as well as the ancient coins that featured honey bees, and are the perfect gift for all lovers of nature.

Both charms move independently on the hoop and can be taken off to offer alternative looks. Secured with post fittings, they are for pierced ears only.

name: John Lewis Otley Leather Armchair, Dark Leg
description:
A classic design with a contemporary twist, Otley has solid oak turned wooden legs, low curving arms and a supportive seat platform. It's also 100% foam-free, making it a more environmentally-friendly choice.

Designed to be kinder to the environment
We've used fibres made from recycled materials rather than foam to fill the seats and cushions on our Otley range. By using a foam alternative it means you can recycle this piece of furniture once it reaches the end of its life and avoid landfill. And the benefits of fibre-filled cushions don't stop there as they create a more casual look and a softer sit, perfect for curling up on.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Cyberjammies Clarissa Knit Pyjama Bottoms, Purple
description: Superb comfort and elegance combine in the Cyberjammies Clarissa knit pyjama bottoms. Made from a beautifully soft modal-elastane mix the trousers are elasticated at the back with a working drawstring at the front, have two side pockets and are finished with cuffs at the ankle for a snug, comfy fit. Wear them with the slouch knit top for the comfiest way to lounge or sleep.

name: DesignWorks Ink Radiant Rainbow Notebook, Pink
description: With the Radiant Rainbow Notepad from DesignWorks Ink, keeping up with your notes, goals, and lists is fun and fashionable! This flip-over notepad features a suede dusty pink cover with gold foil detail. The interior of the notebook features 100 lined pages with an elastic closure to keep everything secure on the go. This notepad makes the perfect gift for any paper-lover in your life.

name: Monica Vinader Nura Cross Over Ring, Gold
description: With this pre-stacked statement ring from Monica Vinader, everyday bold is easy to achieve. The simple design features a sleek cross-over shape for a contemporary finish. Every hand-crafted Monica Vinader piece comes with a 5-year warranty and lifetime repairs.

name: CREED Silver Mountain Water Soap, 150g
description:
This luxurious bar of hand-milled soap lathers quickly and leaves the skin lightly fragranced.

Inspired by the exhilarating crispness of mountain air and the purity of cascading alpine streams, a bracing landscape in which the Creed family find relaxation and renewal.

A contemporary scent which captures the purity of citrus notes, tea, blackcurrant and musk. Cool, clean, icy and mentholated - reminiscent of sparkling streams coursing through the snowcapped Swiss Alps.

  • Top notes: Bergamot, Mandarin, Neroli
  • Heart notes: Green Tea, Blackcurrant Bud
  • Base notes: Sandalwood, Musk

Fragrance family: Marine/Green/Fresh

name: Myla Rose Atherstone Mews Plunge Bra, Red/Pink
description:
Exquisitely embroidered and every little bit Myla, Atherstone Mews is a plunge bra with underwired darted cups. The sweet yet sexy style pops with embroidered tendrils, flowers and birds for an ethereal look.

Pair with the matching thong.

Myla Rose is an exciting new line from London-born luxury lingerie brand MYLA. Inspired by the brand’s signature colourful style, floral essence and British heritage, Myla Rose encompasses everything ‘MYLA’ into a special collection in partnership with us here at John Lewis. For the women of today who expect comfort, functionality and pretty details all rolled into one, the Myla Rose collection is a curated range of wearable everyday styles and special occasion pieces that will take you from day to night. Featuring decadent details from French laces to foil-printed embroideries and available in an extended size range, Myla Rose will bring a little luxury to the forefront of your lingerie drawer.

name: Freya Offbeat Underwired Side Support Bra, Black
description: The offbeat range is crafted from a stretch floral lace, and feature contrast colour detailing. The Underwire Side Support Bra features a four piece cup with side support and laminated side cup to offer great uplift, forward projection and support. name: KIKI Health Krill Oil, 30 Licaps
description:
KIKI’s Krill Oil are encapsulated in Licaps capsules, which offers faster product release and in turn speed the absorption of the oil.

They are easy to swallow and will not leave you with any unpleasant ­shy burps, reflux or aftertaste.

KIKI’s Krill Oil is sustainably sourced and harvested in the pristine Antarctic waters and isolated from environmental contaminants and toxins. We use low temperatures and efficient fraternisation methods, which results in unwanted salts and contaminants being removed. This concentrated form of krill oil contains choline which helps maintain normal homocysteine metabolism, normal lipid metabolism, and in addition, maintenance of normal liver function.

Our Krill Oil contains a significant source of EPA and DHA which are bound to phospholipids, resulting in the oil being more easily absorbed by the body. This ensures prompt delivery to the brain, heart and eyes. An optimal preparation process is used to preserve the krill oil’s natural qualities and ensures its freshness. These easy to swallow Licaps will not leave you with any unpleasant fishy burps, reflux or aftertaste. A beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of EPA and DHA.

Full list of ingredients:

  • Krill Oil (crustacean) (Euphausia superba)
  • Other Ingredients: Astaxanthin
  • Licaps Capsules: Piscene (fish) gelatin and water
  • Allergens: crustacean

Key Features:

Safety Information: We strongly recommend that the product should not be used with baby's arms in when they start to roll on their side. Swaddles or structured baby sleep bags are not suitable for premature or babies of low birth weight. We do not recommend this product for babies under 3kg/ 6.6lbs. Do not sure if the child can climb out of the cot. Do not use in combination with other bedding items (e.g. cot duvet).

Estimated diamond weight 0.65ct.

Buying second-hand jewellery offers the opportunity to own unique quality items in a much more sustainable way. Items that can be treasured for years and then passed on. Sourced directly from quality jewellery suppliers.

If you want to return this product, you'll need to take it back to a John Lewis & Partners shop for verification, and not return it by post or courier. We'll process your refund once the item has been returned to and checked by our specialist, so please allow us time to action your full refund.

How to have your ring resized

1.Once you've placed your order, please email your ring size directly to jewels@kojis.co.uk including your name and order number
2.If this is not received within three days, we will dispatch the ring with the size quoted on the website. Please not that the ring cannot be resized once it's dispatched. Once the ring is resized it cannot be returned.

name: John Lewis Reactive Glaze Stoneware Cereal Bowl, 15cm
description:
We've designed this cereal bowl with a colourful reactive glaze which makes every piece subtly different in look and finish. Embrace the individuality and enjoy your stoneware piece. It's dishwasher and microwave safe for easy everyday use in the modern home.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: JOY by DIOR Eau de Parfum, 50ml
description:
The new JOY by DIOR fragrance is immediate, clear and generous. Joy is finally captured in a scent, marked by both enveloping softness and energy.

An ode to pleasure and life.

An eau de parfum illuminated by the vibrant smile of flowers and citrus fruits, the smooth caress of woods and the serenity of musks.

A fragrance with a thousand nuances and facets, yet crystal-clear.

JOY by DIOR expresses this remarkable feeling of joy by offering an olfactive interpretation of light.

"This perfume resembles certain pointillist paintings that are rich with a precise, yet not too obvious, technique. It is constructed with multiple nuances, a myriad of facets that lead to an expression that is clear and self-evident." François Demachy, DIOR Perfumer-Creator.

Zested Bergamot and Mandarin explode in unison with flowers. Grasse Rose, in both Essence and Absolute form, as well as heady Jasmine, blend with these delectable fruits in a vibrant smile. Warm and creamy sandalwood embraces us in softness. An intimate signature, the clear and powdery whisper of musks creates a tender and sensual skin-on-skin effect.

Its bottle is both luminous and precious. Its femininity shines through in the brilliant silver and radiant pink of this instantly attractive juice. A bright shining silver thread wraps around the lid, like a light jewel delicately engraved with its name, which curls around in a perfect O.

For a ritual of pure pleasure and to prolong this moment of joy:

  • Apply JOY by DIOR body milk
  • Spray JOY by DIOR onto pulse points (on wrists, behind ears and on neck)

name: John Lewis Chester Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa, Dark Leg
description:
A modern twist on a classic shape, Chester features deep, feather-wrapped seat cushions and buttoned back detailing for an inviting sit, finished with brass-capped tapered legs.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Abode Atlas Monobloc 2 Lever Kitchen Tap, Matt Black
description:
This Abode Atlas monobloc kitchen tap has an elegant arch shape, a functional design by a European architect and made in Italy. The single flow and dual levers give you effortless control.

Made of metal throughout, this durable tap is solid and practical with an anti-splash spout and quarter-turn handle action for precision flow.

The tap is custom designed for mid to low-pressure home water systems.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

Choose the perfect tap for your kitchen

Below are a few options and features to consider when choosing your perfect kitchen tap. Taps are largely about style and preference although they can have several useful features:

Aerators (also called flow constrictors) These are anti-splash, but also mix air with your water, creating a good pressure, at the same time as saving water. If you are simply rinsing plates or cutlery these can give a great saving.
Filter taps These work in the same way as a water filter jug, except they filter as you draw water from the mains, therefore giving you limitless filtered water. They remove bacteria, chlorine and lead from the water supply. They also remove any pesticides and insecticides which may have got into the water system. Filtered water also helps reduce the build up of limescale in appliances. The filter cartridges for these taps need replacing every 6 months or so to retain effectiveness.
Hot taps Use a mini-boiler under the sink to provide you with instant boiling (or hot) water. You no longer need to rely on kettles or saucepans to heat water before you make a cup of tea, or boil your veg - it comes instantly from the tap. Some taps can also provide you with chilled water for cold drinks, and even sparkling water. These are great if you like fizzy drinks, but prefer to avoid additional sugar - simply mix with your favourite cordial!

description:
Designed to last in look as well as quality, our sweatshirt is softer and smoother thanks to its high-quality cotton handle. Combining a simple boat neckline, a classic sweatshirt construction and modern zip-neck detailing it's a trusted style that works well in weekend and casual looks.

John Lewis & Partners introduces a new style philosophy focused on individuality, colour and versatility.

Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch.

Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. John Lewis & Partners: it’s how you wear it.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.
This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton.
bettercotton.org/massbalance

name: Sony SRS-XE200 Waterproof Bluetooth Portable Speaker, Bright Blue
description:
Take your music collection with you wherever you go, and without a worry, with Sony’s compact and portable SRS-XE200 speaker. It’s pretty much everything-proof. Waterproof, dustproof, shockproof, and even saltwater-resistant. IP67-rated to be specific. So you can happily chuck hiking treks, camping trips, or beach parties at it …anything outdoors frankly. And with its handy strap you can easily carry it with you, attach it to a rucsac, or hang it up wherever you lay your hat.

Wide-spread Sony sound
Sony’s clever tech makes sure it spreads the sound wider than you’d expect from a compact speaker. The brand’s unique L-Shape Diffuser ensures audio is distributed evenly, further, and wider, so everyone in the group enjoys the same sound quality. Plus, unlike regular speaker cones, its X-Balanced speaker unit features a non-circular diaphragm which realises more sound pressure for a high-quality sound.

Party Connect
With Party Connect, you can connect up to 100 compatible Sony Bluetooth speakers wirelessly to enjoy synchronised sound. It’s social, it’s synchronised, and it’s Sony sound.

Calls with Echo Cancelling
And when it’s linked to your smartphone, you can use it as a speakerphone too for easy calls with friends and family. The neat Echo Cancelling feature means two people can talk at the same time without cutting out.

Multipoint Bluetooth
Two Bluetooth devices can be paired with this speaker at the same time, and easily switched between. Smooth.

Extended party power
Keep the party going ‘all day and all of the night’ with 16 hour battery life. (Or all night and on into the day if it’s a summer classic, come to think of it). And if you’ve maxxed out the power and it’s running low, just ten minutes of quick charge can eke out the party atmos for another 70 minutes.

name: EAST END PRINTS BLANC Prints 'Greenwich' Framed Print
description:
A colourful urban garden, Greenwich-style, from BLANC Prints.

This fine art-quality print on 210gsm acid-free archival paper is framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes. The acrylic glaze is light in weight and optically the same as glass. Made in the UK, it's ready to hang on your wall.

BLANC Prints UK is a brand best known for its colourful and authentic designs. It's run by a couple from Yorkshire who wanted to break the mould of standard living by bringing colour and a sense of freedom through prints into everyday life.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

    • The wide frame measures 3.5cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 36 x 31cm
  • 46 x 36cm
  • 56 x 46cm
  • 86 x 66cm

name: Natasha Barnes - 'Fragments of Nature' Canvas Print, Set of 2, 60 x 60cm, Multi
description:
A pair of abstract canvas prints by artist Natasha Barnes. Made in the UK, they're ready to hang on your wall.

Natasha Barnes is a self-taught fine artist from South Africa. Her natural talent and pure passion for painting have led Natasha to develop a profound style reflective of expressionism. The artist’s dynamic marriage of colour and texture, created via sophisticated mark making, evokes a sense of fluidity, movement and a sense of a ‘journey’ in every piece.

Natasha paints in water-based mediums and her inspirations often stem from her travels. Earthy tones reflect her South African roots and application is thick and sometimes textured. Her subject dictates the flow of the paint and forms take on an element of the unreal, moving into the world of abstraction.

The chaise seat section on this sofa is moveable so you can arrange the sofa to suit your space, with the chaise end either on the right or left.

G Plan Vintage is a furniture range inspired by classic G Plan sofas and chairs, created in collaboration with Hemingway Design. Named after the year of the original model that influenced the current designs, they blend timeless details with a contemporary approach. It's a collection that embraces the quality and craftsmanship of G Plan, as well as Hemingway's fresh and vibrant approach to vintage projects.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

name: Virtue Curl Discovery Haircare Gift Set
description:
Curl Shampoo: Hydrates. Nourishes. Repairs.

Curl Conditioner: Softens. De-Frizzes. Replenishes.

Curl Leave-In Butter: Enhances. Nourishes. Shines.

Detangle, de-frizz, nourish, hydrate, and protect curls from humidity, heat, and environmental damage with these silicone- and sulfate-free formulas.

Detangle, hydrate, and protect hair from heat, humidity, and environmental damage with nourishing sulfate-free Curl Shampoo and Conditioner and Leave-In Curl Butter, a deeply restorative yet weightless cream for a variety of curl patterns.

Virtue® Curl Shampoo is a rich, non-drying formula that gently cleanses while removing excess oils and build-up to maintain the natural curl pattern. It protects against humidity, heat, and environmental damage while mending and prepping hair for manageable, frizz-free styles.

Virtue® Curl Conditioner weightlessly detangles, de-frizzes, nourishes, and hydrates without weighing down curls. It repairs cuticle damage, rejuvenates elasticity, and protects against humidity, heat, and environmental damage for soft, silky, and strong curls.

Virtue® Curl Leave-In Butter is a healing, leave-in cream rich in reparative proteins and concentrated moisture to infuse hair with hydration, neutralise frizz, and guard from heat and humidity. Simultaneously, Alpha Keratin 60ku® repairs cracks and splits to protect against breakage, leaving curls stronger, softer, and full of shine.

Alpha Keratin 60ku® works with specially chosen hydrators and curl-optimizing polymers to facilitate natural curl patterns while repairing brittle hair that’s more prone to breakage. Virtue® Curl is the only premium curl line free of the Big Six chemicals – parabens, phthalates, silicones, sulfates, formaldehyde donors, and synthetic colourants.

Ideal for: A broad range of soft waves to highly textured curl patterns. Safe for colour-treated and chemically treated hair.

Set contains:

  • Curl Shampoo, 60ml
  • Curl Conditioner, 60ml
  • Curl Leave-In Butter, 15ml

With a neat collar neckline and bold patchwork print, it provides you with a functional yet stylish choice that'll protect you from the elements too.

description:
Make a statement in the bold, eye-catching design of our Cut Out Swimsuit. Featuring a deep plunge neckline and stunning cross back, this suit can effortlessly take you from beach to bar; wear it as a body and team it with your favourite high-waisted jeans or floaty skirt.

Double-lined and with a high elastane content which will ensure you feel sculpted, smoothed and supported, this style is cut from a premium fabric made of 100% regenerated nylon, from pre and post-consumer waste.

While we always design for comfort and confidence, due to the eye-catching back design and dropped neckline of this suit, there is not a huge amount of bust support and may not be suitable for more busty figures. If you feel the straps are a little on the loose side, try the next size down for a closer fit.

name: Waterford Crystal Cut Glass Olann Tumblers, Set of 2, 340ml, Clear
description:
Ireland is a country of words. Spoken, written or sung, the Irish are famously verbose and social people known for their warmth, hospitality and generosity. It is the Irish spirit of togetherness, sharing and interaction that inspires our Waterford Short Stories Collection. The Olann Short Stories pattern is derived from the Irish word for wool and the design is inspired by the famous Aran wool knit sweater and the Aran stitch, which is aDiamond Stitch' reminiscent of the small fields on the island. This Olann Double Old Fashioned is the ideal glass for any vintage cocktail. Perfect for gifting, the set of two is presented in classic Waterford packaging.

Choose the perfect glassware

Glass comes in a range of weights, cuts and clarity and we have a wide selection for you to choose from, designed to suit every budget and occasion.

Soda LimeVersatile and available in many colours and styles, soda lime glass is perfect for everyday use. Its ingredients are made up primarily of sand, soda ash and lime which are scientifically measured to ensure that the finished piece is exactly as desired. Soda lime is used in machine made and handmade items.
Crystal GlassFiner in quality with greater clarity than soda glass, crystal is ideal for both every day and special occasions. Crystal Glass is superior to Soda Lime Glass in quality and allows for a finer cut rim instead of rounded or rolled edges.
Lead CrystalWith a beautiful clarity, weight and resonance, lead crystal is a quality choice. To be called 'Lead', the glass has at least 24% lead oxide in its composition. Lead Crystal was traditionally used for cutting as it was often produced with a thicker wall. This glassware is to be handwashed, only.
Sparkx®Neither Soda Lime Glass nor Crystal Glass, this ultra-clear glass is pure, transparent and free of heavy metals. Plus it is resistant to attrition caused by dishwashers.
SON.hyx® This is high-tech crystal glass with all the same ingredients as Crystal Glass but also some extra properties that make it even stronger, with a better clarity. SON.hyx is more resistant to attrition from dishwashers than ordinary Crystal Glass and even Sparkx.
LUXION®100% lead-free crystal glass which replaces its former 24% lead crystal composition. It has ultra-clear transparency and exceptional resistance to dishwasher detergents whilst retaining its strength and durability. This glassware type is also 100% recyclable.
RecycledGlassware which has been recycled is handmade and reuses otherwise wasted glass.
Tempered Tempered glass is heat resistant to withstand high temperatures and the tempering process makes it durable and stronger than Soda Lime Glass.
HandmadeThis type of glassware is either handblown or mouthblown. Handmade glass can be produced in any of the glass materials listed above, depending on the quality required and capabilities of the manufacturer. Both types of glassware are usually suitable for use in the dishwasher and any occasion.
DecorativeThere are many ways to decorate glass including cutting, spraying, diamond etching, pantograph etching, silk screen printing, sand blasting, hand painting and even adding Swarovski Crystals. Such techniques can be applied to any glass material.

name: LSA International Dapple Tealight Holder, Sun Amber
description:
Expertly mouth-blown from coloured glass, this Dapple tealight holder from LSA International has fine walls and a dappled all-over texture. When a candle burns within, the undulating surface beautifully refracts the light, casting a patterned glow over the room.

Comes supplied with a tealight candle.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Candles & Home Fragrance | Candle Holders

name: Bosch Series 4 GSN36VWFPG Freestanding Freezer, White
description:
Offering flexible storage options and a frost-free design, Bosch has designed this freezer to work around your needs in the kitchen. Fitted with SuperFreeze functionality to speedily freeze your food and retain vitamins, its reversible door, variable storage options and 242L capacity make it a product of form and function.

Capacity & Storage
This upright model has 242 litres of capacity with four full-width freezer drawers and three shelves. Saving energy, the transparent freezer drawers mean you can see the contents without having to open a drawer.

Keep Your Freezer Ice Free, With No Frost
NoFrost means there's no defrosting. It keeps the freezer ice-free, so you can always be sure of maximum performance and maximum capacity.

SuperFreeze protects frozen loads
Bosch's SuperFreeze feature is able to drop the freezer's temperature and rapidly freeze your items while protecting your frozen food from defrosting when new food is added. Once the required temperature is reached, the freezer will return to its normal operation.

BigBox frozen food drawers
With the extra-deep frozen food drawers, you’ll have enough room for large frozen items like gateaux or pizzas. No matter whether you're catering for birthdays or wedding receptions, in the two BigBox drawers you'll find enough space for large frozen goods.

Flexible Sotrage Options
Bosch's VarioZone design offers flexibility thanks to removable glass shelves and drawers. You can take all the safety glass shelves out to create more space for storing larger items - handy if you want to buy the Christmas turkey a few weeks before the big day.

Extra Features

  • Audible and visual temperature warning when the door is left open
  • A reversible door hinge gives the flexibility to have a left or right side opening door

description:

  • Different textures and surfaces help develop sensory perception

Keep the herd entertained for hours with our playful elephant! Simply load in the balls, press the friendly elephant's back, and watch them pop out of its trunk! Complete with hoopla rings, they're all set to be occupied for hours while you talk to friends on the 'elephone and carry out your daily tusks!

name: Guerlain Eau de Beauté Micellar Lotion, 200ml
description:
The first essential skincare step, Eau de Beauté from Guerlain, concentrates all the effectiveness of a make-up remover, cleanser and toner for quick and effective cleansing in just one step. This unique, almost gel-like liquid is applied with a cotton pad to refresh the skin like beneficial dew. Its micelles – surfactant molecules – gently cleanse and trap the slightest impurity and every last trace of make-up on the face and eyes, while toning the skin.
 
Gentle, pure and incredibly fresh, skin is hydrated and plumped up in a single step.
 
The exclusive signature fragrance developed for Eau de Beauté enfolds the skin in a delicate scent blending the purity of white tea, the comforting freshness of musky notes and a touch of jasmine

name: Le Creuset Signature Cast Iron Round Casserole, Flint, 20cm
description:
A one-pot wonder, the Signature Cast Iron Round Casserole from Le Creuset is an iconic piece of cookware loved by generations. Updated and available in an array of carefully chosen colours, it's endlessly versatile and ideal for anything from quick and easy 30-minute meals to slow-cooked aromatic stews served as a table centrepiece.

Key features:

  • Versatile use in the oven, on the hob, under the grill or even on a barbecue
  • Lightest cast iron on the market
  • Exceptional heat retention saves energy
  • Tight-fitting domed lid helps retain moisture
  • Easy-grip side handles and ergonomic lid knob
  • Resists chipping, cracking and colour fading
  • Handcrafted, unique piece
  • Lifetime guarantee included
  • Wide choice of vibrant and classic colours available

Versatile all-rounder
Perfect for one-pot recipes for busy lives, as well as casseroles cooked over time, this all-rounder makes fragrant rice and pilaf dishes, stuffed vegetables, soups, golden-roasted potatoes, roast chicken and even bakes bread. The tight-fitting lid keeps the oven clean and is perfect when proving dough to create family-sized loaves. The easy-release interior suits baking. Use on the hob, including induction, in the oven, on an Aga, under the grill, on a barbecue or even on an open fire.

Retains heat and moisture
Made from robust cast iron, this casserole's weight is its strength. A solid performer, it distributes heat evenly and retains heat to save energy; it best operates on a low to medium setting. Transfer from oven to table and it will keep dishes warm for longer. The domed lid increases space and returns moisture to the pot to prevent dishes drying out. You need only a little oil for cooking thanks to the sand enamel interior that prevents sticking and burning. Adding a touch of water makes it ideal for steaming too.

Easy to carry and clean
The lightest cast iron on the market, this much-loved kitchen staple features large handles that are easy to grip with oven gloves. Stabilisers under the lid give a secure, no-slide fit while the lid's heat-resistant stainless steel knob is ergonomically shaped for the hand. Almost like non-stick, the toughened enamel interior is easy to wipe clean. It's also hygienic and won't absorb odours and flavours.

Built to last
Designed for longevity, this quality kitchen favourite makes a wonderful wedding gift, to be enjoyed for many memorable meals to come. Handcrafted by skilled artisans at the original Le Creuset foundry in France since 1925, each piece is made from its own sand mould, making it entirely unique. It resists chipping and cracking and retains its colour over time. All Le Creuset cast iron comes with a lifetime guarantee.

Colour your kitchen
The casserole is available in an extensive choice of colours and shades to suit your taste and your décor, from earthy Flint and deep Ultra Violet to timeless Satin Black, Cotton and Almond. Take your pick from stunning blue hues in Ink, Marseille Blue, Coastal Blue, Teal and Marine or choose Cerise or ever-classic Volcanic to add warmth to a kitchen.

Le Creuset's Cast Iron Round Casserole is available in several sizes.

Diameter Capacity Dimensions Weight
20cm 2.4L H14.1 x W21.5 x D27.3cm 3.1kg

Le Creuset Cast Iron Care

  • Remove all packaging and labels. Wash the pan in hot, soapy water, then rinse and dry thoroughly
  • Medium or low heat will provide the best results for cooking, including frying and searing
  • The enamel surface is not ideal for dry cooking
  • Always cool a hot pan for a few minutes before washing. Thermal shock may occur, resulting in cracking or loss of enamel
  • Handwash recommended

name: EAST END PRINTS HollieGraphik 'Stars' Framed Print, Oak Frame, 36 x 31cm
description:
An ideal gift for the Coldplay lover in your life, this typographic print from HollieGraphik celebrates the lyrics from the hit 'Yellow', 'Look at the stars, look how they shine for you.'

The giclée art printing process and 210gsm acid-free archival paper create an exhibition-quality art print with long-lasting colours that more closely resemble the artist's materials and tones. A digital form of the original work is stored and then printed using a commercial printer and pigment-based inks. The print is presented with an acrylic glaze that's optically the same as glass yet lighter in weight making it easier and safer to hang. Ready to hang on your wall, it's framed in obeche wood in a choice of finishes.

HollieGraphik is the brainchild of Manchester-based graphic designer Hollie Cookson. Born out of lockdown in May 2020 but a long-time goal, Hollie put her skills to work in her newfound spare time, to create music-inspired prints. Using bold and modern typography, she designs prints for music fans who want to add a pop of colour and lyrical genius into their homes. Hollie's aim was to celebrate the importance of music by creating timeless and unique designs that evoke nostalgia and memories of good times, defined by classic indie lyrics.

Have you thought about wall hooks and fittings?

EAST END PRINTS picture frames are usually one of two frame widths: medium frame (2.2cm) and wide frame (3.5cm). The frame width varies across the range.

The medium frame measures 2.2cm across and comes in the following four sizes:

  • 33.4 x 28.4cm
  • 43.4 x 33.4cm
  • 53.4 x 43.4cm
  • 83.4 x 63.4cm

  • Smooths: Bix’Activ™ helps to decrease the appearance of oiliness and visibly reduce the look of shine and pores
  • Brightens: Rose Complex targets all signs of stress in the skin including dullness, dryness, pigmentation and dark circles for skin that looks brighter, smoother, hydrated and more youthful
  • Evens: Hyalurosmooth™ targets uneven texture, dryness and dullness, and locks in moisture for a fresher, plumper, smoother and even-looking skin tone
  • Plumps: Coconut Extract improves skin’s ability to hold water by helping strengthen the skin barrier over time for plumper, younger-looking skin

  • Long-lasting with 16HR wear

*312 people tested daily over 4 weeks. **Tested on 33 people over 4 weeks. Bix’Activ™ and Hyalurosmooth™ are trademarks by BASF Beauty Care Solutions France SAS.

description:
Keep your Airpods Pro safe with this handy case, equipped with a snap hook attachment. Finished with the iconic Mulberry Tree press stud closure, use the snap hook to attach it to your keys, belt loops or bag.

Caring for your Mulberry product

To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

name: Sur La Table Colour Me Happy Stoneware Pasta Bowl, 23cm, Blue
description:
Featuring a vibrant glaze and a beautifully smooth raw base, the 'Colour Me Happy' pasta bowl from Sur La Table brings a splash of colour to the table. Designed to be enjoyed together, mix and match with the complementing colourful bowls in the range to create a truly striking tableware set. The bowl is dishwasher and microwave safe for everyday use.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

Its fluid, fresh and lightweight texture blends perfectly with the skin. It provides a bare-skin feel, an undetectable finish, and very light coverage.

A range of natural and radiant shades suitable for all skin tones from fair to dark.

A new classification makes it easier to choose shades:

Benefits:

Key ingredients:

  • Aqua-Lock complex (a cocktail of water captor key ingredients): Aquatic Mint extract, Plant-based sugar): provides freshness and immediate hydration
  • Vita-Light complex (Kiwi + Acerola extracts): boosts complexion radiance and enhances the energy and vitality of the skin

name: John Lewis + Swoon Roche Stoneware Serving Bowl, 27.8cm
description:
Designed by Swoon, made by us. With a shared commitment to exceptional design and quality, we've collaborated to create an exclusive collection for the modern home.

The Roche range has been designed with contemporary everyday living in mind. Made of durable stoneware and glazed with a well-considered colour pallet, the range has a subtle embossed texture. This serving bowl is microwave and dishwasher safe for everyday use.

Choose the perfect china

All our china is made from clay and kiln-fired for durability. Except for pieces with special trims, everything is dishwasher-safe. Below are a few options to consider when choosing your perfect china.

EarthenwareStrong and practical, earthenware is often a little thicker than other ceramics, making it ideal for everyday use.
StonewareFired at high temperatures, stoneware is very tough and heat-resistant. It comes in a number of different glaze finishes.
PorcelainAffordable yet luxurious, porcelain is renowned for its translucency. Fired at high temperatures, porcelain has an extremely tough glazed surface, making it durable.
Fine china The synthetic bone ash used in fine china makes it a more affordable alternative to bone china. Like bone china, it's strong, translucent and delicate, and creamier in colour.
New bone china A type of porcelain with added calcium oxide to achieve a similar aesthetic as bone china, but without animal bone ash.
Bone china White bone china is the strongest and most translucent ceramic. Though it looks delicate, it's tough enough for daily use and is usually dishwasher-safe. It contains at least 35% bone ash.

name: Amazon Echo Dot Smart Speaker with Alexa Voice Recognition & Control, 5th Generation (2022), Charcoal
description:
The 5th Gen Echo Dot offers an improved audio experience compared to any previous model, for clearer vocals, deeper bass and vibrant sound. It has a sleek, compact design that fits virtually anywhere, ideal for smaller spaces. And you can ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, make calls, and give you info like the latest news, sports results, weather, and more.

Amazon Audio
Use your voice to request a song, artist, or genre through streaming services like Amazon Music, Apple Music, Spotify, Deezer, and more (subscriptions may apply). Using other compatible Echo devices (sold separately) in different rooms, you can link them up for multi-room music, and fill the home with your favourite music, radio, podcasts, and Audible audio-books.

Alexa Skills
Access Alexa’s tens of thousands of skills by simply asking. You can set timers, add items to lists, and create calendar events and reminders to keep you on schedule. Listen to the news, and check the latest sport scores, or the weather. All with just your voice.

Control compatible devices
You can manage other compatible smart home devices using just your voice. So you could switch on the lamp before getting out of bed, dim the lights to watch a film, or adjust the thermostat without leaving the sofa. Other compatible smart devices are sold separately.

Keep in touch
With multiple devices, you can drop in on other rooms throughout the home, or make an announcement to every room with a compatible Echo device. So you can let the family know dinner’s ready or remind the kids that it’s bedtime. Stay in touch with friends and family with compatible devices too, with hands-free calling.

Privacy built-in
It’s built with multiple layers of privacy protection. The Microphone Off button electronically disconnects the microphones, and you have control over voice recordings and can view, hear or delete them whenever you like.

Eero built-in
You can turn this Echo device into a Wi-Fi extender in minutes, with compatible Echo and eero devices (UK, US & Canada only). Your Wi-Fi network must use a compatible eero router and the Echo device must stay in range of a compatible eero device. You will need to link your eero and Amazon accounts and manage eero Built-in from the eero mobile app. eero Built-in compatible Echo devices support up to 1,000 square feet (92 square metres) of additional coverage, speeds up to 100 Mbps, and 10 or fewer connected devices in the 5 GHz band. Actual performance can vary and certain eero, Echo, or Alexa features may be incompatible with eero Built-in.

Some services may require subscription.

A Smart Speaker is a platform that can run 3rd party Apps. 3rd party content providers may remove Apps from the Smart platform or stop supporting them at any time, and we cannot guarantee an App’s availability. When new Smart products are launched, there may also be a delay before certain Apps become available. Availability of Apps is not included within the terms of the manufacturer’s warranty, or the John Lewis 2-year Guarantee for audio visual products, or the 5-year Guarantee for TVs.

name: Apple iPhone 13, iOS, 6.1", 5G, SIM Free, 256GB, Blue
description:
Everything you know and love about the iPhone made better. Apple has kitted out the newest iteration of their flagship phone with their most advanced dual-camera system yet, along with a lightning-fast chip that makes browsing, gaming, and video calling a cinch. Encased in a durable, flat-edge design that's water-resistant, it's protected from the bumps and knocks of everyday life. All this, and they've still managed to fit in a bigger battery that'll see you through the day and well into the night.

5G enabled
Get ready for the next generation of mobile internet and experience incredible download speeds, or play games without the fear of lag. Please contact your mobile service provider regarding the 5G options currently available to you.

Super Retina XDR display
Now 28% brighter than predecessors, the super-bright OLED display makes scrolling, liking, reading, and just about everything, easier when you're out and about. Ultra-high pixel density means photos, videos and text look extra-sharp, and the display is even more expansive, thanks to a smaller TrueDepth camera area.

You've never looked so good on screen
Just about everything on the iPhone 13's camera has been upgraded. The new dual setup reveals more detail in the dark areas of your photos, along with image stabilisation tech that keeps shots steady even when you're not. Night Mode now features on the front-facing camera, meaning better selfies after sundown, and Photographic Styles apply your preferred Tone and Warmth settings to your photos automatically.

When filming, capture cinema-style moments with the new Cinematic Mode that adjusts focus automatically as you record; even allowing you to edit the depth effect when the shoot's over. HDR video with Dolby Vision lets you shoot home movies in 4K & 60fps, while Deep Fusion helps capture even the subtlest textures, patterns and details.

Lightning speed
The lightning-fast A15 Bionic is a speed-boosting, camera-elevating, reality-augmenting, power-optimising, privacy-protecting, game-changing chip. The updated CPU and GPU makes tackling processor-heavy tasks a cinch; helping you make the most of the features like Live Text, Apple ProRAW and 4K Dolby Vision video.

Designed for living
Safeguarding against unexpected bumps and knocks, the Ceramic Shield is tougher than any smartphone glass, whilst the fingerprint-resistant coating helps keep your phone looking glamorous. IP68 water resistance also means there's no need to worry if you accidentally drop it in the bath either. We still don't recommend taking a dip with this device, however.

A battery that lasts all day, and then some
The iPhone 13 lasts more than 2.5 hours longer than the iPhone 12. You'll be able to run apps like YouTube for over 15 hours without the need to grab the nearest charger, and if you're listening to music or an audiobook, it's even longer at 75 hours.

Wireless charging
If you own a MagSafe or Qi wireless charging pad (sold separately) you can enjoy effortless powering up - just connect or place your iPhone 13 onto the pad as usual to commence.


Please be aware: Apple do not provide wall (plug) chargers or wired EarPods with this device.


What is SIM free?
You'll receive the iPhone without having to commit to any network, leaving you free to decide which SIM card to use in the device. This gives you the opportunity to find the most suitable plan, whether that's contract or pay-as-you-go, throughout the lifetime of the phone. You also have the option to add a foreign SIM card, so you can use the device overseas.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan - this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.


We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.
