name: 2022 Apple iPad Pro 12.9", M2 Processor, iOS, Wi-Fi & Cellular, 128GB, Space Grey
description:
The ultimate iPad just got a serious upgrade. Supercharged by Apple’s M2 processor, the 12.9” 2022 iPad Pro delivers astonishing performance, an amazingly advanced display, and stunning speed. Fitted with a Liquid Retina XDR display, a 12MP 122° field of view front camera, plus 12MP wide & 10MP ultra-wide rear cameras, your photos, videos, entertainment and games all look staggeringly good. This is a Pro level iPad experience.

Supercharged by M2
Say hello to next-gen performance. An evolution of Apple Silicon chip technology, the M2 processor delivers even more of the power and efficiency introduced by the M1. Blaze through your work with a more powerful 8-core CPU, and create stunning graphics with a lightning-fast 10-core GPU. With a 40 per cent faster Neural Engine to accelerate machine learning tasks and 50 per cent more memory bandwidth, M2 brings astonishing performance and new capabilities to iPad Pro.

5G speed
Get ready for the next generation of mobile internet and experience incredible download speeds, or play games without the fear of lag. Please contact your mobile service provider regarding the 5G options currently available to you.

Liquid Retina XDR display
iPad Pro’s Liquid Retina XDR display delivers crisp detail with a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, making viewing and editing HDR photos and videos, and enjoying your favourite movies and TV shows, a visual dream. It features 1,000 nits of full-screen brightness and 1,600 nits of peak brightness, while advanced display technologies such as P3 wide colour, True Tone and ProMotion keep everything supremely smooth and authentically lifelike.

Stunning photo and video capability
Featuring a front-facing, ultra-wide camera with a 12MP sensor and a 122 degree field of view, you’re all set to look your best for FaceTime and superior selfies.

The iPad Pro’s rear 12MP wide and 10MP ultra-wide cameras are able to help you capture exceptional photos and videos. And with support for ProRes video capture, iPad Pro is a complete mobile video studio. Thanks to the more powerful ISP in the M2 chip, iPad Pro now features Smart HDR 4 for even more true-to-life imagery.

LiDAR Scanner
The LiDAR scanner measures how long it takes light to reflect back from objects, so it can create a depth map of any space you’re in and unlock the world of immersive AR experiences.

Face ID security
Thanks to Face ID, it takes just a glance to unlock your iPad, or a gentle swipe up to access features. It's engineered for secure unlocking, and works in both portrait and landscape orientations. You can even log-in to apps and pay securely with just a glance, so there's less passwords to remember.

The speed of Thunderbolt
The supremely fast and versatile Thunderbolt port works with existing USB-C connectors and opens up an extensive ecosystem of high-performance accessories, such as external storage, displays, and docks. It’s capable of data transfer speeds of up to 40Gb/s.

Pro accessories
Apple Pencil, Magic Keyboard and the Smart Keyboard Folio open up even more ways to use your iPad Pro. Draw a masterpiece, take notes or make a business plan. These versatile accessories are designed to take your work and creativity to the next level. All accessories are sold separately.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device’s lifespan – this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.

name: John Lewis Enamel Steel Non-Stick Shallow Casserole & Glass Lid, 28cm
description:
Our Enamel Steel cookware is built to last and designed to make cooking easier. The high-quality enamel steel is finished with a stainless steel rim which protects the exterior coating.

The two-layer marble non-stick coating provides excellent food release and makes each pan easy to clean. The Bakelite handle is comfortable to hold and stays cool when the pan is on the hob. All of our pans have a stainless steel base as this provides the magnetism to use on an induction hob.

Key benefits:

  • High-quality enamel cookware with two-layer marble non-stick
  • Stainless steel rim protects the shallow casserole
  • Stay-cool Bakelite handles
  • Non-stick surface
  • Dishwasher safe but washing by hand recommended
  • Glass lid with steam vent
  • Made in Spain

  • Suitable for use on all hobs, including induction

Getting the most from your induction pans
All of our John Lewis induction pans are tested to British and European standards for safety and performance. To ensure the functionality of induction pans, it is important to make sure the magnetic circuit with the hob isn't broken by:

  • Making sure the size of the pan base is no smaller than the hob 'ring'
  • Using pans with a flat base
  • Not lifting the pan off the hob top continuously
  • Giving coated and aluminium pans with steel bases more time to heat, as the aluminium sides do not heat directly from the hob
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Cooking & Baking | Pots & Pans

name: Pure Collection Cashmere Crew Neck Jumper, Ocean

name: Bosch Series 6 KAG93AIEPG Freestanding 70/30 American Fridge Freezer, Stainless Steel Effect
description:
Don't be fooled by its charming looks. A stainless steel exterior isn't the only thing that's great about this fridge freezer - there's loads of handy stuff inside too. Bosch has kitted you out with frost-free tech to help maximise space, along with supercooling controls for the fridge and a plumbed water and ice dispenser.

More room for your groceries
You won't have a problem fitting your groceries into the KAG93AIEPG. The fridge has a capacity of 366L, two salad crisper drawers that'll keep your fruit and veg fresh and tasty and five shelves to store chilled favourites. The 165L freezer also offers two drawers to accommodate your frozen goods, with clear front panels to make checking on your food easy.

Plumbed water & ice dispenser
On those hotter summer days, a chilled drink really hits the spot. With the plumbed water and ice dispenser, you can enjoy cool beverages with ease. Add cubed and crushed ice to your favourite beverages and keep everybody happy.

Frost free design saves you work & energy
Forget chipping away at sheets of ice at the bottom of your freezer. NoFrost technology reduces the humidity inside the freezer to prevent ice layers from forming. So it won't be a battle to just pull out the ice cream.

Fast Freeze protects frozen loads
The stress of having to unpack ice cream before it melts is no more. The handy fast freeze function rapidly freezes your groceries as well as making sure any food that's already in the drawers doesn't defrost as you unpack this week's shopping.

Reliable shelving with safety glass
All the shelves are made from extra strong, easy-to-clean safety glass. If something tips over, the spillage is contained and does not spill into the rest of the refrigerator compartment.

Bottle Rack
Free up the rest of your fridge by keeping your wine in the handy built-in rack designed to keep wine bottles in place.

LED Temperature Display
With separate controls for the fridge and freezer compartments, this appliance gives you more control over how your food is stored. You can set the temperatures to match your own specific preferences, and adjust them as and when your needs change.

Audible Temperature Alarm
That midnight snack won't come back to haunt you in the morning anymore. If the doors have been left open, you will be alerted by an audible alarm, helping you save energy as well as preserving the freshness of your food.

name: Laura Mercier Real Flawless Weightless Perfecting Foundation, 0W1 Satin
description:
Re-Define Perfecting Coverage. Forget. Protect. A weightless, long-wearing foundation that blurs the line between makeup and skin with medium buildable coverage and 12 hours of waterproof and fade-proof wear.

Re-define perfecting coverage with this multifunctional foundation to reveal a healthier-looking complexion. Featuring the Perfecting Colour Technology to lift sallowness and dullness for cake-free, colour-true wear. The Auto-Balancing Technology instantly hydrates for smoother skin and helps reduce shine throughout the day.

Benefits:

  • Blurs the look of imperfections, pores, fine lines
  • Improves skin tone and texture
  • Long-wearing for 12 hours

Clinical claims:

  • Controls oil immediately
  • Improves skin texture in 6 weeks
  • Improves hydration for 24 hours
  • Humidity/Sweat/Water-proof
  • Dermatologist tested
  • Non-Comedogenic
  • Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin

Sustainability Note: glass bottle is recyclable

Based on a consumer test of 63 participants:

  • 94% said it feels comfortable on skin
  • 90% said it blends seamlessly into skin and stays comfortable throughout the day
  • 87% said complexion looks healthier
  • 86% said it creates a more even-looking complexion

name: Ele Pack - 'Above & Below' Abstract Framed Print & Mount, 80 x 70cm, Purple/Multi
description:
A framed print of an abstract work, 'Above & Below' by artist Ele Pack. This giclee print has a cotton core mount in a handmade and hand-finished sustainably sourced solid ash wood frame. Made in the UK by museum specialists and printed on heavyweight, matt-smooth fine art paper, it's ready to hang on your wall.

Ele Pack received her degree in Fine Art Painting from Loughborough College of Art and now lives and works in Brighton. She has exhibited her paintings in the UK, Germany, Sweden and the US and was commissioned to create 12 bespoke paintings for London's Cadogan Hotel in Sloane Street, Chelsea.

Ele states that her recent work has, "taken inspiration from the ocean, nature and the natural world. I seek to make images that have a feeling of light and space, the landscape and the sea, without being a literal representation. Living on the coast in Brighton has had a definite influence, with much of the new work conveying the openness and feel of space, depth and water."

name: DIOR Forever Skin Glow Foundation, 2N
description:
Beautify your complexion with the Dior Forever Skin Glow foundation that enhances the face with a radiant finish for 24h**. It hydrates the skin and visibly improves the complexion.

Instantly, the complexion is harmonious and even. After one week, the skin is visibly more hydrated and plumped. After one month, it is more beautiful and visibly more radiant.

Available in more than 40 shades created to match all skin tones, the Dior Forever Skin Glow foundation is also clean.* Learn more about our commitment and ingredients in the Formula section. Formulated with an 86%*** skincare base, it contains extracts of wild pansy for hydration, hibiscus and nasturtium for radiance and Iris for its antioxidant properties and iris for its protective properties. Tested on sensitive skin, it is non-comedogenic and offers up to SPF20 protection.

  • Shades 0.5N to 4WO are formulated with SPF20 protection
  • Shades 5N to 9N are formulated with SPF15 protection

No change to the shades: order your usual shade.

*Clean: carefully selected list of ingredients complying with the Dior Responsible Beauty Charter. **Instrumental test on 20 women. ***Skincare base: 86% of the formulation comes from ingredients used in Dior skincare.

name: Totally About You Personalised Evolution Water Bottle, 500ml, Yellow
description:
Choose from a selection of fonts and have a name laser engraved up the bottle to add that complete personalised finish. Laser engraving reveals the natural stainless steel silver beneath, this means your name will not rub off over time as you take your bottle out and about.

These stunningly styled bottles from onegreenbottle are triple walled stainless steel vacuum insulated isothermal water bottles designed to keep your beverage cool for 24hrs or hot for 12hrs. The sports cap and the internal straw inside these bottles are colour matched to the colour of the bottle and the straw is made from food grade silicone. Perfect for refilling and reusing on the go. BPA and BPS free for safe, everyday hydration.

Ditch single use plastic and know that onegreenbottle will reclaim 25 plastic bottles from the ocean using the plastic bank scheme, for every bottle sold. The outside of the bottle is powder coated to make it more durable, so hand washing is recommended. The inside of the bottle is pure 304 Stainless Steel with no linings or coatings. Because the triple insulated bottle will retain heat we recommend a temperature of 80c max and advise to open with care when using hot water.

How to personalise your product

Consider the personalisation you would like. There is a 20 character limit for the name.

    1. Place your order.

    2. Choose your name (maximum 20 characters).

    3. Choose your favourite font (dolphin, steel, rocky or bumble).

    4. Email your personalisation details directly to johnlewis@totallyaboutyou.co.uk, including your name and order number.

If you are purchasing this as a gift and do not wish the recipient to be contacted, please ensure that you put your own contact details for this order. You may be contacted by the supplier about your order.

Refund policy
We can't offer refunds or exchanges on personalised goods, unless faulty or not as described. Find out more. This does not affect your statutory rights.

This two-door wardrobe has three drawers at the bottom and the right-hand door has an external mirror. The interior has a single compartment with two shelves and a hanging rail, all of which are fully adjustable to suit your requirements.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: John Lewis Charlotte High Back Small 2 Seater Leather Sofa, Dark Leg
description:
The traditional Charlotte range combines gently flared scrolled arms and tapered legs for an elegant look with fibre-filled cushions you can really sink into. This high back version gives even more support.

Environmentally friendly fillings
We use Quallofil® Blue fibres in our Charlotte range as a more sustainable choice than chemical-based foam fillings. Quallofil® Blue fibres are made using 50% recycled plastic from Plastic Bank; a globally recognised and award-winning solution to stop ocean plastic whilst improving the lives of people living in poverty, who collect the plastic. These fibres give firm, controlled support and are long-lasting so they'll retain the cushion's original appearance instead of becoming squashed and flat over time.

Sustainably sourced timber
We make sure Charlotte's timber frames are sourced from carefully managed, sustainable forests.

Sustainable manufacturing
We’re proud to work with Westbridge, our manufacturing partner based in North Wales who make our Charlotte range of sofas for us. Westbridge have been making more environmentally friendly choices for over a decade and haven’t sent anything to landfill since 2007. They also continue to work hard to offset their carbon footprint by introducing energy-saving procedures and equipment throughout their factory.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Denby Quartz Jade Bottle Vase, H20cm, Green
description:
John Lewis & Partners + Denby is a collaboration of colour, texture and passion, created together with skill and care in Derbyshire, England. Our unique Quartz Jade pottery range of contemporary stoneware is handcrafted with a rich, textural glaze in subtle shades of green and soft blues.

Presented in a Denby gift box this vase is inspired by the early salt glaze bottles produced by Denby in the late 19th century. A contemporary take on a simple form, its narrow opening is ideal for displaying a single favourite stem or a few choice flowers.

Each piece of Denby stoneware is handcrafted using pottery techniques passed down through generations and can pass through as many as 20 pairs of hands during the making process. Every item of pottery is expertly glazed by skilled craftsmen and the distinctive glazes are renowned for their practicality and durability.

name: John Lewis Textured Weave Recycled Polyester Thermal Lined Pencil Pleat Door Curtain, Pale Blue, W117 x Drop 213cm
description:
Help protect those heating bills by blocking out cold draughts from your front door. This single panel door curtain has a thermal lining that protects the heat inside your room, whilst stopping any pesky draughts from creeping in.

Made with a textured weave and in plain colours, there are plenty of options to choose from to suit your home styling.

Choosing the right size
These curtains can be hung with a pole or track using curtain hooks (not included). There are three hook positions on the heading, allowing you to choose how your curtains sit against the track or pole. For example, if you're using a track you may want to use the middle or lower row of hooks to cover the track, whereas if you're using a pole you may want to use the top row of hooks so the curtains hang below the rings. The specified drop is taken from the top row of hook pockets to the bottom edge of the curtain.
The width stated indicates the size of one curtain panel when laid completely flat.

Worth knowing...
We package our curtains in recycled materials to keep them protected whilst they make their way to you. This means that when they arrive there could be some creases in them. We recommend you hang them for a few days to allow them to flatten and for the creases to fall out. If after this period your curtains still show signs of being folded then follow the ironing instructions on the back of the packaging. Be aware that each style of curtain has different ironing instructions, including heat limitations according to the fabric, so do make sure you follow the guidance provided to get the best results.

Do you need a curtain pole and accessories? Shop them here.

description: This thick, hard-wearing natural coir pile doormat features three majestic tigers sitting in a fun, spotty print just waiting to welcome you home. Coir makes an excellent material for doormats as its roughness is good for removing mud. Plus, all it needs is a brush to keep it clean.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Short Sleeve Custom Slim Polo Shirt, Deckwash White/C8645
description:
An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original.

This trim version is made from a highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a super-soft handle.

Made in Ralph’s Custom Slim Fit, this polo has a trim silhouette in between their Classic and Slim Fit. Tailored through the waist with bicep hugging sleeves, a ribbed collar and embroidered pony at the chest complete the iconic design.

Ideal for smart-casual styling throughout the seasons, this polo looks just as at home with denim as it does with slim chinos and leather boat shoes.

name: Cybex PRIAM Lux Carry Cot Plus
description:
The PRIAM Lux Carry Cot is ideal for babies from birth until they’re six months old. Simply click the carrycot to the Priam Frame and your stroller is ready to go. Approved for overnight sleeping, the carrycot is perfect for sophisticated and comfortable family travelling wherever the adventure takes you. The spacious unit boasts generous dimensions and maximum comfort for baby, now at a higher position when on the pushchair frame, closer to the parent. The PLUS fabric has a unique melange textured appearance, as well as enhanced durability - for a comfortable feel.

Closer Contact
By using the same adapters for the infant car seat and the cot, the latter can now be placed in a higher position to ensure closer contact with your baby.

Front Pocket
The new pocket with a zipper is a convenient place to store all parents’ belongings.

Breathable Soft Foam Mattress
The interior memory foam mattress and its lining - made out of 100% cotton - offer maximum comfort and excellent breathability for your baby.

Panorama Sky View Windows
Two different mesh windows improve air circulation and provide a panorama view. Once opened, a tidy storage for the panorama view window flap is provided.

Sun Canopy with Integrated Sun Visor
The sun canopy provides UPF50+ sun protection and has an extendable visor which offers extra shade.

Carrying Handle
Carrying the cot is always balanced and easy thanks to the integrated carrying handle in the canopy.

Ensure the carrycot clicks onto the chassis securely before using it.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy

name: LG Styler S3BF Steam Clothing Care System
description:
The easy to use LG Styler S3BF Steam Clothing Care System has been created to refresh your clothes at home, no matter if they’re creased or require a gentle drying. It can even eliminate germs and odours, as well as clean and sanitise fabrics and items that are difficult or impossible to wash.

How it works
Thanks to the use LG Styler S3BF Steam Clothing Care System’s intuitive touch pad, you can quickly select the required cycle for your items. The unique moving hanger helps to shake off odours and wrinkles, whilst TrueSteam sanitises your clothes.

TrueSteam technology
LG’s TrueSteam technology will remove up to 99.9% of allergens from clothes as well as sterilising bacteria, so it’s ideal for allergy sufferers or those with sensitive skin.

SmartThinQ
Download the SmartThinQ app and get set to operate the LG Styler S3BF Steam Clothing Care System or monitor precious garments from anywhere, anytime. Track the device’s energy consumption or use Cycle Download to add newly developed care cycles.

Refresh your space
LG Styler’s dehumidify cycle helps to refresh surrounding clothes and atmosphere, so your clothes refreshed, as well as your indoor space. Just select the appropriate cycle and keep the door open at least 45º.

Helpful features
Keep your trouser creases looking crisp whilst reducing general wrinkling, or with the Gentle Dry cycle you can quickly dry delicates, including silk and cashmere – best of all, there’s no need to feel fear dreaded shrinking or damage. You can even download tailor-made courses for special fabrics.

So quiet it's worth shouting about
Quiet Mark approval means sounds are kept to a minimum and you're not disturbed by excess noise. Handy if you've an open-plan living space.

  • Supply tank: 1.7L
  • Drain tank: 1.8L
  • Capacity: 3 clothing Items
  • Cable Length: 190cm

    • Cycles available
    Refresh Normal/Light/Heavy; Special Wools Knits/Suit Coats/Sports Wear; Dry Normal/Rain Snow/Dehumidification; Sanitary Normal/Bedding/Fine Dust/Heavy Duty; Downloaded Trouser Wrinkle Care/Leather Care/Static Removal/Jean Care/Down Jacket Care

name: John Lewis Nordmann Fir Real Christmas Tree
description:
Bring home the magic of Christmas with a high-quality real tree that will both look beautiful and fill your home with a fresh, festive scent.

We work with our growers to bring you the best available trees, carefully grown and selected in Scotland, for maximum freshness and transported to you efficiently to minimise damage.

Each tree takes 10 years of individual care and attention by professional Christmas tree growers to ensure it becomes a fitting seasonal centrepiece for your home.

Each type of tree requires very careful management and growing premium quality Christmas trees is a skilled and rare profession.

Our Nordman fir trees (up to 8 feet) are grown on the edge of a small village hidden deep in the Scottish borders on a farm that has produced some of the best trees available each and every year. A dedicated team has perfected the art of nurturing the trees in their early years, before using a specialist hand pruning method to shape them into perfect specimens.

Trees 8ft and above are grown on two farms deep in the hills beyond Loch Lomond and near the coast north of Fife. They are carefully tended to for over ten years using a range of special equipment to give a lovely shape.

Your tree will be hand-selected, especially for you and arrive with full care instructions. Please note that the stand is not included.

Refund policy

name: Tommee Tippee Grobag Rainbow Print Stage 3 Sleeping Bag, 1 Tog, White/Multi
description:
Especially useful to help those wriggly little ones regulate their temperature while sleeping, this Stage 3 sleep bag from Tommee Tippee is reassuringly snug on top but with plenty of legroom so they can stretch out with no loose blankets for them to kick off. 85% of babies sleep better* in Tommee Tippe's Grobags.

Made for comfort the sleep bag is designed using soft, 100% cotton-rich, fluorescent-free fabric, perfect for a comfortable night's sleep. Plus no sleep bag is safer, all Tommee Tippee's sleepwear products are safety tested and approved and adhere to British and European Safety Standards.

This version comes with a fun rainbow print that works with most nursery themes.

Key features:

  • 6-18m is suitable for children 18-25lbs / 8.16–11.34 kg (65-80cm). 18-36m is suitable for children from 25lbs / 11.34 kg upwards (80-95cm)
  • SnugFit™ design - Slim fitting through the chest, with a roomy, hip-healthy bottom to allow your baby to adopt a natural "frog-legged" sleeping position, which is important for correct hip development
  • A safer alternative to loose sheets and blankets – baby enjoys a safe and comfortable sleep, with no loose sheets to get tangled up in or kick off during the night.
  • Easy nappy changes – an easy zip opening that’s perfect for night-time nappy changes, meaning you can keep baby cosy and warm at the top but can unzip from the bottom for a quick-change
  • All Tommee Tippee's products have been safety tested and approved giving you reassurance and your baby a comfortable safe night’s sleep.
  • Super comfy feel - touchably soft, cotton-rich, fluorescent-free fabric for a cosy night's sleep

Good to know: A tog measurement is a European warmth rating: the higher the tog, the warmer the product. Tommee Tippee baby sleep bags are available in 0.2, 1.0, 2.5 and 3.5 togs. Always ensure you dress your baby in the correct clothing to suit your room temperature, see Tomme Tippee packs for guidance.

name: John Lewis Java II Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa, Metal Leg
description:
Redesigned to more modern proportions, Java II features slender legs, generous bolster style arms and innovative Cortec™ pocket spring technology for a supportive sit.

Comfort and sustainability
We use innovative Cortec™ pocket springs to give excellent support in the Java II. These springs help retain the cushion shapes so they stay firmer for longer compared to foam seats. The air in the pockets also allows for natural ventilation, keeping upholstery clean and fresh, and with no glue used the springs are 100% recyclable.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

To celebrate Pride 2022, Playful Promises designed the 'Love is Love' capsule collection. Each piece is named after leading LGBTQ figures throughout history and this set is named after Marsha P. Johnson, an American LGBTQ+ liberation activist and drag queen. Johnson was an outspoken activist for gay rights and one of the prominent figures in the Stonewall uprising of 1969.

Featuring beautiful teal floral embroidery in the centre this suspender belt has a sheer mesh back and 4 adjustable suspender straps. Match with the Marsha bra and knickers for the ultimate lingerie set.

name: AEG MBE2658SEB Integrated Microwave, Black
description:
No matter the size and shape of your kitchen, the MBE2658SEB integrated microwave oven from AEG can be easily installed and boasts a contemporary design that's sure to bring a touch of style to your home cooking.

Touch to open
It's been designed with an electronic, touch-activated door. Opening with just a tap, it provides quick and convenient access.

Easy access to customised functions
Frequently used microwave settings can be saved and accessed quickly with favourite functions. Once a customised programme has been set, simply activate it via the star-shaped icon. No need to remember the exact settings each time.

Sleek design for quick cleaning
Cleaning at its most convenient. Its sleek design means that there is nowhere for dirt to get stuck. With no buttons, it's just a smooth glass surface, ensuring a spotless finish every time.

Defrost quickly and efficiently
Frozen flavours are unlocked quickly with the defrost function. Select the food type and the weight, and it will start after automatically calculating the time required. This ensures fast results while preserving taste and texture.

Additional features:

  • 900 watt microwave power
  • End of cook cycle signal
  • Child lock function
breadcrumbs: Electricals | Microwaves & Cooking Appliances | Microwave Ovens

name: CHANEL Rouge Coco Ultra Hydrating Lip Colour, 412 Téhéran
description:
ROUGE COCO, the iconic CHANEL lipstick, reinvented. A new formula for more sensoriality and hydration all day long. A new range of shades inspired by the close friends of Mademoiselle Chanel, those who simply called her Coco. The ROUGE COCO clique is composed of 24 shades: Arthur, Adrienne, Roussy, Dimitri and more.

  • The combination of three vegetable waxes−mimosa, jojoba and sunflower−hydrates, nourishes the lips and ensures immediate and lasting comfort.

Please note that vintage jewellery was produced prior to the introduction of the 2002 law prohibiting the use of nickel or nickel compounds. Customers allergic to these metals may experience skin rashes or irritation where the metal is in contact with the skin.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Tablet with Bluetooth S Pen, Android, 8GB RAM, 256GB, Wi-Fi, 11"
description:
Samsung's Galaxy Tab S8 gives you everything you want in a tablet, and more. Be more productive with three apps running on screen at once, enjoy more vibrant, cinematic visuals on its 11" LTPS LCD display with 120Hz refresh rate, and stay connected with Google Duo calling. It features a Qualcomm Snapdragon processor, 8GB RAM, a 12MP Ultra Wide camera that adapts to who’s on the call, quad speakers tuned by AKG with Dolby Atmos technology, and a Bluetooth S Pen for serious multi-tasking. Its super-fast processor will let you join video calls, stream movies and run multiple apps with ease.

S Pen with Air Actions
Samsung’s Bluetooth S Pen has been designed to look and feel like a regular pen writing on a piece of paper, so every movement will feel totally natural. Take notes or make illustrations – the S Pen will make your writing and drawing smooth and simple. Thanks to the S Pen’s built-in Bluetooth sensor, you can control your presentations with Air Actions, and it magnetically attaches to the rear of the tablet and starts charging as soon as it connects.

Super-fast processor
Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 houses the powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, enabling multiple apps running smoothly, brilliantly reactive gaming action, and smooth scrolling and streaming.

What is RAM?
RAM (Random Access Memory) is different to the permanent storage provided by hard disk drives (HDD), solid state drives (SSD) or memory cards in your equipment. RAM is used by your device to temporarily store data to carry out everyday operations. The more RAM your machine has, the faster you can expect it to open and run programs.

This device has 8GB of RAM.

Be immersed
Galaxy Tab S8's 11" WQXGA (2560 x 1600) display with a super-smooth 120Hz refresh rate gives you an immersive and cinematic experience with superb detail, rich colour and deep blacks.

Capture the moment
The Galaxy Tab S8’s 12MP Ultra Wide front camera will ensure your selfies and video chats look fabulous. It will zoom out if you have company, and always follow the speaker.

With dual 13MP + 6MP (ultra wide) rear camera lenses, you’re all set for capturing those special moments – and making sure everyone stays in the shot.

Samsung DeX
Want to leave your laptop at home? Helpfully, Samsung’s DeX technology means you can connect your Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 to Samsung’s Keyboard Cover (sold separately) for an immersive, desktop PC-like experience.

Great qualities
The memory card slot enables expandable storage up to 1TB (memory card sold separately), whilst Fast Charging means you’ll be back up and running in no time.

There’s also AKG tuned quad speakers with Dolby Atmos technology to provide a rich soundscape for all your games and shows.

And with an onscreen optical fingerprint scanner, you just need to tap the screen to unlock this device.


Please note: Use of Google Duo requires a Google account.


We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.

About your new rug

  • We recommend John Lewis & Partners Rug Hold Underlay. It prevents your rug from moving underfoot and protects against colour transfer to the floor
  • Natural fibres may shed. This will reduce over time, and shouldn’t affect your rug’s lifespan or performance
  • When vacuuming your rug, use suction only. Rotating brushes may damage the fibres
  • Blot any spills with a clean, dry cloth. Do not rub or use harsh detergents.
  • Textile backed

The John Lewis Foundation: This rug has been handmade in an area of India where not all children have access to education. Through the John Lewis Foundation, which was set up to help improve the well-being of disadvantaged communities, we have worked with a local charity Care & Fair India to fund the building and running of a new school offering secondary education to teenage girls who would not otherwise have this opportunity.

John Lewis Foundation, a registered charity: 11181620.The John Lewis Foundation was established to benefit communities in the UK and overseas. Since 2007, it's supported 50 charities in 9 countries promoting education, enterprise and employment.

name: Treat Republic Personalised Brass Sundial & Compass
description:
A special brass compass with a unique sundial feature below which is a fully operational nautical compass. It's made with highly polished brushed brass, which adds charm to the product and it's also sent out with a protective pouch, in which the compass can also be kept when not displayed.

The lid can be personalised with up to 90 characters. Meaningful messages make the compass a lifelong keepsake for the travellers and adventurers in your life, reminding them to either always come back home to you or to not get lost as they wander!

How to personalise your product

  • Consider the personalisation you would like. The character limits are: Line one 22 characters, line two - 20 characters, line three - 25 characters, line four - 20 characters, line five - 10 characters.
  • Place your order
  • Email your personalisation details directly to johnlewis@treatrepublic.com within 3 days of ordering including your name, order number and contact details. Please note if you do not want any personalisation added you will still need to contact this email address to inform them of this or they will not be able to proceed with you order. If you are purchasing this as a gift and do not wish the recipient to be contacted, please ensure that you put your own contact details for this order. You may be contacted by the supplier about your order.

    • Refund policy

    This item is made to your specification and so is excluded from our usual returns policy. Find out more. This does not affect your statutory rights.

name: Swyft Model 01 Storage Ottoman
description:
Say goodbye to less-than-beautiful storage solutions with Swyft's Storage 01.

Designed in a round shape it has a comfortable foam top for solo sitting, or for those well-deserved feet-up moments. Inside, you’ll find a sturdy hardwood and solid beech frame that’s made to last, with a soft fabric lining.

About Swyft's fabric options

All inherently durable and resilient to everyday life, the boucles, wools, chenilles, and soft linens offer a softer, more textured option. The velvets, linens, suedes, and cottons are all made with stain-resistant threads so you don't need to worry about your clumsy friend, over-excited child or boisterous pet making a mess.

About Swyft's Eco-Velvets
These fabrics are woven from 100% recycled polyester and are GRS (Global Recycled Standard) certified. The yarns are extruded from post-consumer PET bottles, repurposing thousands of plastic bottles that would otherwise end up in the ocean or landfill. These fabrics are also OEKO-TEX 100 certified, meaning they've been thoroughly tested beyond national and international requirements to ensure all components are fully free from any substances which may be harmful to human health. Those are some pretty impressive conditions, but they still perform as you would expect from velvets as they're durable yet have that soft matt touch with a plush dense pile.

Delivered in a box
No matter how tight your entry space, or how many flights of stairs you need to contend with, Swyft sofas are easily delivered as they will come in a box that can be lifted by one person, or a series of boxes depending on the size. It'll take some assembly when it gets to you, but it does mean you don't need to worry about the logistics of actually getting your new sofa into your home. And you won't need any tools as every Swyft product uses the innovative Swyft-lok mechanism which makes assembly quick and easy.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: The Ordinary 100% Organic Cold Pressed Rose Hip Seed Oil, 30ml
description:
This formulation contains 100% Rosehip Seed Oil that is cold-pressed and organic.

Rosehip Seed Oil has a variety of topical benefits and is rich in linoleic acid, linolenic acid and pro-vitamin A. Due to its unique composition, it is able to balance the look of visible sebum production, reduce signs of ageing, and provide antioxidant support to the skin.

Rosehip Seed Oil also hydrates the skin by enhancing the skin's moisture barrier and enhances skin radiance by reducing the look of uneven tone and dullness.

Good to know: Our Rose Hip Seed Oil is completely unrefined and imparts a natural scent. This scent is not an indication of rancidity.

Make the moment with a match for every power move.

#LeaveYourMark: this long-lasting lipstick is for everyone, for any occasion. Explore all the must-have shades in 3 on-trend finishes.

description:
Offering a slightly relaxed fit for that natural broken-in feel, when the weekend calls, reach for these jeans by AllSaints.

Less Laundering
Itâ€™s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible.

name: Hourglass Ambient Lightng Blush, Sublime Flush
description:
Discover a new way to blush. This groundbreaking hybrid combines the customized lighting effects of Ambient Lighting Powder with a spectrum of breathtakingly modern hues. The result is seamless, soft-focus and multidimensional colour.

Features & Benefits:

  • Fuses universally flattering Ambient Lighting Powders with vivid cheek colours, creating airy, lightweight hybrid blushes
  • Provide seamless, soft-focus, multidimensional colour
  • Developed with Photoluminescent Technology for depth and dimension
  • Hand-made using an advanced miscelare technique (“to mix” in Italian), creating the perfect balance of pigment and powder; no two look alike
  • Delivers a natural radiant finish with buildable colour
  • Complements all Ambient Lighting products
  • Vegan and cruelty-free

Hourglass Innovation:

Photoluminescent Technology: The optically transparent particles alter the appearance of the skin by manipulating and refracting favorable light. The result is skin that looks smooth, even and enhanced - not masked. The soft-focus technology minimises the look of wrinkles and imperfections, neutralises discolouration and emulates the appearance of young, healthy skin.

Available in 8 shades:

  • Dim Infusion - A subdued coral blush fused with Dim Light to add warmth
  • Diffused Heat - A vibrant poppy blush combined with Diffused Light for a subtle halo effect
  • Luminous Flush - A champagne rose blush fused with Luminous Light to evoke a candlelit glimmer
  • Radiant Magenta - A golden fuchsia blush combined with Radiant Light for a summer glow
  • Mood Exposure - A soft plum blush fused with Mood Light to brighten the complexion
  • Etheral Glow - A cool pink blush fused with Ethereal Light for a moonlit luminosity
  • At Night (New) - A brick red combined with Radiant Light to recreate a vibrant fireside gleam
  • Sublime Flush (New) - A soft pink blush fused with lilac for a natural flush

name: Too Faced Born This Way Matte Foundation, Brulee
description:
This Too Faced Born This Way Matte 24 Hour Long Wear Foundation is an oil-free, 24-hour matte foundation that masterfully diffuses the line between makeup and skin.

This matte formula stays completely colour true, while covering imperfections to reveal the all-day, shine-free look of naturally flawless skin.

35-shades of waterproof, lightweight wear, and coverage so undetectable, they’ll think you were Born This Way.

Infused with key ingredients for unbeatable benefits, Hyaluronic Acid gives a smoother and more youthful appearance. Alpine Rose helps empower skins health and resilience, whilst Coconut Water aids in replenishing skins moisture levels for all-day hydration. Your skin has never felt as good as it looks!

All shades are matched to the original Born This Way Foundation.

  • Flawless natural finish
  • Oil-free and oil-controlling formula
  • Transfer resistant
  • Waterproof
  • Longwearing for 24 hours
  • Non-acnegenic
  • Infused with Coconut Water that works to boost skin's radiance for a dewy, healthy-looking finish whilst creating the perfect base for your complexion perfection. Alpine Rose to improve skin's appearance and Hyaluronic Acid for long-lasting hydration
  • Available in 35 natural shades!
