name: Sanderson Active Emulsion, Greens, Oxney Olive, 2.5L
description:
Designed for living, Active Emulsion is our most versatile finish yet. This highly durable classic matt finish is ideal for busy family homes and can be used on walls and woodwork. Whether it's a living room, hallway, busting kitchen diner, playroom or bathroom, this washable finish is made for family life.

Please note: it is not always possible to render colours precisely in our images and colours will also change according to different lighting conditions and environments. We strongly recommend you purchase a tester pot before ordering.

name: Cyberjammies Jack Check Cotton Pyjama Shorts, Burgundy Mix
description: These classic pyjama shorts are made from super-soft 100% cotton and boast a timeless check print. They're fully elasticated at the waist, have an adjustable front drawstring and a true fly-front. Perfect for sleeping, as well as casual days at home.

name: AND/OR Eloisa Flatform Metallic Lace Up Trainers, Gold
description:
The Eloisa chunky trainers from AND/OR are the ideal piece to add some pop to your summer wardrobe.

The minimalist laced upper is a design classic, designed in metallic canvas with metal eyelets and metallic counter piece to make a truly versatile style.

With a flatform, Eloisa is finished with a padded topline collar for added comfort.

name: DIOR 5 Couleurs Couture Eyeshadow Palette
description:
The iconic 5 Couleurs eyeshadow palette has been reinvented to become 5 Couleurs Couture. Each eyeshadow palette – Denim, Black Bow, Rouge Trafalgar and Mitzah – corresponds to an iconic piece of the DIOR wardrobe, offering a nuanced array of intense shades that are easy to use and combine.

Depending on the palette, the eyeshadow can be matte, satiny, pearly, metallic or glitter. The eyes are enhanced with luminous makeup in sublime colours.

Benefits:

A creamy and comfortable texture that does not migrate into the crease of the eyelid.

  • Intense colour with extreme wear
  • A variety of finishes: matte, satin, pearly, metallic, highlighter and glitter
  • A duo of double-ended applicators for full creative expression

Developed by the DIOR laboratories, the palettes contain a fine and creamy powder with a no-makeup feel that delivers immediate, long-wearing colour intensity to suit any skin tone. For the first time at DIOR, the palettes are enriched with skincare ingredients: aloe vera for its smoothing properties and pine oil for its softening action.

name: Brakeburn Primrose Showerproof Soft Shell, Blue
description:
On-trend and with a practical edge, this jacket by Brakeburn falls just to the knee in a mid-length cut.

Designed for practicality with a built-in hood and with a pretty floral print, it is showerproof and is created from a clever blend of hard-wearing fabrics for longevity of wear.

name: Bella Dahl Cami Crinkle Jumpsuit, Bright Night
description: In a relaxed, crinkle texture, this jumpsuit is the perfect base to your summer wardrobe.

name: John Lewis Baby Organic Cotton Rich Lace Trim Socks, Pack of 3, Cream
description: Keep baby's tootsies looking cute with this pack of three lace foldover socks from us. Made from a soft cotton blend with pretty scalloped lace edging, they're machine washable for easy laundering.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Baby & Toddlerwear (0-3 yrs) | View All Baby & Toddler Accessories

name: John Lewis Wool Rich 42oz Twist Carpet
description:
This single ply carpet is made from a wool rich blend and weaved in a classic twist style. The material is hard-wearing, making this carpet suitable for places of very heavy domestic use, such as a lounge or hallway. It is also moth resistant.

Both hard-wearing and soft, this carpet is crafted from a natural-synthetic mix. The advantages of this are:

  • Strong - perfect for busy rooms
  • Less shedding
  • High level of durability and resilience - looks and feels good for longer

Both hard-wearing and long-lasting, this carpet has a twist construction which creates a unique texture throughout. Its durable quality makes it perfect for high-traffic rooms.

This carpet is designed for heavy domestic wear making it ideal for living rooms, dining rooms and halls.

name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Correcting Concealer, 41CP
description:
Meet Stay Naked Correcting Concealer, our vegan formula*, real-skin matte concealer with 25% more pigment and full coverage that lasts up to 24 hours.

With an expanded range of 25 shades, there's enough coverage to go around. Our Stay Naked Concealer lineup features 9 shade intensities, 3 mastertones, and 5 undertones. Use this flexible, real-skin matte finish concealer for just about anything, from covering imperfections to highlighting cheekbones.

The patented wave tip applicator makes it easy to get the right level of coverage - use the flat side for precise, light application or lean into the curve for smooth glide-on application and a heavier dose of product.

*Vegan formula: does not contain animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

name: Tiffany Rose Plain Waterfall Midi Maternity Dress, Taupe Grey
description: Fall head over heels in love with this Waterfall Midi Maternity Dress. A stunning design featuring ruffle details on the skirt and a gathered cross-over neckline. Dress up or down and feel the best version of you in this fun and flattering design. Perfect for nursing too!

name: Royal Selangor Mini Harry Potter and Dumbledore Set
description:
A cute pair of Harry Potter figurines from Royal Selangor, made from pewter and rendered in the official Harry Potter Charms manga style.

The set includes Harry himself astride his broom and Professor Dumbledore, perhaps about to declare house points or deliver an important speech to the pupils of Hogwarts.

Pewter is almost maintenance-free as it does not react with the air to oxidise or tarnish. It can attract dust and dirt, but all that's required is an occasional wipe with a soft, damp cloth. Over time pewter develops a pleasing and subdued patina unique to the metal which is part of the beauty of investing in this material.

name: Polo Ralph Lauren Custom Slim Polo Shirt, Jamaica Heather
description:
Polo's run through Ralph Lauren's DNA. It's just a well-known fact. The American designer might not have invented the style, but he did perfect it. And this is the classic: made from cotton-jersey, it’s got a two-button collar, slim-fit, and, of course, the polo player at the chest.

As you are probably quite aware, this can be worn with practically anything, but we are lobbying for smart-casual: think slim-fitting with neutral tones and oxford, not brogues.
breadcrumbs: Men | Men's Polo Shirts & Rugby Shirts

name: Gucci Rouge de Beauté Brillant High-Shine Lipstick, 714 Jody Wild Mauve
description:
Deeply moisturising over 24 hours, long-lasting and with high shine power, Rouge de Beauté Brillant High-Shine Lipstick has the caring properties of a balm with lipstick levels of pigmentation. Delivering a veil of vibrant, glowing colour with an instant sensation of moisture, this hybrid lipstick envelops the lips with hydration and beautiful colour. Creating a luminous glowing finish and long-lasting shine, Rouge De Beauté Brillant serves as an in-between for a sheer and satin lipstick. Formulated with nourishing and antioxidant ingredients, the creamy texture highlights and preserves the natural beauty of the mouth, so lips look fuller and plumped to perfection.

Based on a precise combination of Flower Oils, Fruit Butters, and Hyaluronic Acid, the Rouge de Beauté Brillant High-Shine Lipstick formula helps to nourish the lips while delivering high shine colour. It is infused with luxurious and moisturising Black Rose Oil and Peony Oil combined with Jojoba Seed Oil and Karité Butter for 24-hour moisturising effects. The addition of Hyaluronic Acid not only provides immediate hydration, but long-lasting hydration too, as well as a subtle lip-plumping and smoothing effect.

Beautiful shine and glowing colour combine in vibrant hues of reds, pinks, corals and natural shades. The design was given a full makeover, in order to represent and celebrate the uniqueness of Rouge de Beauté Brillant High-Shine Lipstick. Encased within an elegant slim gold bullet, the precious outer lid is wrapped in a unique black and gold print: inspired by vintage brooches, the choice of this particular pattern bears witness once again to the Creative Director’s passion for collectable objects of desire.

name: John Lewis Wool Ribbed Tights
description:
We've made these ribbed tights with a blend of wool fibres to ensure maximum comfort and warmth during the cold weather.

John Lewis & Partners introduces a new style philosophy focused on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe. Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch. Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. John Lewis & Partners: it’s how you wear it.

name: Brakeburn Quilted Zip Through Hoodie, Grey
description:
Crafted from a cotton blend to see you through particularly breezy days, this quilted​ sweatshirt by Brakeburn has a drawstring neckline and full-length sleeves.

Timeless and adaptable with its pattern-free design, you’ll find yourself reaching for this one again and again.

name: Hobbs Anastasia Lace Shift Dress, Navy/Oyster
description:
A simple shift style that does it all, this knee-length dress by Hobbs is embellished with intricate lace.

With a round neckline and cap sleeves, this piece will have you dancefloor ready.

name: Urban Decay Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation, 70WY
description:
Find your naked truth with Stay Naked Weightless Liquid Foundation, our vegan formula, buildable medium coverage liquid foundation with a real-skin matte finish that lasts up to 24 hours.

We designed this lineup of 50 shades with 9 shade intensities, 3 mastertones, and 7 undertones to dial in your precise colour match. Our waterproof, long-wear foundation feels like wearing nothing, thanks to a breathable, flexible vegan formula* that moves with you - all day and all night, up to 24 hours!

It not only feels better, it even looks better with its stay-true colour, which minimises the appearance of pores - so you always look like you.

*Vegan formula: does not contain animal-derived ingredients or by-products.

name: Deja Day Grace Supportive Plunge Bra
description: The Grace Mesh Bra is the perfect everyday bra with pretty details. This plunge mesh bra is comfortable and supportive with its underwire, and low cut it's the perfect balance between practical and sexy without trying too hard.

name: TEMPUR® Hybrid Elite Pocket Spring Memory Foam Mattress, Medium, Double
description:
Tempur's innovative Hybrid range features the brand's advanced memory foam material to relieve pressure points, as well as the addition of Precision Micro Coil technology to provide responsive support.

The Hybrid Elite mattress inherently reacts to your movements while you sleep as its memory foam filling conforms to your individual shape and weight for truly personalised comfort. It absorbs motion too, so you won't be disturbed during the night when sharing with a partner.

Housing Tempur's state of the art micro coil system, each spring is made from cold drawn steel and individually pocketed for exceptional support. Working with the foam filling, the micro coils respond to provide enhanced comfort while you sleep.

Finally, the stylish geometric QuickRefresh zip-around cover can be conveniently removed to be aired, and even washed at 60°C, helping to keep your sleep surface fresh and hygienic night after night.

Bed Base
TEMPUR® mattresses must always be placed on a well-ventilated bed base or frame with feet, castors or legs to allow air to circulate freely, preventing moisture from accumulating. Bases with sturdy platform tops or slats (no more than 90mm apart) work best in terms of support and airing, check everything is level before you put your mattress on to use. A sprung divan can be used but this base will initially alter the feel as it creates more movement to the mattress making it feel softer. Once users are comfortable on the mattress the TEMPUR® mattress will then work. However, if the sprung base is poor then this could change the feel and pressure-relieving qualities. Therefore, we don't recommend using a TEMPUR® mattress on a sprung base over 5 years old as it is vital that the support for the mattress is level and free of dips or hollows which can occur from prior use. When making up the bed, TEMPUR® do not recommend using a valance between the mattress and chosen bed base as this can restrict air flow to the mattress.

Getting used to the feel
If your previous mattress or pillow used more traditional methods of support such as springs, feathers or fibre, it is likely your TEMPUR® products will initially feel different. The unique pressure-relieving properties of the TEMPUR® foam material, can take some time for the body to get used to. The more time spent on or in bed: resting, reading or watching TV, the better. The extra movement helps the cells in the TEMPUR® foam material to open and as they open, the cells 'breathe' and respond more rapidly to the user's weight and shape.

Try before you buy
This is an important purchase and it’s worthwhile to try your choice of mattress in store to make sure it's right for you. Our store Partners will be able to tell you more about its benefits, and recommend options based on your needs. For more information, call 03452 661 805 and we can tell you where the range you’d like to view is on display.

name: Fjällräven Kånken Classic Backpack, Black
description:
Originally designed for Swedish school children in 1978, the Kanken from Fjallraven has become a well-loved and iconic backpack for children and adults around the world.

Ideal for college or the daily commute, this Scandinavian design classic is made from the brand's Vinylon F fabric, which is highly durable and repels moisture better than any other synthetic fabric.

The backpack features top carry handles, adjustable shoulder straps, two side pockets, and a zipped front pouch. It's finished with the brand label sewn on the front.

name: John Lewis Baby Rainbow & Spot Sleepsuits, Pack of 2, Green/Multi
description:
A snug and cosy set of two sleepsuits. Both made from 100% cotton jersey with chin guard, one design features rainbows and animals whilst the other features an all over spot with moon and cloud embroidery.

Better Cotton
By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting our investment in Better Cotton’s mission to help cotton communities survive and thrive while protecting and restoring the environment. Better Cotton Farmers are farmers who care for the environment and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing.
This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton.
bettercotton.org/massbalance
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Baby & Toddlerwear (0-3 yrs) | Baby & Toddler Sleepsuits

name: Raging Bull Classic Signature Full Zip Hoodie, Grey Marl
description:
True to their rugby roots, Raging Bull sizes are slightly more generous than other fashion brands. As always, we recommend referring to Raging Bull's size guide before ordering to ensure the best fit for you.

This supremely soft and comfortable hoodie has everything you expect from Raging Bull; great detailing and quality, as well as a super-soft and durable handle. This no-nonsense garment is ready for all off duty activities and is finished with iconic Bull logo detailing at the chest.

name: Live Unlimited Animal Print Top, Brown
description:
Not your average staple, this jersey top from Live Unlimited never loses relevance with its striking leopard print.

Framed with a modern square neckline and a sleeveless design, it is made with durable fabric for longevity of wear and is ideal for relaxed daytime wear.

name: LNDR Peachy Keen Workout Shorts
description: Made from the brand's PEACH PERFECT fabric, LNDR's PEACHY KEEN bike shorts are like any badass heroine: they have a soft touch, but with a firm hold. Figure hugging and silhouette smoothing, the high-rise silhouette boasts a flattering, seamed fit, making them perfect for strength and cardio, while a clever slip pocket at the side will hold your smartphone firmly in place when you take your workout outdoors. And since no one wants shorts that go see-through the second you squat, these are fully opaque to keep you completely covered.

name: Philips 8.1W LED R7s Non Dimmable Bulb, White
description: This 8.1W LED R7s bulb is equivalent to a powerful 60W. Non-dimmable, it's easy to install and offers a white light output.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Shop Lighting | Light Bulbs

name: Gina Bacconi Josette Floral Lace Sleeveless Dress, Rose
description:
Feel red carpet ready in the Josette corded lace dress by Gina Bacconi. This beautiful piece is a breath of fresh air, perfect for any formal event or dinner with the significant other.

The Josette is fully lined for added protection and features a concealed back zip fastening. The ruching at the side is flattering for the figure. Pair this sleeveless dress with your favourite heels and clutch bag.

name: Jigsaw Plisse Crew Neck Jumper
description: Shaped at the neck by a classic crew framing, this lightweight jumper by Jigsaw is cut from a cotton-rich blend for durable comfort that lasts.

name: John Lewis Braided Indoor/Outdoor Rug, L240 x W170 cm, Navy
description:
In a charming, braided style that adds texture and interested, this versatile rug is made using 510 recycled plastic bottles. With a flat finish making this rug ideal for busy, high-traffic rooms, the materials in this rug have been woven together by hand to create a strong construction.

Made using recycled materials, helping us to reduce our impact on the planet, this rug is made from 510 plastic bottles.

Worth knowing:

Due to the nature of the material and weave of this rug each one is unique, so yours may look slightly different to the one pictured.

About your new rug

  • We recommend John Lewis & Partners Rug Hold Underlay. It prevents your rug from moving underfoot and protects against colour transfer to the floor
  • Minimal pile shedding may occur. This will reduce over time, and shouldn't affect your rug's lifespan or performance
  • Vacuum occasionally. When vacuuming your rug, use suction only. Rotating brushes may damage your rug
  • Blot any spills with a clean, dry cloth. Do not rub. Spot clean using a mild soap solution
  • Textile backed
  • Specialist cleaning recommended
  • This rug can be used both indoors and outdoors, when using outdoors please avoid leaving the rug outside during long periods of time in poor weather allowing the rug to become saturated with water as this will cause the rug to deteriorate. When the rug is not in use please ensure the rug is clean and fully dry and store rolled up carefully in a warm and dry location.

name: BOSS Artwork Logo T-Shirt
description:
Refresh your approach to timeless staples with this crew neck t-shirt from HUGO BOSS.

Imbued with graphic appeal and an unmistakable logo, reach for off-duty denim to complete the look.

name: DIOR Addict Lip Maximizer, 007 Raspberry
description:
Discover the new Dior Addict Lip Maximizer, the iconic plumping and hydrating lip gloss for instant volume-boosting shine, in an ultra-couture case. Now made with 90%* natural-origin ingredients, the caring formula is infused with hyaluronic acid and nourishing cherry oil to offer spectacular shine with 24 hours** of hydration and absolute comfort. Its minty fresh effect gives the lips an addictive refreshing sensation. Upon application, the lips appear instantly and remarkably plumped.

Dior Addict Lip Maximizer gloss is now available in two intensities and four finishes with a mirror shine effect– classic, intense, shimmer and holographic.

*Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. **Instrumental test on 30 subjects.

How to use:

Can be worn on its own for a gloss effect with mirror shine. Can be layered over the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Glow for a nourished lip-volumizing makeup effect. Can be used as a primer under Dior’s bestselling Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil for the ultimate glow look.

Good to know: External use on non-irritated lips only. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of irritation other than a tingling sensation or localised heat linked to the product, discontinue use.

name: Superdry Overhead Hoodie
description:
The ultimate choice when it comes to casual comfort, this hoodie from Superdry is plain for easy mixing and matching.

Kicking back with its relaxed hood and long sleeves, it offers a soft feel thanks to its cotton blend and is an everyday wardrobe essential.

name: Tommy Hilfiger Baby Essential Logo Crew Neck Sweatshirt and Joggers Set, Black
description: Made from organic cotton, this essential set comes with a crew neck sweatshirt, with signature Tommy Hilfiger branding across the chest, and a pair of joggers, cuffed at the ankle and with a drawstring waist for the perfect fit.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Baby & Toddlerwear (0-3 yrs) | Baby & Toddler Sweatshirts, Fleeces & Hoodies

name: Georg Jensen Heart Keyring
description:
A fabulous keyring that acts as a gesture of love and affection when presented as a gift or for one's own self use. Crafted using stainless steel, the lock is as secure as the love and affection that it symbolises.

Designer Klaus Rath had to take a number of things into consideration when he created - a new keyring from Georg Jensen. It is often said, the number of keys on one's keyring denotes the amount of responsibility in one's life. Whether there are many keys or only one, the function of the keyring to hold them together securely is a top priority. The design of a keyring, these days, reflects much about the owner's personality.

Based on the design of Georg Jensen's most popular keyring Ellipse, two new motifs have been added to the collection - a heart and flower. Ellipse has a masculine design, where as the new motifs have a definite feminine sensibility, the heart made for loved ones and the flower brightens the day. All three keyrings are crafted in stainless steel and act as the lock, securing the keys in place. The practical locking system and durable polyurethane strap of the key rings ensures the keys will never fall off.

name: TOMS Alpargata Espadrilles
description: Long live your slip-ons. The Alpargata Cupsole has the same casual look as our iconic slip-on but with an extra durable rubber cupsole designed to keep your shoes like-new for longer.

name: John Lewis + Swoon Radley RHF Chaise End Sofa, Wildwood Green Velvet
description:
Designed by Swoon, made by us. With a shared commitment to exceptional design and quality, we've collaborated to create an exclusive furniture collection for the modern home.

The Radley is truly palatial, as if its come out of a country mansion drawing room. Featuring pleated button tufting along the back and a wonderfully curved back it instantly creates a regal feel in the lounge.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: Clarke & Clarke Breton Furnishing Fabric, Sage
description:
Clarke & Clarke's Breton fabric is part of an authoritative collection of stripes and checks. Timeless, durable and versatile, all fabrics are dual-purpose and made from 100% cotton.

Ready to place your order, or looking for more advice?
If you'd like to purchase this fabric and are ready to place your order, or need a little styling advice, there are a few ways we can help. Firstly, come into any of our shops and speak to a Partner. Alternatively, we can come to you as we're also now offering in-home appointments. Finally, you can book a virtual appointment and speak to one of our estimators on a video or phone call. They'll provide a combination of practical measuring, design and technical advice.
Find out more about our services and book an appointment here

name: Monica Vinader Nura Tiny Fine Chain Bracelet, Silver
description:
Created with a wave of interlocking links, this chain bracelet from Monica Vinader comes with a blank canvas that you can have engraved on the front or back.

Secured with a lobster clasp, it'll ensure a secure fit as you go about your day.

This item can be personalised via Monica Vinader's complimentary engraving service in one of their Monica Vinader stores. Simply bring your purchases to your nearest engraving store for your complimentary engraving service. Create a uniquely special gift to treasure forever.

name: Little Acorns Portofino Changing Table Dresser, Grey/Oak
description:
This dresser combines style with practicality and functionality. Made to grow with your child, it comes with a removable changer that allows you to use it as a changing table when they're little and remove it when they're not. Plus the 3 drawers give you plenty of storage space for all their outfits or whatever you need to store.

The matching cot bed and wardrobe can be bought separately for a complete look.
breadcrumbs: Baby & Child | Nursery Furniture & Furnishings | Dressers & Drawers

name: Marc O'Polo Round-Neck Sleeveless Wool Knit Jumper
description: Framed with a classic round neckline, this jumper from Marc O'Polo is made from a rich wool blend.

name: Chelsea Peers Fruit Print Swimming Shorts, Orange
description: Redefine your swim wardrobe with these vibrant print swim shorts. With an abstract design featuring fruit and tropical leaves dangling from chains, these shorts are made from 100% recycled materials.

name: Ted Baker Caieta Organza Spot Pussy Bow Blouse, White
description:
Bringing a neat addition to your wardrobe, this blouse from Ted Baker is refreshed with timeless spots.

Designed with a pussybow tie neck for an elevated feel and short sleeves, it is made with durable fabric for longevity of wear and is perfect for evenings out.

name: John Lewis Fishes Paper Napkins, Pack of 16
description:
Whether you live by the water or simply have an affinity for aquatic creatures, dive deep into the contemporary fish trend with this playful herringbone design. The whimsical motif works well with warm metallic colours such as gold which look great against the simple navy and white backdrop.

This product is made from tissue that carries the FSC® logo. The FSC® label ensures that the wood used to produce these premium paper napkins is sourced from sustainable forests, that are managed in a way that meets the social, economic and ecological needs of present and future generations.

name: Jamie Oliver by Tefal Cook's Classics Stainless Steel All-In-One Pan, 30cm
description:
The Jamie Oliver by Tefal Cook's Classics range is expertly crafted from stainless steel for exceptional durability and a lifetime of professional-style home cooking. The stainless steel is resistant to corrosion, stains and shocks. With this design's helpful Thermo-Signal technology, the heat indicator hourglass icon disappears when the pan reaches the optimum cooking temperature.

The extra-thick Titanium non-stick surface is scratch-resistant and toxin-free.

This shallow pot is dishwasher safe, but hand-washing is recommended to preserve the life of the pan. The extra-thick Thermo-Fusion™+ base heats quickly and evenly on all hobs, even induction. The pot is also oven safe up to 250°C, so you can start cooking dishes on the hob and finish cooking in the oven.

Key features:

  • Stainless steel for durability and even heat distribution
  • Superior Titanium anti-scratch, non-stick coating
  • Oven safe up to 250°C
  • Dishwasher safe but hand wash is recommended
  • Thermo-Signal heat indicator
  • For use on any hob, including induction

    • Metal handles
    Metal pan handles heat up when cooking so be careful when lifting pans and touching handles. Please use an oven glove, mitt or pot holder when handling hot pans.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Cooking & Baking | Pots & Pans

name: Michael Kors Georgie Leather Wedge Heel Trainers, Black
description:
Freshening up your wardrobe, this pair of trainers by Michael Kors is made with supple leather for a luxurious feel.

Sitting on a wedge heel, they are designed with a closed toe that has smart-casual covered.

Heel height: 4cm

name: 360 Sweater Elaine Plain Cashmere Jumper
description: 360 Cashmere's Elaine is a stylish, edgy take on a classic cashmere knit. Cut from sumptuously soft lightweight fabric, you won't want to take it off.

name: Barbour Pendle Beanie Hat, Light Grey
description: The Pendle beanie hat from Barbour provides a great option for weekend looks with a fuss-free design and pared-back aesthetic. Soft and comfortable, this knitted accessory features a turn-up hem with branding to the front to finish.

name: John Lewis Flora Lace Up Trainers, Navy
description:
Designed with fun and function in mind, our Flora trainers are the ideal finishing touch for your weekend outfit.

Made in Europe with European leathers, they feature tonal laces in a range of bright contemporary colours.

The Flora is fully leather lined and has a foam-padded footbed for underfoot comfort all day long.

Also available in Wide Fit.

John Lewis & Partners introduces a new style philosophy focused on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe.

Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch.

Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. John Lewis & Partners: it’s how you wear it.

name: John Lewis Pear & Blackcurrant Scented Candle, 485g
description: Enjoy the fruity scents of pear and blackcurrant - perfect for rooms when you want to add a burst of fragrance.
breadcrumbs: Home & Garden | Candles & Home Fragrance | Candles

name: John Lewis Draper Motion Large 3 Seater Leather Sofa with Footrest Mechanism, Dark Leg, Demetra Charcoal
description:
Stylish and functional, the Draper range is thoughtfully designed with tailored arms and slender legs. The modern proportions of the button detail seat and back cushions offer a deep and supportive sit. This is our Motion version which includes a footrest, so you can really kick back and relax with your feet up.

Worth knowing…
As leather is a natural product, there are natural characteristics on each leather hide used to make our sofas. These could be things like brand marks, insect bites or wrinkles. A large sofa could be made with as many as four hides so there may also be some slight colour variation, however, we have strict guidelines to make sure any noticeable marks aren't in a prominent place. These distinctive qualities also mean that no two pieces of leather furniture will be exactly the same.

It's the little things
We care about our furniture; how it's designed, the materials used and the people who make it. That's why every detail is carefully considered, with more than 20 quality checks, to ensure you're as proud of it as we are.

Try before you buy
We're confident in our furniture's quality, but it's always a good idea to check that it's a good personal fit for you. We can't display all of our pieces in all of our stores – they just won't fit – but call us on 03452 661805 and we can help you find a nearby location to see, sit or even lie on it before ordering.

name: DELSEY Chatelet Air 2.0 80cm 4-Wheel Extra Large Trunk Suitcase, Angora
description:
Tough, hard-wearing, secure. The Chatelet Air collection turns stress-free travel into an art form.

Secured with a TSA lock and DELSEY's patented SECURITECH® closure system, the case is 3 times more resistant to intrusion than a conventional zipper and offers optimal security for your luggage. The pullers are also reinforced, up to 3 times stronger than standard drawbars.

Inside, the zipped mesh divider and pockets keep personal effects protected, with four double wheels providing rolling comfort through the airport and beyond.

name: CHANEL Rouge Coco Bloom Hydrating And Plumping Lipstick, 140 Alive
description:
A new shine is born: intense, plumping and long-lasting.

ROUGE COCO BLOOM is a lip colour that blossoms with the radiance of beauty in motion.

CHANEL Research has created its first hydrating and plumping lipstick that combines intense, long-lasting colour and sculpting shine in a patented formula.

Ultra-comfortable, it works in two phases.

  • Phase 1: colour capture: The colour instantly sets on the lips, creating an intense, long-lasting result
  • Phase 2: plumping power: The ultra-glossy oil phase rises to the surface and reflects light off the lips, providing spectacular shine

For eye-catching, mesmerising lips that light up the face.

The CHANEL Makeup Creation Studio has dreamed up a new range of deep, radiant shades: a combination of nudes, soft, warm or ebullient pinks, luminous oranges, powerful reds, sensual browns and magnetic plums.

Its new black and silver packaging recalls the mirror-like finish of the lipstick. It also features a transparent cap that allows each intense shade to peek through.

name: French Connection Jacqueline Cable Knit Jumper, Violet Tulle
description: With a crew neckline for simple yet sleek style, this jumper by French Connection is finished in a textured handle for a tactile edge and is designed with future seasons in mind with its longlasting fabric.

name: 2022 Apple iPad Pro 12.9", M2 Processor, iOS, Wi-Fi & Cellular, 2TB, Space Grey
description:
The ultimate iPad just got a serious upgrade. Supercharged by Apple’s M2 processor, the 12.9” 2022 iPad Pro delivers astonishing performance, an amazingly advanced display, and stunning speed. Fitted with a Liquid Retina XDR display, a 12MP 122° field of view front camera, plus 12MP wide & 10MP ultra-wide rear cameras, your photos, videos, entertainment and games all look staggeringly good. This is a Pro level iPad experience.

Supercharged by M2
Say hello to next-gen performance. An evolution of Apple Silicon chip technology, the M2 processor delivers even more of the power and efficiency introduced by the M1. Blaze through your work with a more powerful 8-core CPU, and create stunning graphics with a lightning-fast 10-core GPU. With a 40 per cent faster Neural Engine to accelerate machine learning tasks and 50 per cent more memory bandwidth, M2 brings astonishing performance and new capabilities to iPad Pro.

5G speed
Get ready for the next generation of mobile internet and experience incredible download speeds, or play games without the fear of lag. Please contact your mobile service provider regarding the 5G options currently available to you.

Liquid Retina XDR display
iPad Pro’s Liquid Retina XDR display delivers crisp detail with a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, making viewing and editing HDR photos and videos, and enjoying your favourite movies and TV shows, a visual dream. It features 1,000 nits of full-screen brightness and 1,600 nits of peak brightness, while advanced display technologies such as P3 wide colour, True Tone and ProMotion keep everything supremely smooth and authentically lifelike.

Stunning photo and video capability
Featuring a front-facing, ultra-wide camera with a 12MP sensor and a 122 degree field of view, you’re all set to look your best for FaceTime and superior selfies.

The iPad Pro’s rear 12MP wide and 10MP ultra-wide cameras are able to help you capture exceptional photos and videos. And with support for ProRes video capture, iPad Pro is a complete mobile video studio. Thanks to the more powerful ISP in the M2 chip, iPad Pro now features Smart HDR 4 for even more true-to-life imagery.

LiDAR Scanner
The LiDAR scanner measures how long it takes light to reflect back from objects, so it can create a depth map of any space you’re in and unlock the world of immersive AR experiences.

Face ID security
Thanks to Face ID, it takes just a glance to unlock your iPad, or a gentle swipe up to access features. It's engineered for secure unlocking, and works in both portrait and landscape orientations. You can even log-in to apps and pay securely with just a glance, so there's less passwords to remember.

The speed of Thunderbolt
The supremely fast and versatile Thunderbolt port works with existing USB-C connectors and opens up an extensive ecosystem of high-performance accessories, such as external storage, displays, and docks. It’s capable of data transfer speeds of up to 40Gb/s.

Pro accessories
Apple Pencil, Magic Keyboard and the Smart Keyboard Folio open up even more ways to use your iPad Pro. Draw a masterpiece, take notes or make a business plan. These versatile accessories are designed to take your work and creativity to the next level. All accessories are sold separately.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device’s lifespan – this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.


We can help you get set up
Our specialist in-store Partners can help you to get set up on your new device right away. We can help with anything from transferring personal data from your old device to setting up any essential features.

Visit your local shop with your new device, or simply Click & Collect from a John Lewis & Partners when purchasing and an available Technical Support Partner can set it up for you.

Find out more details and pricing for our tech support services.

name: Mulberry Heavy Grain Leather Card Wallet
description:
Featuring the signature Mulberry Postman's Lock plaque, this card holder has three slip pockets for cards, folded notes or papers, along with a nappa lining.

Caring for your Mulberry product

To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine.

Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily.

Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection.

Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

name: NRBY Mimi Lyocell Harem Trousers
description: Easy, slim-fitting harem-meets-cargo pant with these Mimi trousers from NRBY. In supersoft washed lyocell twill, a clean front waistband, elasticated back, side seam pockets and elasticated hem all come together to provide a perfect fit every time. The utility pocket stitching adds a nice modern touch to the piece.

name: Pure Collection Lana Slim Leg Trousers, Black
description:
These lovely wool-blend trousers from Pure Collection combine a soft, comfortable feel with neat, pared-back tailoring.

In a smart design, these trousers feature classic pleat detail with belt loops and side pockets.

Pair with a stunning silk blouse for simple elegance.

name: Bose SoundLink Micro Water-resistant Portable Bluetooth Speaker with Built-in Speakerphone, White Smoke
description:
Packing mighty Bose sound, but tiny and tough enough to take with you anywhere, the Soundlink Micro is a Bluetooth speaker built for super sound, on-the-go, in any condition. With small speakers that deliver deceptively big sound, a rugged and waterproof body, and a handy and secure strap, it can go with you on all your outdoor adventures. Now you can take renowned Bose sound quality with you ...wherever!

Brilliant Bluetooth Connection
Enjoy the freedom of wireless portable listening. The Soundlink Micro pairs quickly and easily with your smart phone, tablet or other Bluetooth device. Voice prompts talk you through pairing, making it simple. You can connect to two devices at once, and it remembers the eight most recent devices you've used, so reconnecting is a cinch.

Bose Sound
The speakers in the Soundlink Micro have been engineered purposefully to deliver bigger sound than its size suggests. The custom-designed transducer and silicone passive radiators ensure detail and clarity in the mids and trebles, backed up with booming bass. It all adds up to the sound quality Bose are renowned for.

Tough & Waterproof
Designed for high performance in all conditions and all weathers, the Soundlink Micro exceeds the IPX7 waterproof rating. So don't worry if you're caught in pouring rain, by the pool, by the sea ...even if you drop it in the water! Constructed from silicone rubber housing, it'll reliably resist scratches, dents, and knocks as well.

Super Secure Strap
It's designed to tag along easily wherever you want to go. A tear-resistant strap holds it tightly on your backpack, bike, cool box...wherever. With a durable, super reliable grip you get confidence it'll stay securely no matter how many times you use it.

Phone Friendly
With a built-in mic, it's simple to take hands-free calls when your phone's connected, and all with the excellent clarity of a Bose speaker.

Battery Beauty
A rechargeable lithium-ion battery gives you up to six hours of rich Bose quality sound, and is easily recharged by Micro-USB.

Optimised for Bose SimpleSync
This product is optimised for Bose SimpleSync. With SimpleSync technology, you can pair it with selected Bose speakers and soundbars for a personalised listening experience.

name: Newgarden Sisine 70  Wireless Outdoor Floor Lamp, Natural
description: This wireless outdoor floor lamp from Newgarden will become an essential to illuminate any space in your garden giving it a natural touch. The Sisine 70 incorporates a 900 lumen portable rechargeable bulb that requires no installation, you only have to bring it close to the lamp and it will adhere due to its magnetised base. This bulb also includes a remote control to turn it on and off and regulate the intensity.
breadcrumbs: Furniture & Lights | Shop Lighting | Floor Lamps

name: John Lewis Selsey Semi Flush, 3 Pendant Ceiling Light, Blue/Chrome
description:
This addition to the Selsey range will add an elegant feature to your home, perfect for eye-catching placement above your dining table, kitchen island or in any living space. The three pendants that hang from the fitting will lend just the right amount of warm light to your room.

Each piece of Selsey glass is different, as its unique, blue bubble finish requires individual hand-blowing. Based on the Czech technique of using bubbles to create a decorative effect, its appealingly natural, yet imperfect aesthetic indicates exquisite craftsmanship.

name: Philips 2.8W B22 LED Non Dimmable Candle Bulbs, White, Set of 2
description:
This set of two 2.8W LED bulbs from Philips are non-dimmable, have a lifespan of up to 15,000 hours and have a standard bayonet cap (B22) fitting.

Offering a warm white light output, these bulbs are equivalent to a powerful 25W.

Worth Knowing
This table is a guide to show you the equivalent bulb wattage across halogen, LED and traditional bulbs.

Traditional WattageHalogen EquivalentLED EquivalentLumens
25W18W4W250+
40W28W5.5W-6W470+
60W42W8W-8.5W806+
75W53W11W1055+
100W70W13W1521+

Watts vs Lumens
A bulb's watt rating indicates how much energy it uses. The higher the watt, the more energy it requires. Lumens is a measure of brightness. The higher the number of lumens, the brighter the light.

description: Upgrade your trouser collection this season with these versatile cargo trousers from Calvin Klein. Made from cotton with flap utility pockets down the leg to elevate your casual style. Finished with a slim leg to ensure a modern fit.

Framed with a collared neck and elbow length sleeves, it is made with light yet robust blended fabric for longevity of wear and pairs effortlessly with floaty summery skirts for warm days spent with good friends.

name: Coach Willow Leather Shoulder Bag, Black
description: Not too big, not too small, Willow is the perfect go-anywhere shoulder bag with space for all of your day-to-day essentials. Crafted of colour block polished pebble leather, it has an organised interior with one zip compartment, two open compartments and a snap pocket for small necessities. The roomy trapezoid shape secures with Coach's Signature turn-lock closure and can be carried by hand, on the shoulder or crossbody.

name: Cyberjammies Heart Print Pyjama Bottoms, Grey/Multi
description: With a sweet heart print that you are sure to love, these pyjama bottoms by Cyberjammies won't let you down when it comes to comfort thanks to its soft cotton blend.

name: John Lewis Emily Kitami Bed Frame, Single, Cotton Effect Grey
description:
Meet Emily Kitami, our bed frame which is designed with an upholstered headboard and a sturdy solid oak base. It's a classic, clean-lined style but the well-padded headboard gives it a modern edge, and it can be upholstered in a fabric of your choice. Sprung slats in the base provide a supportive and responsive foundation for your mattress.

Assembly service
Our assembly service is included in the selling price for our Made to Order beds. At the same time as delivery, we'll build your new bed and place it in your room of choice. We'll take away all of the packaging too, for recycling.

Built with Smart Slats
This bed frame is designed with wider slats at the shoulders, lumbar and feet. They provide maximum support for you and your mattress so that you experience perfect spinal alignment while you sleep. The standard slat caps are black so we have added grey slat caps to ensure that you know where to place the wider slats.

Choose from one of our fabrics:

Our Band A fabric, Cotton Effect is woven to create a linen-effect feel

Our Band A fabric, Brushed Tweed is woven with man-made fibres, making it exceptionally durable and versatile

Our Band B fabric, Soft Touch Chenille has a velvet-style, chenille feel. It's woven with man-made fibres to create a beautifully soft yarn and can appear two-tone in different lights

Our Band B fabric, Deep Velvet is a soft and luxurious velvet-like fabric

Our Band B fabric, Mole is a soft and cosy woven wool-blend. Piling and bobbling may occur naturally over time

Our Band B fabric, Relaxed Linen is durable, resilient and versatile, woven from man-made and natural fibres

Our Band C fabric, Aquaclean Harriet is made from a short, dense pile of velvet that has a soft, brushed finish. An Aquaclean treatment has been applied to this resilient fabric which means you can banish the majority of household stains with water. The treatment covers every fibre with an invisible coating so it doesn't need to be retreated or re-coated. It will naturally develop lines, scuffs and shading over time.

Want to see it first?
You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture before ordering. Pop into one of our shops to see the full range of colours and fabrics on offer. If you do plan on doing this, we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

name: John Lewis Velvet Ready Tied Bow Tie

name: Mango Croc Effect Double Zip Purse, Beige
description: Two compartments are always better than one. With this handy purse from Mango you get two zipped pockets to help organise your payment essentials in whatever way suits you. Crafted with a croc-effect print, it is equal parts practical and chic.

name: Reiss Odell Side Stripe Joggers

name: Ro&Zo Floral Tiered Ruffle Midi Dress, Black

name: Swyft Bed 02 Upholstered Bed Frame, Super King Size, Velvet Teal
description:
Getting your beauty sleep never looked so good. Bed 02 from Swyft is upholstered in either cool linen or sumptuous velvet in a range of calming neutrals or punchy tones, and it's designed with a contemporary winged headboard that nods to Mid-Century style.

Sweet dreams in minutes
Thanks to their signature Swyft-fix system, this bed frame can be easily assembled or disassembled in a matter of minutes. There's no need for small parts or screwdrivers so you're free to throw complicated instructions to the wind. Just like their sofas, simply slot each frame piece together, and you're done. No flat-pack stresses here.

Built to last
A dedicated team in Portugal made Bed 02, and they really know their stuff. Not only will this bed make a statement in your space, it has practicality covered too. It sits atop a solid ash wood plinth with stylish tapered legs and it has supportive sprung slats in the base. The headboard is also foam-filled so those breakfast-in-bed mornings can be enjoyed in comfort.

About Swyft's fabric options

All inherently durable and resilient to everyday life, the boucles, wools, chenilles, and soft linens offer a softer, more textured option. The velvets, linens, suedes, and cottons are all made with stain-resistant threads so you don't need to worry about your clumsy friend, over-excited child or boisterous pet making a mess.

Want to see it first?

If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. name: Cluedo Junior Game
description:
Crack the case of the missing cake in the Cluedo Junior board game. This whodunit game for younger kids brings all the mystery and fun of Cluedo to a whole new story.

In Cluedo Junior, players search under furniture and characters for clues to who took the missing cake, when they took it and what they drank with it. Roll the dice to see if you can move characters, look under them or look under the furniture for clues. Keep an eye out for the trail of crumbs!

As kids uncover clues, they’ll rule out choices and build their case. In the Cluedo Junior board game, you’ll have to be the first to discover what happened to win.

Was it Colonel Mustard at three o’clock with the milkshake? Or Dr Orchid at one o’clock with the apple juice? The answer is different every time, so join the search for clues to find out!

name: Mango Apple Faux Leather Trousers, Black

name: 2023 Apple MacBook Pro 14", M2 Pro Processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD
description:
It's a beast. Equipped with the super-fast M2 Pro chip, for work or play, Apple's 2023 MacBook Pro promises groundbreaking performance and amazing battery life. The 120Hz ProMotion HDR display makes everything feel super fluid and responsive on-screen, while the six-speaker sound system fills the room with its punchy bass. All this, along with versatile connectivity options and more pixels than ever before. "Pro" doesn't even come close to grasping how much power this notebook puts in your hands.

Keep in contact
Thanks to the onboard 1080p HD camera and three-mic array, this device, once connected to Wi-Fi, will let you take part in video chats or virtual meetings, enabling the fun of the office to come to you.

Apple M2 Pro Processor
It's fast. Really fast. The 10-core CPU and 16-core GPU can take on even the most demanding of projects, flying through graphics-intense projects and video editing with ease. And it'll remain just as fast whether on battery or plugged in. So wherever inspiration strikes or duty calls, run with it.

RAM packed
RAM is your computer's short-term memory. The more you have, the faster you can expect apps to launch and run. There's 16GB in this MacBook Pro, so it's super comfortable running lots of complex tasks at once, and you won't see any obvious lag or slowdown.

Easy on the eyes
Featuring Apple's ProMotion technology, the screen can refresh up to 120 times per second, giving you smoother scrolling, improved responsiveness and crystal-clear visuals. It'll adapt to whatever's on-screen; ramping up performance when you need it most, and preserving battery when you don't.

Magic Keyboard
Doing away with the Touch Bar, the updated Magic Keyboard comes with a full-height function key row and Touch ID, which gives you a fast, easy, secure way to unlock your Mac and sign in to apps and sites.

Liquid Retina XDR display
Featuring 1000 nits brightness, the Liquid Retina XDR MiniLED display delivers deep blacks and bright whites. HDR content comes to life in photos, videos and games, allowing you to experience more true-to-life colours with realistically vivid details.

A battery that just keeps going
A single charge lets you watch up to 18 hours of video content or up to 12 hours browsing online. And Fast charge comes as standard, giving you up to 50% battery life in just 30 minutes.*

Connecting your other devices
Transfer photos and videos with an SDXC card reader. Connect to TVs or displays with HDMI output. Listen using a 3.5mm headphone jack that detects and automatically adjusts for high‑impedance headphones. Connect to high-speed peripherals or displays with three Thunderbolt 4 ports. And fast‑charge using the quick‑releasing MagSafe 3 port.

*Please note: The 67W wall charger included with this notebook is not capable of Fast-charge. The 96W USB-C Power Adapter, available here, is required for this feature.

Additional information: manufacturers often update their Operating System (OS) software over the course of a device's lifespan – this means that your product might ship with a more advanced OS than specified.
